texts.original_text: Hi! I am a humble Maid!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy master has a big heart to match his\xfffebig belly. He's a gourmet!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I am looking for ingredients that will\xfffemake his heart jump for joy!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmmm... This is not quite what I'm\xfffelooking for.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't think my master will be satisfied\xfffewith such a smell...

texts.original_text: Sniff, sniff... Sniff, sniff...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, I don't smell anything interesting\xfffein your Bag.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you find a gourmet ingredient,\xfffeplease let me know!

texts.original_text: Leo: Check me out! The excitement\xfffeof the big city has made me stronger!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Leo: Check me out! The excitement\xfffeof the big city has made me stronger!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looks like I wasn't wound up enough...\xfffeI need a little more urban atmosphere.
texts.translated_text: Looks like I wasn't wound up enough...\xfffeI need a little more urban atmosphere.

texts.original_text: Maybe all of this excitement is\xfffea little too much for me...
texts.translated_text: Maybe all of this excitement is\xfffea little too much for me...

texts.original_text: Living in a fast-paced environment\xfffehelps with a person's growth.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis city is a model for those words.
texts.translated_text: Living in a fast-paced environment\xfffehelps with a person's growth.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis city is a model for those words.

texts.original_text: Silvia: My glasses have locked onto you!\xfffeLet's have a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Silvia: My glasses have locked onto you!\xfffeLet's have a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Th-there’s a crack in my glasses.\xfffeThat was a smashing battle!
texts.translated_text: Th-there’s a crack in my glasses.\xfffeThat was a smashing battle!

texts.original_text: The time I've spent here has been\xfffereally fun and wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, being this surrounded by excitement\xfffemakes you miss nature somehow!
texts.translated_text: The time I've spent here has been\xfffereally fun and wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, being this surrounded by excitement\xfffemakes you miss nature somehow!

texts.original_text: All the buildings reflected in my glasses\xfffeare dazzling enough to make me dizzy!
texts.translated_text: All the buildings reflected in my glasses\xfffeare dazzling enough to make me dizzy!

texts.original_text: Dave: Hey! You've got it goin' on!\xfffeLet's get a Pokémon battle goin'\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto see who's got it goin' on the most!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Dave: Hey! You've got it goin' on!\xfffeLet's get a Pokémon battle goin'\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto see who's got it goin' on the most!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No one's got it goin' on more than you!\xfffeYou can hang out with all the tough guys!
texts.translated_text: No one's got it goin' on more than you!\xfffeYou can hang out with all the tough guys!

texts.original_text: The life of a tough guy in the city is\xfffea little much.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhite Forest is looking better\xfffeall the time.
texts.translated_text: The life of a tough guy in the city is\xfffea little much.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhite Forest is looking better\xfffeall the time.

texts.original_text: This city is big and tough, just like me!\xfffeWhat do you think of me now? I've got it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegoin' on as much as it will go! Right?
texts.translated_text: This city is big and tough, just like me!\xfffeWhat do you think of me now? I've got it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegoin' on as much as it will go! Right?

texts.original_text: Britney: Hey there! You over thataway!\xfffeHave a Pokémon battle with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBring heaps of cute Pokémon, OK?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Britney: Hey there! You over thataway!\xfffeHave a Pokémon battle with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBring heaps of cute Pokémon, OK?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Whoa, what was that?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are way strong!\xfffeThere's no chance I'm keepin' up!
texts.translated_text: Whoa, what was that?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are way strong!\xfffeThere's no chance I'm keepin' up!

texts.original_text: All the racket in this city is getting\xfffeto be too much.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to lie on my back in the\xfffewide-open spaces!
texts.translated_text: All the racket in this city is getting\xfffeto be too much.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to lie on my back in the\xfffewide-open spaces!

texts.original_text: I have to try somethin' awful to keep up\xfffewith city life! But I still enjoy it a bit.
texts.translated_text: I have to try somethin' awful to keep up\xfffewith city life! But I still enjoy it a bit.

texts.original_text: Robbie: In Black City, my groove's\xfffegetting into a groove! And in battle,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll never lose!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Robbie: In Black City, my groove's\xfffegetting into a groove! And in battle,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll never lose!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ooh, now I'm grooveless.\xfffeBut I'll get my groove back, so\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelet's battle again sometime!
texts.translated_text: Ooh, now I'm grooveless.\xfffeBut I'll get my groove back, so\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelet's battle again sometime!

texts.original_text: Aaah! I've grooved my way into a rut!\xfffeI want to take a break in White Forest!
texts.translated_text: Aaah! I've grooved my way into a rut!\xfffeI want to take a break in White Forest!

texts.original_text: Developing and developing.\xfffeBlack City changes every day!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI love that about this place!
texts.translated_text: Developing and developing.\xfffeBlack City changes every day!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI love that about this place!

texts.original_text: Miki: Hello!\xfffeI'm a fan of sudden beginnings!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's get right to the Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Miki: Hello!\xfffeI'm a fan of sudden beginnings!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's get right to the Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, gosh. I already lost?\xfffeSudden endings, I'm not such a fan of!
texts.translated_text: Oh, gosh. I already lost?\xfffeSudden endings, I'm not such a fan of!

texts.original_text: It's too busy and noisy, and it's enough\xfffeto make a slow-paced person like me\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedizzy. I want to relax in White Forest.
texts.translated_text: It's too busy and noisy, and it's enough\xfffeto make a slow-paced person like me\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedizzy. I want to relax in White Forest.

texts.original_text: I was worried, since I'm a little laid back\xfffeand do things at my own speed,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat Black City and I aren't a good fit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it'll work out, and it's fun here!
texts.translated_text: I was worried, since I'm a little laid back\xfffeand do things at my own speed,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat Black City and I aren't a good fit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it'll work out, and it's fun here!

texts.original_text: Ryder: Hyah! Hello!\xfffeI want to test my strength against you!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's OK, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Huh... So that's how much I've improved.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks! Battling with you\xfffehas given me a goal!
texts.translated_text: Huh... So that's how much I've improved.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks! Battling with you\xfffehas given me a goal!

texts.original_text: Hyah! Hyah... Hyah?\xfffeMy heart's not really into it.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMaybe I just can't concentrate here.
texts.translated_text: Hyah! Hyah... Hyah?\xfffeMy heart's not really into it.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMaybe I just can't concentrate here.

texts.original_text: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince strong people gather here, it's\xfffethe optimal place for a test of strength!
texts.translated_text: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince strong people gather here, it's\xfffethe optimal place for a test of strength!

texts.original_text: Karenna: Faster! Faster! I'm ready\xfffeto go! Please spar with me!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Karenna: Faster! Faster! I'm ready\xfffeto go! Please spar with me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Thank you very much! I still haven't\xfffetrained enough. I need to be faster!
texts.translated_text: Thank you very much! I still haven't\xfffetrained enough. I need to be faster!

texts.original_text: There are many things to learn from\xfffebattle, but to improve on what I learned,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to run and train in the forest.
texts.translated_text: There are many things to learn from\xfffebattle, but to improve on what I learned,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to run and train in the forest.

texts.original_text: There is a lot to learn from battles!\xfffeI want to battle more and more!
texts.translated_text: There is a lot to learn from battles!\xfffeI want to battle more and more!

texts.original_text: Doug: Hello, hello! Nice to work with you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow about a Pokémon battle to celebrate\xfffeour new acquaintance?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey! You must be Unova's best!
texts.translated_text: Hey! You must be Unova's best!

texts.original_text: Black City has everything! But if there's\xfffeone thing it's missing, it's...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNature! Relaxation! I want to relax!
texts.translated_text: Black City has everything! But if there's\xfffeone thing it's missing, it's...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNature! Relaxation! I want to relax!

texts.translated_text: Black City is full of hustle and bustle!\xfffeI'm sure my work will progress here!

texts.original_text: Vincent: You don't really think you can\xfffebeat me, Black City's Ace Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Vincent: You don't really think you can\xfffebeat me, Black City's Ace Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: An Ace Trainer like me, losing?!\xfffeThis doesn't count! It just doesn't!

texts.original_text: I was born and raised in the city, but\xfffeI think nature is really great.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to go to White Forest.
texts.translated_text: I was born and raised in the city, but\xfffeI think nature is really great.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to go to White Forest.

texts.original_text: The awesomeness of this city\xfffespices up my life!
texts.translated_text: The awesomeness of this city\xfffespices up my life!

texts.original_text: Marie: Take deep, deep breaths before\xfffebattle. When your mind is clear,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe battle can begin!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Marie: Take deep, deep breaths before\xfffebattle. When your mind is clear,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe battle can begin!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I overthought things, and I lost...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes just acting on instinct\xfffemight be better.
texts.translated_text: I overthought things, and I lost...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes just acting on instinct\xfffemight be better.

texts.original_text: I was working on my paper, but now\xfffeI've got writer's block.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe getting some fresh air in\xfffeWhite Forest would clear my head.
texts.translated_text: I was working on my paper, but now\xfffeI've got writer's block.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe getting some fresh air in\xfffeWhite Forest would clear my head.

texts.original_text: Black City is really exciting, and there's\xfffealways so much going on.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt gives me lots of ideas!
texts.translated_text: Black City is really exciting, and there's\xfffealways so much going on.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt gives me lots of ideas!

texts.original_text: Lena: Since I started my journey as a\xfffePokémon Trainer, I haven't lost\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCan you make me lose?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Lena: Since I started my journey as a\xfffePokémon Trainer, I haven't lost\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCan you make me lose?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh. I really lost, didn't I...?\xfffeIt's strange. I'm usually calm, but now\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm a little frustrated.
texts.translated_text: Oh. I really lost, didn't I...?\xfffeIt's strange. I'm usually calm, but now\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm a little frustrated.

texts.original_text: In the end, everything returns\xfffeto nature, no matter what.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's why White Forest may\xfffebe so calming...
texts.translated_text: In the end, everything returns\xfffeto nature, no matter what.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's why White Forest may\xfffebe so calming...

texts.original_text: People build buildings because\xfffethey fear the power of nature.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's why I feel so calm here...
texts.translated_text: People build buildings because\xfffethey fear the power of nature.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's why I feel so calm here...

texts.original_text: Black City battles really\xfffemake a person excited, huh?
texts.translated_text: Black City battles really\xfffemake a person excited, huh?

texts.original_text: Hmmm. I think I'd like\xfffeto see somewhere else soon.
texts.translated_text: Hmmm. I think I'd like\xfffeto see somewhere else soon.

texts.original_text: Black City has so much to see.\xfffeI never get tired of it!
texts.translated_text: Black City has so much to see.\xfffeI never get tired of it!

texts.original_text: Molly: If you look at everything while\xfffewalking, you make eye contact with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich Pokémon will you use, Trainer who\xfffemet my gaze?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Molly: If you look at everything while\xfffewalking, you make eye contact with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich Pokémon will you use, Trainer who\xfffemet my gaze?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When you don't feel confident,\xfffelower your eyes as you walk.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat is a bit of wisdom.
texts.translated_text: When you don't feel confident,\xfffelower your eyes as you walk.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat is a bit of wisdom.

texts.original_text: When there is this much commotion,\xfffeit's hard to calm down.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to relax somewhere quiet.
texts.translated_text: When there is this much commotion,\xfffeit's hard to calm down.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to relax somewhere quiet.

texts.original_text: Black City always feels like it is\xfffegoing forward. It's really cool, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: Black City always feels like it is\xfffegoing forward. It's really cool, isn't it?

texts.original_text: My Pokémon is saying that was\xfffea good battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you think my Pokémon\xfffeis truly well mannered?
texts.translated_text: My Pokémon is saying that was\xfffea good battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you think my Pokémon\xfffeis truly well mannered?

texts.original_text: I love this place, but my Pokémon\xfffeseems unsatisfied.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should take it to White Forest.
texts.translated_text: I love this place, but my Pokémon\xfffeseems unsatisfied.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should take it to White Forest.

texts.original_text: This is definitely the best place for me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe constant change and development\xfffereally put me in high spirits.

texts.original_text: Ah, you are a strong person!\xfffeI can feel it in my heart.
texts.translated_text: Ah, you are a strong person!\xfffeI can feel it in my heart.

texts.original_text: I've grown a little tired of looking for\xfffemy Prince Charming.
texts.translated_text: I've grown a little tired of looking for\xfffemy Prince Charming.

texts.translated_text: There are many strong people in this\xfffecity, so I never get bored!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to meet more and more\xfffestrong people!

texts.original_text: That felt like being on the edge!\xfffeIt was thrilling and fun!
texts.translated_text: That felt like being on the edge!\xfffeIt was thrilling and fun!

texts.original_text: Aaahhh. I'm even getting tired of\xfffethrilling things. I want to pass time\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeslowly and simply with my Pokémon...
texts.translated_text: Aaahhh. I'm even getting tired of\xfffethrilling things. I want to pass time\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeslowly and simply with my Pokémon...

texts.original_text: Black City is great. It has culture,\xfffeand you can live comfortably.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think when you're picking a place\xfffeto live, living comfortably is important!
texts.translated_text: Black City is great. It has culture,\xfffeand you can live comfortably.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think when you're picking a place\xfffeto live, living comfortably is important!

texts.original_text: Gene: I can't remember how many\xfffePokémon I've encountered...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you test your powers\xfffeagainst someone like me?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gene: I can't remember how many\xfffePokémon I've encountered...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you test your powers\xfffeagainst someone like me?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmmm... I still have a long way to\xfffego as a Trainer.
texts.translated_text: Hmmm... I still have a long way to\xfffego as a Trainer.

texts.original_text: I want to meet more Pokémon\xfffein my day-to-day life.
texts.translated_text: I want to meet more Pokémon\xfffein my day-to-day life.

texts.original_text: You can keep battling more and more\xfffeand test your power here!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBlack City is a great city!
texts.translated_text: You can keep battling more and more\xfffeand test your power here!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBlack City is a great city!

texts.original_text: Your efficient fighting style\xfffeis truly wonderful!
texts.translated_text: Your efficient fighting style\xfffeis truly wonderful!

texts.original_text: Maybe there's more to life\xfffethan efficiency...
texts.translated_text: Maybe there's more to life\xfffethan efficiency...

texts.original_text: Efficiency is everything in\xfffebattling and in business.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBlack City is efficient.\xfffeI like that in a place!
texts.translated_text: Efficiency is everything in\xfffebattling and in business.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBlack City is efficient.\xfffeI like that in a place!

texts.translated_text: Miho: I'm adorable, and so is my Pokémon!\xfffeDo you think you can win against us?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How can we lose when we're so cute?
texts.translated_text: How can we lose when we're so cute?

texts.original_text: I've been thinking lately that it would be\xfffebetter for my Pokémon and me to get back\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto nature...
texts.translated_text: I've been thinking lately that it would be\xfffebetter for my Pokémon and me to get back\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto nature...

texts.original_text: You can get everything in Black City, so\xfffeI'm sure I can find things that will help\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeme become cuter and stronger!
texts.translated_text: You can get everything in Black City, so\xfffeI'm sure I can find things that will help\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeme become cuter and stronger!

texts.original_text: I see...\xfffeI must be weak, then...
texts.translated_text: I see...\xfffeI must be weak, then...

texts.original_text: I'm a little tired of living a life where\xfffeI'm worried about how people see me.
texts.translated_text: I'm a little tired of living a life where\xfffeI'm worried about how people see me.

texts.original_text: In Black City, I can always confirm what\xfffekind of guy I am by battling others.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's easy to understand.

texts.original_text: Did some of my excitement\xfffeget through to you?
texts.translated_text: Did some of my excitement\xfffeget through to you?

texts.original_text: In Black City, you can quickly let me know\xfffehow you feel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis directness feels really great!

texts.translated_text: My oh my...\xfffeI lost!

texts.translated_text: Even if I buy a lot of stuff, I'm still\xfffeunsatisfied... I have times like that!

texts.translated_text: My business opportunity!\xfffeIt's going up in smoke!!

texts.original_text: Time is limited!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to always give things my all\xfffeso I don't regret anything!

texts.original_text: I apparently still haven't done enough\xffferesearch on Pokémon battling.
texts.translated_text: I apparently still haven't done enough\xffferesearch on Pokémon battling.

texts.translated_text: All I think about every day is\xfffePokémon battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut maybe it would be better\xfffeto think about other things, too...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI think that sometimes.

texts.original_text: If I'm in Black City, I can focus on\xfffePokémon battling and get really good!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll try to master one thing!
texts.translated_text: If I'm in Black City, I can focus on\xfffePokémon battling and get really good!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll try to master one thing!

texts.original_text: The result is a loss.\xfffeIt's a beautiful, clear answer.

texts.original_text: In Black City, you can get a clear answer\xfffeif you battle...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's satisfying for a researcher.

texts.original_text: Rosa: Life is just killing time.\xfffeDon't you think so?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlay with me for a bit!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: I managed to kill some time!

texts.translated_text: I might not know what to do with a life of\xfffekilling time every day!

texts.original_text: I lost! This city doesn't fit me well.
texts.translated_text: I lost! This city doesn't fit me well.

texts.original_text: Just staying in one place...\xfffeI'd like to try living like that.
texts.translated_text: Just staying in one place...\xfffeI'd like to try living like that.

texts.translated_text: Wandering and having Pokémon battles!\xfffeI like living like this!

texts.original_text: I couldn't win! But this is one of the\xfffethrills of battling!
texts.translated_text: I couldn't win! But this is one of the\xfffethrills of battling!

texts.original_text: Recently, I've been thinking I would like\xfffeto take a more leisurely trip without any\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeparticular destination in mind.

texts.original_text: In Black City, I can enjoy Pokémon\xfffebattles, and it fits my\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejourney perfectly!

texts.translated_text: Grace: I am about to show you the beauty\xfffeof artistic Pokémon battling!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease be overwhelmed!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The combination of you and your Pokémon\xfffewas very beautiful!!
texts.translated_text: The combination of you and your Pokémon\xfffewas very beautiful!!

texts.original_text: There is a limit to the beauty a person\xfffecan create...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI feel like that when I look at this city.
texts.translated_text: There is a limit to the beauty a person\xfffecan create...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI feel like that when I look at this city.

texts.original_text: My heart dances in delight at the\xfffecalculated beauty of a city built\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby people!
texts.translated_text: My heart dances in delight at the\xfffecalculated beauty of a city built\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby people!

texts.original_text: Black City\xfffeProsperous and Vibrant
texts.translated_text: Black City\xfffeProsperous and Vibrant

texts.original_text: Many people come here from White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter White Forest and invite\xfffepeople, they might move here.
texts.translated_text: Many people come here from White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter White Forest and invite\xfffepeople, they might move here.

texts.original_text: I'll work hard to do my job really well,\xfffeand I'll make a lot of money!
texts.translated_text: I'll work hard to do my job really well,\xfffeand I'll make a lot of money!

texts.original_text: This is a wonderful city where you can\xfffefind whatever you want!
texts.translated_text: This is a wonderful city where you can\xfffefind whatever you want!

texts.original_text: Ha ha ha!\xfffeYou want more toys, huh?
texts.translated_text: Ha ha ha!\xfffeYou want more toys, huh?

texts.original_text: My, my. Oh, this child.\xfffeWe'll buy you another.
texts.translated_text: My, my. Oh, this child.\xfffeWe'll buy you another.

texts.original_text: I'm tired of this toy!\xfffeI want a more fun toy!
texts.translated_text: I'm tired of this toy!\xfffeI want a more fun toy!

texts.original_text: The country, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm amazed anyone can live in a place\xfffethat's so inconvenient.
texts.translated_text: The country, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm amazed anyone can live in a place\xfffethat's so inconvenient.

texts.original_text: Nature and slow-paced living?\xfffeI don't need a boring life like that!
texts.translated_text: Nature and slow-paced living?\xfffeI don't need a boring life like that!

texts.original_text: Welcome to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the city of dreams, greed, and\xfffemore greed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I am Black City's boss, so I'm\xfffea whirlpool of greed!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the city of dreams, greed, and\xfffemore greed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I am Black City's boss, so I'm\xfffea whirlpool of greed!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This city is filled with vibrant people\xfffewho are like big piles of greed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmm. Try defeating \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0000 of the\xfffepeople outside.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen I'll respond to your greed.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This city is filled with vibrant people\xfffewho are like big piles of greed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmm. Try defeating \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0000 of the\xfffepeople outside.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen I'll respond to your greed.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I see you've defeated \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0001 of them.\xfffeHmph. Keep trying.
texts.translated_text: I see you've defeated \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0001 of them.\xfffeHmph. Keep trying.

texts.original_text: What?\xfffeYou've already beaten \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0000 people?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou...\xfffeYou're a greedier one than I expected.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDeep down, you want a lot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI like you!\xfffeI'll respond to your greed.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: What?\xfffeYou've already beaten \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0000 people?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou...\xfffeYou're a greedier one than I expected.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDeep down, you want a lot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI like you!\xfffeI'll respond to your greed.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Next, try to defeat \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0004 people.\xfffeShow me how greedy you really are.
texts.translated_text: Next, try to defeat \xf000Ȅ\x0001\x0004 people.\xfffeShow me how greedy you really are.

texts.original_text: Wow! You're the best!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're definitely the greediest\xfffeof the greedy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou put the other greedies to shame!
texts.translated_text: Wow! You're the best!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're definitely the greediest\xfffeof the greedy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou put the other greedies to shame!

texts.original_text: Wow! It's all really expensive, so these\xfffethings must be great...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want this, and that, and that\xfffething over there!
texts.translated_text: Wow! It's all really expensive, so these\xfffethings must be great...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want this, and that, and that\xfffething over there!

texts.original_text: I want to become more powerful and make\xfffemore money!
texts.translated_text: I want to become more powerful and make\xfffemore money!

texts.original_text: If you have the money, you can get\xfffeanything you want in this city!
texts.translated_text: If you have the money, you can get\xfffeanything you want in this city!

texts.original_text: This city has everything!\xfffeAbsolutely everything!
texts.translated_text: This city has everything!\xfffeAbsolutely everything!

texts.original_text: Hmmm... Isn't there a better job where\xfffeI can make more money?
texts.translated_text: Hmmm... Isn't there a better job where\xfffeI can make more money?

texts.original_text: I wonder how strong this Pokémon\xfffecould become...
texts.translated_text: I wonder how strong this Pokémon\xfffecould become...

texts.translated_text: Everything I want is here!\xfffeIf I only had money! If only!

texts.translated_text: The power of civilization is amazing...\xfffeWe can make anything people could want!

texts.original_text: Hey there!\xfffeI'm Fennel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeProfessor Juniper asked me\xfffeto give you something.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease, follow me!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hey there!\xfffeI'm Fennel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeProfessor Juniper asked me\xfffeto give you something.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease, follow me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Are you looking for the Gym Leader?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is not here.\xfffeHe could be in the Trainers' School.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to challenge him,\xfffeplease go find him.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Trainers' School is not far from\xfffethis Gym.

texts.original_text: You don't seem to have any Gym Badges,\xfffeso I can't let you by.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith your lack of training, you'll have\xfffea hard job making any progress.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me give you some friendly advice.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChallenge a Gym Leader in this town,\xfffeand test your ability!

texts.original_text: You don't seem to have\xfffeany Gym Badges.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith your lack of experience,\xfffeyou'll have a hard time in the future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere's some friendly advice.\xfffeChallenge a Gym Leader in this town,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand test your ability!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The scientist Fennel was looking for you\xfffea little while ago!
texts.translated_text: The scientist Fennel was looking for you\xfffea little while ago!

texts.original_text: The scientist Fennel was looking for you\xfffea little while ago!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The scientist Fennel was looking for you\xfffea little while ago!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wow!\xfffeIt's a shiny Gym Badge!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGetting that Badge proved you have skill\xfffeenough to handle whatever comes next!
texts.translated_text: Wow!\xfffeIt's a shiny Gym Badge!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGetting that Badge proved you have skill\xfffeenough to handle whatever comes next!

texts.original_text: The Striaton City Gym Leader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo matter how often I challenge him,\xfffehe always uses Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat I don't like...
texts.translated_text: The Striaton City Gym Leader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo matter how often I challenge him,\xfffehe always uses Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat I don't like...

texts.original_text: If a Pokémon type and a move type are\xfffethe same, the move's power will increase!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Gym Leader told me!
texts.translated_text: If a Pokémon type and a move type are\xfffethe same, the move's power will increase!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Gym Leader told me!

texts.original_text: At the site of an old factory,\xfffeat a place we call the Dreamyard,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere's an unusual Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat can make dreams appear!
texts.translated_text: At the site of an old factory,\xfffeat a place we call the Dreamyard,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere's an unusual Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat can make dreams appear!

texts.original_text: I too studied at the Trainers' School\xfffewhen I was a beginner.
texts.translated_text: I too studied at the Trainers' School\xfffewhen I was a beginner.

texts.original_text: Do you know how Technical Machines work?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA TM can instantly teach a move to a\xfffePokémon. You can use it over and over\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith different Pokémon. How cool is that?
texts.translated_text: Do you know how Technical Machines work?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA TM can instantly teach a move to a\xfffePokémon. You can use it over and over\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith different Pokémon. How cool is that?

texts.original_text: Er... Um...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGrass-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Fire-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!
texts.translated_text: Er... Um...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGrass-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Fire-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!

texts.original_text: Er... Um...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWater-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Grass-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!
texts.translated_text: Er... Um...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWater-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Grass-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!

texts.original_text: Um... Er...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFire-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Water-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!
texts.translated_text: Um... Er...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFire-type Pokémon are\xfffeweak against Water-type moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know more stuff!

texts.original_text: Some Trainers train themselves and\xfffetheir Pokémon in the Dreamyard.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou might think about going there...\xfffeCould be you'll find something...
texts.translated_text: Some Trainers train themselves and\xfffetheir Pokémon in the Dreamyard.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou might think about going there...\xfffeCould be you'll find something...

texts.original_text: I'm so glad you came.\xfffeI'd like to give you this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm so glad you came.\xfffeI'd like to give you this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: To live quietly and do a lot of fishing...\xfffeI truly live my ideal existence!
texts.translated_text: To live quietly and do a lot of fishing...\xfffeI truly live my ideal existence!

texts.original_text: Pokémon can be found in dark places, too.\xfffeThat's when a Dusk Ball can do the trick!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHere's one for you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Pokémon can be found in dark places, too.\xfffeThat's when a Dusk Ball can do the trick!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHere's one for you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A Dusk Ball works well at night\xfffeor in a cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlus, its name is excellent!\xfffeThe Dusk Ball. Dusk!
texts.translated_text: A Dusk Ball works well at night\xfffeor in a cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlus, its name is excellent!\xfffeThe Dusk Ball. Dusk!

texts.original_text: Striaton City\xfffeThree Stand Together as One!
texts.translated_text: Striaton City\xfffeThree Stand Together as One!

texts.original_text: Dreamyard ahead.\xfffeA place for novice Trainers.
texts.translated_text: Dreamyard ahead.\xfffeA place for novice Trainers.

texts.original_text: Trainers' School\xfffeBrush up on Pokémon knowledge!
texts.translated_text: Trainers' School\xfffeBrush up on Pokémon knowledge!

texts.original_text: Striaton City Pokémon Gym\xfffeLeader: ---\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTriple Trouble!
texts.translated_text: Striaton City Pokémon Gym\xfffeLeader: ---\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTriple Trouble!

texts.original_text: Welcome to the Striaton City\xfffePokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome to the Striaton City\xfffePokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm Chili! I light things up with\xfffeFire-type Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm Chili! I light things up with\xfffeFire-type Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm a Water-type specialist,\xfffeand my name is Cress.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePleased to make your acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm a Water-type specialist,\xfffeand my name is Cress.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePleased to make your acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And my name is Cilan.\xfffeI like Grass-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: And my name is Cilan.\xfffeI like Grass-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cilan: Um, you see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs for why the three of us, um,\xfffeare all here is, well, er...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cilan: Um, you see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs for why the three of us, um,\xfffeare all here is, well, er...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Chili: Oh, enough! Listen up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe three of us will\xfffedecide whom you'll battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt'll be based on the type of\xfffethe first Pokémon you chose!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Chili: Oh, enough! Listen up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe three of us will\xfffedecide whom you'll battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt'll be based on the type of\xfffethe first Pokémon you chose!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cress: That is indeed the case.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the partner you first chose was\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type, it seems.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cress: That is indeed the case.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the partner you first chose was\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type, it seems.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ta-da! The Fire-type scorcher Chili--\xfffethat's me--will be your opponent!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ta-da! The Fire-type scorcher Chili--\xfffethat's me--will be your opponent!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That is correct!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt shall be I and my esteemed Water\xfffetypes that you must face in battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That is correct!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt shall be I and my esteemed Water\xfffetypes that you must face in battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Nothing personal... No hard feelings...\xfffeMe and my Grass-type Pokémon will...um...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe're gonna battle, come what may.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Nothing personal... No hard feelings...\xfffeMe and my Grass-type Pokémon will...um...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe're gonna battle, come what may.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Yeeeeooow!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime to play with FIRE!!\xfffeI'm the strongest of us brothers!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Yeeeeooow!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime to play with FIRE!!\xfffeI'm the strongest of us brothers!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What incredible luck for you--you get to\xfffebattle the best among the three of us.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: What incredible luck for you--you get to\xfffebattle the best among the three of us.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: So, um, if you're OK with me, I'll, um,\xfffeput everything I've got into being, er,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou know, your opponent.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: So, um, if you're OK with me, I'll, um,\xfffeput everything I've got into being, er,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou know, your opponent.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww, man!\xfffeI was all fired up, too!
texts.translated_text: Aww, man!\xfffeI was all fired up, too!

texts.original_text: How exceedingly lucky for you\xfffethat you do not have to face me.
texts.translated_text: How exceedingly lucky for you\xfffethat you do not have to face me.

texts.original_text: ...Uh hm. I always seem to lose\xfffethe timing of...of the dance. Like that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrue enough, I did want to...\xfffewant to have a Pokémon battle with you.
texts.translated_text: ...Uh hm. I always seem to lose\xfffethe timing of...of the dance. Like that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrue enough, I did want to...\xfffewant to have a Pokémon battle with you.

texts.original_text: Whoa ho! You're on fire!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, it's the Pokémon League's rule.\xfffeTake this Gym Badge!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Whoa ho! You're on fire!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, it's the Pokémon League's rule.\xfffeTake this Gym Badge!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Why, you're quite remarkable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's the Pokémon League's rule, so--\xfffeplease take this Badge.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Why, you're quite remarkable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's the Pokémon League's rule, so--\xfffeplease take this Badge.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ...What a surprise.\xfffeYou...are very strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like not even\xfffeChili or Cress could beat you...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ...What a surprise.\xfffeYou...are very strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like not even\xfffeChili or Cress could beat you...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Chili!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Chili!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Cress!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Cress!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Cilan!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received\xfffethe Trio Badge from Cilan!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gym Badges are proof\xfffeof a Trainer's abilities.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have one Badge, Pokémon, including\xfffetraded Pokémon up to Lv. 20,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill obey you without question.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe also want you to have this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gym Badges are proof\xfffeof a Trainer's abilities.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have one Badge, Pokémon, including\xfffetraded Pokémon up to Lv. 20,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill obey you without question.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe also want you to have this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000 contains Work Up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use Work Up, the Pokémon's\xfffeAttack and Sp. Atk go up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, TMs can be used\xfffeas many times as you want.
texts.translated_text: \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000 contains Work Up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use Work Up, the Pokémon's\xfffeAttack and Sp. Atk go up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, TMs can be used\xfffeas many times as you want.

texts.original_text: In the Unova region, we are still\xfffenovice Gym Leaders.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich means the other Gym Leaders\xfffeare much stronger than we are.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe'll need to work hard and improve.
texts.translated_text: In the Unova region, we are still\xfffenovice Gym Leaders.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich means the other Gym Leaders\xfffeare much stronger than we are.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe'll need to work hard and improve.

texts.original_text: I can't believe TMs can be used\xfffeover and over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you wanted, you could use one to\xfffeteach all your Pokémon the same move!
texts.translated_text: I can't believe TMs can be used\xfffeover and over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you wanted, you could use one to\xfffeteach all your Pokémon the same move!

texts.original_text: If there were 17 siblings in\xfffethe Striaton City Gym...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere could be a specialist for\xfffeeach type of Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: If there were 17 siblings in\xfffethe Striaton City Gym...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere could be a specialist for\xfffeeach type of Pokémon.

texts.original_text: Cilan: In the Unova region, um,\xfffewe are still novice Gym Leaders.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich means, well, that other Gym\xfffeLeaders are much stronger than we are.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGoing...slow...and steady...is OK, so...\xfffewe compete with one another\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand get, um, stronger and stronger.
texts.translated_text: Cilan: In the Unova region, um,\xfffewe are still novice Gym Leaders.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich means, well, that other Gym\xfffeLeaders are much stronger than we are.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGoing...slow...and steady...is OK, so...\xfffewe compete with one another\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand get, um, stronger and stronger.

texts.original_text: Chili: Oh! It's you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour fire is more intense than\xfffewhen you got the Trio Badge!
texts.translated_text: Chili: Oh! It's you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour fire is more intense than\xfffewhen you got the Trio Badge!

texts.original_text: Cress: ...We heard about\xfffethe incident with N's Castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf we had received the message in time,\xfffethe three of us could have helped.
texts.translated_text: Cress: ...We heard about\xfffethe incident with N's Castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf we had received the message in time,\xfffethe three of us could have helped.

texts.original_text: Hello! I'm Clyde. I'm the guide for\xfffeTrainers challenging a Pokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe appreciate your challenging the Gym.\xfffeTake this to commemorate the occasion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hello! I'm Clyde. I'm the guide for\xfffeTrainers challenging a Pokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe appreciate your challenging the Gym.\xfffeTake this to commemorate the occasion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: One basic element of Pokémon battles is\xfffethe relationship between types.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you choose Pokémon with effective\xfffetypes and effective moves,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevictory is just a step away!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this Gym, you proceed by\xfffestepping on the switch with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe type that is effective against the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon type shown on the curtain.
texts.translated_text: One basic element of Pokémon battles is\xfffethe relationship between types.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you choose Pokémon with effective\xfffetypes and effective moves,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevictory is just a step away!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this Gym, you proceed by\xfffestepping on the switch with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe type that is effective against the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon type shown on the curtain.

texts.original_text: I hope you'll always remember the\xfffeincredible moment when you received\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis Gym Badge.
texts.translated_text: I hope you'll always remember the\xfffeincredible moment when you received\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis Gym Badge.

texts.original_text: Welcome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are very proud of our menu,\xfffewhich we adjust to suit each Trainer!
texts.translated_text: Welcome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are very proud of our menu,\xfffewhich we adjust to suit each Trainer!

texts.original_text: I've just learned that the more\xfffeGym Badges you win, the more items\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can buy at a shop!
texts.translated_text: I've just learned that the more\xfffeGym Badges you win, the more items\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can buy at a shop!

texts.original_text: Have you been catching Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you have more Pokémon,\xfffeyou're less likely to lose in battles,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand it's more fun to look at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokédex and PC Box!
texts.translated_text: Have you been catching Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you have more Pokémon,\xfffeyou're less likely to lose in battles,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand it's more fun to look at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokédex and PC Box!

texts.original_text: Fennel: You're going to meet all of the\xfffePokémon in the Unova region. Am I right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, the stairs are right here!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Fennel: You're going to meet all of the\xfffePokémon in the Unova region. Am I right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, the stairs are right here!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Fennel: My room is upstairs here.\xfffeCome on, go upstairs!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Fennel: My room is upstairs here.\xfffeCome on, go upstairs!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: After a battle, to my surprise,\xfffemy Pokémon evolved and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechanged its appearance!
texts.translated_text: After a battle, to my surprise,\xfffemy Pokémon evolved and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechanged its appearance!

texts.original_text: Some evolve and some don't...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon really are mysterious creatures.
texts.translated_text: Some evolve and some don't...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon really are mysterious creatures.

texts.original_text: You can't go upstairs now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause Fennel said she was testing\xfffesomething, and she had a scary look\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon her face!
texts.translated_text: You can't go upstairs now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause Fennel said she was testing\xfffesomething, and she had a scary look\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon her face!

texts.original_text: She may not look like it,\xfffebut Fennel is a great scientist!
texts.translated_text: She may not look like it,\xfffebut Fennel is a great scientist!

texts.original_text: So like I said, I'm Fennel, and as you can\xfffesee, I'm a scientist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn fact, the subject I'm researching\xfffeis Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeProfessor Juniper is my friend\xfffefrom college.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe asked me to help you guys.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: So like I said, I'm Fennel, and as you can\xfffesee, I'm a scientist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn fact, the subject I'm researching\xfffeis Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeProfessor Juniper is my friend\xfffefrom college.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe asked me to help you guys.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: So!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you something to help you.\xfffeThis is a Hidden Machine for you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: So!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you something to help you.\xfffeThis is a Hidden Machine for you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There are some moves that a Pokémon can\xfffeuse even when it is not fighting!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith this Hidden Machine, you can teach\xfffeyour Pokémon a move called Cut.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt can cut down a small tree.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you can use the Hidden Machine as\xfffemany times as you want, like a TM.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that great?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's difficult to make a Pokémon\xfffeforget a hidden move once it learns it.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There are some moves that a Pokémon can\xfffeuse even when it is not fighting!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith this Hidden Machine, you can teach\xfffeyour Pokémon a move called Cut.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt can cut down a small tree.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you can use the Hidden Machine as\xfffemany times as you want, like a TM.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that great?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's difficult to make a Pokémon\xfffeforget a hidden move once it learns it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And I'd like to ask you a favor, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is a place called the Dreamyard\xfffeon the outskirts of Striaton City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd like some of the Dream Mist that a\xfffePokémon there called Munna gives off.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith that, I'll be able to use\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0002Game Sync \xf000＀\x0001\x0000to collect save files of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious Trainers!
texts.translated_text: And I'd like to ask you a favor, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is a place called the Dreamyard\xfffeon the outskirts of Striaton City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd like some of the Dream Mist that a\xfffePokémon there called Munna gives off.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith that, I'll be able to use\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0002Game Sync \xf000＀\x0001\x0000to collect save files of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious Trainers!

texts.original_text: Fennel: Did Juniper ask you to complete\xfffethe Pokédex?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is a challenge to update the Pokédex\xffferegularly, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOops! I got distracted! Please bring me\xfffesome of the Dream Mist that Munna\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegives off in the Dreamyard!
texts.translated_text: Fennel: Did Juniper ask you to complete\xfffethe Pokédex?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is a challenge to update the Pokédex\xffferegularly, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOops! I got distracted! Please bring me\xfffesome of the Dream Mist that Munna\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegives off in the Dreamyard!

texts.original_text: Fennel: Ta-da!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to you, I got some Dream Mist,\xfffeand now I can collect save files of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious Trainers!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThank you very much!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs a token of my appreciation,\xfffeI will give you this C-Gear to use!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe C-Gear is a device related to\xfffecommunications, such as\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeInfrared Connection or\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNintendo Wi-Fi Connection.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Turn on the C-Gear and\xfffeestablish communications?

texts.original_text: About \xf000＀\x0001\x0002Game Sync\xf000＀\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd like to explain a little more about the\xfffesystem to collect Trainers' save files.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you have time to learn more?

texts.original_text: I am sorry!\xfffeI am so happy, so I will explain about it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause, thanks to you, we can do a\xfffegreat thing!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What's more, we learned that if you use\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0002Game Sync\xf000＀\x0001\x0000 to make a Pokémon sleep,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit will have dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when you wake up that Pokémon,\xfffeits dream becomes the reality in a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespace called \xf000＀\x0001\x0001Entralink \xf000＀\x0001\x0000in the middle of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIsn't Game Sync interesting?\xfffeIf you like, please send your save file.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've summed up the details in the PC, so\xfffeplease check it if you get a chance!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: What's more, we learned that if you use\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0002Game Sync\xf000＀\x0001\x0000 to make a Pokémon sleep,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit will have dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when you wake up that Pokémon,\xfffeits dream becomes the reality in a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespace called \xf000＀\x0001\x0001Entralink \xf000＀\x0001\x0000in the middle of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIsn't Game Sync interesting?\xfffeIf you like, please send your save file.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've summed up the details in the PC, so\xfffeplease check it if you get a chance!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You can register your friends in your\xfffePal Pad.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter you register, you can link with\xfffethose friends over Nintendo Wi-Fi\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeConnection to do all kinds of fun things!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can trade Pokémon, challenge\xfffeyour friends to a battle, and so on.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me give you a quick how-to on\xffferegistering your friends.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can either input your friend's code\xfffedirectly by using your Pal Pad...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr you can use the IR Connection\xfffefeature of the C-Gear.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, you can register your friend!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Game Sync is a system to collect save\xfffefiles from Trainers all over the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethrough Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby making Pokémon sleep and retrieving\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetheir dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch the Online button on the C-Gear\xfffescreen, and a button called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0001Game Sync \xf000＀\x0001\x0000appears.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChoose a Pokémon to send to sleep, then\xfffeyou can send your save file through\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNintendo Wi-Fi Connection.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should be able to make more Pokémon\xfffesleep as a result of the research.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Game Sync is a system to collect save\xfffefiles from Trainers all over the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethrough Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby making Pokémon sleep and retrieving\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetheir dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch the Online button on the C-Gear\xfffescreen, and a button called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0001Game Sync \xf000＀\x0001\x0000appears.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChoose a Pokémon to send to sleep, then\xfffeyou can send your save file through\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNintendo Wi-Fi Connection.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should be able to make more Pokémon\xfffesleep as a result of the research.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Pokémon Dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use Game Sync to make a\xfffePokémon sleep, it will have dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you wake up the Pokémon with\xfffeGame Sync, its dream becomes\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe reality in a space called \xf000＀\x0001\x0001Entralink\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe\xf000＀\x0001\x0000in the middle of the Unova region...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! Trainer!\xfffeDo you have enough Poké Balls?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't be shy.\xfffeTake this with you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You cannot have too many Poké Balls!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy advice is that when you use a better\xfffePoké Ball, it's easier to catch Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: You cannot have too many Poké Balls!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy advice is that when you use a better\xfffePoké Ball, it's easier to catch Pokémon!

texts.original_text: The beginning of my relationship with\xfffemy wife was our Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI could not defeat her, even\xfffethough I tried many times!
texts.translated_text: The beginning of my relationship with\xfffemy wife was our Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI could not defeat her, even\xfffethough I tried many times!

texts.original_text: My husband and I are compatible...\xfffebecause he cannot beat me in battle!
texts.translated_text: My husband and I are compatible...\xfffebecause he cannot beat me in battle!

texts.original_text: Do your Pokémon have nicknames?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen we give a Pokémon a nickname,\xfffewe grow attached to it. Don't you agree?
texts.translated_text: Do your Pokémon have nicknames?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen we give a Pokémon a nickname,\xfffewe grow attached to it. Don't you agree?

texts.original_text: I went abroad to have Pokémon battles!
texts.translated_text: I went abroad to have Pokémon battles!

texts.original_text: Hi, traveling Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour family must be talking about you\xffferight now!
texts.translated_text: Hi, traveling Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour family must be talking about you\xffferight now!

texts.original_text: You can tell how strong Trainers are\xfffeby the number of Gym Badges they have!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're a Trainer, you should challenge\xfffeGym Leaders and collect a lot of Badges!
texts.translated_text: You can tell how strong Trainers are\xfffeby the number of Gym Badges they have!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're a Trainer, you should challenge\xfffeGym Leaders and collect a lot of Badges!

texts.original_text: Lately, I have a favorite model.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHer name is Elesa, and her Pokémon\xfffeare strong, too!
texts.translated_text: Lately, I have a favorite model.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHer name is Elesa, and her Pokémon\xfffeare strong, too!

texts.original_text: The GTS! It links the world from the\xfffesecond floor of a Pokémon Center!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe full name of the GTS is the\xfffeGlobal Trade Station!
texts.translated_text: The GTS! It links the world from the\xfffesecond floor of a Pokémon Center!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe full name of the GTS is the\xfffeGlobal Trade Station!

texts.original_text: I've trained only Fire-type Pokémon,\xfffe'cause they're my favorites!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut they had no chance in a battle\xfffeagainst Water-type Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSigh... Maybe I should try to train\xfffePokémon of other types.
texts.translated_text: I've trained only Fire-type Pokémon,\xfffe'cause they're my favorites!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut they had no chance in a battle\xfffeagainst Water-type Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSigh... Maybe I should try to train\xfffePokémon of other types.

texts.original_text: It is quite hard to train six Pokémon at\xfffeonce, so I've heard some Trainers focus\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon training three Pokémon at a time.
texts.translated_text: It is quite hard to train six Pokémon at\xfffeonce, so I've heard some Trainers focus\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon training three Pokémon at a time.

texts.original_text: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you come looking for the\xfffeGym Leader?
texts.translated_text: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you come looking for the\xfffeGym Leader?

texts.original_text: He was here talking about Pokémon\xfffetypes until just a few moments ago...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you walked right past him?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: He was here talking about Pokémon\xfffetypes until just a few moments ago...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you walked right past him?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Nothing improves your skill as a Trainer\xfffelike real battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why challenging Gym Leaders is\xfffegreat practice.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: By the way, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, will you have a\xfffebattle with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to test how important items are\xfffein battles.
texts.translated_text: By the way, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, will you have a\xfffebattle with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to test how important items are\xfffein battles.

texts.original_text: Cheren: If you give a Pokémon this kind\xfffeof Berry to hold, it will eat it to heal up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen its HP goes down in battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you give Pokémon man-made items\xfffelike Potions to hold, they can't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuse them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, good luck, then.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This Trainers' School exists to meet the\xfffedemands of Trainers who want to know\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemore about Pokémon because they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelove them!
texts.translated_text: This Trainers' School exists to meet the\xfffedemands of Trainers who want to know\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemore about Pokémon because they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelove them!

texts.original_text: Pokémon have mysterious powers\xfffecalled Abilities.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAbilities have a variety of effects, and\xfffemany of those effects are activated when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon are in battle!
texts.translated_text: Pokémon have mysterious powers\xfffecalled Abilities.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAbilities have a variety of effects, and\xfffemany of those effects are activated when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon are in battle!

texts.original_text: There is a technique that lets you\xfffecancel evolution!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll read the book about it to you.\xfffeAre you ready?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“You can surprise a Pokémon and stop its\xfffeevolution by pressing the B Button when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Pokémon is evolving."
texts.translated_text: There is a technique that lets you\xfffecancel evolution!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll read the book about it to you.\xfffeAre you ready?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“You can surprise a Pokémon and stop its\xfffeevolution by pressing the B Button when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Pokémon is evolving."

texts.original_text: Some moves can only be taught with TMs.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTMs can be used over and over, so you\xfffemight want to use them a lot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't like the move you taught,\xfffeyou can always use a different TM.

texts.translated_text: Would you like to take a quiz about\xfffestatus conditions?

texts.translated_text: So here is the question:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich of the following items\xfffecures poison?

texts.translated_text: The item that cures paralysis is\xfffeParlyz Heal, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich of the following items\xfffewakes up a sleeping Pokémon?

texts.translated_text: Full Heal does exactly what the name\xfffesuggests--it heals all status conditions!

texts.original_text: If poisoned, a Pokémon steadily loses HP\xfffewhen battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe poison lingers after the battle.\xfffeTo cure it, use an Antidote.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If poisoned, a Pokémon steadily loses HP\xfffewhen battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe poison lingers after the battle.\xfffeTo cure it, use an Antidote.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Paralysis reduces the Speed stat\xfffeand may prevent movement.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt remains after battle, so use a\xfffeParlyz Heal.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Paralysis reduces the Speed stat\xfffeand may prevent movement.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt remains after battle, so use a\xfffeParlyz Heal.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If a Pokémon falls asleep, it will be\xfffeunable to attack.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon may wake up on its own,\xfffebut if a battle ends while it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesleeping, it will stay asleep.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWake it up using an Awakening.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If a Pokémon falls asleep, it will be\xfffeunable to attack.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon may wake up on its own,\xfffebut if a battle ends while it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesleeping, it will stay asleep.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWake it up using an Awakening.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A burn reduces the Attack stat and\xfffesteadily reduces the victim's HP.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA burn lingers after battle.\xfffeCure a burn using a Burn Heal.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A burn reduces the Attack stat and\xfffesteadily reduces the victim's HP.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA burn lingers after battle.\xfffeCure a burn using a Burn Heal.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If a Pokémon is frozen, it becomes\xfffecompletely helpless.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon may thaw out on its own,\xfffebut if a battle ends while it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrozen, it will stay frozen.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThaw it out using an Ice Heal.\xf000븁\x0000

Then, if it ever\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefalls asleep, it will wake up immediately.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, and another piece of advice--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNacrene City's Gym Leader uses\xfffeNormal types.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have a Fighting-type Pokémon,\xfffeit might give you a big advantage.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001I...want to see things no one can see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ideals of Pokémon inside Poké Balls.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe truths of how Trainers should be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd a future where Pokémon\xfffehave become perfect...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you feel the same?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Right now, my friends aren't strong\xfffeenough to save all Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I can't solve the equation\xfffethat will change the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, I need power... Power enough\xfffeto make anyone agree with me.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now I know what power I need.\xfffeReshiram!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe legendary Pokémon that, along with\xfffethe hero, created the Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's my turn to become that hero--\xfffeand you and I will be friends!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now, what did she tell me? Um...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can use the Dowsing Machine\xfffeto find places where items are hidden.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSo you can find stuff you can't even see!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: These old textile factories\xfffeand storehouses were abandoned.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut enterprising young people\xfffestarted using them as studios.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat could be called the beginning of\xfffeNacrene City, the city of art.
texts.translated_text: These old textile factories\xfffeand storehouses were abandoned.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut enterprising young people\xfffestarted using them as studios.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat could be called the beginning of\xfffeNacrene City, the city of art.

texts.original_text: That warehouse...\xfffeThey're selling something good inside.
texts.translated_text: That warehouse...\xfffeThey're selling something good inside.

texts.original_text: Even though it's just an old warehouse,\xfffeit's become so popular...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt makes me take a second look at\xfffewhat I think things are worth.

texts.original_text: If you would, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, take this...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you take this Dark Stone, that\xfffemeans you'll be the one to battle N\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeif anything happens to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you really OK with that?

texts.translated_text: If you take this Light Stone, that\xfffemeans you'll be the one to battle N\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeif anything happens to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you really OK with that?

texts.original_text: Alder: I understand. You are determined\xfffeto take on this duty.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, here it is.\xfffePrepare yourself. Be strong.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Welcome to the Nacrene Museum!
texts.translated_text: Welcome to the Nacrene Museum!

texts.original_text: Those robbers... What in the world is\xfffeTeam Plasma?
texts.translated_text: Those robbers... What in the world is\xfffeTeam Plasma?

texts.original_text: You can get to the Pokémon Gym by going\xfffeto the back of the museum!
texts.translated_text: You can get to the Pokémon Gym by going\xfffeto the back of the museum!

texts.original_text: What do they plan to accomplish by\xfffestealing the Dragon Skull?
texts.translated_text: What do they plan to accomplish by\xfffestealing the Dragon Skull?

texts.original_text: Wow! Whenever I look at this skeleton,\xfffeI'm...fascinated.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wow! Whenever I look at this skeleton,\xfffeI'm...fascinated.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Welcome! I'm Hawes, the\xfffeassistant director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you were kind enough to visit,\xfffeI'll give you a tour of the museum.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome! I'm Hawes, the\xfffeassistant director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you were kind enough to visit,\xfffeI'll give you a tour of the museum.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This skeleton is of a Dragon-type\xfffePokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's a theory that it had an accident\xfffewhile it was flying around the world, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it became a Fossil.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This skeleton is of a Dragon-type\xfffePokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's a theory that it had an accident\xfffewhile it was flying around the world, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it became a Fossil.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This rock is amazing! It's a meteorite!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt contains some kind of energy\xfffefrom space.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This rock is amazing! It's a meteorite!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt contains some kind of energy\xfffefrom space.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, this? It's an ordinary old stone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was found near the desert, but other\xfffethan the fact that it's old, it doesn't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeseem to have any value...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only display it because it's rather\xfffepretty to look at.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, this? It's an ordinary old stone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was found near the desert, but other\xfffethan the fact that it's old, it doesn't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeseem to have any value...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only display it because it's rather\xfffepretty to look at.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokémon Gym is just beyond here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon Gym is just beyond here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: At the end of the Gym, a very strong\xfffeand kind Gym Leader is waiting.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, the Gym Leader Lenora\xfffehappens to be my wife!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: At the end of the Gym, a very strong\xfffeand kind Gym Leader is waiting.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, the Gym Leader Lenora\xfffehappens to be my wife!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: So you've come, Gym Leader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe, Team Plasma, claim this museum's\xfffeDragon Skull in the name of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon liberation!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Well, then, here's\xfffeour smoke screen!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Plasmaaaa!

texts.translated_text: Bianca: I won't forgive those thieves!

texts.original_text: Cheren: So I can't battle the Gym Leader\xfffebecause of Team Plasma, huh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a bother.
texts.translated_text: Cheren: So I can't battle the Gym Leader\xfffebecause of Team Plasma, huh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a bother.

texts.original_text: Skeletal specimens are so mysterious...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom the outside, you can't see their\xfffefunctional, efficient design.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's almost as if it is an embodiment of\xfffetheir former essence... So fascinating!

texts.original_text: Rare Pokémon from around the world...\xfffeMuseums are packed with adventure!
texts.translated_text: Rare Pokémon from around the world...\xfffeMuseums are packed with adventure!

texts.original_text: My oh my oh my!
texts.translated_text: My oh my oh my!

texts.original_text: The Gym Leader here studies Fossils and\xfffeancient artifacts.
texts.translated_text: The Gym Leader here studies Fossils and\xfffeancient artifacts.

texts.original_text: Those thugs sure were bold...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's almost as if they believe they are\xfffedoing the right thing.
texts.translated_text: Those thugs sure were bold...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's almost as if they believe they are\xfffedoing the right thing.

texts.original_text: Perhaps there is a Pokémon that came\xfffefrom space along with this meteorite.
texts.translated_text: Perhaps there is a Pokémon that came\xfffefrom space along with this meteorite.

texts.original_text: What in the world could Team Plasma\xfffebe thinking?!
texts.translated_text: What in the world could Team Plasma\xfffebe thinking?!

texts.original_text: This is a skeletal specimen from a\xfffePokémon that flew around the world.
texts.translated_text: This is a skeletal specimen from a\xfffePokémon that flew around the world.

texts.original_text: Part of the skeleton was stolen by\xfffeTeam Plasma and is missing!
texts.translated_text: Part of the skeleton was stolen by\xfffeTeam Plasma and is missing!

texts.original_text: It's a Fossil of a Pokémon that was\xfffeprotected by a very hard shell.
texts.translated_text: It's a Fossil of a Pokémon that was\xfffeprotected by a very hard shell.

texts.original_text: A meteor that has a space virus\xfffeattached to it.
texts.translated_text: A meteor that has a space virus\xfffeattached to it.

texts.original_text: An ancient round stone that was buried\xfffein the desert.
texts.translated_text: An ancient round stone that was buried\xfffein the desert.

texts.original_text: A plate with an unknown script carved\xfffeinto it.
texts.translated_text: A plate with an unknown script carved\xfffeinto it.

texts.original_text: A mask that ancient people used to wear\xfffeat festivals.
texts.translated_text: A mask that ancient people used to wear\xfffeat festivals.

texts.original_text: Bones that were once carried as weapons\xfffeby a certain kind of Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: Bones that were once carried as weapons\xfffeby a certain kind of Pokémon.

texts.original_text: A Pokémon Gym where a Leader waits for\xfffea challenger at the back of a museum...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt has a great atmosphere, doesn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo... I will give this to you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A Pokémon Gym where a Leader waits for\xfffea challenger at the back of a museum...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt has a great atmosphere, doesn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo... I will give this to you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: All Trainers in this Gym use\xfffeNormal-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is just between you and me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNormal-type Pokémon are weak against\xfffeFighting-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAround here, Fighting-type Pokémon\xfffeshow up around Pinwheel Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, I will explain about the Gym itself!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this Pokémon Gym, if you answer\xfffequestions hidden in books,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can move forward.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor your information, the first book is\xfffe“Nice to Meet You, Pokémon."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't know where the book is,\xfffeplease ask anyone!\xf000븁\x0000
