texts.translated_text: Lenora: Oh, it's you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs always, you're raising your Pokémon\xfffewith a lot of love!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, ol' Clay contacted me\xffferecently.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe said you can find Pokémon Fossils\xfffein Twist Mountain!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGo check it out if you like!

texts.original_text: Lenora's research materials are stored\xfffein an orderly fashion.
texts.translated_text: Lenora's research materials are stored\xfffein an orderly fashion.

texts.original_text: The bones Lenora is using for research\xfffeare on display.
texts.translated_text: The bones Lenora is using for research\xfffeare on display.

texts.original_text: Hi, Trainer! Do you know a Pokémon\xfffecalled Audino?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a Pokémon that I sometimes find\xfffewhen I'm walking.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt jumps out of rustling grass.\xfffeI can get a lot of Exp. Points.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's kind of a friendly Pokémon, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: Hi, Trainer! Do you know a Pokémon\xfffecalled Audino?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a Pokémon that I sometimes find\xfffewhen I'm walking.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt jumps out of rustling grass.\xfffeI can get a lot of Exp. Points.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's kind of a friendly Pokémon, isn't it?

texts.original_text: I heard that the Fossils in the museum\xfffewere found in Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, a person called Clay apparently\xfffedonated them to the museum.
texts.translated_text: I heard that the Fossils in the museum\xfffewere found in Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, a person called Clay apparently\xfffedonated them to the museum.

texts.original_text: When you choose “HELP"\xfffeat the PC at a Pokémon Center,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can learn many things. It's so cool!
texts.translated_text: When you choose “HELP"\xfffeat the PC at a Pokémon Center,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can learn many things. It's so cool!

texts.original_text: I play the guitar and have\xfffePokémon battles every day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI keep doing that 'cause I enjoy it!
texts.translated_text: I play the guitar and have\xfffePokémon battles every day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI keep doing that 'cause I enjoy it!

texts.original_text: Even the same kind of Pokémon can have\xfffedifferent natures!
texts.translated_text: Even the same kind of Pokémon can have\xfffedifferent natures!

texts.original_text: I am a poet...\xfffeI write poems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEvery day, I stretch my imagination and\xfffedevote myself to my creative activity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople dream when sleeping, but if a\xfffePokémon dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI cannot even imagine how it is...
texts.translated_text: I am a poet...\xfffeI write poems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEvery day, I stretch my imagination and\xfffedevote myself to my creative activity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople dream when sleeping, but if a\xfffePokémon dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI cannot even imagine how it is...

texts.original_text: I am a poet...\xfffeI write poems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEvery day, I stretch my imagination and\xfffedevote myself to my creative activity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople dream when sleeping, but\xfffeif a Pokémon dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust thinking about it fuels\xfffemy imagination.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon probably enjoy sleeping, too!
texts.translated_text: I am a poet...\xfffeI write poems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEvery day, I stretch my imagination and\xfffedevote myself to my creative activity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople dream when sleeping, but\xfffeif a Pokémon dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust thinking about it fuels\xfffemy imagination.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon probably enjoy sleeping, too!

texts.original_text: Hi! Do you have a Pokémon called\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like to trade your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffefor my \xf000ā\x0001\x0001?
texts.translated_text: Hi! Do you have a Pokémon called\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like to trade your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffefor my \xf000ā\x0001\x0001?

texts.original_text: Wow. Thanks!\xfffeThen, let's trade!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wow. Thanks!\xfffeThen, let's trade!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Yay! Please take good care of\xfffemy \xf000ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will take good care of your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: Yay! Please take good care of\xfffemy \xf000ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will take good care of your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: I'd like to trade for a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...
texts.translated_text: I'd like to trade for a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...

texts.original_text: It's OK if you don't want to...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you change your mind, let's\xfffetrade Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: It's OK if you don't want to...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you change your mind, let's\xfffetrade Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Thanks to our Pokémon, you and I\xfffebecame friends!
texts.translated_text: Thanks to our Pokémon, you and I\xfffebecame friends!

texts.original_text: The \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000 that I got from you has\xfffegrown up and become very strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's have a battle!
texts.translated_text: The \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000 that I got from you has\xfffegrown up and become very strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's have a battle!

texts.original_text: Yay! I'll show off how I trained\xfffethis Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Yay! I'll show off how I trained\xfffethis Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I want to show you how \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000\xfffehas grown up...
texts.translated_text: I want to show you how \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000\xfffehas grown up...

texts.original_text: I had a great time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI traded my Pokémon with yours, and\xfffeon top of that, we had a great battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm so happy to be with Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: I had a great time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI traded my Pokémon with yours, and\xfffeon top of that, we had a great battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm so happy to be with Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Oh my, what a lovely Trainer!\xfffeWhat kind of Pokémon do you have?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh my, what a lovely Trainer!\xfffeWhat kind of Pokémon do you have?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's very friendly toward you!\xfffeIt must be happy with you.
texts.translated_text: It's very friendly toward you!\xfffeIt must be happy with you.

texts.original_text: It's a little bit friendly to you...\xfffeSomething like that.
texts.translated_text: It's a little bit friendly to you...\xfffeSomething like that.

texts.original_text: Hmmm...\xfffeIt may still take some time.
texts.translated_text: Hmmm...\xfffeIt may still take some time.

texts.original_text: Fwish fwish!
texts.translated_text: Fwish fwish!

texts.original_text: Pwoof...
texts.translated_text: Pwoof...

texts.original_text: Pokémon you get through trades\xfffegrow up fast. But be careful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf a traded Pokémon grows up too much,\xfffeit won't listen to you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you have a lot of Badges, you'll\xfffebe OK.
texts.translated_text: Pokémon you get through trades\xfffegrow up fast. But be careful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf a traded Pokémon grows up too much,\xfffeit won't listen to you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you have a lot of Badges, you'll\xfffebe OK.

texts.original_text: DS Wireless Communications is great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can trade Pokémon with people\xfffewho are far away!
texts.translated_text: DS Wireless Communications is great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can trade Pokémon with people\xfffewho are far away!

texts.original_text: Just now, I traded a Pokémon holding an\xfffeitem! So, it's like the item is a present!
texts.translated_text: Just now, I traded a Pokémon holding an\xfffeitem! So, it's like the item is a present!

texts.original_text: Dire Hit? In Unova, it's called Dire Hit.\xfffeHuh? No difference?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Anyway, in a battle, it's very powerful\xfffewhen a move is a critical hit!
texts.translated_text: Dire Hit? In Unova, it's called Dire Hit.\xfffeHuh? No difference?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Anyway, in a battle, it's very powerful\xfffewhen a move is a critical hit!

texts.original_text: I started a shop in this warehouse!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I started a shop in this warehouse!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Burgh used this warehouse until\xfffetwo years ago!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen Burgh gets artist's block,\xfffehe comes back here to Nacrene City!
texts.translated_text: Burgh used this warehouse until\xfffetwo years ago!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen Burgh gets artist's block,\xfffehe comes back here to Nacrene City!

texts.original_text: Burgh is an artist, and also the\xfffeGym Leader in Castelia City.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe want to be like him!
texts.translated_text: Burgh is an artist, and also the\xfffeGym Leader in Castelia City.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe want to be like him!

texts.original_text: That thing you have is a Pokédex,\xfffeisn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWow! Coooooool! You collect Pokémon!\xfffeOK! I'll help you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich Pokémon did you choose at the\xfffebeginning of your journey?
texts.translated_text: That thing you have is a Pokédex,\xfffeisn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWow! Coooooool! You collect Pokémon!\xfffeOK! I'll help you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich Pokémon did you choose at the\xfffebeginning of your journey?

texts.original_text: You have Snivy! Then I will give you this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Grass-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You have Snivy! Then I will give you this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Grass-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You have Oshawott! Then I will give\xfffeyou this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Water-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You have Oshawott! Then I will give\xfffeyou this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Water-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You have Tepig! Then I will give you this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Fire-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You have Tepig! Then I will give you this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you let your Pokémon hold it, it can\xffferaise the power of Fire-type moves!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A lot of items have effects when Pokémon\xfffehold them, so try to find them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, work hard to fill up your Pokédex!\xfffeGood luck!
texts.translated_text: A lot of items have effects when Pokémon\xfffehold them, so try to find them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, work hard to fill up your Pokédex!\xfffeGood luck!

texts.translated_text: Then, what is the Pokémon you chose\xfffeat the beginning of your journey?

texts.original_text: If you want to tell me, please speak\xfffeto me!
texts.translated_text: If you want to tell me, please speak\xfffeto me!

texts.original_text: Welcome to Café Warehouse,\xfffea stylish café in a rural area!
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Café Warehouse,\xfffea stylish café in a rural area!

texts.original_text: Welcome to Café Warehouse,\xfffea stylish café in a rural area!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur café has a special on Wednesdays!\xfffeHere, have a Soda Pop!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEnjoy the taste of our specialty!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Café Warehouse,\xfffea stylish café in a rural area!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur café has a special on Wednesdays!\xfffeHere, have a Soda Pop!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEnjoy the taste of our specialty!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Enjoy the taste of our specialty!
texts.translated_text: Enjoy the taste of our specialty!

texts.original_text: This café has a special on Wednesdays!
texts.translated_text: This café has a special on Wednesdays!

texts.original_text: As far as I'm concerned, it doesn't\xfffematter that the café is in a rural area\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat nobody knows.
texts.translated_text: As far as I'm concerned, it doesn't\xfffematter that the café is in a rural area\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat nobody knows.

texts.original_text: Do you know about the Battle Box?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it is a useful function you can\xfffeuse at the Pokémon Center.
texts.translated_text: Do you know about the Battle Box?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it is a useful function you can\xfffeuse at the Pokémon Center.

texts.original_text: The Striaton City Gym Leaders are a\xfffegreat triplet combo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Grass-type Pokémon user, Cilan,\xfffechooses great tea leaves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Water-type Pokémon user, Cress,\xfffeprepares the best water.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the Fire-type Pokémon user, Chili,\xfffepours hot water at the right heat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo wonder their tea is the best!
texts.translated_text: The Striaton City Gym Leaders are a\xfffegreat triplet combo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Grass-type Pokémon user, Cilan,\xfffechooses great tea leaves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Water-type Pokémon user, Cress,\xfffeprepares the best water.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the Fire-type Pokémon user, Chili,\xfffepours hot water at the right heat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo wonder their tea is the best!

texts.original_text: When you battle with a friend using\xfffewireless communications, you can use\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeitems using a Wonder Launcher!
texts.translated_text: When you battle with a friend using\xfffewireless communications, you can use\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeitems using a Wonder Launcher!

texts.original_text: Yes, I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have a Wonder Launcher, energy\xfffewill be charged, and you can use\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious items.
texts.translated_text: Yes, I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have a Wonder Launcher, energy\xfffewill be charged, and you can use\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevarious items.

texts.original_text: Hello, Trainer!\xfffeI think Potions are important for a trip!
texts.translated_text: Hello, Trainer!\xfffeI think Potions are important for a trip!

texts.original_text: I should have bought more Poké Balls!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon I wanted to catch\xfffejust came out, and I missed it!
texts.translated_text: I should have bought more Poké Balls!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon I wanted to catch\xfffejust came out, and I missed it!

texts.original_text: Hi! I have some questions for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to play, which do you prefer:\xfffeoutside or at home?
texts.translated_text: Hi! I have some questions for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to play, which do you prefer:\xfffeoutside or at home?

texts.original_text: I see, I see!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, which one are you interested in:\xfffethe thing everybody knows\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor the thing nobody knows?
texts.translated_text: I see, I see!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, which one are you interested in:\xfffethe thing everybody knows\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor the thing nobody knows?

texts.original_text: Oh, really?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, really?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In my view, you are a person with\xfffecommon sense!
texts.translated_text: In my view, you are a person with\xfffecommon sense!

texts.original_text: I'd say you are quite active!
texts.translated_text: I'd say you are quite active!

texts.original_text: I'd say you are very curious!
texts.translated_text: I'd say you are very curious!

texts.original_text: I'd say you are quite composed!
texts.translated_text: I'd say you are quite composed!

texts.original_text: I'd say you are quite relaxed!
texts.translated_text: I'd say you are quite relaxed!

texts.translated_text: Outside

texts.original_text: At home
texts.translated_text: At home

texts.original_text: Neither
texts.translated_text: Neither

texts.original_text: The thing everybody knows
texts.translated_text: The thing everybody knows

texts.original_text: The thing nobody knows
texts.translated_text: The thing nobody knows

texts.original_text: Burgh: That way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeM'hm. There, heading toward the Gym?!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Burgh: That way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeM'hm. There, heading toward the Gym?!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When work's finally over...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my thrown Poké Ball rocks three\xfffetimes and I hear that great “click"...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy life is full of things that give me joy!
texts.translated_text: When work's finally over...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my thrown Poké Ball rocks three\xfffetimes and I hear that great “click"...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy life is full of things that give me joy!

texts.original_text: I'm a battling Clerk ⑭!\xfffe...But my Pokémon are weak.
texts.translated_text: I'm a battling Clerk ⑭!\xfffe...But my Pokémon are weak.

texts.original_text: Busy, busy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter I eat breakfast, I have to think\xfffeabout lunch.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter eating lunch, I worry about dinner.\xfffeEvery day's the same. What a busy life!
texts.translated_text: Busy, busy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter I eat breakfast, I have to think\xfffeabout lunch.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter eating lunch, I worry about dinner.\xfffeEvery day's the same. What a busy life!

texts.original_text: Hey there, Trainer!\xfffeAre your Pokémon healthy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing healthy's the best, because when\xfffeyou're healthy, you can do anything!
texts.translated_text: Hey there, Trainer!\xfffeAre your Pokémon healthy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing healthy's the best, because when\xfffeyou're healthy, you can do anything!

texts.original_text: ...Grumble, grumble, grumble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShould I change my Pokémon's moves,\xfffeor should I change my Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGrumble, grumble...
texts.translated_text: ...Grumble, grumble, grumble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShould I change my Pokémon's moves,\xfffeor should I change my Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGrumble, grumble...

texts.original_text: Castelia City has so many people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes there are people who are only\xfffeinterested in themselves.
texts.translated_text: Castelia City has so many people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes there are people who are only\xfffeinterested in themselves.

texts.original_text: My favorite way to spend my lunch break\xfffeis watching ships at the dock.
texts.translated_text: My favorite way to spend my lunch break\xfffeis watching ships at the dock.

texts.original_text: Working women are beautiful, and\xfffebattling Pokémon are wonderful!
texts.translated_text: Working women are beautiful, and\xfffebattling Pokémon are wonderful!

texts.original_text: At the Battle Company, we welcome\xfffeTrainers who are proud of their skills.
texts.translated_text: At the Battle Company, we welcome\xfffeTrainers who are proud of their skills.

texts.original_text: Next time, I'll do it! Next time, I want to\xfffeeat a Casteliacone for sure!
texts.translated_text: Next time, I'll do it! Next time, I want to\xfffeeat a Casteliacone for sure!

texts.translated_text: Castelia City\xfffeA City of Grandeur

texts.translated_text: Ahead: Castelia Street\xfffeOcean Side: Cruise Dock

texts.translated_text: Ahead: Pokémon Gym\xfffeOcean Side: Liberty Pier

texts.translated_text: Passerby Analytics HQ\xfffe...People pass by as they walk along.

texts.original_text: Battle Company\xfffeTalented Trainers Welcome!
texts.translated_text: Battle Company\xfffeTalented Trainers Welcome!

texts.original_text: Thanks again for your help.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy bug Pokémon are scurrying with\xfffeexcitement about getting to battle you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's get straight to it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Thanks again for your help.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy bug Pokémon are scurrying with\xfffeexcitement about getting to battle you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's get straight to it!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww...\xfffeI lost.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever! Losing to you doesn't bug me\xfffebecause you are a-MAZ-ingly strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the Gym Badge!\xfffeYou beat me, so it's yours!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Aww...\xfffeI lost.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever! Losing to you doesn't bug me\xfffebecause you are a-MAZ-ingly strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the Gym Badge!\xfffeYou beat me, so it's yours!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeInsect Badge from Burgh.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeInsect Badge from Burgh.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's the Insect Badge!\xfffeIt's insectible--I mean, incredible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have three Badges,\xfffePokémon up to Lv. 40 will obey you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeincluding traded Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause I'm a generous guy,\xfffeI'll also give you this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It's the Insect Badge!\xfffeIt's insectible--I mean, incredible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have three Badges,\xfffePokémon up to Lv. 40 will obey you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeincluding traded Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause I'm a generous guy,\xfffeI'll also give you this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Struggle Bug also lowers the\xfffeSp. Atk of the target that was damaged.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm the best guy to tell you,\xfffeit's the little things that count!
texts.translated_text: Struggle Bug also lowers the\xfffeSp. Atk of the target that was damaged.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm the best guy to tell you,\xfffeit's the little things that count!

texts.original_text: How many discoveries have you made\xfffesince you started your adventure?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I was a kid, my innocent heart was\xfffecaptured by the beauty of bug Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI drew with them and battled with them,\xfffeand after all this time, I continue\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto discover new things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA world shared with Pokémon is a world\xfffeswarming with mysteries.
texts.translated_text: How many discoveries have you made\xfffesince you started your adventure?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I was a kid, my innocent heart was\xfffecaptured by the beauty of bug Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI drew with them and battled with them,\xfffeand after all this time, I continue\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto discover new things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA world shared with Pokémon is a world\xfffeswarming with mysteries.

texts.original_text: Burgh: Heya!\xfffeThis is what I do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI keep raising Pokémon and drawing\xfffepictures inspired by the Pokémon I raise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's what I love to do. My life hums\xfffewith energy. What could be better?

texts.original_text: When you step on the switch,\xfffethe one that pops out is--moi!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn that note, have a battle with moi!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now. Come. On.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStep on this switch, and what happens?\xfffeMoi!

texts.original_text: Yeeeeeeeeah! Thank you for going\xfffeto the trouble of calling me out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll channel my gratitude into my\xfffePokémon's moves and...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemake sure it gets to you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The theme of this Gym is\xfffewalking through walls.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt first glance, these funny honey walls\xfffemay look impassable or even impossible.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIf you try hard, it'll work out. So I say.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut...if it doesn't, here's a sweet tip:\xfffestep on the switches on the floor!

texts.original_text: Welcome to the Royal Unova!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe scenery is exhilarating,\xfffethe battles are exciting.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ticket is $1,000.\xfffeWould you like to get on board?

texts.original_text: The Royal Unova leaves once a day,\xfffeonly in the evening.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt is a cruiser-type passenger ship.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Royal Unova leaves once a day,\xfffeonly in the evening.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt is a cruiser-type passenger ship.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The ship goes under a big bridge called\xfffeSkyarrow Bridge in the Unova region,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethen turns around at Marvelous Bridge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand returns to Castelia City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe'll let you know when it's time\xfffeto leave by blowing a whistle five times.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: From the deck of the world-famous Royal\xfffeUnova, you can enjoy a spectacular view.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the passenger cabins are full of\xfffeTrainers who love to battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy both the view and\xfffethe battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNote that as C-Gears may affect radio\xfffesignals or instruments in the ship,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe ask that you refrain from using them.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThank you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You might already know this, but I will\xfffegive you some advice!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a Pokémon evolves, it will be more\xfffepowerful, but it will be slower to learn\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea new move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is especially true for Pokémon that\xfffeevolve with stones.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, it's up to you: you can have it learn\xfffea good move and then evolve it with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea stone, or evolve it with a stone fast\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand then have it learn a move with a TM!

texts.original_text: The more I conduct surveys,\xfffethe more fun it will be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm determined to pass by more people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's way more fun to conduct surveys\xfffewith people than doing them by myself.

texts.original_text: By any chance, are you having trouble?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it's difficult to pass by many people,\xfffeI recommend you try a timed survey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt takes time, but if you pass by just\xfffeone person, you can complete the\xf000븀\x0000\xffferequest.

texts.original_text: I'll give you a hint.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you go to a place full of people,\xfffeI recommend a head-count survey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can collect survey data really fast,\xfffeso you can complete the request\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a short time.

texts.original_text: Good work today,\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've become the top statistician\xfffeinstantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI should learn a lot from you\xfffeand work hard!
texts.translated_text: Good work today,\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've become the top statistician\xfffeinstantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI should learn a lot from you\xfffeand work hard!

texts.original_text: When I answered a questionnaire earlier,\xfffeI got a questionnaire sheet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I will answer all the\xfffequestionnaires...
texts.translated_text: When I answered a questionnaire earlier,\xfffeI got a questionnaire sheet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I will answer all the\xfffequestionnaires...

texts.original_text: After the questionnaire, the next step is\xfffeconducting a survey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSet the request you want to survey\xfffeon the Survey Radar...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd let's go!
texts.translated_text: After the questionnaire, the next step is\xfffeconducting a survey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSet the request you want to survey\xfffeon the Survey Radar...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd let's go!

texts.original_text: New statisticians are not\xfffeanswering questionnaires.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they answered questionnaires,\xfffethey could conduct more surveys...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat a shame!
texts.translated_text: New statisticians are not\xfffeanswering questionnaires.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they answered questionnaires,\xfffethey could conduct more surveys...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat a shame!

texts.original_text: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've also started teaching novice\xfffestatisticians how to conduct surveys.
texts.translated_text: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've also started teaching novice\xfffestatisticians how to conduct surveys.

texts.original_text: What is the popular movie now?\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001, do you have any idea?
texts.translated_text: What is the popular movie now?\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001, do you have any idea?

texts.original_text: What is the popular food now?\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001, do you have any idea?
texts.translated_text: What is the popular food now?\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001, do you have any idea?

texts.original_text: What is the popular...\xfffeOh, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew it.\xfffeI have to take a survey by myself...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAh, it is a pain in the neck...
texts.translated_text: What is the popular...\xfffeOh, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew it.\xfffeI have to take a survey by myself...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAh, it is a pain in the neck...

texts.original_text: The survey requests from the leader\xfffeare hard. Don't you agree?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBesides, the number of more difficult\xfffesurveys are increasing...
texts.translated_text: The survey requests from the leader\xfffeare hard. Don't you agree?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBesides, the number of more difficult\xfffesurveys are increasing...

texts.original_text: Hello! Good work today, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you finished all the\xfffesurvey requests from the leader?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard if you finish all the requests,\xfffeyou can get something good!
texts.translated_text: Hello! Good work today, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you finished all the\xfffesurvey requests from the leader?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard if you finish all the requests,\xfffeyou can get something good!

texts.original_text: Oh! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xfffeI'm honored to see you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, wow!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001 spoke to me!
texts.translated_text: Oh! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001!\xfffeI'm honored to see you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, wow!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001 spoke to me!

texts.original_text: I am not as good an artist as Burgh,\xfffebut I have a liking for paintings.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see. Today, I'd like to paint\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000-type Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you show me what kinds of Pokémon\xfffeyou have?
texts.translated_text: I am not as good an artist as Burgh,\xfffebut I have a liking for paintings.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see. Today, I'd like to paint\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000-type Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you show me what kinds of Pokémon\xfffeyou have?

texts.original_text: Please show me a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Please show me a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! You have that type!\xfffeI'm inspired!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you! As a token of my gratitude,\xfffewhich one would you like?
texts.translated_text: Oh! You have that type!\xfffeI'm inspired!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you! As a token of my gratitude,\xfffewhich one would you like?

texts.original_text: One \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000!\xfffeIt's all yours now!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww. You are the best!\xfffePlease come back tomorrow, too!
texts.translated_text: Aww. You are the best!\xfffePlease come back tomorrow, too!

texts.original_text: As long as the artist enjoys creating\xfffean artwork, it doesn't matter if the\xf000븀\x0000\xffferesult is judged as bad or good.
texts.translated_text: As long as the artist enjoys creating\xfffean artwork, it doesn't matter if the\xf000븀\x0000\xffferesult is judged as bad or good.

texts.original_text: If you catch a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type, please show it to me!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll give you a little something.
texts.translated_text: If you catch a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type, please show it to me!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll give you a little something.

texts.original_text: The Pokémon you chose is not the one\xfffeI requested.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want to paint is a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type!
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon you chose is not the one\xfffeI requested.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want to paint is a Pokémon that's\xfffe\xf000ă\x0001\x0000 type!

texts.original_text: Oh!\xfffeThe shape of this Egg...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSuperb! It gives me chills!\xfffeIt's electrifying! It makes me tremble!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlas, even I cannot tell what type\xfffean Egg is!

texts.original_text: People who work in this building have\xfffePokémon battles, not opinion battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to be strong, but if you go\xfffeupstairs, please be extra careful.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: People who work in this building have\xfffePokémon battles, not opinion battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to be strong, but if you go\xfffeupstairs, please be extra careful.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Welcome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use the elevator, please use the\xfffebuttons on the door or next to the door.
texts.translated_text: Welcome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use the elevator, please use the\xfffebuttons on the door or next to the door.

texts.original_text: Every morning, my Pokémon wakes me\xfffewith Wake-Up Slap, so I always look like\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea wreck.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I appreciate its good intentions, so\xfffeI'll work my hardest to provide for it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetoday, as always.
texts.translated_text: Every morning, my Pokémon wakes me\xfffewith Wake-Up Slap, so I always look like\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea wreck.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I appreciate its good intentions, so\xfffeI'll work my hardest to provide for it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetoday, as always.

texts.original_text: This is Battle Company.\xfffeResearch and Development of Items!
texts.translated_text: This is Battle Company.\xfffeResearch and Development of Items!

texts.original_text: Burgh's signature is scrawled in the\xfffecorner of the painting.
texts.translated_text: Burgh's signature is scrawled in the\xfffecorner of the painting.

texts.original_text: I am in charge of development!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to give you this, because you\xfffecame here for a company tour!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I am in charge of development!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to give you this, because you\xfffecame here for a company tour!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If a Pokémon holds a Scope Lens, it has\xfffea better chance to make a critical hit!

texts.original_text: Oh! A company tour?\xfffeOr some Pokémon practice?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEither way, I'm glad you came.\xfffeI'm happy, so I'll give you these!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! A company tour?\xfffeOr some Pokémon practice?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEither way, I'm glad you came.\xfffeI'm happy, so I'll give you these!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm very happy, so I will give you\xfffeanother present!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm very happy, so I will give you\xfffeanother present!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A Quick Ball makes it easier to catch a\xfffePokémon if you use it at the very\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebeginning of a battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd a Timer Ball makes it easier to catch\xfffea Pokémon you've been battling\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor a long time!

texts.original_text: Oh! You are the Pokémon Trainer\xfffeI met at the entrance!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've come this far. That means\xfffeyou must be quite strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you prepared to face the strongest\xfffeperson in this building?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you prepared to face the chairman?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, the time has come. I am the one!\xfffeI accept your challenge!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I disguise myself as a janitor because\xfffeI like to know what kinds of Trainers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecome here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI had a good time battling you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is a token of my esteem.\xfffePlease accept this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Hi there!\xfffeI am the Game Director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! You are working on your Pokédex!\xfffeIf you fill it up a lot, please let me see!

texts.translated_text: Hi there!\xfffeI am the Game Director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! You've caught every kind of\xfffePokémon in Unova!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWow! Excellent!\xfffeWe'll give you an award!!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I will send this award certificate\xfffeto your house!
texts.translated_text: I will send this award certificate\xfffeto your house!

texts.original_text: Hi there!\xfffeI am the Game Director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! Excellent! You've finally collected\xfffeall the Pokémon and completed\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo honor the efforts you have made in\xfffecompleting this Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAllow me to present you with this award!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hi there!\xfffeI am the Game Director.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! Excellent! You've finally collected\xfffeall the Pokémon and completed\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo honor the efforts you have made in\xfffecompleting this Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAllow me to present you with this award!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How did you meet all the Pokémon\xfffeto fill up your Pokédex?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you work long and hard to catch\xfffeand raise them?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you receive them as gifts from\xfffefriends?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you got some in trades from\xfffearound the world?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThough everyone's Pokédex may look the\xfffesame, the stories they contain are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeall unique!
texts.translated_text: How did you meet all the Pokémon\xfffeto fill up your Pokédex?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you work long and hard to catch\xfffeand raise them?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you receive them as gifts from\xfffefriends?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you got some in trades from\xfffearound the world?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThough everyone's Pokédex may look the\xfffesame, the stories they contain are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeall unique!

texts.original_text: I will send this award certificate\xfffeto your house, too!
texts.translated_text: I will send this award certificate\xfffeto your house, too!

texts.original_text: Beware of spoilers! What I'm working on\xfffeis the ending of the game.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't look at it here! You'll have\xfffeto play it for yourself.
texts.translated_text: Beware of spoilers! What I'm working on\xfffeis the ending of the game.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't look at it here! You'll have\xfffeto play it for yourself.

texts.original_text: I am the Graphic Designer. I am devoting\xfffeall my energy to every dot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHup! I should put one dot here as if I'm\xfffemaking this part hollow!
texts.translated_text: I am the Graphic Designer. I am devoting\xfffeall my energy to every dot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHup! I should put one dot here as if I'm\xfffemaking this part hollow!

texts.original_text: A tip for getting strong\xfffein Pokémon battles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see.\xfffeI guess the most important thing is...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehaving a lot of battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you become very strong, come back\xfffeand have a Pokémon battle with me!
texts.translated_text: A tip for getting strong\xfffein Pokémon battles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see.\xfffeI guess the most important thing is...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehaving a lot of battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you become very strong, come back\xfffeand have a Pokémon battle with me!

texts.original_text: Oh! You've become strong! I can tell.\xfffeDo you want to have a battle with me?
texts.translated_text: Oh! You've become strong! I can tell.\xfffeDo you want to have a battle with me?

texts.original_text: Well, let's begin!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well, let's begin!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You think about battles very thoroughly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI lost, but I learned a lot from you.\xfffeBesides, it was fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome back again tomorrow.
texts.translated_text: You think about battles very thoroughly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI lost, but I learned a lot from you.\xfffeBesides, it was fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome back again tomorrow.

texts.original_text: No?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been raising Pokémon, thinking about\xfffetheir Abilities and just the right\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecombination of held items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a pity...\xfffe
texts.translated_text: No?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been raising Pokémon, thinking about\xfffetheir Abilities and just the right\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecombination of held items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a pity...\xfffe

texts.original_text: I'm Snorlax.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, no. I'm the Planner!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't mean to butt in, but the\xfffeLeftovers item is important, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: I'm Snorlax.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, no. I'm the Planner!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't mean to butt in, but the\xfffeLeftovers item is important, isn't it?

texts.original_text: I am the Sound Designer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI put in a lot of wonderful mechanisms\xfffeto change the game's music!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow many of them have you noticed?
texts.translated_text: I am the Sound Designer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI put in a lot of wonderful mechanisms\xfffeto change the game's music!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow many of them have you noticed?

texts.original_text: I can tell you take the sound seriously,\xfffeso here's a treat for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you think about this\xfffedramatic sound?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I can tell you take the sound seriously,\xfffeso here's a treat for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you think about this\xfffedramatic sound?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Were you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, for a strong Trainer like you,\xfffewinning against Team Rocket\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould be a piece of cake!
texts.translated_text: Were you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, for a strong Trainer like you,\xfffewinning against Team Rocket\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould be a piece of cake!

texts.original_text: I am the Feeling Reader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard a lot of people take\xfffeFeeling Checks using the C-Gear.
texts.translated_text: I am the Feeling Reader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard a lot of people take\xfffeFeeling Checks using the C-Gear.

texts.original_text: I am the Feeling Reader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom the results of your Feeling Checks,\xfffeI'll tell you your lucky person\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you interested?\xfffeDo you want to know your lucky person?
texts.translated_text: I am the Feeling Reader.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom the results of your Feeling Checks,\xfffeI'll tell you your lucky person\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you interested?\xfffeDo you want to know your lucky person?

texts.original_text: The person who can make your day\xfffeexceptionally happy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: The person who can make your day\xfffeexceptionally happy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: Oh, you don't have to hesitate.\xfffeI will read it for free!
texts.translated_text: Oh, you don't have to hesitate.\xfffeI will read it for free!

texts.original_text: The person who can make your day\xfffeexceptionally happy is...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh dear. You've taken a Feeling Check\xfffeonly with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI suggest that you take Feeling Checks\xfffewith a lot of people!
texts.translated_text: The person who can make your day\xfffeexceptionally happy is...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh dear. You've taken a Feeling Check\xfffeonly with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI suggest that you take Feeling Checks\xfffewith a lot of people!

texts.original_text: You can't change the name of a Pokémon\xfffeyou got from someone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause the name contains wishes\xfffeof the person who named it!
texts.translated_text: You can't change the name of a Pokémon\xfffeyou got from someone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause the name contains wishes\xfffeof the person who named it!

texts.original_text: Gesundheit: Gyu gyu?
texts.translated_text: Gesundheit: Gyu gyu?

texts.original_text: By taking a Feeling Check, you can get\xfffea Sweet Heart. That's a good item, right?
texts.translated_text: By taking a Feeling Check, you can get\xfffea Sweet Heart. That's a good item, right?

texts.original_text: My name is Mr. Lock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a magical clown who can\xfffeopen anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour name is \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'll see you again, I'm sure.
texts.translated_text: My name is Mr. Lock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a magical clown who can\xfffeopen anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour name is \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'll see you again, I'm sure.

texts.original_text: You have a Lock Capsule in your Bag...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am the only one in the whole world\xfffewho can open the capsule.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can open it in the blink of an eye!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You have a Lock Capsule in your Bag...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am the only one in the whole world\xfffewho can open the capsule.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can open it in the blink of an eye!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Look! As you can see, I opened it swiftly\xfffeand with precision!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInside the capsule...\xfffeWhat your heart most desires...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Technical Machine!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Look! As you can see, I opened it swiftly\xfffeand with precision!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInside the capsule...\xfffeWhat your heart most desires...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Technical Machine!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hm. There's a letter with the\xfffeTechnical Machine...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hm. There's a letter with the\xfffeTechnical Machine...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: “I entrust the Technical Machine in the\xfffeLock Capsule to a trustworthy Trainer in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't allow it to fall into the hands of\xfffevillains like Team Rocket..."\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “I entrust the Technical Machine in the\xfffeLock Capsule to a trustworthy Trainer in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't allow it to fall into the hands of\xfffevillains like Team Rocket..."\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: More is written here...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“TM95 is Snarl.\xfffeIt's a Dark-type Special Attack, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit lowers the opponents' Sp. Atk stat."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's what it is...a move that tests\xfffethe sense of the user!
texts.translated_text: More is written here...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“TM95 is Snarl.\xfffeIt's a Dark-type Special Attack, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit lowers the opponents' Sp. Atk stat."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's what it is...a move that tests\xfffethe sense of the user!

texts.original_text: Even though I opened the Lock Capsule,\xfffeI can't unlock a closed heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am a sad clown, indeed...
texts.translated_text: Even though I opened the Lock Capsule,\xfffeI can't unlock a closed heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am a sad clown, indeed...

texts.original_text: I secretly invented a special machine.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly people who know the secret\xfffepassword can use it.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I secretly invented a special machine.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly people who know the secret\xfffepassword can use it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There's more!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There's more!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is the password that will enable you\xfffeto use the Relocator I invented!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a superb machine that will swiftly\xfffefetch a special Pokémon or item\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby connecting to a special network.
texts.translated_text: This is the password that will enable you\xfffeto use the Relocator I invented!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a superb machine that will swiftly\xfffefetch a special Pokémon or item\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby connecting to a special network.

texts.original_text: I added a button on the main menu.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease save the game, then go back to\xfffethe title screen!
texts.translated_text: I added a button on the main menu.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease save the game, then go back to\xfffethe title screen!

texts.original_text: Unfortunately, it seems that you don't\xffferemember the password...
texts.translated_text: Unfortunately, it seems that you don't\xffferemember the password...

texts.original_text: Did you find my Relocator useful?
texts.translated_text: Did you find my Relocator useful?

texts.original_text: Bianca: Heeey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou remember the promise you\xfffemade on the Xtransceiver, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, let's get right to our\xfffePokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Heeey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou remember the promise you\xfffemade on the Xtransceiver, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, let's get right to our\xfffePokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou remember the promise you\xfffemade on the Xtransceiver, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, let's get right to our\xfffePokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou remember the promise you\xfffemade on the Xtransceiver, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, let's get right to our\xfffePokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, before that...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: But, before that...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: They said we can have a Pokémon battle\xfffein the gate as long as we're careful not\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto break the electric bulletin board.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm the new-and-improved version of me!\xfffeIt's gonna go great this time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's start up our Pokémon battle again!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: They said we can have a Pokémon battle\xfffein the gate as long as we're careful not\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto break the electric bulletin board.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm the new-and-improved version of me!\xfffeIt's gonna go great this time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's start up our Pokémon battle again!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: I'll never be a strong Trainer\xfffelike you or Cheren or Iris, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know, since we left Nuvema Town,\xfffeI've met a lot of people and I've been\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking about what I want to do in life!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you look at it that way, Pokémon\xfffehave given me a lot of new experiences.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: I'll never be a strong Trainer\xfffelike you or Cheren or Iris, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know, since we left Nuvema Town,\xfffeI've met a lot of people and I've been\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking about what I want to do in life!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you look at it that way, Pokémon\xfffehave given me a lot of new experiences.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Having my Pokémon stolen was just\xfffereally hard, and I felt really unsure...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, I gotta say I'm really glad I went!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've learned so much on this journey.\xfffeAnd I also learned that being with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon is really, really important!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, well, I hope to see you again soon!\xfffeBye-bye, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Having my Pokémon stolen was just\xfffereally hard, and I felt really unsure...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, I gotta say I'm really glad I went!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've learned so much on this journey.\xfffeAnd I also learned that being with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon is really, really important!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, well, I hope to see you again soon!\xfffeBye-bye, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Maybe I should try to find a\xfffePokémon on Route 4 to catch!
texts.translated_text: Maybe I should try to find a\xfffePokémon on Route 4 to catch!

texts.original_text: Route 4 is long!\xfffeBe careful if you plan to follow it!
texts.translated_text: Route 4 is long!\xfffeBe careful if you plan to follow it!

texts.original_text: Nimbasa City is at the end\xfffeof Route 4.
texts.translated_text: Nimbasa City is at the end\xfffeof Route 4.

texts.original_text: The number of Trainers on the\xfffeRoyal Unova today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0003.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd you've won against \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0004.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ship is nearing the port.\xfffeWould you like to get off the ship?
texts.translated_text: The number of Trainers on the\xfffeRoyal Unova today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0003.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd you've won against \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0004.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ship is nearing the port.\xfffeWould you like to get off the ship?

texts.original_text: The number of Trainers on the\xfffeRoyal Unova today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0003.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ship is nearing the port.\xfffeWould you like to get off the ship?
texts.translated_text: The number of Trainers on the\xfffeRoyal Unova today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0003.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ship is nearing the port.\xfffeWould you like to get off the ship?

texts.original_text: There are a lot of cabins in this big ship!\xfffeI would like to give you advice 'cause\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou need help finding Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you want to listen to my hint?
texts.translated_text: There are a lot of cabins in this big ship!\xfffeI would like to give you advice 'cause\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou need help finding Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you want to listen to my hint?

texts.original_text: Some guests like to tell really long\xfffestories, and they just keep talking\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuntil they hear a whistle!
texts.translated_text: Some guests like to tell really long\xfffestories, and they just keep talking\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuntil they hear a whistle!

texts.original_text: The Royal Unova's renowned observation\xfffedeck is just ahead.
texts.translated_text: The Royal Unova's renowned observation\xfffedeck is just ahead.

texts.original_text: If you’re looking in the cabins with\xfffeblue doors for someone to battle,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou’ll find only one Trainer there today.
texts.translated_text: If you’re looking in the cabins with\xfffeblue doors for someone to battle,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou’ll find only one Trainer there today.

texts.original_text: It seems the number of Trainers in the\xfffecabins with blue doors today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0002.
texts.translated_text: It seems the number of Trainers in the\xfffecabins with blue doors today is \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0002.

texts.original_text: It's running on the ocean!\xfffeWhat a peculiar thing to see!
texts.translated_text: It's running on the ocean!\xfffeWhat a peculiar thing to see!

texts.original_text: I can't make up my mind whether to go to\xfffethe observation deck or battle some\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainers in the cabins.
texts.translated_text: I can't make up my mind whether to go to\xfffethe observation deck or battle some\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainers in the cabins.

texts.original_text: I'm running with the rhythm of the waves,\xfffebut it's a real challenge!
texts.translated_text: I'm running with the rhythm of the waves,\xfffebut it's a real challenge!

texts.original_text: Having battles on the ship and seeing\xfffethe scenery from the deck...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis ship is the best!
texts.translated_text: Having battles on the ship and seeing\xfffethe scenery from the deck...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis ship is the best!

texts.original_text: I'm still wondering which cabin to enter.
texts.translated_text: I'm still wondering which cabin to enter.

texts.original_text: I came here from Johto for business,\xfffebut everything is dynamic here.
texts.translated_text: I came here from Johto for business,\xfffebut everything is dynamic here.

texts.original_text: Are you from Unova?\xfffeI came here from Johto for business.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs I thought, a foreign region is\xfffeso different! What's the difference?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ...\xfffe... ... ... ... so,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWell, ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ... Don't you agree?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Are you from Unova?\xfffeI came here from Johto for business.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs I thought, a foreign region is\xfffeso different! What's the difference?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ...\xfffe... ... ... ... so,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWell, ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe... ... ... ... ... Don't you agree?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! A whistle is blowing!\xfffeSorry to keep you so long...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it was fun to talk with you.\xfffeThank you!
texts.translated_text: Oh! A whistle is blowing!\xfffeSorry to keep you so long...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it was fun to talk with you.\xfffeThank you!

texts.original_text: A battle break from work!\xfffeIt is particularly fun.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A battle break from work!\xfffeIt is particularly fun.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I had a great battle on my break\xfffefrom work.
texts.translated_text: I had a great battle on my break\xfffefrom work.

texts.original_text: There are yet more Pokémon across\xfffethe water!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe excitement never stops!
texts.translated_text: There are yet more Pokémon across\xfffethe water!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe excitement never stops!

texts.original_text: I am having a relaxing time in this\xfffeopulent cabin.
texts.translated_text: I am having a relaxing time in this\xfffeopulent cabin.

texts.original_text: I heard that strong Trainers gather\xfffehere, so I came all the way from Sinnoh!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me enjoy some Pokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I heard that strong Trainers gather\xfffehere, so I came all the way from Sinnoh!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me enjoy some Pokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I can have Pokémon battles while\xfffeI'm being rocked in the ship.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlus, I can see Pokémon that are rarely\xfffeseen. I am soooo happy!
texts.translated_text: I can have Pokémon battles while\xfffeI'm being rocked in the ship.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlus, I can see Pokémon that are rarely\xfffeseen. I am soooo happy!

texts.original_text: I heard a lot of Trainers in this ship\xfffeare from the other side of the ocean.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSpeaking of which, I am also from Kanto!
texts.translated_text: I heard a lot of Trainers in this ship\xfffeare from the other side of the ocean.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSpeaking of which, I am also from Kanto!

texts.original_text: Did you go to the observation deck?\xfffeYou can see an incredible view!
texts.translated_text: Did you go to the observation deck?\xfffeYou can see an incredible view!

texts.original_text: Having Pokémon battles while on the ship,\xfffebeing rocked by the ocean waves...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't it exciting?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Having Pokémon battles while on the ship,\xfffebeing rocked by the ocean waves...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't it exciting?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I lost...\xfffeMaybe I will go check out the view...

texts.original_text: My mother once told me of a Pokémon that\xfffeplayed a melody and danced so lightly\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat it filled people's hearts with joy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen sorrow darkened the entire world,\xfffeand the Pokémon lost the melody...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, at that time, some red shoes\xfffewere lost somewhere...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: The truth is this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe white dragon appeared before a hero\xfffewho sought the true way to knit together\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea world full of many warring people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis white Dragon-type Pokémon shared\xfffeits knowledge--and bared its fangs\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeat those who stood against it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTogether, the power of this Pokémon and\xfffethe hero brought unity to the hearts of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeveryone in the land,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand that is how Unova was created.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We shall bring back the hero and\xfffethat Pokémon to Unova once again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf we can win people's hearts and minds,\xfffewe can easily create the world that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI--I mean, Team Plasma--desires!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Burgh: Here in Castelia, we have\xfffea lot of different kinds of people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone's ways of thinking and\xfffelifestyles are very different.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHonestly, there's something about what\xfffeyou're saying I don't quite understand.

texts.original_text: Burgh: One thing we all have in\xfffecommon is that we all care a lot\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven people meeting for the first time\xfffecan talk about Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTalk or battle or trade...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Remember your speech at Accumula Town?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou were responsible for leading me to\xffferethink my relationship with Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeFor that, I thank you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt that time, I made a promise...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI swore to myself that I would dedicate\xfffemyself to Pokémon even more strongly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat you guys are doing... Aren't you\xfffegoing to strengthen the bond between\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople and Pokémon even more?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Myah-ha-ha-ha!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are quite hard to figure out--a little\xfffemore intelligent than I'd expected.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am fond of intelligent people, you see.\xfffeYou'll enjoy hearing about this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom every corner of the world,\xfffeI have gathered knowledgeable people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor our king's benefit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou could call them the Seven Sages.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVery well! We will submit to your\xfffeopinion and be on our way.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: It's hard to get up the morning after\xfffea fun day like today.

texts.original_text: I've asked my Pokémon to use Sing\xfffeinstead of setting an alarm clock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I cannot get up at all.\xfffeI don't know why.
texts.translated_text: I've asked my Pokémon to use Sing\xfffeinstead of setting an alarm clock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I cannot get up at all.\xfffeI don't know why.

texts.original_text: ¡Es la primera vez que vengo aquí!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe¡Pero este precioso paisaje hace\xfffeque me sienta como en casa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe¡La próxima vez traeré a mis amigos!
texts.translated_text: ¡Es la primera vez que vengo aquí!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe¡Pero este precioso paisaje hace\xfffeque me sienta como en casa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe¡La próxima vez traeré a mis amigos!

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Gramps! We know you run\xfffethe Day Care!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow do we know?\xfffeBecause we're Team Plasma!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Gramps! We know you run\xfffethe Day Care!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow do we know?\xfffeBecause we're Team Plasma!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: We are taking Pokémon away\xfffefrom people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you work at the Day Care, we figure\xfffeyou must have a lot of Pokémon!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHand 'em over!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: We are taking Pokémon away\xfffefrom people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you work at the Day Care, we figure\xfffeyou must have a lot of Pokémon!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHand 'em over!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Day-Care Man: What kind of\xfffenonsense is this?!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Day-Care Man: What kind of\xfffenonsense is this?!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! A strong-looking Trainer!\xfffePlease help me!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! A strong-looking Trainer!\xfffePlease help me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: If you're going to get in\xfffeour way, we'll take your Pokémon, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: If you're going to get in\xfffeour way, we'll take your Pokémon, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: !!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: !!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: This went downhill fast!\xfffeSo I think... We'd better... Ruuuun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's hide out at the amusement park!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: This went downhill fast!\xfffeSo I think... We'd better... Ruuuun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's hide out at the amusement park!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Day-Care Man: Thank you so much!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease take this as a token\xfffeof my gratitude.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a brand-new Bike.\xfffeI'd always planned on riding around\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNimbasa City...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut I never ended up riding it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Day-Care Man: I have a Day Care\xfffeon Route 3!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have any Pokémon you want\xfffeme to raise, please drop them off!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just came to sightsee, but\xfffeI got in a lot of trouble!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Day-Care Man: I have a Day Care\xfffeon Route 3!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have any Pokémon you want\xfffeme to raise, please drop them off!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just came to sightsee, but\xfffeI got in a lot of trouble!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Yoo-hoo!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Yoo-hoo!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Know what?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Know what?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The professor told me Nimbasa City\xfffehas a lot of things to see and do--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffethe amusement park, Big Stadium,\xfffeSmall Court, and the Battle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The professor told me Nimbasa City\xfffehas a lot of things to see and do--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffethe amusement park, Big Stadium,\xfffeSmall Court, and the Battle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm going to go see the Pokémon Musical!\xfffeSee you later!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm going to go see the Pokémon Musical!\xfffeSee you later!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Yoo-hoo, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Yoo-hoo, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Know what?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Know what?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I just had a look at the Musical Theater.\xfffeIt's sooo cool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you're here, come on, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome with me!\xfffeOver here, over here!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I just had a look at the Musical Theater.\xfffeIt's sooo cool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you're here, come on, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome with me!\xfffeOver here, over here!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK, we're here! Let's go in!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: OK, we're here! Let's go in!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Ooh, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you interested in musicals?\xfffeThen, let's go in together!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Ooh, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you interested in musicals?\xfffeThen, let's go in together!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Daddy?!\xfffeWhat are you doing here?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Daddy?!\xfffeWhat are you doing here?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: I've come to take you\xfffeback home, of course!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour mother told me that you'd\xfffemade it all the way out here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaven't you gone far enough?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: I've come to take you\xfffeback home, of course!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour mother told me that you'd\xfffemade it all the way out here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaven't you gone far enough?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: No way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to keep traveling\xfffewith \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 and my Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: No way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to keep traveling\xfffewith \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 and my Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Absolutely not! Others do\xfffethings their way, and we do things ours!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Absolutely not! Others do\xfffethings their way, and we do things ours!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Is that so?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, how about you do things your way,\xfffeand I'll do things mine!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Is that so?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, how about you do things your way,\xfffeand I'll do things mine!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Sweetie, you keep going on your travels.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Sweetie, you keep going on your travels.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Hey! Who do you think\xfffeyou are? This is a family matter!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Hey! Who do you think\xfffeyou are? This is a family matter!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My name is Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm this town's Gym Leader.\xfffeI also happen to be a model.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My name is Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm this town's Gym Leader.\xfffeI also happen to be a model.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You know, there are many people\xfffein this world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are people whose way of thinking\xfffemay be completely different from yours.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSometimes, this means you may get hurt.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You know, there are many people\xfffein this world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are people whose way of thinking\xfffemay be completely different from yours.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSometimes, this means you may get hurt.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Of course!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's exactly right!\xfffeIt's because I'm worried about that...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Of course!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's exactly right!\xfffeIt's because I'm worried about that...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: But it's important to keep trying,\xfffeto learn about the differences between\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyourself and others...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo learn that being different is OK.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you shouldn't worry.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers always have Pokémon\xfffeat their side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are wonderful. It's not only how\xfffecute they can be, but also how much you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan depend on them...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: But it's important to keep trying,\xfffeto learn about the differences between\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyourself and others...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo learn that being different is OK.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you shouldn't worry.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers always have Pokémon\xfffeat their side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are wonderful. It's not only how\xfffecute they can be, but also how much you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan depend on them...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Please!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know there's gonna be painful stuff\xfffelike you're worrying about!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI know! Really, I get it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, like, listen...\xfffeThere'll be tons of nice people, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnow what else? Since I've been\xfffetraveling with Pokémon, I've already\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegotten tougher, I can totally tell.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...please?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Please!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know there's gonna be painful stuff\xfffelike you're worrying about!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI know! Really, I get it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, like, listen...\xfffeThere'll be tons of nice people, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnow what else? Since I've been\xfffetraveling with Pokémon, I've already\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegotten tougher, I can totally tell.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...please?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Hmm...\xfffeI guess.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf wanting to continue your journey\xfffeis selfishness on your part,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewanting to stop you is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeselfishness on mine.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm surprised to find I'm the one\xfffebeing childish--at my age!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Hmm...\xfffeI guess.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf wanting to continue your journey\xfffeis selfishness on your part,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewanting to stop you is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeselfishness on mine.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm surprised to find I'm the one\xfffebeing childish--at my age!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This Gym Leader's comments helped me\xfffewake up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBianca, I'm sure it's better that you\xfffetake the path you want to take now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hope that your journey will be fun.\xfffeBon voyage!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This Gym Leader's comments helped me\xfffewake up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBianca, I'm sure it's better that you\xfffetake the path you want to take now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hope that your journey will be fun.\xfffeBon voyage!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, please...\xfffeTake care of my little girl, OK?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, please...\xfffeTake care of my little girl, OK?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Papa, I'll come home after\xfffeI find out what I really want to do!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Papa, I'll come home after\xfffeI find out what I really want to do!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: I'm sure he traveled\xfffeas a Trainer himself, in the past...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBeing a parent must be hard.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: I'm sure he traveled\xfffeas a Trainer himself, in the past...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBeing a parent must be hard.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Did I meddle unnecessarily?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou looked troubled, so\xfffeI decided to chime in.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Did I meddle unnecessarily?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou looked troubled, so\xfffeI decided to chime in.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: By the way, if you're Trainers, please\xfffestop by the Pokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll teach you a little something about\xfffehow tough a journey can get.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: By the way, if you're Trainers, please\xfffestop by the Pokémon Gym.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll teach you a little something about\xfffehow tough a journey can get.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm sorry, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'll be waiting on Route 5.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm sorry, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'll be waiting on Route 5.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: She's so cool! Hah!\xfffeI want to be a totally cool woman\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelike Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMm. I wonder how I'll get there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, before that, I guess I need to\xfffediscover what I really want to do!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSee you later, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: She's so cool! Hah!\xfffeI want to be a totally cool woman\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelike Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMm. I wonder how I'll get there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, before that, I guess I need to\xfffediscover what I really want to do!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSee you later, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We athletes and our Pokémon\xfffeshow excellent teamwork!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can see it at Big Stadium and\xfffeSmall Court, so please stop by!
texts.translated_text: We athletes and our Pokémon\xfffeshow excellent teamwork!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can see it at Big Stadium and\xfffeSmall Court, so please stop by!

texts.original_text: As it happens, Nimbasa City is a major\xfffedestination for Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are Pokémon Trainers in\xfffelots of these buildings.
texts.translated_text: As it happens, Nimbasa City is a major\xfffedestination for Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are Pokémon Trainers in\xfffelots of these buildings.

texts.original_text: Leisurely trips by train...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRiding from Gear Station to\xfffeAnville Town feels a bit like a dream.
texts.translated_text: Leisurely trips by train...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRiding from Gear Station to\xfffeAnville Town feels a bit like a dream.

texts.original_text: Coming to flashy Nimbasa City makes\xfffeme feel light and happy, as if I were\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeholding an Air Balloon.
texts.translated_text: Coming to flashy Nimbasa City makes\xfffeme feel light and happy, as if I were\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeholding an Air Balloon.

texts.original_text: There are performers\xfffecrowding around Route 5.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeeing all the fun the Pokémon and\xfffeTrainers are having fills me with energy!
texts.translated_text: There are performers\xfffecrowding around Route 5.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeeing all the fun the Pokémon and\xfffeTrainers are having fills me with energy!

texts.original_text: I was a good girl, so I got to\xfffego to the amusement park!
texts.translated_text: I was a good girl, so I got to\xfffego to the amusement park!

texts.original_text: Ferris wheel! Ferris wheel!\xfffeI love Ferris wheels!
texts.translated_text: Ferris wheel! Ferris wheel!\xfffeI love Ferris wheels!

texts.original_text: Nimbasa's Pokémon Gym is\xfffein the amusement park!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo doubt it has a surprising gimmick!
texts.translated_text: Nimbasa's Pokémon Gym is\xfffein the amusement park!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo doubt it has a surprising gimmick!

texts.original_text: I won!\xfffeThen I lost...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I won!\xfffeThen I lost...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gear Station has trains where\xfffeyou can battle other Trainers.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Battle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gear Station has trains where\xfffeyou can battle other Trainers.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Battle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're a Trainer, aren't you?\xfffePlease just accept this without a word!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You're a Trainer, aren't you?\xfffePlease just accept this without a word!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you have a Vs. Recorder, you can\xffferecord battles with friends or on the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBattle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyway, this woman of mystery will\xfffego somewhere... That's right!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeShe'll go to the Battle Institute!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If you have a Vs. Recorder, you can\xffferecord battles with friends or on the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBattle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyway, this woman of mystery will\xfffego somewhere... That's right!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeShe'll go to the Battle Institute!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Nimbasa City\xfffeLit by the Flash of Lightning!
