texts.original_text: Did the fantastic speed leave you dizzy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy beloved Pokémon will be the next one\xfffeto make your head spin!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Did the fantastic speed leave you dizzy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy beloved Pokémon will be the next one\xfffeto make your head spin!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My, oh my...\xfffeYou have a sweet fighting style.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI mean, you're a great Trainer!\xfffeExcuse me, I...uh... Oh, here!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want you to have this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My, oh my...\xfffeYou have a sweet fighting style.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI mean, you're a great Trainer!\xfffeExcuse me, I...uh... Oh, here!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want you to have this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeBolt Badge from Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeBolt Badge from Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you have four Badges, including this\xfffeBolt Badge, Pokémon up to Lv. 50,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeincluding traded Pokémon, will obey you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, here's this move I like.\xfffeFeel free to use it, um, if you want to.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If you have four Badges, including this\xfffeBolt Badge, Pokémon up to Lv. 50,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeincluding traded Pokémon, will obey you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, here's this move I like.\xfffeFeel free to use it, um, if you want to.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Volt Switch lets the Pokémon switch with\xfffea different Pokémon after attacking.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOf course, if you don't have another\xfffePokémon in your party, you can't switch.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're going to Driftveil City next?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOf course. There is a Pokémon Gym there,\xfffeafter all. Oh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI bet you won't be able to get there.\xfffeYou know what?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll fix it so you can cross.\xfffeWait for me on Route 5.

texts.original_text: What you'd like to do...\xfffeWhat your Pokémon would like to do...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you think it could be amazing\xfffeif those are aligned?

texts.original_text: Are you cool riding a roller coaster?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Are you cool riding a roller coaster?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When you ride a roller coaster, the\xfffespeed can make you dizzy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to make your head spin with\xfffea Pokémon battle that's just as intense!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: When you ride a roller coaster, the\xfffespeed can make you dizzy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to make your head spin with\xfffea Pokémon battle that's just as intense!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Your way of battling...\xfffeIt's elegant! You've got style!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEven compared to Ms. Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Your way of battling...\xfffeIt's elegant! You've got style!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEven compared to Ms. Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you press the switches, the\xffferoller coaster's path will change.
texts.translated_text: If you press the switches, the\xffferoller coaster's path will change.

texts.original_text: Your Nimbasa Gym challenge is finally\xfffenearing its finale.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you don't beat me,\xfffeyou won't get to meet Ms. Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Your Nimbasa Gym challenge is finally\xfffenearing its finale.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you don't beat me,\xfffeyou won't get to meet Ms. Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm also a Pokémon Trainer who was\xfffetoughened up by Ms. Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll show you power and style befitting\xfffethis Gym.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm also a Pokémon Trainer who was\xfffetoughened up by Ms. Elesa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll show you power and style befitting\xfffethis Gym.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It pleases me to be the opponent of a\xfffestrong and honorable Trainer like you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It pleases me to be the opponent of a\xfffestrong and honorable Trainer like you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you maintain your calm and don't get\xfffeflustered by this Gym's gimmicks,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou'll be able to defeat Ms. Elesa...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand any other Trainer, as well!
texts.translated_text: If you maintain your calm and don't get\xfffeflustered by this Gym's gimmicks,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou'll be able to defeat Ms. Elesa...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand any other Trainer, as well!

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 pressed the switch.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe roller coaster's path\xfffehas been changed!
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 pressed the switch.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe roller coaster's path\xfffehas been changed!

texts.original_text: How about it? I can see you're surprised!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you ever have guessed that\xfffethis Gym is a roller coaster?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, let me fill you in...\xfffeAnd take this, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: How about it? I can see you're surprised!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you ever have guessed that\xfffethis Gym is a roller coaster?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, let me fill you in...\xfffeAnd take this, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In this roller coaster Gym, the first\xfffestep is to get in the car.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext comes the platform!\xfffeThere, you can change\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere the coaster is going!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes you continue by riding\xfffethe cars of opponents you defeat.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's how you aim for the Gym Leader!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, Electric-type Pokémon don't\xfffedo well against Ground-type moves...
texts.translated_text: In this roller coaster Gym, the first\xfffestep is to get in the car.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext comes the platform!\xfffeThere, you can change\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere the coaster is going!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes you continue by riding\xfffethe cars of opponents you defeat.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's how you aim for the Gym Leader!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, Electric-type Pokémon don't\xfffedo well against Ground-type moves...

texts.original_text: Elesa uses sparkling bright\xfffeElectric-type attacks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the combination of you and your\xfffePokémon was even more impressive!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was... It was...\xfffean emotional roller coaster!
texts.translated_text: Elesa uses sparkling bright\xfffeElectric-type attacks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the combination of you and your\xfffePokémon was even more impressive!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was... It was...\xfffean emotional roller coaster!

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're looking for Team Plasma, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey ran into the amusement park.\xfffeCome with me.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're looking for Team Plasma, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey ran into the amusement park.\xfffeCome with me.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001They're not here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's ride the Ferris wheel\xfffeand see if we can spot them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI love Ferris wheels.\xfffeThe circular motion... The mechanics...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey're like collections of\xfffeelegant formulas.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001They're not here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's ride the Ferris wheel\xfffeand see if we can spot them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI love Ferris wheels.\xfffeThe circular motion... The mechanics...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey're like collections of\xfffeelegant formulas.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: My lord N!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: My lord N!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: You're safe, sire!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: You're safe, sire!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001There's no problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're part of the people we brought in\xfffeto help us save the Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSo, you're under my protection, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGo, quickly, and let my battle cover\xfffeyour retreat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Now then, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffedo you follow my logic?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001There's no problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're part of the people we brought in\xfffeto help us save the Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSo, you're under my protection, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGo, quickly, and let my battle cover\xfffeyour retreat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Now then, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffedo you follow my logic?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001If true, your words please me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAh. Then...\xfffeThe future I envision...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps I can't beat you here and now,\xfffebut I'll battle you to buy time for these\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemembers of Team Plasma to get away!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're quite strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I have a future that I must change.\xfffeAnd, for that future...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're quite strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I have a future that I must change.\xfffeAnd, for that future...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'll defeat the Champion and become\xfffeunbeatable, unlike any other!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll make all Trainers free their Pokémon!\xfffeJust try and stop me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to be together with Pokémon,\xfffeyour only hope is to collect the Badges\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom each area and head for the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon League!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTry and stop me there, if you dare!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'll defeat the Champion and become\xfffeunbeatable, unlike any other!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll make all Trainers free their Pokémon!\xfffeJust try and stop me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to be together with Pokémon,\xfffeyour only hope is to collect the Badges\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom each area and head for the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon League!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTry and stop me there, if you dare!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: This is the end of the Double Train line.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you want to return to Nimbasa City,\xfffeplease talk to me again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy your time here.

texts.translated_text: This is the end of the Multi Train line.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you want to return to Nimbasa City,\xfffeplease talk to me again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy your time here.

texts.translated_text: Do you want to return to Nimbasa City?

texts.original_text: Well then, we'll return to Nimbasa City.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well then, we'll return to Nimbasa City.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: What would you like to do?

texts.translated_text: Continue Challenge

texts.translated_text: Return to Nimbasa City

texts.translated_text: Stay Here

texts.translated_text: Awaiting your friend's response...

texts.original_text: "Return to Nimbasa City" was chosen, so\xfffeyour challenge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill end for now.
texts.translated_text: "Return to Nimbasa City" was chosen, so\xfffeyour challenge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill end for now.

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you have been promoted\xfffeto Rank \xf000ȁ\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you have been promoted\xfffeto Rank \xf000ȁ\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Would you like to send these results\xfffeusing Nintendo WFC?
texts.translated_text: Would you like to send these results\xfffeusing Nintendo WFC?

texts.original_text: There's still a lot more to go, but let's\xfffedo our best!
texts.translated_text: There's still a lot more to go, but let's\xfffedo our best!

texts.original_text: There's still a lot more to go, but let's\xfffedo our best!
texts.translated_text: There's still a lot more to go, but let's\xfffedo our best!

texts.original_text: We finally made it this far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur opponents will get tougher, but let's\xfffedo our best and not get discouraged!
texts.translated_text: We finally made it this far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur opponents will get tougher, but let's\xfffedo our best and not get discouraged!

texts.original_text: We finally made it this far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur opponents will get tougher, but let's\xfffedo our best and not get discouraged!
texts.translated_text: We finally made it this far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur opponents will get tougher, but let's\xfffedo our best and not get discouraged!

texts.original_text: We finally made it here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Could we be the best partners ever?!
texts.translated_text: We finally made it here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Could we be the best partners ever?!

texts.original_text: We finally made it here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Could we be the best partners ever?!
texts.translated_text: We finally made it here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Could we be the best partners ever?!

texts.original_text: This is the end of the Wi-Fi Train line.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you want to return to Nimbasa City,\xfffeplease talk to me again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy your time here.
texts.translated_text: This is the end of the Wi-Fi Train line.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you want to return to Nimbasa City,\xfffeplease talk to me again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy your time here.

texts.original_text: The challenge was interrupted.
texts.translated_text: The challenge was interrupted.

texts.original_text: The selection was canceled.
texts.translated_text: The selection was canceled.

texts.original_text: Constant battles make me nervous.\xfffeI'm taking a little rest here.
texts.translated_text: Constant battles make me nervous.\xfffeI'm taking a little rest here.

texts.original_text: I'm going to save up Battle Points and\xfffeget some items for my Pokémon to hold.
texts.translated_text: I'm going to save up Battle Points and\xfffeget some items for my Pokémon to hold.

texts.original_text: For each seven-win streak, the Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon who challenge you become\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeprogressively tougher.
texts.translated_text: For each seven-win streak, the Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon who challenge you become\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeprogressively tougher.

texts.original_text: I've decided to use only cute Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you have any unique thing you're\xfffeparticular about?
texts.translated_text: I've decided to use only cute Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you have any unique thing you're\xfffeparticular about?

texts.original_text: OK! I'm all prepared!\xfffeAll aboard for a battle journey!
texts.translated_text: OK! I'm all prepared!\xfffeAll aboard for a battle journey!

texts.original_text: Phew...I'm worn out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThese Trainers are tough. I wonder\xfffehow far I'll get with my skills.
texts.translated_text: Phew...I'm worn out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThese Trainers are tough. I wonder\xfffehow far I'll get with my skills.

texts.original_text: Have you heard of the Subway Bosses?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey appear only to strong Trainers,\xfffeand they challenge them to battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are the Battle Subway's bosses.
texts.translated_text: Have you heard of the Subway Bosses?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey appear only to strong Trainers,\xfffeand they challenge them to battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are the Battle Subway's bosses.

texts.original_text: That last battle was tough...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI should've traded in my BP for a\xfffebetter item.
texts.translated_text: That last battle was tough...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI should've traded in my BP for a\xfffebetter item.

texts.original_text: If you have wooon, the trip goes ooon!\xfffeRelying on Pokémon, this vagabooond!
texts.translated_text: If you have wooon, the trip goes ooon!\xfffeRelying on Pokémon, this vagabooond!

texts.original_text: About time to take it to the next level.\xfffeGive it your best shot, too!
texts.translated_text: About time to take it to the next level.\xfffeGive it your best shot, too!

texts.original_text: The Trainers here are really tough\xfffefrom the very start.
texts.translated_text: The Trainers here are really tough\xfffefrom the very start.

texts.original_text: My 42nd straight win...\xfffeNot too shabby, eh?
texts.translated_text: My 42nd straight win...\xfffeNot too shabby, eh?

texts.original_text: Can't believe I won 84 straight...\xfffeIs this a dream or a hallucination?
texts.translated_text: Can't believe I won 84 straight...\xfffeIs this a dream or a hallucination?

texts.original_text: You've got a 14-win streak!\xfffePretty good! Not bad!
texts.translated_text: You've got a 14-win streak!\xfffePretty good! Not bad!

texts.original_text: I hear the Super Train is endless!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn other words, if you keep winning, you\xfffecan keep going, on and on to wherever!
texts.translated_text: I hear the Super Train is endless!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn other words, if you keep winning, you\xfffecan keep going, on and on to wherever!

texts.original_text: I can go a lot further!\xfffeI can win a lot more!
texts.translated_text: I can go a lot further!\xfffeI can win a lot more!

texts.original_text: The eyes of the Trainers here are very\xfffeserious, or maybe you could say glinting.
texts.translated_text: The eyes of the Trainers here are very\xfffeserious, or maybe you could say glinting.

texts.original_text: Is this the best this officer can do...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe light from the passing trains seems\xfffeway too bright.
texts.translated_text: Is this the best this officer can do...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe light from the passing trains seems\xfffeway too bright.

texts.original_text: The Subway Boss was a suspicious,\xfffestrange fellow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI still don't believe he was giving it\xfffehis all.
texts.translated_text: The Subway Boss was a suspicious,\xfffestrange fellow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI still don't believe he was giving it\xfffehis all.

texts.original_text: Challenging people is also part of my\xfffepolice training.
texts.translated_text: Challenging people is also part of my\xfffepolice training.

texts.original_text: I can legally go as wild as I want!\xfffeThis place! It's paradise, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: I can legally go as wild as I want!\xfffeThis place! It's paradise, isn't it?

texts.original_text: My journey has just started!\xfffeNeither of us can afford to lose!
texts.translated_text: My journey has just started!\xfffeNeither of us can afford to lose!

texts.original_text: Being alone on the station's platform\xfffesomehow makes me feel a little sad.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople leave on their journeys here, and\xfffeit reminds me of those memories.
texts.translated_text: Being alone on the station's platform\xfffesomehow makes me feel a little sad.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople leave on their journeys here, and\xfffeit reminds me of those memories.

texts.original_text: The Subway Boss was a piece of cake!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should cut loose on the\xfffeSuper Train next time!
texts.translated_text: The Subway Boss was a piece of cake!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should cut loose on the\xfffeSuper Train next time!

texts.original_text: The Trainers sure have become stronger.\xfffeI'm feeling a little uneasy...
texts.translated_text: The Trainers sure have become stronger.\xfffeI'm feeling a little uneasy...

texts.original_text: It looks like my Pokémon skill has\xfffereached its peak power.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI couldn't let go of my dreams...\xfffeI'll hang them on you, stranger,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyoung Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd this is proof.\xfffePlease accept this, youngster...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It looks like my Pokémon skill has\xfffereached its peak power.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI couldn't let go of my dreams...\xfffeI'll hang them on you, stranger,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyoung Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd this is proof.\xfffePlease accept this, youngster...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm going to return to my home and\xfffequietly cheer myself up with art!
texts.translated_text: I'm going to return to my home and\xfffequietly cheer myself up with art!

texts.original_text: Oh ho ho ho...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've already done better than I did\xfffeduring my last challenge!
texts.translated_text: Oh ho ho ho...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've already done better than I did\xfffeduring my last challenge!

texts.original_text: Battle between two excellent Trainers is\xfffevery artistic.
texts.translated_text: Battle between two excellent Trainers is\xfffevery artistic.

texts.original_text: For being called a Subway Boss,\xfffethat Trainer sure wasn't as strong\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas “Boss" suggests.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was almost as if...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs if they are simply gauging\xfffehow strong we really are.
texts.translated_text: For being called a Subway Boss,\xfffethat Trainer sure wasn't as strong\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas “Boss" suggests.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was almost as if...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs if they are simply gauging\xfffehow strong we really are.

texts.original_text: Well then!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's about time to get on\xfffethe train!
texts.translated_text: Well then!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's about time to get on\xfffethe train!

texts.original_text: Now just wait a minute, little Pokémon!\xfffeI'll let you battle lots and lots soon!
texts.translated_text: Now just wait a minute, little Pokémon!\xfffeI'll let you battle lots and lots soon!

texts.original_text: Urk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI got motion sickness on the train...
texts.translated_text: Urk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI got motion sickness on the train...

texts.original_text: You beat our boss, right?\xfffeNot half bad, hey!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now, super Trainer, you've\xfffeearned the qualification to take on the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSuper Train!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Trainers on the Super Train are\xfffereally tough.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to know the essence of the\xfffeBattle Subway, you should give it a try!
texts.translated_text: You beat our boss, right?\xfffeNot half bad, hey!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now, super Trainer, you've\xfffeearned the qualification to take on the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSuper Train!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Trainers on the Super Train are\xfffereally tough.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to know the essence of the\xfffeBattle Subway, you should give it a try!

texts.original_text: I'd rather have an exciting battle than\xfffeslowly drive the train.
texts.translated_text: I'd rather have an exciting battle than\xfffeslowly drive the train.

texts.original_text: Where did you come from?\xfffeAnd where are you going?
texts.translated_text: Where did you come from?\xfffeAnd where are you going?

texts.original_text: We Depot Agents are the protectors of\xfffepeace and order in the station.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are verrry opposed to littering on\xfffethe platform, shouting or playing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinstruments, loitering, or any activities\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat bother other people!
texts.translated_text: We Depot Agents are the protectors of\xfffepeace and order in the station.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are verrry opposed to littering on\xfffethe platform, shouting or playing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinstruments, loitering, or any activities\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat bother other people!

texts.original_text: Just like how a machine needs fine-tuning,\xfffePokémon need maintenance, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a necessity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor example, rethinking the moves that a\xfffePokémon knows.
texts.translated_text: Just like how a machine needs fine-tuning,\xfffePokémon need maintenance, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a necessity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor example, rethinking the moves that a\xfffePokémon knows.

texts.original_text: No clumsy gimmicks...\xfffeNo unnecessary items...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only thing you can rely on is the\xfffestrength of you and your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis place is wonderful, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: No clumsy gimmicks...\xfffeNo unnecessary items...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only thing you can rely on is the\xfffestrength of you and your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis place is wonderful, isn't it?

texts.original_text: Over 100 straight victories...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf this is all due to your strength,\xfffeyou're even a match for the Champion.
texts.translated_text: Over 100 straight victories...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf this is all due to your strength,\xfffeyou're even a match for the Champion.

texts.original_text: The strength of the Trainers on\xfffethe Super Train is beyond imagination!
texts.translated_text: The strength of the Trainers on\xfffethe Super Train is beyond imagination!

texts.original_text: I had a taste of it...\xfffeThe rush of battle...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI shouldn't...\xfffeIt's too wild...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut at this rate, I'm going to\xfffeend up on the path of battlers...
texts.translated_text: I had a taste of it...\xfffeThe rush of battle...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI shouldn't...\xfffeIt's too wild...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut at this rate, I'm going to\xfffeend up on the path of battlers...

texts.original_text: Howdy! I'm a genius Pilot!\xfffeUnova's finest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I'm comin' in first here, too!
texts.translated_text: Howdy! I'm a genius Pilot!\xfffeUnova's finest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I'm comin' in first here, too!

texts.original_text: I've seen elite Trainers like me\xfffeall over the place, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like the battles will be tough\xfffefrom here on.
texts.translated_text: I've seen elite Trainers like me\xfffeall over the place, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like the battles will be tough\xfffefrom here on.

texts.original_text: Even for an elite Trainer such as myself,\xfffeit's starting to get hard.
texts.translated_text: Even for an elite Trainer such as myself,\xfffeit's starting to get hard.

texts.original_text: Hey, how are you doing?\xfffeI'm still going strong!
texts.translated_text: Hey, how are you doing?\xfffeI'm still going strong!

texts.original_text: I've a-done it--77 straight wins!\xfffeThat number has a lucky sound!
texts.translated_text: I've a-done it--77 straight wins!\xfffeThat number has a lucky sound!

texts.original_text: We've defeated over 300 Trainers...
texts.translated_text: We've defeated over 300 Trainers...

texts.original_text: My my, what a weak-looking Trainer...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I would just get bored if I\xfffebattled you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you this, so just get a little\xfffetougher, OK?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My my, what a weak-looking Trainer...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I would just get bored if I\xfffebattled you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you this, so just get a little\xfffetougher, OK?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm only interested in strong\xfffeopponents...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you get tougher, I wouldn't\xfffemind battling you.
texts.translated_text: I'm only interested in strong\xfffeopponents...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you get tougher, I wouldn't\xfffemind battling you.

texts.original_text: Not many people left on the platform...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGuess that shows how hard it is\xfffeto keep winning on the Battle Subway.
texts.translated_text: Not many people left on the platform...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGuess that shows how hard it is\xfffeto keep winning on the Battle Subway.

texts.original_text: ...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHuh? What? What do you want?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm busy planning my tactics for my\xfffenext battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't mean to be rude, but I really\xfffeneed to concentrate. Would you mind\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenot talking to me right now?
texts.translated_text: ...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHuh? What? What do you want?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm busy planning my tactics for my\xfffenext battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't mean to be rude, but I really\xfffeneed to concentrate. Would you mind\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenot talking to me right now?

texts.original_text: 91 straight victories is nothing more\xfffethan a natural result for me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy glorious record will just keep\xfffegoing up!
texts.translated_text: 91 straight victories is nothing more\xfffethan a natural result for me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy glorious record will just keep\xfffegoing up!

texts.original_text: You...\xfffeYou have the same eyes as me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou love battling so much...\xfffeNo, it's not just that...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBattling is your reason for living.\xfffeYou and I are the same type, aren't we?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...I'll give you this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You...\xfffeYou have the same eyes as me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou love battling so much...\xfffeNo, it's not just that...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBattling is your reason for living.\xfffeYou and I are the same type, aren't we?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...I'll give you this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're continuing your battle, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's because we are that type of\xfffeperson, aren't we...
texts.translated_text: You're continuing your battle, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's because we are that type of\xfffeperson, aren't we...

texts.original_text: I'm going to leave a rockin' record and\xfffeturn into a big star!
texts.translated_text: I'm going to leave a rockin' record and\xfffeturn into a big star!

texts.original_text: Hey, how are you doing?\xfffeI'm still going strong!
texts.translated_text: Hey, how are you doing?\xfffeI'm still going strong!

texts.original_text: There's more to Pokémon than it seems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe world of Pokémon battling really gets\xfffedeeper and deeper.
texts.translated_text: There's more to Pokémon than it seems.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe world of Pokémon battling really gets\xfffedeeper and deeper.

texts.original_text: I found this when I was cleaning.\xfffeYou can have it if you'd like.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I found this when I was cleaning.\xfffeYou can have it if you'd like.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, no need to thank me!\xfffeAfter all, I just found it in the trash.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand it. Recently, many\xfffefolks have just been throwing away\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeperfectly good things.
texts.translated_text: Oh, no need to thank me!\xfffeAfter all, I just found it in the trash.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand it. Recently, many\xfffefolks have just been throwing away\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeperfectly good things.

texts.original_text: I may be a Janitor, but I have a lot\xfffeof confidence in my abilities!
texts.translated_text: I may be a Janitor, but I have a lot\xfffeof confidence in my abilities!

texts.original_text: All right! Bring out your Poké Balls!\xfffeNow is the time for a battle!
texts.translated_text: All right! Bring out your Poké Balls!\xfffeNow is the time for a battle!

texts.original_text: You like battles, too!
texts.translated_text: You like battles, too!

texts.original_text: I can't believe a Veteran like me\xfffewould get into trouble like that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhere in the world are the Trainers\xfffehere training?
texts.translated_text: I can't believe a Veteran like me\xfffewould get into trouble like that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhere in the world are the Trainers\xfffehere training?

texts.original_text: How are you doing, Trainer?\xfffeAre you starting to get tired yet?
texts.translated_text: How are you doing, Trainer?\xfffeAre you starting to get tired yet?

texts.original_text: Mumble, mumble, mumble...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to bring good fortune, I always\xfffethink about my family before a battle.
texts.translated_text: Mumble, mumble, mumble...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to bring good fortune, I always\xfffethink about my family before a battle.

texts.original_text: I've been watching you battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNice technique and judgment... Not\xfffesurprising, after a win streak like yours.
texts.translated_text: I've been watching you battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNice technique and judgment... Not\xfffesurprising, after a win streak like yours.

texts.original_text: Not many people around.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut each person who is still here has\xfffeshown true strength.
texts.translated_text: Not many people around.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut each person who is still here has\xfffeshown true strength.

texts.original_text: Even a Veteran can lose to a Preschooler\xfffeif they get careless.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battling requires that you\xfffealways be on guard.
texts.translated_text: Even a Veteran can lose to a Preschooler\xfffeif they get careless.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battling requires that you\xfffealways be on guard.

texts.original_text: Just a little more to 50 straight wins!\xfffeSuddenly, I'm all pumped up!
texts.translated_text: Just a little more to 50 straight wins!\xfffeSuddenly, I'm all pumped up!

texts.original_text: You have the face of someone who\xfffeabsolutely loves Pokémon battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven now, you're still completely hooked\xfffeon battling. Amazing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee hee...\xfffeYou have a promising future!
texts.translated_text: You have the face of someone who\xfffeabsolutely loves Pokémon battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven now, you're still completely hooked\xfffeon battling. Amazing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee hee...\xfffeYou have a promising future!

texts.original_text: You and I both have 91 straight wins!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich of us will reach a 100-win\xfffestreak first?
texts.translated_text: You and I both have 91 straight wins!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich of us will reach a 100-win\xfffestreak first?

texts.original_text: Dawn and dusk behind my battles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rocking train softly rattles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow many hours have now passed\xfffesince we left Nimbasa in the past?
texts.translated_text: Dawn and dusk behind my battles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rocking train softly rattles...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow many hours have now passed\xfffesince we left Nimbasa in the past?

texts.original_text: This is the end of the line...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe trip sure ended quickly.\xfffeI don't want to go home yet.
texts.translated_text: This is the end of the line...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe trip sure ended quickly.\xfffeI don't want to go home yet.

texts.original_text: If you've made it this far, that means\xfffeyou've won 14 in a row.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a fluke! Fourteen is how old I am!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHa ha ha...

texts.original_text: I'm going to let people know I'm still\xfffeas active as ever!

texts.original_text: It's the end of the line already...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess that means my Pokémon\xfffebattle journey is over for now.

texts.original_text: Phew...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis long journey is hard on this\xfffeold body.

texts.original_text: Hmm. You've got 28 straight wins, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis time, I want to keep going\xfffewith this momentum.

texts.original_text: You also beat the Subway Boss, right?\xfffeSomeday I want to battle you, too!

texts.original_text: When my favorite Poké Ball begins\xfffeto shake, I tremble with excitement!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're no ordinary Trainer, are you?\xfffePerhaps you are the Champion somewhere?
texts.translated_text: When my favorite Poké Ball begins\xfffeto shake, I tremble with excitement!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're no ordinary Trainer, are you?\xfffePerhaps you are the Champion somewhere?

texts.original_text: Winning battles feels good, but I've\xfffetraveled quite far...I wonder if I can\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeget back in time for work tomorrow...

texts.original_text: I finally have a 49-battle win streak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf I can do this well at work, I wonder\xfffeif I can get promoted...

texts.original_text: You sure look up to athletes when\xfffeyou're a kid.
texts.translated_text: You sure look up to athletes when\xfffeyou're a kid.

texts.translated_text: I'm raising the same Pokémon as\xfffemy favorite athlete's Pokémon.

texts.original_text: When I throw a Poké Ball, I copy the\xfffethrowing form of a quarterback!
texts.translated_text: When I throw a Poké Ball, I copy the\xfffethrowing form of a quarterback!

texts.translated_text: When I throw a Poké Ball, I copy the form\xfffeof a pitcher!

texts.original_text: Ha ha! I am a football player!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI injured my hand, so I can't sign\xfffeautographs! I'm sorry about that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, what does the autograph on your\xfffeTrainer Card look like?
texts.translated_text: Ha ha! I am a football player!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI injured my hand, so I can't sign\xfffeautographs! I'm sorry about that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, what does the autograph on your\xfffeTrainer Card look like?

texts.original_text: Yeah! I am an Infielder!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hurt my hand, so I can't write\xfffean autograph! Sorry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, how did you sign your Trainer Card?
texts.translated_text: Yeah! I am an Infielder!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hurt my hand, so I can't write\xfffean autograph! Sorry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, how did you sign your Trainer Card?

texts.original_text: Bwa ha ha! I am a Striker!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy hand got hurt, so I won't be able to\xfffesign any autographs! Regrets!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat does your Trainer Card signature\xfffelook like?
texts.translated_text: Bwa ha ha! I am a Striker!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy hand got hurt, so I won't be able to\xfffesign any autographs! Regrets!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat does your Trainer Card signature\xfffelook like?

texts.original_text: Professional athletes look so attractive\xfffeduring a game!
texts.translated_text: Professional athletes look so attractive\xfffeduring a game!

texts.original_text: We can tell how good these professionals\xfffeare just by watching them practice.
texts.translated_text: We can tell how good these professionals\xfffeare just by watching them practice.

texts.original_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffefootball and Pokémon battles!
texts.translated_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffefootball and Pokémon battles!

texts.original_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffebaseball and Pokémon battles!
texts.translated_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffebaseball and Pokémon battles!

texts.original_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffesoccer and Pokémon battles!
texts.translated_text: I want to be a person who is good at\xfffesoccer and Pokémon battles!

texts.original_text: On the field, they play games in earnest!
texts.translated_text: On the field, they play games in earnest!

texts.original_text: Just one ball can make people and\xfffePokémon smile.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSports are wonderful things!
texts.translated_text: Just one ball can make people and\xfffePokémon smile.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSports are wonderful things!

texts.original_text: Eeeee! Turn this waaaaay!
texts.translated_text: Eeeee! Turn this waaaaay!

texts.original_text: There!\xfffeThere, turn like that!
texts.translated_text: There!\xfffeThere, turn like that!

texts.original_text: Following a ball right and left\xfffemakes me feel woozy.
texts.translated_text: Following a ball right and left\xfffemakes me feel woozy.

texts.original_text: Yahooooooo!
texts.translated_text: Yahooooooo!

texts.original_text: Athletes who score points, and athletes\xfffewho support them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDetermining their different roles is the\xfffekey to building a team!
texts.translated_text: Athletes who score points, and athletes\xfffewho support them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDetermining their different roles is the\xfffekey to building a team!

texts.original_text: Football is a fun sport that is divided\xfffeinto offense and defense.
texts.translated_text: Football is a fun sport that is divided\xfffeinto offense and defense.

texts.original_text: His... Those eyes...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like he's coming\xffferight at me!
texts.translated_text: His... Those eyes...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like he's coming\xffferight at me!

texts.original_text: The helmet and pads weigh\xfffe15 to 18 pounds!
texts.translated_text: The helmet and pads weigh\xfffe15 to 18 pounds!

texts.original_text: I've trained and built up my muscles\xfffeby tackling Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNothing can move me!
texts.translated_text: I've trained and built up my muscles\xfffeby tackling Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNothing can move me!

texts.original_text: OK! I will defend to the end with moves\xfffelike Protect and Detect!
texts.translated_text: OK! I will defend to the end with moves\xfffelike Protect and Detect!

texts.original_text: My favorite moves?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Hmm.\xfffeI'd say Tackle and Take Down.
texts.translated_text: My favorite moves?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Hmm.\xfffeI'd say Tackle and Take Down.

texts.original_text: Reading your opponent's attack and\xfffedeciding your next move...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBoth Pokémon battles and football have\xfffethe same thrill!
texts.translated_text: Reading your opponent's attack and\xfffedeciding your next move...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBoth Pokémon battles and football have\xfffethe same thrill!

texts.original_text: The appeal of football?\xfffeLet me see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst, just watch a game without thinking\xfffeabout the rules!
texts.translated_text: The appeal of football?\xfffeLet me see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst, just watch a game without thinking\xfffeabout the rules!

texts.original_text: I'll protect my team with my whole body\xfffeto avoid our opponents' interference!
texts.translated_text: I'll protect my team with my whole body\xfffeto avoid our opponents' interference!

texts.original_text: In football, the quarterback is the\xfffeathlete who decides a strategy and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecarries it out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's kind of like a Pokémon Trainer!
texts.translated_text: In football, the quarterback is the\xfffeathlete who decides a strategy and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecarries it out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's kind of like a Pokémon Trainer!

texts.original_text: In football, you have to learn each and\xfffeevery formation by heart!
texts.translated_text: In football, you have to learn each and\xfffeevery formation by heart!

texts.original_text: The ball used in football is oval-shaped\xfffeand hard to throw, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut once you get the hang of it, you can\xfffethrow it perfectly!
texts.translated_text: The ball used in football is oval-shaped\xfffeand hard to throw, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut once you get the hang of it, you can\xfffethrow it perfectly!

texts.original_text: I am a greeeeeat secret weapon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only problem is, I am so secret that\xfffeI've never been in a game...
texts.translated_text: I am a greeeeeat secret weapon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only problem is, I am so secret that\xfffeI've never been in a game...

texts.original_text: Yoo-hoo! Pass me the ball!
texts.translated_text: Yoo-hoo! Pass me the ball!

texts.original_text: Bodies crashing into other bodies!\xfffeGo, go, go!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am the owner. That’s what\xfffeI like to see.
texts.translated_text: Bodies crashing into other bodies!\xfffeGo, go, go!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am the owner. That’s what\xfffeI like to see.

texts.original_text: To be good at something, you have to do\xfffeit repeatedly, day after day after day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how you get results.\xfffeOtherwise, you won't get better at it.
texts.translated_text: To be good at something, you have to do\xfffeit repeatedly, day after day after day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how you get results.\xfffeOtherwise, you won't get better at it.

texts.original_text: When I was a kid, I played catch with\xfffemy Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: When I was a kid, I played catch with\xfffemy Pokémon!

texts.original_text: It's not bad to grow up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's bad to forget what it felt like\xfffeto be a child.
texts.translated_text: It's not bad to grow up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's bad to forget what it felt like\xfffeto be a child.

texts.original_text: I have baseball, and I have Pokémon...\xfffeHow happy I am!
texts.translated_text: I have baseball, and I have Pokémon...\xfffeHow happy I am!

texts.original_text: If you don't swing a bat, you can't hit\xfffea ball.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't do things, you won't fail...\xfffebut you won't succeed, either.
texts.translated_text: If you don't swing a bat, you can't hit\xfffea ball.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't do things, you won't fail...\xfffebut you won't succeed, either.

texts.original_text: I give 100 percent of my energy all the\xfffetime! That is the only thing I can do.
texts.translated_text: I give 100 percent of my energy all the\xfffetime! That is the only thing I can do.

texts.original_text: What I brag about is my bat!
texts.translated_text: What I brag about is my bat!

texts.original_text: Everybody makes mistakes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut goalkeepers cannot afford a mistake,\xfffebecause they cannot score goals to make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeup for it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf one Pokémon on a team makes a\xfffemistake, however, the other Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand their Trainer can cover for it!
texts.translated_text: Everybody makes mistakes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut goalkeepers cannot afford a mistake,\xfffebecause they cannot score goals to make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeup for it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf one Pokémon on a team makes a\xfffemistake, however, the other Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand their Trainer can cover for it!

texts.original_text: If a Striker catches a teammate's eye,\xfffethey understand each other.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon and its Trainer are the same.\xfffeDon't you agree?
texts.translated_text: If a Striker catches a teammate's eye,\xfffethey understand each other.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon and its Trainer are the same.\xfffeDon't you agree?

texts.original_text: Really strong Trainers thoroughly do\xfffewhatever they can do!
texts.translated_text: Really strong Trainers thoroughly do\xfffewhatever they can do!

texts.original_text: Soccer is beautiful and fun!\xfffePokémon are also beautiful and fun!
texts.translated_text: Soccer is beautiful and fun!\xfffePokémon are also beautiful and fun!

texts.original_text: Soccer with Pokémon is Pokémon soccer.\xfffeThe abbreviation is...Poccer?
texts.translated_text: Soccer with Pokémon is Pokémon soccer.\xfffeThe abbreviation is...Poccer?

texts.original_text: Throw a sound pass to a team member!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter that, to receive a sound pass,\xfffeyou'll need to move swiftly.
texts.translated_text: Throw a sound pass to a team member!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter that, to receive a sound pass,\xfffeyou'll need to move swiftly.

texts.translated_text: Run! Run!\xfffeJust think about running!

texts.translated_text: There is a tennis match\xfffein Small Court now!

texts.translated_text: Tennis players are practicing \xfffein Small Court now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople can watch them practicing!

texts.original_text: We love sports.\xfffeWatching games is great, but we enjoy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewatching practices, too!
texts.translated_text: We love sports.\xfffeWatching games is great, but we enjoy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewatching practices, too!

texts.translated_text: New styles of basketball and tennis\xfffecreated by people and Pokémon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThese may be advanced forms of sports.

texts.original_text: Hey! Now! There!\xfffeAh! No! No, no!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes! Yes, yes!\xfffeThat's right! Ha!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you do it like I said?!
texts.translated_text: Hey! Now! There!\xfffeAh! No! No, no!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes! Yes, yes!\xfffeThat's right! Ha!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you do it like I said?!

texts.original_text: I watch them practice quietly.\xfffeBecause I trust the athletes!
texts.translated_text: I watch them practice quietly.\xfffeBecause I trust the athletes!

texts.original_text: Hm-hum! I can copy that play in my\xfffenext game.
texts.translated_text: Hm-hum! I can copy that play in my\xfffenext game.

texts.original_text: Did you see it?\xfffeThat's a great muscle move!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood muscle! Good hustle!
texts.translated_text: Did you see it?\xfffeThat's a great muscle move!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood muscle! Good hustle!

texts.original_text: Oh! This could be a once-in-a-lifetime\xfffegame! I might witness history!
texts.translated_text: Oh! This could be a once-in-a-lifetime\xfffegame! I might witness history!

texts.original_text: Woooow! Coooool!\xfffeSomeday I want to be on that court!
texts.translated_text: Woooow! Coooool!\xfffeSomeday I want to be on that court!

texts.original_text: I believe in big money!\xfffe...No, I mean I will gain glory!
texts.translated_text: I believe in big money!\xfffe...No, I mean I will gain glory!

texts.original_text: Pokémon tennis is wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlayers are never alone.\xfffeTheir Pokémon are always with them!
texts.translated_text: Pokémon tennis is wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlayers are never alone.\xfffeTheir Pokémon are always with them!

texts.original_text: Tennis is all about rackets and balls.\xfffeThere's nothing profound about it.
texts.translated_text: Tennis is all about rackets and balls.\xfffeThere's nothing profound about it.

texts.original_text: I am a ball boy who collects\xfffetennis balls.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are a Pokémon Trainer who\xfffecollects Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: I am a ball boy who collects\xfffetennis balls.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are a Pokémon Trainer who\xfffecollects Pokémon.

texts.original_text: To become ball boys,\xfffewe gotta practice.
texts.translated_text: To become ball boys,\xfffewe gotta practice.

texts.original_text: A fight against your opponent can end in\xfffethe blink of an eye!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe important thing is how much you\xfffeprepare before the fight.
texts.translated_text: A fight against your opponent can end in\xfffethe blink of an eye!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe important thing is how much you\xfffeprepare before the fight.

texts.original_text: I don't play basketball just because\xfffeI'm tall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I grew tall because I wanted to\xfffeplay basketball so badly?!
texts.translated_text: I don't play basketball just because\xfffeI'm tall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I grew tall because I wanted to\xfffeplay basketball so badly?!

texts.original_text: You! Experience feeling like a\xfffepowerful man!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You! Experience feeling like a\xfffepowerful man!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A Pokémon that can use Strength can\xfffepush a big rock even when it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenot fighting!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to push some rocks around,\xfffego to Route 16!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThump! Thump!
texts.translated_text: A Pokémon that can use Strength can\xfffepush a big rock even when it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenot fighting!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to push some rocks around,\xfffego to Route 16!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThump! Thump!

texts.original_text: Have you seen the musical?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy own Pokémon up on the stage...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is an indescribably\xfffemoving experience.
texts.translated_text: Have you seen the musical?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy own Pokémon up on the stage...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is an indescribably\xfffemoving experience.

texts.original_text: Castelia City is the heart of business.\xfffeNimbasa City is the heart of leisure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVarious people and Pokémon gather\xfffeall over Unova, and the region is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecoming more and more lively.
texts.translated_text: Castelia City is the heart of business.\xfffeNimbasa City is the heart of leisure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVarious people and Pokémon gather\xfffeall over Unova, and the region is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecoming more and more lively.

texts.original_text: A sports game, like baseball or football,\xfffestarts at a certain time every day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's in Big Stadium!
texts.translated_text: A sports game, like baseball or football,\xfffestarts at a certain time every day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's in Big Stadium!

texts.original_text: In the Small Court, you can find games of\xfffebasketball and tennis.
texts.translated_text: In the Small Court, you can find games of\xfffebasketball and tennis.

texts.original_text: Oh...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, my!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 seems to like you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's so nice to see. Makes me want\xfffeto give you this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, my!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 seems to like you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's so nice to see. Makes me want\xfffeto give you this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: If a Pokémon holds a Soothe Bell, it will\xfffebecome more friendly to you.

texts.original_text: Oh...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, my!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour \xf000ā\x0001\x0000's feelings\xfffetoward you seem to be neutral.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you can win its friendship,\xfffeI will give you something nice!

texts.translated_text: If you see a Pokémon that\xfffeyou want to have join you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebe sure to use a good type of Poké Ball.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause this could be the\xfffefirst and last time you see that Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I know it might seem strange for me\xfffeto say this, since I'm the one who asked\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou to complete the Pokédex, but please,\xf000븀\x0000\xffferemember to enjoy your journey!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I know it might seem strange for me\xfffeto say this, since I'm the one who asked\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou to complete the Pokédex, but please,\xf000븀\x0000\xffferemember to enjoy your journey!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Of course, I'm not saying you can just\xfffeneglect the Pokédex. But you know that!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, if you'll please excuse me,\xfffeI have to go meet Bianca.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Of course, I'm not saying you can just\xfffeneglect the Pokédex. But you know that!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, if you'll please excuse me,\xfffeI have to go meet Bianca.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: It seems the Professor\xfffegave us the Pokédex as a reason\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto send us on a journey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt least, that's what my mom told me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey wanted us to go out and see the\xfffeworld, so my mom, Bianca's mom, and your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemom made a request to Professor Juniper.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: It seems the Professor\xfffegave us the Pokédex as a reason\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto send us on a journey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt least, that's what my mom told me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey wanted us to go out and see the\xfffeworld, so my mom, Bianca's mom, and your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemom made a request to Professor Juniper.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, what should we do now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I'd like to show the professor my\xfffethanks by going to Route 4 and catching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesome Pokémon I haven't yet caught.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, what should we do now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I'd like to show the professor my\xfffethanks by going to Route 4 and catching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesome Pokémon I haven't yet caught.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you've come from Route 4,\xfffeNimbasa City is ahead.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext! If you've come from Nimbasa City,\xfffeRoute 4 is ahead!
texts.translated_text: If you've come from Route 4,\xfffeNimbasa City is ahead.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext! If you've come from Nimbasa City,\xfffeRoute 4 is ahead!

texts.original_text: Look at the electric bulletin board to\xfffesee what's happening in Nimbasa City!
texts.translated_text: Look at the electric bulletin board to\xfffesee what's happening in Nimbasa City!

texts.original_text: There are performers gathering on\xfffeRoute 5!
texts.translated_text: There are performers gathering on\xfffeRoute 5!

texts.original_text: I wonder who writes the news on the\xfffebulletin board...
texts.translated_text: I wonder who writes the news on the\xfffebulletin board...

texts.original_text: This way leads to Route 16\xfffeand Marvelous Bridge!
texts.translated_text: This way leads to Route 16\xfffeand Marvelous Bridge!

texts.original_text: A camper has been parked in\xfffeLostlorn Forest on Route 16.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how long it's been there.
texts.translated_text: A camper has been parked in\xfffeLostlorn Forest on Route 16.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how long it's been there.

texts.original_text: Zoroark bewitched everyone and was\xfffehiding itself and its habitat.
texts.translated_text: Zoroark bewitched everyone and was\xfffehiding itself and its habitat.

texts.original_text: Let's train Pokémon vigorously!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, who like training, and you, who\xfffedon't like training!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's train our Pokémon by giving\xfffethem these!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Let's train Pokémon vigorously!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, who like training, and you, who\xfffedon't like training!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's train our Pokémon by giving\xfffethem these!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A Pokémon's Speed decreases when it\xfffeholds a Macho Brace, but it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegrows stronger!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a tool that is a bit difficult to use,\xfffebut that's the way it goes!
texts.translated_text: A Pokémon's Speed decreases when it\xfffeholds a Macho Brace, but it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegrows stronger!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a tool that is a bit difficult to use,\xfffebut that's the way it goes!

texts.original_text: The Battle Test...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis woman of mystery will show you\xfffethe ropes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBattle effectively and keep your\xfffePokémon from fainting!
texts.translated_text: The Battle Test...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis woman of mystery will show you\xfffethe ropes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBattle effectively and keep your\xfffePokémon from fainting!

texts.original_text: Shiny Krokorok...\xfffeI wonder what colors they are!
texts.translated_text: Shiny Krokorok...\xfffeI wonder what colors they are!

texts.original_text: People say Shiny Pokémon\xfffelook like they're gleaming when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey come out of the grass!
texts.translated_text: People say Shiny Pokémon\xfffelook like they're gleaming when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey come out of the grass!

texts.original_text: Nuha nuha nuhaha!
texts.translated_text: Nuha nuha nuhaha!

texts.original_text: If I compared the glow of Nimbasa to\xfffesomething, it would be the sun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes, the sun!\xfffeIt inspires me to give you this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If I compared the glow of Nimbasa to\xfffesomething, it would be the sun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes, the sun!\xfffeIt inspires me to give you this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Sun Stones are stones that make certain\xfffePokémon evolve!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI gave it to Petilil as a present!
texts.translated_text: Sun Stones are stones that make certain\xfffePokémon evolve!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI gave it to Petilil as a present!

texts.original_text: Sun Stones are stones that make certain\xfffePokémon evolve!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI gave it to Cottonee as a present!
texts.translated_text: Sun Stones are stones that make certain\xfffePokémon evolve!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI gave it to Cottonee as a present!

texts.original_text: If you love your Pokémon, even if it\xfffechanges its appearance, you'll stay\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconnected with your Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: If you love your Pokémon, even if it\xfffechanges its appearance, you'll stay\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconnected with your Pokémon.

texts.original_text: When a Pokémon evolves, it gets stronger\xfffeand its appearance changes significantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon that you keep from evolving\xfffewill learn moves more quickly!
texts.translated_text: When a Pokémon evolves, it gets stronger\xfffeand its appearance changes significantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon that you keep from evolving\xfffewill learn moves more quickly!

texts.original_text: Hrmph! So yer the Trainers Elesa was\xfffetalkin' about, huh.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Clay. I'm the Gym Leader 'round\xfffethese parts.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't be expectin' no welcome, now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause when we lowered that bridge,\xfffethe Team Plasma guys we'd caught\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedone escaped in all the ruckus!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hrmph! So yer the Trainers Elesa was\xfffetalkin' about, huh.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Clay. I'm the Gym Leader 'round\xfffethese parts.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't be expectin' no welcome, now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause when we lowered that bridge,\xfffethe Team Plasma guys we'd caught\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedone escaped in all the ruckus!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: What a bother.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're grateful that you lowered the\xfffebridge, but how is it our fault that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey escaped?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: What a bother.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're grateful that you lowered the\xfffebridge, but how is it our fault that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey escaped?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: Ya can say whatever ya want.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what's important is y'all showed up,\xfffeand then Team Plasma escaped.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe it's a little heavy-handed, but\xfffeyou oughtta start lookin' for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYer both talented Trainers, aren't ya?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: Ya can say whatever ya want.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what's important is y'all showed up,\xfffeand then Team Plasma escaped.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe it's a little heavy-handed, but\xfffeyou oughtta start lookin' for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYer both talented Trainers, aren't ya?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Tell ya what...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf ya find Team Plasma, I'll let ya\xfffechallenge my Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLife's all about give and take!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Tell ya what...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf ya find Team Plasma, I'll let ya\xfffechallenge my Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLife's all about give and take!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Well, I suppose that's fair.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut really, we would have looked\xfffefor Team Plasma even if he hadn't asked.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can get stronger while beating that\xfffebothersome bunch...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Well, I suppose that's fair.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut really, we would have looked\xfffefor Team Plasma even if he hadn't asked.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can get stronger while beating that\xfffebothersome bunch...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeI'll go on ahead.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeI'll go on ahead.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Clay.\xfffeIt's a pleasure to meet you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am Ghetsis, of Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've come to pick up my associates\xfffewho are in your care.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Clay.\xfffeIt's a pleasure to meet you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am Ghetsis, of Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've come to pick up my associates\xfffewho are in your care.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: I don't need no thanks, now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYer buddies were tryin' to steal\xfffesome folks' Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: I don't need no thanks, now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYer buddies were tryin' to steal\xfffesome folks' Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: What's this? It seems as if\xfffethere has been some misunderstanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only free Pokémon from wicked people.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: What's this? It seems as if\xfffethere has been some misunderstanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only free Pokémon from wicked people.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: Well, that sounds real nice,\xfffeif it's true.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI may not talk purty, but at least\xfffeI'm an honest man.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou talk real nice, but what yer sayin'\xfffekinda sounds like lyin'.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo tell me plain, what are ya tryin'\xfffeto say?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: Well, that sounds real nice,\xfffeif it's true.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI may not talk purty, but at least\xfffeI'm an honest man.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou talk real nice, but what yer sayin'\xfffekinda sounds like lyin'.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo tell me plain, what are ya tryin'\xfffeto say?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Team Plasma also has an interest\xfffein Driftveil City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd we have many, many more members\xfffebesides those who are here...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Team Plasma also has an interest\xfffein Driftveil City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd we have many, many more members\xfffebesides those who are here...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: ...Well, I can't tell if yer lyin' or\xfffenot, but I reckon you've won this\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewithout a fight.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHrrmph. Fine. Take 'em and git!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: ...Well, I can't tell if yer lyin' or\xfffenot, but I reckon you've won this\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewithout a fight.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHrrmph. Fine. Take 'em and git!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: A decision worthy of a\xfffebusinessman called the Miner King.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour grasp of the situation\xfffeis outstanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, we will be taking\xfffeour colleagues off your hands...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: A decision worthy of a\xfffebusinessman called the Miner King.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour grasp of the situation\xfffeis outstanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, we will be taking\xfffeour colleagues off your hands...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Zinzolin: Ghetsis...\xfffeThank you very much...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Zinzolin: Ghetsis...\xfffeThank you very much...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Don't worry, my fellow servant\xfffeof the king...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are two of the Seven Sages,\xfffeare we not?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, everyone, I expect that we\xfffewill meet again somewhere.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Don't worry, my fellow servant\xfffeof the king...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe are two of the Seven Sages,\xfffeare we not?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, everyone, I expect that we\xfffewill meet again somewhere.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: Sorry to let Team Plasma go after\xfffeyou tracked 'em down, fellas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, why don't we cheer ourselves up\xfffewith a Pokémon battle?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't keep me waitin'!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: Sorry to let Team Plasma go after\xfffeyou tracked 'em down, fellas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, why don't we cheer ourselves up\xfffewith a Pokémon battle?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't keep me waitin'!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Well, we avoided a fight in\xfffethe middle of the city, anyway.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, I can't help but think Ghetsis isn't\xfffejust an ordinary person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm off to go make my Pokémon stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI really don't want to lose\xfffeto that Clay guy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, I'm going to win my\xfffeGym Badge in a flawless victory!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Well, we avoided a fight in\xfffethe middle of the city, anyway.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, I can't help but think Ghetsis isn't\xfffejust an ordinary person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm off to go make my Pokémon stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI really don't want to lose\xfffeto that Clay guy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, I'm going to win my\xfffeGym Badge in a flawless victory!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Our Gym Leader, Clay, is in the\xfffemiddle of something right now.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease come again later.
texts.translated_text: Our Gym Leader, Clay, is in the\xfffemiddle of something right now.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease come again later.

texts.original_text: Bianca: Oh, hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Oh, hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!!\xfffeGuess what, guess what?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!!\xfffeGuess what, guess what?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey, were you at the Gym just now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey! That's Driftveil's Gym Badge!\xfffeOh, that's totally cool. That's amazing.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hey, were you at the Gym just now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey! That's Driftveil's Gym Badge!\xfffeOh, that's totally cool. That's amazing.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No, no, no! I can't get distracted being\xfffeall impressed with your shiny new Badge!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm also a Trainer!\xfffeAt times like this you battle, right?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: No, no, no! I can't get distracted being\xfffeall impressed with your shiny new Badge!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm also a Trainer!\xfffeAt times like this you battle, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: I haven't had a Pokémon battle\xfffewith you in a while, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've become totally strong, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm not that strong, so I don't know\xfffehow to say it, but I think you're way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetuned in to how your Pokémon feel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you know what! I want to share this\xfffeHM with you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: I haven't had a Pokémon battle\xfffewith you in a while, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've become totally strong, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm not that strong, so I don't know\xfffehow to say it, but I think you're way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetuned in to how your Pokémon feel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you know what! texts.original_text: Bianca: My papa gave it to me after\xfffehe tried to take me home that time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure it's so I can come home anytime\xfffehe wants, though...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey, I have to share this with\xfffeCheren, too...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Buh-bye!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: My papa gave it to me after\xfffehe tried to take me home that time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure it's so I can come home anytime\xfffehe wants, though...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey, I have to share this with\xfffeCheren, too...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Buh-bye!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: So how about this city's pride and joy,\xfffethe drawbridge?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe also call it the Charizard Bridge\xfffedue to its elegant form!
texts.translated_text: So how about this city's pride and joy,\xfffethe drawbridge?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe also call it the Charizard Bridge\xfffedue to its elegant form!

texts.original_text: Hey there, Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you ever battled the Elite Four\xfffeof the Pokémon League?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can't battle them unless you\xfffehave eight Gym Badges, right?
texts.translated_text: Hey there, Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you ever battled the Elite Four\xfffeof the Pokémon League?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can't battle them unless you\xfffehave eight Gym Badges, right?

texts.original_text: Oh, ocean...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if the tears I've cried\xfffewill flow all the way to Olivine City.
texts.translated_text: Oh, ocean...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if the tears I've cried\xfffewill flow all the way to Olivine City.

texts.original_text: Those Team Plasma meanies forced me\xfffeto battle them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd when I lost, they stole my Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: Those Team Plasma meanies forced me\xfffeto battle them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd when I lost, they stole my Pokémon!

texts.original_text: When I win, it's because of my Pokémon.\xfffeWhen I lose, it's because of me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I always think. If you get\xfffeconceited, you get sloppy fast.
texts.translated_text: When I win, it's because of my Pokémon.\xfffeWhen I lose, it's because of me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I always think. If you get\xfffeconceited, you get sloppy fast.

texts.original_text: The reason I'm hangin' around is\xfffebecause I want to hang around!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAww! If my Pokémon just knew the move\xfffeSurf, I could go on top of the water!
texts.translated_text: The reason I'm hangin' around is\xfffebecause I want to hang around!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAww! If my Pokémon just knew the move\xfffeSurf, I could go on top of the water!

texts.original_text: Some kids are catching and training\xfffePokémon close to the Cold Storage.
texts.translated_text: Some kids are catching and training\xfffePokémon close to the Cold Storage.

texts.original_text: The Pokémon of lightning and the Pokémon\xfffeof wind are both known to come and go\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas they please.
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon of lightning and the Pokémon\xfffeof wind are both known to come and go\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas they please.

texts.original_text: On the other side of the ocean, there\xfffeare a lot of different people and a lot of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifferent Pokémon, aren't there?
texts.translated_text: On the other side of the ocean, there\xfffeare a lot of different people and a lot of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifferent Pokémon, aren't there?

texts.original_text: The old guy on Route 6 is searching for\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're interested, go talk to him!
texts.translated_text: The old guy on Route 6 is searching for\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're interested, go talk to him!

texts.original_text: Bridges are amazing. 'Cause they are a\xfffesymbol of connecting the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the guy on Route 5 is saying the\xfffesame thing, isn't he?
texts.translated_text: Bridges are amazing. 'Cause they are a\xfffesymbol of connecting the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the guy on Route 5 is saying the\xfffesame thing, isn't he?

texts.original_text: I'm a heartbreaker...\xfffeMy name... Charles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wanted to get the attention of a girl\xfffeI like, so I learned a new style of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts name... Triple Battle!\xfffeWant to learn about it?
texts.translated_text: I'm a heartbreaker...\xfffeMy name... Charles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wanted to get the attention of a girl\xfffeI like, so I learned a new style of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon battling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts name... Triple Battle!\xfffeWant to learn about it?

texts.original_text: Oh, man! Getting someone's attention is\xfffereally hard.
texts.translated_text: Oh, man! Getting someone's attention is\xfffereally hard.

texts.original_text: In Triple Battles, you send out three\xfffePokémon at a time and battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rules are simple: just make all of\xfffeyour opponent's Pokémon faint.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd that's a rough explanation\xfffeof Triple Battles.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In Triple Battles, you send out three\xfffePokémon at a time and battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rules are simple: just make all of\xfffeyour opponent's Pokémon faint.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd that's a rough explanation\xfffeof Triple Battles.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm a heartbreaker...\xfffeMy name... Charles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey! If you're a Trainer, how about a\xfffeTriple Battle?

texts.original_text: You've got a good attitude, don't you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a heartbreaker...\xfffeMy name... Charles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm always at full throttle.\xf000븁\x0000
