texts.original_text: No thanks!
texts.translated_text: No thanks!

texts.original_text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm all sold out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Charles guy bought\xfffeeverything I had.
texts.translated_text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm all sold out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Charles guy bought\xfffeeverything I had.

texts.original_text: You! Glad you came!\xfffeYou want something good?
texts.translated_text: You! Glad you came!\xfffeYou want something good?

texts.original_text: Then, show me a Pokémon Lv. 30 or more!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Then, show me a Pokémon Lv. 30 or more!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! Strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, great!\xfffeTake this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! Strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, great!\xfffeTake this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! You--not so good yet!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter training Pokémon,\xfffecome back here again!
texts.translated_text: Oh! You--not so good yet!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter training Pokémon,\xfffecome back here again!

texts.original_text: You, modest!\xfffeYou should just want something good!
texts.translated_text: You, modest!\xfffeYou should just want something good!

texts.original_text: You! Glad you came!\xfffeGet good at Expert Belts! \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf a Pokémon has an Expert Belt, the\xfffepower of its moves is slightly boosted\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen they are super effective!
texts.translated_text: You! Glad you came!\xfffeGet good at Expert Belts! \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf a Pokémon has an Expert Belt, the\xfffepower of its moves is slightly boosted\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen they are super effective!

texts.original_text: There must be a convenient town where\xfffeeverything is imported and everything\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis available.
texts.translated_text: There must be a convenient town where\xfffeeverything is imported and everything\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis available.

texts.original_text: Somewhere, there's a laid-back town\xfffewhere people value the year's seasons.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard we've imported a lot of goods\xfffefrom that town!
texts.translated_text: Somewhere, there's a laid-back town\xfffewhere people value the year's seasons.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard we've imported a lot of goods\xfffefrom that town!

texts.original_text: Looking at seasonal vegetables is fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause when the seasons change,\xfffethe vegetables available change!
texts.translated_text: Looking at seasonal vegetables is fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause when the seasons change,\xfffethe vegetables available change!

texts.original_text: Whenever we come to the market,\xfffevegetables of all seasons are available.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that a marvel?
texts.translated_text: Whenever we come to the market,\xfffevegetables of all seasons are available.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that a marvel?

texts.original_text: Goods carried away from Driftveil arrive\xfffein a town somewhere else...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. The world is connected.
texts.translated_text: Goods carried away from Driftveil arrive\xfffein a town somewhere else...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. The world is connected.

texts.original_text: Goods carried away from a town\xfffesomewhere else arrive in Driftveil...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. The world is connected.
texts.translated_text: Goods carried away from a town\xfffesomewhere else arrive in Driftveil...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. The world is connected.

texts.original_text: I used to be part of Team Plasma.\xfffeI have various kinds of incense.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I used to be part of Team Plasma.\xfffeI have various kinds of incense.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I am grateful that you came all this way!\xfffeAre you a Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOoh, you have a Pokédex!\xfffeIt's so marvelous!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if you'd please do me a favor.
texts.translated_text: I am grateful that you came all this way!\xfffeAre you a Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOoh, you have a Pokédex!\xfffeIt's so marvelous!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if you'd please do me a favor.

texts.original_text: Oh, Trainer. I'm so pleased that you\xfffecame all the way here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm wondering if you would do me a favor\xfffetoday, too.
texts.translated_text: Oh, Trainer. I'm so pleased that you\xfffecame all the way here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm wondering if you would do me a favor\xfffetoday, too.

texts.original_text: I would like to see a Pokémon that has\xfffelearned a move called \xf000ć\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo be clear, that's \xf000ć\x0001\x0000.\xfffePlease show it to me today.

texts.original_text: I'm touched that you came all the way\xfffehere, yet you are being so unkind.

texts.original_text: Oh, my goodness. Your \xf000ā\x0001\x0001 can\xfffeuse \xf000ć\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou went to all the trouble of teaching\xfffeit to your Pokémon? That's so touching!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is a small token of my appreciation.\xfffePlease don't hesitate to accept this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I wonder what \xf000ć\x0001\x0000 looks like\xfffewhen it is actually used.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am sure you can use it skillfully!
texts.translated_text: I wonder what \xf000ć\x0001\x0000 looks like\xfffewhen it is actually used.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am sure you can use it skillfully!

texts.original_text: You know there are many kinds\xfffeof Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDifferent kinds of Pokémon can learn\xfffedifferent kinds of moves.
texts.translated_text: You know there are many kinds\xfffeof Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDifferent kinds of Pokémon can learn\xfffedifferent kinds of moves.

texts.original_text: Oh! Hey!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, right?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! Hey!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Let me see your Pokédex for a moment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do we have here?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, you've found \xf000Ȃ\x0001\x0000 Pokémon, eh?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Let me see your Pokédex for a moment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do we have here?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, you've found \xf000Ȃ\x0001\x0000 Pokémon, eh?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Staggering! You've seen a Klink!\xfffeYou're becoming quite the Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Staggering! You've seen a Klink!\xfffeYou're becoming quite the Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmmm...\xfffeYou haven't seen a Klink yet, eh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, that's a great Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Excuse me! I was a little excited\xfffeand forgot my manners.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy name is Juniper, too! Cedric Juniper.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHeh! The professor who gave you\xfffethe Pokédex is my daughter!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat girl has told me a lot about you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt really makes my day to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In honor of our meeting,\xfffeI'm going to upgrade your Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In honor of our meeting,\xfffeI'm going to upgrade your Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokédex has\xfffebeen upgraded!
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokédex has\xfffebeen upgraded!

texts.original_text: Cedric: Some Pokémon can change forms\xfffeeven when it's the same individual.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you have already seen a form, you\xfffecan check it with this whenever you want.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI also added a function to make\xfffesearching easier.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ???: Professor, who's that Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ???: Professor, who's that Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cedric: Oh! I forgot my introductions!\xfffeSkyla, this is a friend of my daughter's.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 is traveling around\xfffeUnova to complete the Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cedric: Oh! I forgot my introductions!\xfffeSkyla, this is a friend of my daughter's.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 is traveling around\xfffeUnova to complete the Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Skyla: Oh, I see! So that means you'll\xfffebe challenging the Gym!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeOh boy! I'm really looking forward to it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Oh, I see! So that means you'll\xfffebe challenging the Gym!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeOh boy! I'm really looking forward to it!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cedric: That's right, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeYou should challenge this Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf nothing else, this Gym\xfffeis really out there!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cedric: That's right, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeYou should challenge this Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf nothing else, this Gym\xfffeis really out there!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: See you, Skyla. If something comes\xfffeup again, I'll let you know!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: See you, Skyla. If something comes\xfffeup again, I'll let you know!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Skyla: Professor, my plane\xfffeis a cargo plane!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt carries cargo, not people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you're talking as if places like Kanto\xfffeand Sinnoh are right around the corner!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Professor, my plane\xfffeis a cargo plane!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt carries cargo, not people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you're talking as if places like Kanto\xfffeand Sinnoh are right around the corner!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cedric: Aww, Skyla.\xfffeIf you keep frowning, your face might\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefreeze like that, and that'd be a shame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople and Pokémon, we all have\xfffeto help each other out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee you later!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Skyla: Sheesh!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's hard to believe a happy-go-lucky\xfffeguy like that could be a world-renowned\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon professor.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Heads-up, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs a Gym Leader, I'd be happy to have\xfffeyou challenge the Gym, but there's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesomething I need to take care of first.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Just now, as I was flying the\xfffecargo plane, I saw something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon top of the Celestial Tower.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Just now, as I was flying the\xfffecargo plane, I saw something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon top of the Celestial Tower.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm sure that it is a sick Pokémon!\xfffeIf it is, I can't just leave it there!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have to look into this right away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm leaving for Route 7's Celestial Tower.\xfffeYou can come along if you want.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm sure that it is a sick Pokémon!\xfffeIf it is, I can't just leave it there!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have to look into this right away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm leaving for Route 7's Celestial Tower.\xfffeYou can come along if you want.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Skyla completed her cargo-plane run.\xfffeShe must have gone somewhere after.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe to the Celestial Tower on Route 7?
texts.translated_text: Skyla completed her cargo-plane run.\xfffeShe must have gone somewhere after.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe to the Celestial Tower on Route 7?

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001They may say it is for understanding\xfffeone another better, but what Trainers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffereally use battles for is to compete...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd they hurt each other's Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I the only one who finds this\xfffeterribly painful?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever...\xfffeI'm going to talk to your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been living with Pokémon\xfffesince I was born, so it's easier for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeme to talk with them than with people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Because Pokémon never tell lies.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001They may say it is for understanding\xfffeone another better, but what Trainers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffereally use battles for is to compete...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd they hurt each other's Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I the only one who finds this\xfffeterribly painful?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever...\xfffeI'm going to talk to your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been living with Pokémon\xfffesince I was born, so it's easier for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeme to talk with them than with people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Because Pokémon never tell lies.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Hey, \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you tell me what kind of Trainer\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0001 is?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001OK, OK, got it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo \xf000Ā\x0001\x0001 was born in Nuvema Town,\xfffelives with Mom, and was given the Pokédex\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto start off a journey to see the world.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

That's good!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf every person and Pokémon cared about\xfffeone another like you two do,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI could watch over the future of people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Pokémon without having to liberate\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon from people who just use them.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Ghetsis is using Team Plasma\xfffeto search for some special stones--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffethe Light Stone and the Dark Stone...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Ghetsis is using Team Plasma\xfffeto search for some special stones--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffethe Light Stone and the Dark Stone...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001These stones hold the essence of two\xfffelegendary Pokémon. It is said that when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey lost their physical form, they fell\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinto a slumber and were transformed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, they wait for the hero's arrival...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI shall resurrect a legendary\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon from one of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethese stones, and become its friend.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat will show the world that\xfffeI am the new hero.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEveryone will follow what I say!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001These stones hold the essence of two\xfffelegendary Pokémon. It is said that when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey lost their physical form, they fell\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinto a slumber and were transformed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, they wait for the hero's arrival...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI shall resurrect a legendary\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon from one of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethese stones, and become its friend.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat will show the world that\xfffeI am the new hero.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEveryone will follow what I say!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001My vision is to change the world\xfffewithout using force.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrying to change the world by force\xfffewill just make others resist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf people resist, the ones that will be\xfffehurt are the innocent Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeused by foolish Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou understand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are not just tools\xfffefor people to use!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001My vision is to change the world\xfffewithout using force.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrying to change the world by force\xfffewill just make others resist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf people resist, the ones that will be\xfffehurt are the innocent Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeused by foolish Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou understand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are not just tools\xfffefor people to use!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001As a result...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon and Trainers who care about\xfffeone another, like you and your Pokémon,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be separated.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd that does break my heart a little. \xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001As a result...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon and Trainers who care about\xfffeone another, like you and your Pokémon,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be separated.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd that does break my heart a little. \xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Planes! Their shapes!\xfffeThey are perfectly designed to fly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is no excess in the\xfffemechanics for flying!
texts.translated_text: Planes! Their shapes!\xfffeThey are perfectly designed to fly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is no excess in the\xfffemechanics for flying!

texts.original_text: The only planes that fly out of\xfffeMistralton Airport are cargo planes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf Trainers want to fly, they can go\xfffewith a Pokémon that knows the move Fly.
texts.translated_text: The only planes that fly out of\xfffeMistralton Airport are cargo planes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf Trainers want to fly, they can go\xfffewith a Pokémon that knows the move Fly.

texts.original_text: Skyla's grandfather was\xfffea legendary Pilot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSkyla is our city's Gym Leader.\xfffeShe's a really nice person!
texts.translated_text: Skyla's grandfather was\xfffea legendary Pilot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSkyla is our city's Gym Leader.\xfffeShe's a really nice person!

texts.original_text: Pokémon and people worked together\xfffeto open up desolate land and make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea place where everyone could live.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm certain that this cooperative\xfffespirit will remain unchanged.
texts.translated_text: Pokémon and people worked together\xfffeto open up desolate land and make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea place where everyone could live.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm certain that this cooperative\xfffespirit will remain unchanged.

texts.original_text: It's dangerous to play in a landing strip,\xfffebut you should be OK on ours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only have one cargo flight a day.
texts.translated_text: It's dangerous to play in a landing strip,\xfffebut you should be OK on ours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe only have one cargo flight a day.

texts.original_text: I hear many people have had their\xfffePokémon stolen by Team Plasma...
texts.translated_text: I hear many people have had their\xfffePokémon stolen by Team Plasma...

texts.original_text: If you want to eat delicious vegetables,\xfffethe ones grown in the wild are the best.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the weather and the seasons change,\xfffewild vegetables get more and more tasty.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven Pokémon like to eat wild vegetables!
texts.translated_text: If you want to eat delicious vegetables,\xfffethe ones grown in the wild are the best.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the weather and the seasons change,\xfffewild vegetables get more and more tasty.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven Pokémon like to eat wild vegetables!

texts.original_text: Vegetables grown in a greenhouse\xfffeare the best.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe temperature and their nutrients\xfffeare all managed systematically.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVegetables grown in a completely\xfffeefficient way taste extra delicious!
texts.translated_text: Vegetables grown in a greenhouse\xfffeare the best.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe temperature and their nutrients\xfffeare all managed systematically.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVegetables grown in a completely\xfffeefficient way taste extra delicious!

texts.original_text: Oh! You found our treasure!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mistralton City\xfffeStrewn with Windblown Leaves
texts.translated_text: Mistralton City\xfffeStrewn with Windblown Leaves

texts.original_text: Mistralton Cargo Service\xfffeOur slogan is “Quick and Safe!"
texts.translated_text: Mistralton Cargo Service\xfffeOur slogan is “Quick and Safe!"

texts.original_text: Mistralton City Pokémon Gym\xfffeLeader: Skyla\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Highflying Girl
texts.translated_text: Mistralton City Pokémon Gym\xfffeLeader: Skyla\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe Highflying Girl

texts.original_text: Hee-hee!\xfffeI've been waiting for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you enjoy flying with the help of\xfffethe Mistralton Gym cannons?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey're my pride and joy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis time, let's try something else!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hee-hee!\xfffeI've been waiting for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you enjoy flying with the help of\xfffethe Mistralton Gym cannons?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey're my pride and joy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis time, let's try something else!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're an amazing Pokémon Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are happy,\xfffebecause for the first time in a while,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe could fight with our full strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is an official League Gym Badge.\xfffeI think it will look good on you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You're an amazing Pokémon Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are happy,\xfffebecause for the first time in a while,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe could fight with our full strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is an official League Gym Badge.\xfffeI think it will look good on you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeJet Badge from Skyla.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the\xfffeJet Badge from Skyla.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wow, hot stuff!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith that many Gym Badges,\xfffePokémon up to Lv. 70 will obey you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, as thanks for a Pokémon battle\xfffethat made me very happy,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want you to have this TM.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wow, hot stuff!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith that many Gym Badges,\xfffePokémon up to Lv. 70 will obey you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, as thanks for a Pokémon battle\xfffethat made me very happy,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want you to have this TM.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My present to you is Acrobatics.\xfffeIf the user doesn't have a held item,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeits power doubles.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's a pretty technical move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBe sure to compensate for the\xfffelack of a held item!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, when I flew over\xfffeTwist Mountain on the way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Icirrus City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma--is that the name?\xfffeAnyway, they were heading for the city.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat kind of people are they?
texts.translated_text: My present to you is Acrobatics.\xfffeIf the user doesn't have a held item,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeits power doubles.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's a pretty technical move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBe sure to compensate for the\xfffelack of a held item!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, when I flew over\xfffeTwist Mountain on the way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Icirrus City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma--is that the name?\xfffeAnyway, they were heading for the city.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat kind of people are they?

texts.original_text: Icirrus City, where you'll find the next\xfffeGym, is past Route 7, just after you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecross Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a hop, skip, and a jump when flying,\xfffebut it's a really challenging walk.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHeads up! Make sure you're ready for it!
texts.translated_text: Icirrus City, where you'll find the next\xfffeGym, is past Route 7, just after you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecross Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a hop, skip, and a jump when flying,\xfffebut it's a really challenging walk.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHeads up! Make sure you're ready for it!

texts.original_text: Skyla: Are you and your Pokémon well?\xfffeOur battle together was so much fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, my Pokémon and I have started\xfffetraining again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't usually let people travel in my\xfffecargo plane, but battling with you was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesuch a blast that I'd make an exception.
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Are you and your Pokémon well?\xfffeOur battle together was so much fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, my Pokémon and I have started\xfffetraining again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't usually let people travel in my\xfffecargo plane, but battling with you was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesuch a blast that I'd make an exception.

texts.original_text: Please take this Fresh Water!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Please take this Fresh Water!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Just between you and me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRock, Electric, Ice... Flying types have\xfffemore weaknesses than people know about.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use Pokémon and moves of those\xfffetypes, victory is practically yours!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, to proceed in this Gym,\xfffeyou climb in the cannons to move forward.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe cannons go up, down, left, and right.\xfffeYou can get in them from anywhere!
texts.translated_text: Just between you and me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRock, Electric, Ice... Flying types have\xfffemore weaknesses than people know about.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you use Pokémon and moves of those\xfffetypes, victory is practically yours!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, to proceed in this Gym,\xfffeyou climb in the cannons to move forward.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe cannons go up, down, left, and right.\xfffeYou can get in them from anywhere!

texts.original_text: Woo! Not many people look that good\xfffebeing shot out of a cannon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou make it look easy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd congratulations on your victory\xfffeagainst the Gym Leader.
texts.translated_text: Woo! Not many people look that good\xfffebeing shot out of a cannon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou make it look easy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd congratulations on your victory\xfffeagainst the Gym Leader.

texts.original_text: When a Pokémon learns the move\xfffeHidden Power, somehow I can tell\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat type that move will be!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShould I tell you what type of\xfffeHidden Power your Pokémon will learn?
texts.translated_text: When a Pokémon learns the move\xfffeHidden Power, somehow I can tell\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat type that move will be!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShould I tell you what type of\xfffeHidden Power your Pokémon will learn?

texts.original_text: Now that I'm aware of my hidden power,\xfffeI can tell you what type of Hidden Power\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokémon will learn!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDo you want to know?
texts.translated_text: Now that I'm aware of my hidden power,\xfffeI can tell you what type of Hidden Power\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokémon will learn!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDo you want to know?

texts.original_text: If this Pokémon were to learn\xfffeHidden Power, the move's type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould be \xf000ă\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: If this Pokémon were to learn\xfffeHidden Power, the move's type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould be \xf000ă\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: The type of this Pokémon's\xfffeHidden Power would be \xf000ă\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: The type of this Pokémon's\xfffeHidden Power would be \xf000ă\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: If you want to know, ask me, and I'll\xfffeactivate my hidden power for you!
texts.translated_text: If you want to know, ask me, and I'll\xfffeactivate my hidden power for you!

texts.original_text: It's not possible for an Egg to use\xfffeHidden Power!
texts.translated_text: It's not possible for an Egg to use\xfffeHidden Power!

texts.original_text: I'm sorry, but this Pokémon can't learn\xfffeto use Hidden Power.
texts.translated_text: I'm sorry, but this Pokémon can't learn\xfffeto use Hidden Power.

texts.original_text: The Entree and Pass Power...\xfffeWhat in the world is the Entralink?
texts.translated_text: The Entree and Pass Power...\xfffeWhat in the world is the Entralink?

texts.original_text: There are a lot of greenhouses\xfffearound the runway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFreshly picked vegetables can be sent\xfffeto faraway regions very quickly!
texts.translated_text: There are a lot of greenhouses\xfffearound the runway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFreshly picked vegetables can be sent\xfffeto faraway regions very quickly!

texts.original_text: You see field after field located near\xfffethe runway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFreshly picked vegetables can be sent\xfffeto faraway regions very quickly!
texts.translated_text: You see field after field located near\xfffethe runway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFreshly picked vegetables can be sent\xfffeto faraway regions very quickly!

texts.original_text: Cannons! Cannons!\xfffeSkyla's Gym is full of cannons!
texts.translated_text: Cannons! Cannons!\xfffeSkyla's Gym is full of cannons!

texts.original_text: Ruuunwaaaay! Ruuunwaaaay!\xfffeA Technical Machine on the ruuuunwaaaay!
texts.translated_text: Ruuunwaaaay! Ruuunwaaaay!\xfffeA Technical Machine on the ruuuunwaaaay!

texts.original_text: Ruuunwaaaay! Ruuunwaaaay!\xfffeRacing there is so much fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, hey, which one is the fastest\xfffePokémon in a race?
texts.translated_text: Ruuunwaaaay! Ruuunwaaaay!\xfffeRacing there is so much fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, hey, which one is the fastest\xfffePokémon in a race?

texts.original_text: If you have a Gym Badge from Mistralton,\xfffeI'll tell you something cool!
texts.translated_text: If you have a Gym Badge from Mistralton,\xfffeI'll tell you something cool!

texts.original_text: Wow! A Jet Badge! You won against Skyla!\xfffeOK, I'll tell you something cool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe left our treasure at the edge of\xfffethe runway!
texts.translated_text: Wow! A Jet Badge! You won against Skyla!\xfffeOK, I'll tell you something cool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe left our treasure at the edge of\xfffethe runway!

texts.original_text: Please use our Technical Machine\xfffewith extra care!
texts.translated_text: Please use our Technical Machine\xfffewith extra care!

texts.original_text: When you use the move Fly, you can\xfffereturn to a Pokémon Center\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou've already visited.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if Pokémon don't know their\xfffedestinations, they cannot fly there!
texts.translated_text: When you use the move Fly, you can\xfffereturn to a Pokémon Center\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou've already visited.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if Pokémon don't know their\xfffedestinations, they cannot fly there!

texts.original_text: Because I know a lot about planes,\xfffeI can maintain them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause I know a lot about Pokémon,\xfffeI can be strong!
texts.translated_text: Because I know a lot about planes,\xfffeI can maintain them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause I know a lot about Pokémon,\xfffeI can be strong!

texts.original_text: For the places that I cannot reach,\xfffeI ask Flying- or Psychic-type Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor help sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI cannot even imagine everyday life\xfffewithout Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: For the places that I cannot reach,\xfffeI ask Flying- or Psychic-type Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor help sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI cannot even imagine everyday life\xfffewithout Pokémon.

texts.original_text: Chulululuwa!
texts.translated_text: Chulululuwa!

texts.original_text: Because of this control tower, planes\xfffecan fly safely in the sky where there\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare no roads.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom that, I take this lesson:\xfffeIf Trainers lead Pokémon correctly,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon will feel safe and fight well.
texts.translated_text: Because of this control tower, planes\xfffecan fly safely in the sky where there\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare no roads.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom that, I take this lesson:\xfffeIf Trainers lead Pokémon correctly,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon will feel safe and fight well.

texts.original_text: My dream was to become a Pilot and\xfffefly away, far away...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI still have that dream in my heart.
texts.translated_text: My dream was to become a Pilot and\xfffefly away, far away...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI still have that dream in my heart.

texts.original_text: Welcome to the sky city, Mistralton!\xfffeTake this as a keepsake!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome to the sky city, Mistralton!\xfffeTake this as a keepsake!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If a Pokémon holds an item called\xfffeSharp Beak, its Flying-type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoves will be powered up!
texts.translated_text: If a Pokémon holds an item called\xfffeSharp Beak, its Flying-type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoves will be powered up!

texts.original_text: Hello!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDeliver a lot of cargo quickly!\xfffeThis is Mistralton Cargo Service.
texts.translated_text: Hello!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDeliver a lot of cargo quickly!\xfffeThis is Mistralton Cargo Service.

texts.original_text: Sweets, lovely Sweet Heart! ♪\xfffeCheck feelings between two people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you are a great match, you can\xfffeget sweet on Sweet Heart! ♪\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMeltingly sweet Sweet Heart! ♪\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Sweets, lovely Sweet Heart! ♪\xfffeCheck feelings between two people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you are a great match, you can\xfffeget sweet on Sweet Heart! ♪\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMeltingly sweet Sweet Heart! ♪\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, uh, you?\xfffeYou have Sweet Heart!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you trade ten pieces of your\xfffeSweet Heart for my Heart Scale?
texts.translated_text: Oh, uh, you?\xfffeYou have Sweet Heart!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you trade ten pieces of your\xfffeSweet Heart for my Heart Scale?

texts.original_text: If you bring a lot of Sweet Heart pieces,\xfffeI will trade you for something happy!
texts.translated_text: If you bring a lot of Sweet Heart pieces,\xfffeI will trade you for something happy!

texts.original_text: Yaaaay!\xfffeI have a lot of your heart!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Yaaaay!\xfffeI have a lot of your heart!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh... What a pity.\xfffeWhat a great pity!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou must have a lot of\xfffeHeart Scales already.
texts.translated_text: Oh... What a pity.\xfffeWhat a great pity!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou must have a lot of\xfffeHeart Scales already.

texts.original_text: OK...\xfffeAww...that's too bad.
texts.translated_text: OK...\xfffeAww...that's too bad.

texts.original_text: Gave the Sweet Hearts and received\xfffea \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000 in return.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gave the Sweet Hearts and received\xfffea \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000 in return.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Trading Sweet Hearts you receive\xfffethrough Feeling Checks is one way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto get Heart Scales. \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you show off your Pokémon\xfffeto a lady in Driftveil City, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan get Heart Scales, too.
texts.translated_text: Trading Sweet Hearts you receive\xfffethrough Feeling Checks is one way\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto get Heart Scales. \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you show off your Pokémon\xfffeto a lady in Driftveil City, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan get Heart Scales, too.

texts.original_text: Our family is very fussy about\xfffePokémon moves.
texts.translated_text: Our family is very fussy about\xfffePokémon moves.

texts.original_text: Cedric: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeHow is \xf000ā\x0001\x0001?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cedric: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeHow is \xf000ā\x0001\x0001?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ah! This \xf000ā\x0001\x0001 has really taken\xfffea shine to you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ah! This \xf000ā\x0001\x0001 has really taken\xfffea shine to you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I can tell you're paying a lot of\xfffeattention to training \xf000ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCareful not to be too strict!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I can tell you're paying a lot of\xfffeattention to training \xf000ā\x0001\x0001.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCareful not to be too strict!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokédex is important, but time spent\xfffehaving fun together is also important.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, I just had a thought--\xfffehave you heard of Dragonspiral Tower?
texts.translated_text: The Pokédex is important, but time spent\xfffehaving fun together is also important.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, I just had a thought--\xfffehave you heard of Dragonspiral Tower?

texts.original_text: Really?\xfffeQuite impressive.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Really?\xfffeQuite impressive.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Eh... I'm not surprised you haven't\xfffeheard of it.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Eh... I'm not surprised you haven't\xfffeheard of it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK. Give this story a listen.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDragonspiral Tower is said to be\xfffethe Unova region's oldest building.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStories say it's the place where\xfffelegendary Pokémon came to life or\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere they remain in deep slumber.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I know it's just past Icirrus City,\xfffebut that's all I know about it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's all anyone knows,\xfffebecause no one has ever been inside.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My daughter has wanted to investigate\xfffethat tower for a long time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“What! There's something I don't know?!"\xfffeThat kind of feeling is pure adventure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I'm not too old for some adventuring.\xfffeAway I go to have a look at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragonspiral Tower!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCatch you later!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I've been talking\xfffewith Bianca, and I'm wondering...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince we left Nuvema Town, has\xfffesomething about me...changed?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThinking about what I want to do...\xfffeThinking about what I should do...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt felt like there was nothing...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave I really become stronger?\xfffeOr is it just my Pokémon that have?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't know anymore!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The legendary Pokémon Reshiram\xfffeshared its wisdom with the hero\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand defied foes with columns of fire.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe hero and that Pokémon were as\xfffeclose as a parent and child.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople were filled with awe and looked up\xfffeto them, and that is said to be the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebeginning of what became ancient Unova.

texts.original_text: The legendary Pokémon Zekrom\xfffeshared its wisdom with the hero\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand defied foes with fierce lightning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe hero and that Pokémon were as\xfffeclose as a parent and child.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople were filled with awe and looked up\xfffeto them, and that is said to be the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebeginning of what became ancient Unova.

texts.original_text: Always, the tower looms,\xfffedisdainful of the wind and snow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps its presence has\xfffea special meaning for people.
texts.translated_text: Always, the tower looms,\xfffedisdainful of the wind and snow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps its presence has\xfffea special meaning for people.

texts.original_text: The legendary Pokémon gave help to\xfffethe hero who sought truth.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBecause of that, a region was created.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when its physical form was lost,\xfffethe Pokémon became the Light Stone,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewaiting patiently for a new hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard that story when I was little.
texts.translated_text: The legendary Pokémon gave help to\xfffethe hero who sought truth.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBecause of that, a region was created.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when its physical form was lost,\xfffethe Pokémon became the Light Stone,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewaiting patiently for a new hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard that story when I was little.

texts.original_text: The legendary Pokémon gave help to\xfffethe hero who sought ideals.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBecause of that, a region was created.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when its physical form was lost,\xfffethe Pokémon became the Dark Stone,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewaiting patiently for a new hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard that story since I was little.

texts.original_text: We, Team Plasma, invite you to join us!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe all want to create a new world where\xfffepeople and Pokémon are both free!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLadies and gentlemen, I ask you now...\xfffePlease, release your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd so I end my plea to you today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you one and all for your attention.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: That's right, Iris.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ones who make Pokémon battle\xfffeare the Trainers...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd it's so the Trainers and the Pokémon\xfffecan get to know each other better.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: That's right, Iris.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ones who make Pokémon battle\xfffeare the Trainers...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd it's so the Trainers and the Pokémon\xfffecan get to know each other better.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm going to the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, I guess in this case I should say I'm\xfffe“returning" to the Pokémon League!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOf course, I'll defeat N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll teach him about the beauty of this\xfffeworld, where Pokémon and Trainers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelive together in harmony!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I'll await your arrival.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you've obtained the Opelucid Badge,\xfffecome to the League!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Opelucid Gym Leader is tough.\xfffeTake care!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm going to the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, I guess in this case I should say I'm\xfffe“returning" to the Pokémon League!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOf course, I'll defeat N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll teach him about the beauty of this\xfffeworld, where Pokémon and Trainers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelive together in harmony!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I'll await your arrival.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you've obtained the Opelucid Badge,\xfffecome to the League!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Opelucid Gym Leader is tough.\xfffeTake care!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Farewell.\xfffeI'm counting on you, Drayden and Iris!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Farewell.\xfffeI'm counting on you, Drayden and Iris!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Iris: Aww...\xfffeHe's gone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIs he OK?\xfffeHe looked kinda scary.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Iris: Aww...\xfffeHe's gone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIs he OK?\xfffeHe looked kinda scary.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Drayden: Don't worry, Iris.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is the strongest Trainer\xfffein all of Unova.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Drayden: Don't worry, Iris.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is the strongest Trainer\xfffein all of Unova.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, is it?\xfffeCome to my home.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs Alder asked, I'll tell you\xfffeeverything I can about the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelegendary Dragon-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIris, child, please show the way.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, is it?\xfffeCome to my home.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs Alder asked, I'll tell you\xfffeeverything I can about the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelegendary Dragon-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIris, child, please show the way.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Iris: You bet! If it's Opelucid City,\xfffeI can take you anywhere.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs for the story of Reshiram and Zekrom,\xfffewe'll tell you all we know about it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis way!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A challenger?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry, but currently,\xfffeour Gym Leader is at home.
texts.translated_text: A challenger?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry, but currently,\xfffeour Gym Leader is at home.

texts.original_text: If all Pokémon are released, Trainers and\xfffeGym Leaders will no longer exist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor better or worse, the world\xfffewould surely change...
texts.translated_text: If all Pokémon are released, Trainers and\xfffeGym Leaders will no longer exist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor better or worse, the world\xfffewould surely change...

texts.original_text: The memories of everyone who has lived\xfffein this city have built up over the years\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewithout changing much.
texts.translated_text: The memories of everyone who has lived\xfffein this city have built up over the years\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewithout changing much.

texts.original_text: This city changes endlessly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd every change is engraved in the\xfffememories of the people who live here.
texts.translated_text: This city changes endlessly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd every change is engraved in the\xfffememories of the people who live here.

texts.original_text: I spent so many happy days training my\xfffePokémon as we grew stronger together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it will make my beloved Pokémon\xfffea perfect being, however,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI can't help but let it go.
texts.translated_text: I spent so many happy days training my\xfffePokémon as we grew stronger together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it will make my beloved Pokémon\xfffea perfect being, however,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI can't help but let it go.

texts.original_text: Even if it is inconvenient, I think\xfffesome things shouldn't be changed.
texts.translated_text: Even if it is inconvenient, I think\xfffesome things shouldn't be changed.

texts.original_text: Even if you love them, I think\xfffesome things have to be changed.
texts.translated_text: Even if you love them, I think\xfffesome things have to be changed.

texts.original_text: Hey hey! That person called N had the\xfffelegendary Pokémon with him, so he has\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto be the legendary hero, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's going to change the world, isn't he?
texts.translated_text: Hey hey! That person called N had the\xfffelegendary Pokémon with him, so he has\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto be the legendary hero, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's going to change the world, isn't he?

texts.original_text: I like older things better than new ones.\xfffeThey're just more relaxing!
texts.translated_text: I like older things better than new ones.\xfffeThey're just more relaxing!

texts.original_text: I like newer things better than old ones.\xfffeThey're just so cool!
texts.translated_text: I like newer things better than old ones.\xfffeThey're just so cool!

texts.original_text: ...No way! Without Pokémon, I'll be too\xfffelonely and sad!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut am I only using my Pokémon, then...?
texts.translated_text: ...No way! Without Pokémon, I'll be too\xfffelonely and sad!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut am I only using my Pokémon, then...?

texts.original_text: The Gym Leader Iris is still a child, but\xfffethe mayor Drayden has recognized\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeher power!
texts.translated_text: The Gym Leader Iris is still a child, but\xfffethe mayor Drayden has recognized\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeher power!

texts.original_text: The Gym Leader Drayden is the mayor who\xfffeleads Opelucid.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is always training by wrestling\xfffewith Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: The Gym Leader Drayden is the mayor who\xfffeleads Opelucid.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is always training by wrestling\xfffewith Pokémon.

texts.original_text: So, have we really been making\xfffeour Pokémon suffer...?
texts.translated_text: So, have we really been making\xfffeour Pokémon suffer...?

texts.original_text: Yes, I will keep moving forward together\xfffewith my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven if I were to part ways with my\xfffePokémon, it wouldn't be because someone\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeelse said to, but because we decided to.
texts.translated_text: Yes, I will keep moving forward together\xfffewith my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven if I were to part ways with my\xfffePokémon, it wouldn't be because someone\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeelse said to, but because we decided to.

texts.original_text: I'll definitely keep moving forward\xfffetogether with my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI won't take their company for granted.\xfffeI'll appreciate how amazing that is!
texts.translated_text: I'll definitely keep moving forward\xfffetogether with my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI won't take their company for granted.\xfffeI'll appreciate how amazing that is!

texts.original_text: The legendary Pokémon is the symbol\xfffeof Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDoes that mean Team Plasma is right?\xfffe...I don't know.
texts.translated_text: The legendary Pokémon is the symbol\xfffeof Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDoes that mean Team Plasma is right?\xfffe...I don't know.

texts.original_text: Pursuing ideals is different from person\xfffeto person and Pokémon to Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this city, it seems the ideal is\xfffeto cherish the past.
texts.translated_text: Pursuing ideals is different from person\xfffeto person and Pokémon to Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this city, it seems the ideal is\xfffeto cherish the past.

texts.original_text: The truth people pursue is different\xfffefrom person to person and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon to Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this city, it seems the truth is\xfffeconstant change.
texts.translated_text: The truth people pursue is different\xfffefrom person to person and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon to Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this city, it seems the truth is\xfffeconstant change.

texts.original_text: The hopes of an ancient people are put\xfffeinto this melody...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will bring them back to us now.
texts.translated_text: The hopes of an ancient people are put\xfffeinto this melody...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will bring them back to us now.

texts.original_text: Our hopes are put into this melody...\xfffeI will send them to the future.
texts.translated_text: Our hopes are put into this melody...\xfffeI will send them to the future.

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: ...Hello!\xfffeHow was Iris doing?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: ...Hello!\xfffeHow was Iris doing?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: ...Hello!\xfffeWas Drayden as tough as ever?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: ...Hello!\xfffeWas Drayden as tough as ever?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, I came to report on how to\xffferesurrect the legendary Zekrom.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought it would be better to tell you\xfffein person than over the Xtransceiver.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd as for the conclusion...\xfffeWell, I haven't figured it out yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the Pokémon will wake up\xfffewhen it deems someone worthy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, I came to report on how to\xffferesurrect the legendary Zekrom.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought it would be better to tell you\xfffein person than over the Xtransceiver.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd as for the conclusion...\xfffeWell, I haven't figured it out yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the Pokémon will wake up\xfffewhen it deems someone worthy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, I came to report on how to\xffferesurrect the legendary Reshiram.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought it would be better to tell you\xfffein person than over the Xtransceiver.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd as for the conclusion...\xfffeWell, I haven't figured it out yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the Pokémon will wake up\xfffewhen it deems someone worthy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: More importantly, aren't you amazing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have all eight of Unova's Gym Badges\xfffenow, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've become so strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou probably don't even know it, but\xfffeyou've changed a lot since you left\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNuvema Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, I'll show you where such a\xfffestrong Trainer should head next!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, that just made me think of when I was\xfffeshowing you around the Pokémon Center\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein Accumula Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000? Do you regret setting out\xfffeon your Pokémon journey?

You don't have to tell\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeme everything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'm very happy that you three\xfffechose to train Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause they create chances to meet\xfffemore wonderful people and Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: This Master Ball is\xfffethe most powerful kind of Poké Ball.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt can catch any Pokémon without fail.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the only way I can support you,\xfffeexcept to say...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBe true to yourself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo matter what happens, stay strong\xfffeand keep going with your Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hi! I'm Iris, the amazingly strong\xfffeGym Leader!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTell me... What Pokémon are you using?\xfffeHow will you fight?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOoh, I'm super curious, so let's just\xfffeget started!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey, that's your eighth Badge, right?\xfffeThat's so cool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow every Pokémon will do what you ask,\xfffeno matter how big they are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnow what? I'll give you this TM, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ooh, hey!\xfffeI wonder how Mister Alder is doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if he's battling that Trainer\xfffecalled N in the Pokémon League right now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you know about the Pokémon League?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's past Victory Road, at the end of\xfffeRoute 10!

texts.original_text: You've been on a journey and seen a lot\xfffeof the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm like that, too! I'm from way out in\xfffethe country.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm really happy that I've gotten to\xfffemeet lots of different people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Pokémon!!

texts.original_text: Welcome. Thank you for coming. I am\xfffeOpelucid Pokémon Gym's Leader, Drayden.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the mayor, I've given everything\xfffeto developing the city.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs a Trainer, I've simply been pursuing\xfffegreater strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what I'm searching for now is a young\xfffeTrainer who can show me a bright future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps you can show me that future,\xfffethe way Iris has?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Welcome. Thank you for coming. I am\xfffeOpelucid Pokémon Gym's Leader, Drayden.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the mayor, I've given everything\xfffeto developing the city.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs a Trainer, I've simply been pursuing\xfffegreater strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what I'm searching for now is a young\xfffeTrainer who can show me a bright future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps you can show me that future,\xfffethe way Iris has?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wonderful.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm grateful we had a chance to meet\xfffeand battle.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 received the Legend Badge\xfffefrom Drayden!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, now. texts.original_text: Pokémon and people do not age because of\xfffethe passage of time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey get old when the energy flowing in\xfffetheir hearts dries up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis energy in our hearts is powered by\xfffetruth, ideals, or maybe dreams...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat probably changes with what you most\xfffehope for in your life.

texts.translated_text: If a Pokémon holds a Ring Target, it can\xfffebe hit even by a move that would usually\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave no effect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor example, a Normal-type move would\xfffehit a Ghost-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMastering this item is a bit tough...\xfffeActually, it's very tough, but think\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehow useful it could be!

texts.original_text: Welcome! Glad to see you here at the\xfffeTriple Battle House. As the name\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesuggests, if you want to enjoy Triple\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBattles, you've come to the right spot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I explain how Triple Battles work?
texts.translated_text: Welcome! Glad to see you here at the\xfffeTriple Battle House. As the name\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesuggests, if you want to enjoy Triple\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBattles, you've come to the right spot.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I explain how Triple Battles work?

texts.original_text: May I explain how Triple Battles work?
texts.translated_text: May I explain how Triple Battles work?

texts.original_text: Triple Battle is a battle format in which\xfffeeach side uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer who makes all of the opponent's\xfffePokémon faint will win.
texts.translated_text: Triple Battle is a battle format in which\xfffeeach side uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer who makes all of the opponent's\xfffePokémon faint will win.

texts.original_text: This doesn't intrigue you? It's fun.\xfffePlease allow me to explain how it works.
texts.translated_text: This doesn't intrigue you? It's fun.\xfffePlease allow me to explain how it works.

texts.original_text: Welcome! Glad to see you here at the\xfffeRotation Battle House.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the name suggests, this is the place\xfffeto enjoy Rotation Battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I explain how Rotation Battles work?
texts.translated_text: Welcome! Glad to see you here at the\xfffeRotation Battle House.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs the name suggests, this is the place\xfffeto enjoy Rotation Battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I explain how Rotation Battles work?

texts.original_text: May I explain how Rotation Battles work?
texts.translated_text: May I explain how Rotation Battles work?

texts.original_text: Rotation Battle is a battle format in\xfffewhich each side uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOne Pokémon takes the lead position, and\xfffethe other two stand off to the sides.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut this position will change every turn!
texts.translated_text: Rotation Battle is a battle format in\xfffewhich each side uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOne Pokémon takes the lead position, and\xfffethe other two stand off to the sides.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut this position will change every turn!

texts.original_text: Don't you want to know more? It's fun.\xfffePlease allow me to explain how it works.
texts.translated_text: Don't you want to know more? It's fun.\xfffePlease allow me to explain how it works.

texts.original_text: Know what? I am a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you have a Prop Case! You must be\xfffea huge musical fan, too! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like a new Prop to use\xfffein the musical?
texts.translated_text: Know what? I am a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you have a Prop Case! You must be\xfffea huge musical fan, too! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like a new Prop to use\xfffein the musical?

texts.original_text: I am so glad! ♪ You are also a huge\xfffemusical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should try putting various Props\xfffeon your Pokémon! That would be fun. ♪\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I am so glad! ♪ You are also a huge\xfffemusical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should try putting various Props\xfffeon your Pokémon! That would be fun. ♪\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you know how cute Pokémon\xfffewith Props are?!
texts.translated_text: What?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you know how cute Pokémon\xfffewith Props are?!

texts.original_text: You know what? I'm a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you come see me again tomorrow,\xfffeI'll give you a different Prop! ♪
texts.translated_text: You know what? I'm a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you come see me again tomorrow,\xfffeI'll give you a different Prop! ♪

texts.original_text: You know what? I'm a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want people all over the world\xfffeto enjoy musicals. ♪
texts.translated_text: You know what? I'm a huge musical fan! ♪\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want people all over the world\xfffeto enjoy musicals. ♪

texts.original_text: If you have a lot of Props, it makes you\xfffewant to put them on Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you put Props on Pokémon, it makes\xfffeyou want to participate in a musical!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you agree?
texts.translated_text: If you have a lot of Props, it makes you\xfffewant to put them on Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you put Props on Pokémon, it makes\xfffeyou want to participate in a musical!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you agree?

texts.original_text: 63... 64...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I was counting all the kinds of Props\xfffefor musicals.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think there are about 100\xfffedifferent kinds!
texts.translated_text: 63... 64...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I was counting all the kinds of Props\xfffefor musicals.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think there are about 100\xfffedifferent kinds!

texts.original_text: This is just between you and me, OK?\xfffeI used to be part of Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's strange when everyone around\xfffeyou thinks the same way, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I left Team Plasma to think for myself\xfffeabout what I want to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't tell this story to the guy on the\xfffeopposite side.
texts.translated_text: This is just between you and me, OK?\xfffeI used to be part of Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's strange when everyone around\xfffeyou thinks the same way, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I left Team Plasma to think for myself\xfffeabout what I want to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't tell this story to the guy on the\xfffeopposite side.

texts.original_text: This is just between you and me, OK?\xfffeI'm really not very good as a Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I think Team Plasma might have the\xffferight idea when they take Pokémon away\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom weak Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI do feel sorry for the people who were\xffferobbed, though.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't tell this story to the guy on the\xfffeopposite side.
texts.translated_text: This is just between you and me, OK?\xfffeI'm really not very good as a Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I think Team Plasma might have the\xffferight idea when they take Pokémon away\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom weak Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI do feel sorry for the people who were\xffferobbed, though.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't tell this story to the guy on the\xfffeopposite side.

texts.original_text: The more this city develops, the more\xfffefuturistic it will become.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure of this!\xfffeI want to grow up quickly!
texts.translated_text: The more this city develops, the more\xfffefuturistic it will become.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure of this!\xfffeI want to grow up quickly!

texts.original_text: If I had cherished old things, they could\xfffehave reminded me of old days...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI totally forgot what I was like when I\xfffewas a child.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I was hoping to grow\xfffeup quickly...
texts.translated_text: If I had cherished old things, they could\xfffehave reminded me of old days...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI totally forgot what I was like when I\xfffewas a child.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I was hoping to grow\xfffeup quickly...

texts.original_text: put in a great effort!
texts.translated_text: put in a great effort!

texts.original_text: looks like it can try a little harder.
texts.translated_text: looks like it can try a little harder.

texts.original_text: I want to know the future!\xfffeI am very worried...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how my child, Thyme, will spend\xfffethe future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm making a machine that connects the\xfffefuture and the present, but electricity\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis desperately short.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I want to know the future!\xfffeI am very worried...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how my child, Thyme, will spend\xfffethe future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm making a machine that connects the\xfffefuture and the present, but electricity\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis desperately short.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I've heard that in another world,\xfffethere's another Opelucid City that looks\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevery futuristic.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is a Pokémon from that world\xfffethat knows the move Charge, the machine\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemay work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're able, would you be willing to\xfffelend me a Pokémon like that?
texts.translated_text: I've heard that in another world,\xfffethere's another Opelucid City that looks\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevery futuristic.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is a Pokémon from that world\xfffethat knows the move Charge, the machine\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemay work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're able, would you be willing to\xfffelend me a Pokémon like that?

texts.original_text: I...I see. What a pity.\xfffeIf you change your mind, please return.
texts.translated_text: I...I see. What a pity.\xfffeIf you change your mind, please return.

texts.original_text: Th-thank you!\xfffeNow my machine will work!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Th-thank you!\xfffeNow my machine will work!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I appreciate the thought, but...you\xfffedon't have a Pokémon that meets the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconditions I need.
texts.translated_text: I appreciate the thought, but...you\xfffedon't have a Pokémon that meets the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconditions I need.

texts.original_text: I appreciate the thought, but although\xfffeyour Pokémon knows Charge, it's not from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat other world...
texts.translated_text: I appreciate the thought, but although\xfffeyour Pokémon knows Charge, it's not from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat other world...

texts.original_text: Now, please show me the future!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now, please show me the future!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Whirrr, whirrr, whirrr...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Whirrr, whirrr, whirrr...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! So that's what the future is like!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy precious Thyme is growing up as such\xfffea good kid!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! So that's what the future is like!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy precious Thyme is growing up as such\xfffea good kid!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, it returned to normal...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what an experience!\xfffeI can't stop trembling!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd even though I know the future,\xfffeI guess my present time won't change.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, it returned to normal...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what an experience!\xfffeI can't stop trembling!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd even though I know the future,\xfffeI guess my present time won't change.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I will return your Pokémon to you.\xfffeThis is my thank-you gift.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I will return your Pokémon to you.\xfffeThis is my thank-you gift.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Rather than worrying about the future,\xfffeit is important to live in the present,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich connects to the future, as best\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, Thyme! Let's go out later!\xfffeToday, let's play as hard as we can!
texts.translated_text: Rather than worrying about the future,\xfffeit is important to live in the present,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich connects to the future, as best\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, Thyme! Let's go out later!\xfffeToday, let's play as hard as we can!

texts.original_text: Thyme: I, I...\xfffeWhat will I be when I grow up?
texts.translated_text: Thyme: I, I...\xfffeWhat will I be when I grow up?

texts.original_text: I want to return to the past!\xfffeI want to do many things over again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy father, Bach, created a machine to\xfffesee the future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am making a machine to connect with\xfffethe past.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...But I don't have enough electricity.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I want to return to the past!\xfffeI want to do many things over again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy father, Bach, created a machine to\xfffesee the future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am making a machine to connect with\xfffethe past.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...But I don't have enough electricity.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I've heard that in another world,\xfffethere's another Opelucid City that looks\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevery old-timey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is a Pokémon from that world\xfffethat knows the move Charge, the machine\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemay work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're able, would you be willing to\xfffelend me a Pokémon like that?
texts.translated_text: I've heard that in another world,\xfffethere's another Opelucid City that looks\xf000븀\x0000\xfffevery old-timey.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is a Pokémon from that world\xfffethat knows the move Charge, the machine\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemay work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're able, would you be willing to\xfffelend me a Pokémon like that?

texts.original_text: Ah... What a pity.\xfffeThere is no other way...
texts.translated_text: Ah... What a pity.\xfffeThere is no other way...

texts.original_text: Yes!\xfffeNow, the machine will work.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Yes!\xfffeNow, the machine will work.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're nice to offer, but I'm afraid you\xfffedon't have a Pokémon that meets the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconditions I need.
texts.translated_text: You're nice to offer, but I'm afraid you\xfffedon't have a Pokémon that meets the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeconditions I need.

texts.original_text: That's nice of you, but although your\xfffePokémon knows Charge, it's not from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat other world...
texts.translated_text: That's nice of you, but although your\xfffePokémon knows Charge, it's not from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat other world...

texts.original_text: Now, we can connect with the past!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now, we can connect with the past!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We connected with the past!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFather! It's me, Thyme!\xfffeI owe you an apology...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We connected with the past!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFather! It's me, Thyme!\xfffeI owe you an apology...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It returned to normal...\xfffeIt seems to have run out of electricity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI connected with the past...but I guess\xfffemy present time won't change.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It returned to normal...\xfffeIt seems to have run out of electricity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI connected with the past...but I guess\xfffemy present time won't change.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh!\xfffeI will return your Pokémon to you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you.\xfffeThis is my thank-you gift.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh!\xfffeI will return your Pokémon to you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you.\xfffeThis is my thank-you gift.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Rather than regretting the past...\xfffeit is important to live in the present,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich connects from the past,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas best as you can.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK!\xfffeI'll live positively!
texts.translated_text: Rather than regretting the past...\xfffeit is important to live in the present,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich connects from the past,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas best as you can.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK!\xfffeI'll live positively!

texts.original_text: I heard that my father had a fight with\xfffemy Grandpa Bach a long, long time ago!
texts.translated_text: I heard that my father had a fight with\xfffemy Grandpa Bach a long, long time ago!

texts.original_text: Welcome to Opelucid City,\xfffewhere people value history!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Have you heard this before?
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Opelucid City,\xfffewhere people value history!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Have you heard this before?

texts.original_text: Welcome to Opelucid City,\xfffewhere people like changes!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Have you heard this before?
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Opelucid City,\xfffewhere people like changes!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Have you heard this before?

texts.original_text: Munch, munch...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard that a guy with a legendary\xfffePokémon was visiting Opelucid City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMunch, munch...
texts.translated_text: Munch, munch...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard that a guy with a legendary\xfffePokémon was visiting Opelucid City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMunch, munch...

texts.original_text: Munch, munch...\xfffeI am happy when I am eating!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMunch, munch...\xfffeBut when I don't get food, I am angry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe words hungry and angry are similar.\xfffeDon't you think?
texts.translated_text: Munch, munch...\xfffeI am happy when I am eating!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMunch, munch...\xfffeBut when I don't get food, I am angry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe words hungry and angry are similar.\xfffeDon't you think?

texts.original_text: This way leads to Victory Road.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you don't have eight Badges,\xfffeyou cannot reach the end.
texts.translated_text: This way leads to Victory Road.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you don't have eight Badges,\xfffeyou cannot reach the end.

texts.original_text: Hi, Trainer!\xfffeDo you have a minute?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hi, Trainer!\xfffeDo you have a minute?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I just heard this on the Xtransceiver.\xfffeThere's a big storm on Route 7!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the storm seems to be different from\xfffea natural phenomenon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo strange!
texts.translated_text: I just heard this on the Xtransceiver.\xfffeThere's a big storm on Route 7!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the storm seems to be different from\xfffea natural phenomenon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo strange!

texts.original_text: The trembling before the Pokémon League\xfffeis a tremor of excitement!
texts.translated_text: The trembling before the Pokémon League\xfffeis a tremor of excitement!

texts.original_text: It doesn't matter if we win or lose,\xfffeas long as we have Pokémon with us!
texts.translated_text: It doesn't matter if we win or lose,\xfffeas long as we have Pokémon with us!

texts.translated_text: You need to have eight Gym Badges\xfffeto challenge the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever, even with such skills, it's hard\xfffeto defeat the Elite Four who are waiting!

texts.original_text: Glubaaa!
texts.translated_text: Glubaaa!

texts.original_text: The Pokémon League is a place where you\xfffeboth pursue strength and express it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe way to express it is simple...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou just have to beat the Elite Four and\xfffethe Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can start your challenge by battling\xfffeany of the Elite Four, and if you defeat\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethem all, you can challenge the Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever! I warn you, once you start\xfffeyour challenge, there's no turning back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou must keep battling until you defeat\xfffethem all...or are defeated yourself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you want to go in?

texts.original_text: The Pokémon League is a place where you\xfffeboth pursue strength and express it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe way to express it is simple...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou just have to beat the Elite Four and\xfffethe Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can start your challenge by battling\xfffeany of the Elite Four, and if you defeat\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethem all, you can challenge the Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever! I warn you, once you start\xfffeyour challenge, there's no turning back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter, you must keep battling\xfffeuntil you defeat them all...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor are defeated yourself.
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon League is a place where you\xfffeboth pursue strength and express it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe way to express it is simple...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou just have to beat the Elite Four and\xfffethe Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can start your challenge by battling\xfffeany of the Elite Four, and if you defeat\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethem all, you can challenge the Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever! I warn you, once you start\xfffeyour challenge, there's no turning back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter, you must keep battling\xfffeuntil you defeat them all...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor are defeated yourself.

texts.original_text: The Pokémon League is every Trainer's\xfffegreatest challenge!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon League is every Trainer's\xfffegreatest challenge!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You might want to prepare here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause if you lose even once,\xfffeyou have to start all over again!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You might want to prepare here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause if you lose even once,\xfffeyou have to start all over again!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My apologies, young Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you may not enter the\xfffePokémon League at this time.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My apologies, young Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you may not enter the\xfffePokémon League at this time.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Words are engraved on the statue:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Four great warriors form\xfffe this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the southwest is one who\xfffe does not fear the Ghost type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the southeast is one who\xfffe channels the power of the Fighting type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the northwest is one who\xfffe has mastered the Dark type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the northeast is one who\xfffe knows the mind of the Psychic type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe If you can defeat these warriors with\xfffe your courage and wisdom,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe you shall be led to the summit,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe where the strongest Champion awaits."
texts.translated_text: Words are engraved on the statue:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Four great warriors form\xfffe this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the southwest is one who\xfffe does not fear the Ghost type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the southeast is one who\xfffe channels the power of the Fighting type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the northwest is one who\xfffe has mastered the Dark type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe To the northeast is one who\xfffe knows the mind of the Psychic type.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe If you can defeat these warriors with\xfffe your courage and wisdom,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe you shall be led to the summit,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe where the strongest Champion awaits."

texts.original_text: Nothing happens!\xfffeIt seems you can't go back until you win.
texts.translated_text: Nothing happens!\xfffeIt seems you can't go back until you win.

texts.original_text: “Eyes brimming with dark flame, this man\xfffe  rejected everything other than himself\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe  in order to bring about one\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe  singular justice..."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's part of a novel I'm writing. I was\xfffeinspired by the challenger who was just\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehere, and somehow I got a little sad...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeExcuse me.\xfffeYou're a challenger, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm the Elite Four's Ghost-type\xfffePokémon user, Shauntal, and I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshall be your opponent.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: S-sorry!\xfffeFirst, I must apologize to my Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm really sorry you had a bad\xfffeexperience because of me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! It's not your fault!\xfffeThis is how battles always are.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven in light of that, I'm still one of\xfffethe Elite Four!

texts.original_text: Every person who works with Pokémon has\xfffea Pokémon story to tell.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've found that stories where people and\xfffePokémon help each other out are far more\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinteresting than stories about only\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople, or only Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Challenger, if you defeat the entire\xfffeElite Four of the Pokémon League,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can go on to challenge the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you have earned that right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeReturn to the plaza in the center\xfffeand check the statue.
