texts.original_text: “The Trainer's thoughts joined with the\xfffe  Pokémon's mind, and a lustrous\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe  Aqua Ring unfurled..."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's part of a novel I wrote.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI absolutely love writing about the close\xfffebonds between the Trainers who\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecome here and the Pokémon they train.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCould I use you and your Pokémon as\xfffea subject?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Challenger, if you defeat the entire\xfffeElite Four of the Pokémon League, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan go on to challenge the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you have earned that right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour story is yours and yours alone.\xfffePlease weave a wonderful tale!
texts.translated_text: Challenger, if you defeat the entire\xfffeElite Four of the Pokémon League, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan go on to challenge the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you have earned that right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour story is yours and yours alone.\xfffePlease weave a wonderful tale!

texts.original_text: Man oh man...\xfffeWhat is going on today?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChallengers coming one\xffferight after another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, no matter.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am Grimsley of the Elite Four, and I will\xfffefulfill my duty to be your opponent.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Man oh man...\xfffeWhat is going on today?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChallengers coming one\xffferight after another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, no matter.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am Grimsley of the Elite Four, and I will\xfffefulfill my duty to be your opponent.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Whether or not you get to fight at full\xfffestrength, whether or not luck smiles\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon you--none of that matters.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly results matter. And a loss is a loss.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee, victory shines like a bright light.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd right now, you and your Pokémon\xfffeare shining brilliantly.
texts.translated_text: Whether or not you get to fight at full\xfffestrength, whether or not luck smiles\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon you--none of that matters.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly results matter. And a loss is a loss.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSee, victory shines like a bright light.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd right now, you and your Pokémon\xfffeare shining brilliantly.

texts.original_text: Now, I'm nothing more than\xfffethe guy who lost...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNothing more, nothing less.\xfffeSigh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should take that strength and test\xfffeit against the rest of the Elite Four.
texts.translated_text: Now, I'm nothing more than\xfffethe guy who lost...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNothing more, nothing less.\xfffeSigh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should take that strength and test\xfffeit against the rest of the Elite Four.

texts.original_text: Astonishing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have defeated every member of\xfffethe Pokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it isn't over yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is one more opponent against whom\xfffeyou must prove your strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe pinnacle of the Pokémon League,\xfffethe Champion, Alder...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr, perhaps, that man called N has\xfffedefeated him and taken his title.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't know which one you will face, but\xfffecheck the statue in the central plaza,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand continue to the final room.
texts.translated_text: Astonishing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have defeated every member of\xfffethe Pokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it isn't over yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is one more opponent against whom\xfffeyou must prove your strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe pinnacle of the Pokémon League,\xfffethe Champion, Alder...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr, perhaps, that man called N has\xfffedefeated him and taken his title.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't know which one you will face, but\xfffecheck the statue in the central plaza,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand continue to the final room.

texts.original_text: Life is a serious battle, and you have\xfffeto use the tools you're given.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's more important to master the cards\xfffeyou're holding than to complain about\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe ones your opponents were dealt.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet us begin.\xfffeAnd may the best Trainer win!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeContests like this are proof\xfffethat you are really living...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Life is a serious battle, and you have\xfffeto use the tools you're given.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's more important to master the cards\xfffeyou're holding than to complain about\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe ones your opponents were dealt.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet us begin.\xfffeAnd may the best Trainer win!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeContests like this are proof\xfffethat you are really living...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There are bad ways to win--\xfffeand good ways to lose.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat's interesting and troubling is that\xfffeit's not always clear which is which.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA flipped coin doesn't always land\xfffeheads or tails.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes it may never land at all...
texts.translated_text: There are bad ways to win--\xfffeand good ways to lose.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat's interesting and troubling is that\xfffeit's not always clear which is which.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA flipped coin doesn't always land\xfffeheads or tails.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes it may never land at all...

texts.original_text: Excellent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe nice thing about Pokémon battles is\xfffethey teach the loser something, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat said...\xfffeYou should take that strength and test\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit against the rest of the Elite Four!
texts.translated_text: Excellent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe nice thing about Pokémon battles is\xfffethey teach the loser something, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat said...\xfffeYou should take that strength and test\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit against the rest of the Elite Four!

texts.original_text: Astonishing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have defeated every member of\xfffethe Pokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it isn't over yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is one more opponent against whom\xfffeyou must prove your strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the statue in the central plaza,\xfffeand continue to the final room.
texts.translated_text: Astonishing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have defeated every member of\xfffethe Pokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it isn't over yet.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is one more opponent against whom\xfffeyou must prove your strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the statue in the central plaza,\xfffeand continue to the final room.

texts.original_text: Greetings, challenger.\xfffeMy name is Marshal.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to master the art of fighting,\xfffeI'm training under my mentor, Alder.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy mentor sees your potential as a\xfffeTrainer and is taking an interest in you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is my intention to test you--to take\xfffeyou to the limits of your strength. Kiai!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Greetings, challenger.\xfffeMy name is Marshal.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to master the art of fighting,\xfffeI'm training under my mentor, Alder.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy mentor sees your potential as a\xfffeTrainer and is taking an interest in you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is my intention to test you--to take\xfffeyou to the limits of your strength. Kiai!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Whew! Well done!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs your battles continue,\xfffeaim for even greater heights!
texts.translated_text: Whew! Well done!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs your battles continue,\xfffeaim for even greater heights!

texts.original_text: Representing the Pokémon League in the\xfffeabsence of the Champion has been my duty\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas Alder's student.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever, there is nothing as empty as\xfffewords not backed up by strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA word in your ear, strong challenger...\xfffeThe other members of the Elite Four\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare far more powerful than I am.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo not underestimate them!
texts.translated_text: Representing the Pokémon League in the\xfffeabsence of the Champion has been my duty\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeas Alder's student.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever, there is nothing as empty as\xfffewords not backed up by strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA word in your ear, strong challenger...\xfffeThe other members of the Elite Four\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare far more powerful than I am.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo not underestimate them!

texts.original_text: Now... You have become the strongest\xfffeTrainer in this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe statue in the central chamber will\xfffetake you to the Champion's room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe, the Elite Four of Unova,\xfffeare sworn to follow the Champion's order\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto be neutral.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the rest is up to you!
texts.translated_text: Now... You have become the strongest\xfffeTrainer in this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe statue in the central chamber will\xfffetake you to the Champion's room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe, the Elite Four of Unova,\xfffeare sworn to follow the Champion's order\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto be neutral.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the rest is up to you!

texts.original_text: I thank you deeply for the chance for\xfffeanother round of combat against you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn myself, I seek to develop\xfffethe strength of a fighter.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd shatter any weakness in myself!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePrevailing with the force of\xfffemy convictions!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVictory, decisive victory, is my intention!\xfffeChallenger, here I come!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I thank you deeply for the chance for\xfffeanother round of combat against you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn myself, I seek to develop\xfffethe strength of a fighter.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd shatter any weakness in myself!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePrevailing with the force of\xfffemy convictions!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVictory, decisive victory, is my intention!\xfffeChallenger, here I come!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There are still many strong Trainers\xfffein this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should deepen your bonds with\xfffeyour Pokémon by battling with them.
texts.translated_text: There are still many strong Trainers\xfffein this Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should deepen your bonds with\xfffeyour Pokémon by battling with them.

texts.original_text: In times past, I wandered all the regions\xfffeof the world in pursuit of strength...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOne day, I met my mentor and began to\xfffegrasp the wisdom of making strength\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean internal quality...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd one day, I decided to become part of\xfffethe Elite Four of Unova...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor some reason, the battle we just had\xfffebrought those fateful times back to mind.
texts.translated_text: In times past, I wandered all the regions\xfffeof the world in pursuit of strength...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOne day, I met my mentor and began to\xfffegrasp the wisdom of making strength\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean internal quality...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd one day, I decided to become part of\xfffethe Elite Four of Unova...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor some reason, the battle we just had\xfffebrought those fateful times back to mind.

texts.original_text: The strength shown by you and your\xfffePokémon has deeply impressed me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease, continue to the next room\xfffeto face the strongest Trainer\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof the Unova region!
texts.translated_text: The strength shown by you and your\xfffePokémon has deeply impressed me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease, continue to the next room\xfffeto face the strongest Trainer\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof the Unova region!

texts.original_text: Who are you?\xfffeHow impudent you are to disturb my sleep.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmf...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to possess a combination of\xfffestrength and kindness. Very well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMake your best effort not to bore me\xfffewith a yawn-inducing battle. Clear?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Who are you?\xfffeHow impudent you are to disturb my sleep.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmf...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to possess a combination of\xfffestrength and kindness. Very well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMake your best effort not to bore me\xfffewith a yawn-inducing battle. Clear?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You haven't faced all of the members\xfffeof the Elite Four yet, have you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't concern yourself about me.\xfffeGo on ahead.
texts.translated_text: You haven't faced all of the members\xfffeof the Elite Four yet, have you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't concern yourself about me.\xfffeGo on ahead.

texts.original_text: In the past, when I battled, the force\xfffeof my emotions shook me greatly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my power awoke, I came close to\xfffedestroying everything around me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat weak person no longer exists...\xfffeStill, sometimes, my determination fails.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlways, I aspire to wrap up a victory\xfffewith elegance and grace.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI invite you to be my opponent\xfffeagain in the future, if you wish.
texts.translated_text: In the past, when I battled, the force\xfffeof my emotions shook me greatly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my power awoke, I came close to\xfffedestroying everything around me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat weak person no longer exists...\xfffeStill, sometimes, my determination fails.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlways, I aspire to wrap up a victory\xfffewith elegance and grace.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI invite you to be my opponent\xfffeagain in the future, if you wish.

texts.original_text: Somehow, you managed to defeat the\xfffeentire Elite Four of the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the statue in the center of the\xfffeplaza for the way to the Champion's room.
texts.translated_text: Somehow, you managed to defeat the\xfffeentire Elite Four of the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the statue in the center of the\xfffeplaza for the way to the Champion's room.

texts.original_text: Who's there?\xfffeWho is so uncouth as to disturb my sleep?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmf... It's you again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, you possess that combination of\xfffekindness and strength. Yet you seem\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestronger than before...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo be sure not to bore me with a\xfffesnooze-inducing battle, is that clear?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Who's there?\xfffeWho is so uncouth as to disturb my sleep?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmf... It's you again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, you possess that combination of\xfffekindness and strength. Yet you seem\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestronger than before...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo be sure not to bore me with a\xfffesnooze-inducing battle, is that clear?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alas! Even with the knowledge and skill\xfffepassed down in my family of Trainers,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI still can't win.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reason I came here in the first place\xfffewas to encounter Trainers like you...
texts.translated_text: Alas! Even with the knowledge and skill\xfffepassed down in my family of Trainers,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI still can't win.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reason I came here in the first place\xfffewas to encounter Trainers like you...

texts.original_text: In the past, my untrained heart made my\xfffepower run wild.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI was forbidden to battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll I craved then was to experience the\xfffepure excitement of battling like this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee hee...\xfffeAlthough I'm embarrassed, I can't help\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesmiling right now.
texts.translated_text: In the past, my untrained heart made my\xfffepower run wild.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI was forbidden to battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll I craved then was to experience the\xfffepure excitement of battling like this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee hee...\xfffeAlthough I'm embarrassed, I can't help\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesmiling right now.

texts.original_text: You have defeated the\xfffePokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have earned the right to\xfffeproceed to the Champion's room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaking an entrance is not the point.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you're there, you'll need to\xfffeunleash your power to the fullest!
texts.translated_text: You have defeated the\xfffePokémon League's Elite Four.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have earned the right to\xfffeproceed to the Champion's room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaking an entrance is not the point.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you're there, you'll need to\xfffeunleash your power to the fullest!

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNever again will Pokémon be made to\xfffesuffer or be held captive by humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all thanks to my friend, Reshiram!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNever again will Pokémon be made to\xfffesuffer or be held captive by humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all thanks to my friend, Reshiram!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNever again will Pokémon be made to\xfffesuffer or be held captive by humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all thanks to my friend, Zekrom!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's over!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNever again will Pokémon be made to\xfffesuffer or be held captive by humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all thanks to my friend, Zekrom!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You may have the title of Champion...\xfffeBut you can't stop me with just a title.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYour soft heart has left you weak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYears ago, you lost your Pokémon,\xfffeyour partner, to sickness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to forget the pain in your\xfffeheart, you wandered Unova...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWho knows how long it's been since you've\xfffehad to fight with your full strength?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI actually kind of like that\xfffeabout you, though.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You may have the title of Champion...\xfffeBut you can't stop me with just a title.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYour soft heart has left you weak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYears ago, you lost your Pokémon,\xfffeyour partner, to sickness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to forget the pain in your\xfffeheart, you wandered Unova...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWho knows how long it's been since you've\xfffehad to fight with your full strength?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI actually kind of like that\xfffeabout you, though.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001As a Trainer who far outmatches\xfffethe Champion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI shall issue an order across Unova:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers of the world,\xfffefree your Pokémon!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001As a Trainer who far outmatches\xfffethe Champion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI shall issue an order across Unova:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers of the world,\xfffefree your Pokémon!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: I beg you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeparating people from Pokémon...\xfffeDo anything but that!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: I beg you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeparating people from Pokémon...\xfffeDo anything but that!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You and I both put our beliefs on the\xfffeline and fought with all our strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I won.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo not say another word.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You and I both put our beliefs on the\xfffeline and fought with all our strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I won.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo not say another word.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001...I've been waiting.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001...I've been waiting.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001In the future I envisioned, you obtained\xfffea stone. And, indeed, you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Dark Stone...\xfffeReshiram is responding to it.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001In the future I envisioned, you obtained\xfffea stone. And, indeed, you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Dark Stone...\xfffeReshiram is responding to it.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001In the future I envisioned, you obtained\xfffea stone. And, indeed, you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Light Stone...\xfffeZekrom is responding to it.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001In the future I envisioned, you obtained\xfffea stone. And, indeed, you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat Light Stone...\xfffeZekrom is responding to it.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Stop.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is not a suitable place\xfffefor the legendary dragons!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Stop.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is not a suitable place\xfffefor the legendary dragons!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001From the ground, rise up!\xfffeThe castle of Team Plasma!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSurround the Pokémon League!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001From the ground, rise up!\xfffeThe castle of Team Plasma!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSurround the Pokémon League!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001What has just appeared is\xfffeTeam Plasma's castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe king's words will resound\xfffefrom the heights to all below.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001What has just appeared is\xfffeTeam Plasma's castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe king's words will resound\xfffefrom the heights to all below.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You must come to the castle, as well.\xfffeEverything will be decided there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhether Pokémon will be liberated\xfffefrom people,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor whether Pokémon and people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill live together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will see whose belief is stronger...\xfffeAnd our result will change the world.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You must come to the castle, as well.\xfffeEverything will be decided there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhether Pokémon will be liberated\xfffefrom people,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor whether Pokémon and people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill live together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will see whose belief is stronger...\xfffeAnd our result will change the world.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Mr. Alder, you're a wreck.\xfffeIt's not fitting for the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Mr. Alder, you're a wreck.\xfffeIt's not fitting for the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: You did well to get this far.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: You did well to get this far.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Somehow, I beat the\xfffePokémon League, but it wasn't easy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Somehow, I beat the\xfffePokémon League, but it wasn't easy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Er... I have to congratulate you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Er... I have to congratulate you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I became stronger because\xfffeI understood what I want to do.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I became stronger because\xfffeI understood what I want to do.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeTell N this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSome people grow stronger by being\xfffewith Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are proof. Together,\xfffewe learned and became stronger.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeTell N this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSome people grow stronger by being\xfffewith Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are proof. Together,\xfffewe learned and became stronger.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'll look after Alder. You go on.
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'll look after Alder. You go on.

texts.original_text: Alder: I... I lost.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI should have been able to demonstrate\xfffethe bond between me and my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat would have shown that brat the\xfffeworthlessness of his outrageous dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, his convictions were the real thing...\xfffeBe careful.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ones who change the world are always\xfffethe ones who pursued their dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I ask this of you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven if Pokémon and people are\xfffeseparated, nothing good will come of it.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePlease let him know that!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: I am grateful for\xfffewhat you did about N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't know what he's thinking now,\xfffebut I'm sure he realizes\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat different people and Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave their own paths to follow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay now, how about a match with the\xfffestrongest Trainer in the Unova region?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: I've really been looking forward\xfffeto deciding who's the strongest\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon Trainer in the Unova region!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKiai!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: I've really been looking forward\xfffeto deciding who's the strongest\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon Trainer in the Unova region!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKiai!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Well done!\xfffeYou certainly are an unmatched talent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome with me!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Well done!\xfffeYou certainly are an unmatched talent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome with me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: This room is the Hall of Fame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt exists to commemorate the Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon who have demonstrated their\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestellar strength and kindness of heart.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: This room is the Hall of Fame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt exists to commemorate the Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon who have demonstrated their\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestellar strength and kindness of heart.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: No matter how many times I visit,\xfffeI always feel a little awed by the names\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeengraved here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: No matter how many times I visit,\xfffeI always feel a little awed by the names\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeengraved here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: With your skill and persistence, you have\xfffeearned your place in this Hall of Fame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour name, the account of your journey,\xfffeand the history of your battles will all\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebe recorded here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hope all of this becomes a support\xfffeto you and helps you grow stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Trainer, you and the Pokémon\xfffewho fought by your side will be recorded\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this machine!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: With your skill and persistence, you have\xfffeearned your place in this Hall of Fame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour name, the account of your journey,\xfffeand the history of your battles will all\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebe recorded here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hope all of this becomes a support\xfffeto you and helps you grow stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Trainer, you and the Pokémon\xfffewho fought by your side will be recorded\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this machine!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Do you want to go to\xfffeTeam Plasma's castle?
texts.translated_text: Do you want to go to\xfffeTeam Plasma's castle?

texts.original_text: I see.
texts.translated_text: I see.

texts.original_text: Return to Castelia City?
texts.translated_text: Return to Castelia City?

texts.original_text: Well then, please board the ship!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well then, please board the ship!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Please board the ship\xfffeat your convenience.
texts.translated_text: Please board the ship\xfffeat your convenience.

texts.original_text: Hello, and welcome to Unity Tower!\xfffeWould you like to go upstairs?
texts.translated_text: Hello, and welcome to Unity Tower!\xfffeWould you like to go upstairs?

texts.original_text: Indeed.\xfffePlease step inside the elevator.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Indeed.\xfffePlease step inside the elevator.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Please come again.
texts.translated_text: Please come again.

texts.original_text: This is Unity Tower.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers from all over the world cross\xfffeborders and oceans to gather here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVisit whichever floor you like!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe more people you know worldwide,\xfffethe more floors you can visit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy all that we have to offer!
texts.translated_text: This is Unity Tower.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers from all over the world cross\xfffeborders and oceans to gather here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVisit whichever floor you like!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe more people you know worldwide,\xfffethe more floors you can visit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease enjoy all that we have to offer!

texts.original_text: Right now, the number of visitors in\xfffeUnity Tower is \xf000ȁ\x0001\x000b.
texts.translated_text: Right now, the number of visitors in\xfffeUnity Tower is \xf000ȁ\x0001\x000b.

texts.original_text: Wow! So you like\xfffe\xf000Ĩ\x0001\x0006, then!
texts.translated_text: Wow! So you like\xfffe\xf000Ĩ\x0001\x0006, then!

texts.original_text: Awesome! The ceiling is sooo high!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how many of me\xfffeyou'd have to stack up to reach it?
texts.translated_text: Awesome! The ceiling is sooo high!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how many of me\xfffeyou'd have to stack up to reach it?

texts.original_text: Coming to Unity Tower always\xfffegets me excited!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing here always reminds me of how big\xfffethe world really is!
texts.translated_text: Coming to Unity Tower always\xfffegets me excited!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing here always reminds me of how big\xfffethe world really is!

texts.original_text: You're a new face.\xfffeIs this your first time here?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUnity Tower is the place where\xfffeTrainers come from all over the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I work hard every day doing\xfffesecurity checks to protect those\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyoung Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't loiter around here\xfffeand cause trouble.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You're a new face.\xfffeIs this your first time here?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUnity Tower is the place where\xfffeTrainers come from all over the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I work hard every day doing\xfffesecurity checks to protect those\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyoung Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't loiter around here\xfffeand cause trouble.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Seems like I've met you somewhere...\xfffeAnyway, don't get too wound up and fall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen guests get hurt, it causes me\xfffeno end of trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Seems like I've met you somewhere...\xfffeAnyway, don't get too wound up and fall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen guests get hurt, it causes me\xfffeno end of trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! So you're a Trainer, then!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI see. You're far from family\xfffeand traveling the world, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI suppose it's fine if you contact them\xfffeonce in a while.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh! So you're a Trainer, then!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI see. You're far from family\xfffeand traveling the world, huh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI suppose it's fine if you contact them\xfffeonce in a while.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, it's you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmm... You like trading, do you now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, that's all right, isn't it.\xfffeYou're active--just like a young person\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshould be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, it's you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like you come here a lot.\xfffeDo you have friends all over the world?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd never have imagined a world like this\xfffewhen I was young.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Kay, you can pass.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: What are we doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon Munna and Musharna\xfffeemit a mysterious vapor called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDream Mist, which shows people's dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're going to use that to make people\xfffewant to release their Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe'll show them dreams\xfffeto manipulate their hearts.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: What are we doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon Munna and Musharna\xfffeemit a mysterious vapor called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDream Mist, which shows people's dreams.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're going to use that to make people\xfffewant to release their Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe'll show them dreams\xfffeto manipulate their hearts.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: You're kicking a Pokémon\xfffeto make it give off Dream Mist?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's mean! Why?\xfffeYou're Trainers too, right?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: You're kicking a Pokémon\xfffeto make it give off Dream Mist?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's mean! Why?\xfffeYou're Trainers too, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: That's right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're Pokémon Trainers too, but\xfffewe're fighting for a different reason.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUnlike you two, we're fighting for\xfffethe freedom of Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: That's right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're Pokémon Trainers too, but\xfffewe're fighting for a different reason.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUnlike you two, we're fighting for\xfffethe freedom of Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: And setting Pokémon free\xfffemeans that we win Pokémon battles and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetake Pokémon by force!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, on that note, we are going to rescue\xfffeyour Pokémon from you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: And setting Pokémon free\xfffemeans that we win Pokémon battles and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetake Pokémon by force!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, on that note, we are going to rescue\xfffeyour Pokémon from you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Were you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, Trainer-who-destroyed-our-castle,\xfffeI was quite surprised by you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Were you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, Trainer-who-destroyed-our-castle,\xfffeI was quite surprised by you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you surprise them, both Pokémon\xfffeand people leave themselves open.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhile they're in a state of surprise,\xfffethey can't use their powers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelike they normally would.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur intention was to surprise people\xfffeby making our castle appear and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshowing off the legendary Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt that moment, we planned to deeply\xfffeimpress people's hearts with the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeawesome power of Team Plasma\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the brilliance of our new world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If you surprise them, both Pokémon\xfffeand people leave themselves open.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhile they're in a state of surprise,\xfffethey can't use their powers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelike they normally would.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur intention was to surprise people\xfffeby making our castle appear and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshowing off the legendary Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt that moment, we planned to deeply\xfffeimpress people's hearts with the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeawesome power of Team Plasma\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the brilliance of our new world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now that I've seen the strength of\xfffespirit in you and the Gym Leaders,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI wonder how effective that strategy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould have been, after all.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe that strength of spirit\xfffeis what's needed to take Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto the next level?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHm... I'm sorry to have wasted your time\xfffewith this silly conversation.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTake this with you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now that I've seen the strength of\xfffespirit in you and the Gym Leaders,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI wonder how effective that strategy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewould have been, after all.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe that strength of spirit\xfffeis what's needed to take Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto the next level?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHm... I'm sorry to have wasted your time\xfffewith this silly conversation.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTake this with you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Ah... And now,\xfffeabout Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am an officer of the\xfffeInternational Police, and there are so\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany things you must tell me at once!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gorm: Musharna is said to appear here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts Dream Mist makes you see dreams,\xfffebut they are nothing but illusions.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe dreams you realize with your\xfffeown abilities are the real dreams.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Accept my thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat it is they are thinking,\xfffewhat it may be they are hoping,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis is the information I pursue.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUntil we meet again!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Accept my thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat it is they are thinking,\xfffewhat it may be they are hoping,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis is the information I pursue.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUntil we meet again!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: A thousand thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEh, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xfffeOn a topic I must speak to you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving received such a report, of\xfffesomeone far from here, who has seen\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea person like N and...a dragon Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am on my way to ascertain the\xfffecertainty of this information.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe will meet again one day!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Pinwheel Forest\xfffeDid you remember to pack an Antidote?

texts.original_text: In order to eliminate the old-fashioned\xfffeways of looking at things...
texts.translated_text: In order to eliminate the old-fashioned\xfffeways of looking at things...

texts.translated_text: We will steal Pokémon!\xfffeYou'll never play together again!

texts.translated_text: If their Pokémon are liberated,\xfffeTrainers will no longer be Trainers!

texts.translated_text: If you don't think the same way we think,\xfffewe'll use all our power to eliminate you!

texts.original_text: Burgh: Well, you see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are two ways out of\xfffePinwheel Forest--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffethe road that goes straight and the\xfffepath that winds through the woods.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I will take the straight road after them!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If they're not there,\xfffeI'll block the exit.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Would you please take the other way\xfffeand check whether Team Plasma\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis hiding in there somewhere?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll run into a lot of Trainers,\xfffebut it's basically a single path,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso I'm sure you won't get lost.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: So you made it this far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll hold you here so my friends\xfffecan get away!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: A pursuer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh, ha ha. A kid like you--\xfffebeat some of us?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat can't be helped, but...\xfffeI'll take you on now!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: A pursuer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh, ha ha. A kid like you--\xfffebeat some of us?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat can't be helped, but...\xfffeI'll take you on now!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Fine.\xfffeTake your stupid skull!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: So the dream our king had--\xfffethe dream we had--won't come true...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Gorm of the Seven Sages!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm mortified that this skull, which we\xfffewent to so much trouble to obtain,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas stolen from us so easily.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gorm: It's not important.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can afford to abandon\xfffethe Dragon Skull.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAccording to the results of our\xffferesearch, this is not the legendary\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon for which Team Plasma is looking.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt is completely unrelated.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But we will not allow anyone to disrupt\xfffeour plans and get away with it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will fix it so you never interfere\xfffewith us again.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gorm: I am one of the Seven Sages\xfffeof Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis, another of the Seven Sages,\xfffewill liberate Pokémon with words alone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe remainder of the Seven Sages have\xfffeordered their compatriots to take\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon with full force!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the odds are a little against us now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo you, the Bug Pokémon user Burgh and\xfffethe Normal Pokémon user Lenora, I say...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnow your enemies, know yourself,\xfffeand you need not fear the result\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof a hundred battles...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis time, we shall retreat quietly.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gorm: I am one of the Seven Sages\xfffeof Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis, another of the Seven Sages,\xfffewill liberate Pokémon with words alone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe remainder of the Seven Sages have\xfffeordered their compatriots to take\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon with full force!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the odds are a little against us now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo you, the Bug Pokémon user Burgh and\xfffethe Normal Pokémon user Lenora, I say...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnow your enemies, know yourself,\xfffeand you need not fear the result\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof a hundred battles...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis time, we shall retreat quietly.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: To secure the liberation of Pokémon,\xfffewe will steal Pokémon from Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven though you are Gym Leaders,\xfffewe will not tolerate any further\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeobstruction from you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn any case, we will settle this someday.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hope you are looking forward\xfffeto that time as much as I...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I heard about these Pokémon statues,\xfffeand I came to look into their origins!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I heard about these Pokémon statues,\xfffeand I came to look into their origins!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I've learned that each of these Pokémon\xfffestatues is actually a real Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's called Darmanitan. It's sleeping,\xfffeso it's become like a stone.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I've learned that each of these Pokémon\xfffestatues is actually a real Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's called Darmanitan. It's sleeping,\xfffeso it's become like a stone.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When I quickly measured how long\xfffethey've existed...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was amazing! Around 2,500 years!\xfffeSeems like they went to sleep that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelong ago.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat means they've been here since\xfffebefore this place was in ruins, when\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Relic Castle was flourishing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePerhaps they were guarding the city.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: These Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are either in a state of hibernation\xfffeor meditation, so if you wake them, they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill become active once again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the item that wakes up Darmanitan is\xfffeactually...this RageCandyBar!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I will share one with you,\xfffetoo, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: According to what I've heard, that\xfffeRelic Castle is the ruins of a city built\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby the hero of old and the dragon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon that accompanied the hero.
texts.translated_text: According to what I've heard, that\xfffeRelic Castle is the ruins of a city built\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby the hero of old and the dragon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon that accompanied the hero.

texts.original_text: Oh! A sea of sand! I don't need\xfffeGo-Goggles here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I've come here all the way from\xfffethe Hoenn region.
texts.translated_text: Oh! A sea of sand! I don't need\xfffeGo-Goggles here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I've come here all the way from\xfffethe Hoenn region.

texts.original_text: The Desert Resort is especially known for\xfffethe Relic Castle.
texts.translated_text: The Desert Resort is especially known for\xfffethe Relic Castle.

texts.original_text: I'm a School Kid, so I know this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust like in caves, you can run into\xfffePokémon almost anywhere in the desert.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut they don't like hiding in the pale\xfffesand. So if you walk there, you won't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave to worry about battling.
texts.translated_text: I'm a School Kid, so I know this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust like in caves, you can run into\xfffePokémon almost anywhere in the desert.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut they don't like hiding in the pale\xfffesand. So if you walk there, you won't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave to worry about battling.

texts.original_text: I've been carrying two Pokémon Fossils,\xfffebut they're just so heavy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you take one of them off my hands?
texts.translated_text: I've been carrying two Pokémon Fossils,\xfffebut they're just so heavy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you take one of them off my hands?

texts.original_text: Oh, you like the Cover Fossil?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it is the Fossil of a Pokémon\xfffethat used to swim in the ancient sea!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, you like the Cover Fossil?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it is the Fossil of a Pokémon\xfffethat used to swim in the ancient sea!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, you like the Plume Fossil?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is the Fossil of a bird Pokémon\xfffethat lived in an ancient forest.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...But they say it couldn't fly.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, you like the Plume Fossil?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is the Fossil of a bird Pokémon\xfffethat lived in an ancient forest.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...But they say it couldn't fly.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, won't you please take one?\xfffeThey're really weighing me down.
texts.translated_text: Oh, won't you please take one?\xfffeThey're really weighing me down.

texts.original_text: Oh, did you change your mind? Great!\xfffeYou can have your choice of Fossils!
texts.translated_text: Oh, did you change your mind? Great!\xfffeYou can have your choice of Fossils!

texts.original_text: The museum in Nacrene City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hear Pokémon can be restored from\xfffeFossils there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause Lenora loves bones and Fossils!
texts.translated_text: The museum in Nacrene City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hear Pokémon can be restored from\xfffeFossils there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe'Cause Lenora loves bones and Fossils!

texts.original_text: Plume Fossil
texts.translated_text: Plume Fossil

texts.translated_text: Cancel

texts.original_text: Trainer! You still can't move ahead\xfffe'cause there is so much sand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will do my best to remove the sand.\xfffeGive me a second!
texts.translated_text: Trainer! You still can't move ahead\xfffe'cause there is so much sand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will do my best to remove the sand.\xfffeGive me a second!

texts.original_text: Trainer! You still can't move ahead\xfffe'cause there is so much sand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will do my best to remove the sand.\xfffeGive me a second!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Trainer! You still can't move ahead\xfffe'cause there is so much sand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will do my best to remove the sand.\xfffeGive me a second!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There! The sand is cleared away, so now\xfffeyou can proceed.
texts.translated_text: There! The sand is cleared away, so now\xfffeyou can proceed.

texts.original_text: There are two things I've learned\xfffeabout quicksand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you try to walk through the middle,\xfffeyou'll fall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd if you try to run through it,\xfffeyou'll fall.
texts.translated_text: There are two things I've learned\xfffeabout quicksand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you try to walk through the middle,\xfffeyou'll fall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd if you try to run through it,\xfffeyou'll fall.

texts.original_text: Ryoku: Ghetsis told us that once again\xfffewe should test how much power you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will see if you can defeat Team Plasma!
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: Ghetsis told us that once again\xfffewe should test how much power you have.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will see if you can defeat Team Plasma!

texts.original_text: Ryoku: Go!\xfffeHurry and fall through the flowing sands!
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: Go!\xfffeHurry and fall through the flowing sands!

texts.original_text: Cheren: Whew! I finally caught up.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Whew! I finally caught up.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: You two. Come here...\xfffeCome to my side.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: You two. Come here...\xfffeCome to my side.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: It looks like everyone is here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt seems you are working hard\xfffeto resurrect Zekrom, the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it appears the Dark Stone you seek\xfffeis not here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: It looks like everyone is here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt seems you are working hard\xfffeto resurrect Zekrom, the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it appears the Dark Stone you seek\xfffeis not here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: It looks like everyone is here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt seems you are working hard\xfffeto resurrect Reshiram, the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it appears the Light Stone you seek\xfffeis not here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: It looks like everyone is here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt seems you are working hard\xfffeto resurrect Reshiram, the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it appears the Light Stone you seek\xfffeis not here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well then, congratulations are in order!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you were chosen by our king.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you truly desire to keep the world as\xfffeit is, where Pokémon live alongside\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople, you must bring the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon spoken of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein legend and battle with our king.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOtherwise, Team Plasma will steal every\xfffePokémon from every person in the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand release them all!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well then, congratulations are in order!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you were chosen by our king.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you truly desire to keep the world as\xfffeit is, where Pokémon live alongside\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople, you must bring the other\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDragon-type Pokémon spoken of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein legend and battle with our king.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOtherwise, Team Plasma will steal every\xfffePokémon from every person in the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand release them all!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Release them, you say?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo the Pokémon who live with their\xfffeTrainers actually want that?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIs the liberation you talk about really\xfffejust stealing Pokémon from people?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Release them, you say?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo the Pokémon who live with their\xfffeTrainers actually want that?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIs the liberation you talk about really\xfffejust stealing Pokémon from people?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: What's this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChampion Alder, even though illness took\xfffethe Pokémon that had been your partner\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor many years, and you haven't had a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeserious battle in all that time...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven you, who ordered the Elite Four to\xfffeprotect the Pokémon League and left to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewander the Unova region alone...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven a Champion like you now wants to\xfffeprotect a world where Pokémon and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople live together?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: What's this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChampion Alder, even though illness took\xfffethe Pokémon that had been your partner\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor many years, and you haven't had a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeserious battle in all that time...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven you, who ordered the Elite Four to\xfffeprotect the Pokémon League and left to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewander the Unova region alone...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven a Champion like you now wants to\xfffeprotect a world where Pokémon and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople live together?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma's king will show the people of\xfffeUnova that he is stronger than a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeChampion who keeps Pokémon bound!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd just like the hero who founded\xfffeUnova, he will be accompanied by the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe will give this order!\xfffe“Trainers, release your Pokémon!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor this, we have prepared a suitable\xfffecastle for the legendary Reshiram and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeour king!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma's king will show the people of\xfffeUnova that he is stronger than a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeChampion who keeps Pokémon bound!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd just like the hero who founded\xfffeUnova, he will be accompanied by the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe will give this order!\xfffe“Trainers, release your Pokémon!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor this, we have prepared a suitable\xfffecastle for the legendary Reshiram and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeour king!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma's king will show the people of\xfffeUnova that he is stronger than a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeChampion who keeps Pokémon bound!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd just like the hero who founded\xfffeUnova, he will be accompanied by the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe will give this order!\xfffe“Trainers, release your Pokémon!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor this, we have prepared a suitable\xfffecastle for the legendary Zekrom and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeour king!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: I won't lose!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll fight for all Trainers who love their\xfffePokémon, and for all Pokémon who believe\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein their Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: I won't lose!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll fight for all Trainers who love their\xfffePokémon, and for all Pokémon who believe\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein their Trainers!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Our king has no interest in you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe has already determined that victory\xfffeagainst you is assured.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Our king has no interest in you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe has already determined that victory\xfffeagainst you is assured.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: So you stayed behind just to\xfffetell me that? Just to make a fool of me?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: So you stayed behind just to\xfffetell me that? Just to make a fool of me?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Of course not.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm doing this out of kindness.\xfffeYes, kindness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm making sure the Champion doesn't\xfffeget hurt for no reason.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGranted, the moment when\xfffesomeone loses all hope...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI really do love to watch\xfffethat moment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, farewell.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Of course not.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm doing this out of kindness.\xfffeYes, kindness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm making sure the Champion doesn't\xfffeget hurt for no reason.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGranted, the moment when\xfffesomeone loses all hope...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI really do love to watch\xfffethat moment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, farewell.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Alder...\xfffeWhat are you going to do now?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Alder...\xfffeWhat are you going to do now?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Hmmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt seems my only choice is to return to\xfffethe Pokémon League and battle N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it bothers me to do exactly what\xfffeGhetsis wants...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMore importantly, what should we do\xfffeabout the Dark Stone?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: !!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: !!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Arggghhhhh!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Ryoku of the Seven Sages is\xfffelooking for a Pokémon inside Relic Castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was his lookout so he\xfffewouldn't be interrupted...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStupid, stupid, stupid me!\xfffePlus, weak... And did I mention stupid?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt all adds up to nincompoop!
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Ryoku of the Seven Sages is\xfffelooking for a Pokémon inside Relic Castle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was his lookout so he\xfffewouldn't be interrupted...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStupid, stupid, stupid me!\xfffePlus, weak... And did I mention stupid?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt all adds up to nincompoop!

texts.original_text: Ryoku: I was planning to catch the\xfffePokémon called Volcarona that lives\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this Relic Castle and present it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Ghetsis.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the Shadow Triad said that Ghetsis\xfffehas gone somewhere, right?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: I was planning to catch the\xfffePokémon called Volcarona that lives\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this Relic Castle and present it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Ghetsis.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the Shadow Triad said that Ghetsis\xfffehas gone somewhere, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Seven Sages...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe always said we were complete when the\xfffeseven of us were together.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow I don't know the meaning of those\xfffewords anymore.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess I don't mind, even if we were\xfffebeing used, but the dream is over.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Seven Sages...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe always said we were complete when the\xfffeseven of us were together.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow I don't know the meaning of those\xfffewords anymore.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess I don't mind, even if we were\xfffebeing used, but the dream is over.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I no longer need this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis gave it to me, but I have no use\xfffefor it.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I no longer need this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis gave it to me, but I have no use\xfffefor it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ryoku: This Relic Castle and our own\xfffecastle are both crumbling...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what's different is that this Relic\xfffeCastle is the remains of a civilization.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd our castle left nothing behind...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: This Relic Castle and our own\xfffecastle are both crumbling...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what's different is that this Relic\xfffeCastle is the remains of a civilization.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd our castle left nothing behind...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Regarding Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am an officer of the International\xfffePolice, and you must satisfy my request\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor certain information!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Regarding Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am an officer of the International\xfffePolice, and you must satisfy my request\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor certain information!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ryoku: Understood.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut we don't know much about Ghetsis or\xfffeour lord N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe haven't even figured out if they are\xfffefather and son...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: Understood.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut we don't know much about Ghetsis or\xfffeour lord N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe haven't even figured out if they are\xfffefather and son...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Accept my thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are thinking--upon what topics?\xfffeThey are hoping--upon what chances?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is of the utmost urgency.\xfffeAt once! On the way!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: I thank you profoundly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCuriously, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xfffeThere is a topic on which we must speak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA report has reached my ears of someone\xfffefar from here. Indeed, this someone has\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespotted a person like N and a...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedragon Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI depart to validate the validity\xfffeof this information.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe shall meet again, so until then, adieu.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Vraahhbrbrbr!
texts.translated_text: Vraahhbrbrbr!

texts.original_text: The Pokémon quietly\xfffeflew away and disappeared...
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon quietly\xfffeflew away and disappeared...

texts.original_text: You want to know about this place?\xfffeThis is the Cold Storage.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInside, there are Workers\xfffewith their Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: You want to know about this place?\xfffeThis is the Cold Storage.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInside, there are Workers\xfffewith their Pokémon!

texts.original_text: The reason why Clay is having you look\xfffefor Team Plasma is 'cause he is testing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour abilities.
texts.translated_text: The reason why Clay is having you look\xfffefor Team Plasma is 'cause he is testing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour abilities.

texts.original_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you think Team Plasma could be\xfffein there?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't like cold places, but we have\xfffeto check. What a bother.
texts.translated_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you think Team Plasma could be\xfffein there?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't like cold places, but we have\xfffeto check. What a bother.

texts.original_text: Cheren: All right, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeLet's get this over with.
texts.translated_text: Cheren: All right, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeLet's get this over with.

texts.original_text: You can get to the Cold Storage through\xfffethe gap between the fence and the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecontainer over there.
texts.translated_text: You can get to the Cold Storage through\xfffethe gap between the fence and the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecontainer over there.

texts.original_text: For a few loads, send it by Pokémon.\xfffeFor a lot of loads, send it by ship.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUse the best method for your needs!
texts.translated_text: For a few loads, send it by Pokémon.\xfffeFor a lot of loads, send it by ship.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUse the best method for your needs!

texts.original_text: A helmet is an important tool for\xfffeshock protection!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's good to let your Pokémon\xfffehave one, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A helmet is an important tool for\xfffeshock protection!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's good to let your Pokémon\xfffehave one, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you let a Pokémon hold a Rocky Helmet,\xfffethe foe will also be damaged if that foe's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemove makes physical contact.

texts.original_text: The experiences of joy and suffering\xfffeare a vital part of being alive.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis gave me the sensation\xfffeof being truly alive...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat did he mean to accomplish?\xfffeThat isn't what's important.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Pokémon and people live by being\xfffetogether and relying on one another.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat might be how you feel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's so, is it necessary to\xfffeseparate people and Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy talking to you, I've discovered that\xfffethere's much I need to think about...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wish I had more to give you in thanks...\xfffeHere, take this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This place is always charged with\xfffelots of electricity that Pokémon like!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe electric charges react from one\xfffestone to another, and that's why\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesome of the stones are floating!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut not all of the stones can be pushed.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: My father asked me to research Klink,\xfffewhich is a Pokémon that looks like a gear,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause I'm researching the origins\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof Pokémon and the era they appeared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe knows how to get what he wants from\xfffepeople, but I was already interested in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis anyway, so it's a lot of fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, yeah! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, this is for you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My father asked me to research Klink,\xfffewhich is a Pokémon that looks like a gear,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause I'm researching the origins\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof Pokémon and the era they appeared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe knows how to get what he wants from\xfffepeople, but I was already interested in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis anyway, so it's a lot of fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, yeah! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, this is for you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Giving that Lucky Egg\xfffeto a Pokémon to hold increases the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeamount of Exp. Points received in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebattle by a lot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving strong Pokémon will make\xfffeit easier to fill your Pokédex pages!

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeAre you working on your Pokédex?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKeep encountering lots of Pokémon,\xfffeso you can keep filling in those pages!

texts.original_text: This cave has been around since the\xfffedistant past, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeData to prove that Klink existed more\xfffethan a hundred years ago can't be found.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that must mean...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKlink suddenly appeared a hundred\xfffeyears ago!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Where Pokémon came from\xfffeand where they are going...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf we can learn that, I believe\xfffewe can get along even better!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Where Pokémon came from\xfffeand where they are going...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf we can learn that, I believe\xfffewe can get along even better!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Know what, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000?\xfffePokémon are mysterious!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder why these amazing\xfffelittle guys stay by our sides.
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Know what, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000?\xfffePokémon are mysterious!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder why these amazing\xfffelittle guys stay by our sides.

texts.original_text: ...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are stairs going down ahead.\xfffeTeam Plasma is waiting for you there.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Many different values mix together,\xfffeand the world becomes gray...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat is unforgivable!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will separate Pokémon and people, and\xfffeblack and white will be clearly distinct!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly then will Pokémon become\xfffeperfect beings!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes, that is my dream!\xfffeThat is the dream I must fulfill!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, do you have a dream\xfffeof your own?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You have a dream...\xfffeThat's wonderful.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll learn just what kind of dream\xfffeyou have--in battle!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001As if a person without a dream\xfffecould ever understand me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEh... I guess...\xfffeI have to crush your will here!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

Why?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIs it impossible for me to win while\xfffefeeling bad about being a Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs if I could pursue the truth with\xfffesomething as meaningless as a battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs if that could make me worthy to become\xfffefriends with the legendary Pokémon!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Bianca,\xfffeyou have good ears.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't believe you heard\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's voice from that far away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who is this Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Bianca,\xfffeyou have good ears.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't believe you heard\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's voice from that far away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who is this Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Professor Juniper,\xfffewhat are you thinking?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to have no qualms about the\xffferelationship between Pokémon and people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou put Pokémon into categories using\xfffearbitrary rules and think you can\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand them like that...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe very idea of a Pokédex revolts me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you have to say for yourself?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Professor Juniper,\xfffewhat are you thinking?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou appear to have no qualms about the\xffferelationship between Pokémon and people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou put Pokémon into categories using\xfffearbitrary rules and think you can\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand them like that...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe very idea of a Pokédex revolts me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you have to say for yourself?\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Oh, my.\xfffeLooks like you're not my biggest fan.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour opinion is understandable.\xfffeIt happens to be different from mine,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich is equally understandable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow about if all people get to decide for\xfffethemselves how to relate to Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Oh, my.\xfffeLooks like you're not my biggest fan.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour opinion is understandable.\xfffeIt happens to be different from mine,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhich is equally understandable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow about if all people get to decide for\xfffethemselves how to relate to Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're saying I should just allow\xfffepeople to think whatever they want and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetreat Pokémon however they want,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeno matter whether the Pokémon suffer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI refuse to tolerate the existence\xfffeof a world like that!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You're saying I should just allow\xfffepeople to think whatever they want and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetreat Pokémon however they want,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeno matter whether the Pokémon suffer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI refuse to tolerate the existence\xfffeof a world like that!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Well, I didn't expect\xfffehim to change his mind right away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I hope he'll spend a little time\xfffetrying to understand how others feel.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Well, I didn't expect\xfffehim to change his mind right away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I hope he'll spend a little time\xfffetrying to understand how others feel.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now, then...\xfffeI think I'll go collect a little more data.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor Pokémon and people to get\xfffealong better, we need to take steps\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto learn more about them!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now, then...\xfffeI think I'll go collect a little more data.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor Pokémon and people to get\xfffealong better, we need to take steps\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto learn more about them!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hi! We're the Nugget brothers.\xfffeI am the big brother.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And I am the little brother\xfffeof the Nugget brothers!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Glad you showed up!\xfffeI want to give you this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Glad you showed up!\xfffeI want to give you this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I want to give you this, too.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That's a Nugget!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow'd it get so golden without\xfffedeep-frying? Trade secret!

texts.original_text: Nuggetaboutit!
texts.translated_text: Nuggetaboutit!

texts.original_text: Bronius: When I saw you in Castelia,\xfffeI did not care about your existence.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere in the Chargestone Cave,\xfffeGhetsis tested your ability...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce more, we will test you to learn\xfffewhat it is you are.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma, come out!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bronius: When I saw you in Castelia,\xfffeI did not care about your existence.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere in the Chargestone Cave,\xfffeGhetsis tested your ability...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce more, we will test you to learn\xfffewhat it is you are.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma, come out!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Bronius of the Seven Sages,\xfffeI will bring this kid down!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Bronius of the Seven Sages,\xfffeI will bring this kid down!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: This kid is the real thing!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: This kid is the real thing!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Because of you,\xfffeI'm now ex-Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing an ex doesn't sound cool, does it?\xfffeHow are you going to make it up to me?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Because of you,\xfffeI'm now ex-Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing an ex doesn't sound cool, does it?\xfffeHow are you going to make it up to me?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: An ex-Team Plasma member\xfffebecomes an ordinary Pokémon Trainer...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis was that moment.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: An ex-Team Plasma member\xfffebecomes an ordinary Pokémon Trainer...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis was that moment.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bronius: The Pokémon of our Team Plasma\xfffeare also fighting for their Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was so obvious that I overlooked it...\xfffeThank you for reminding me of that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, I'd like you to take this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bronius: The Pokémon of our Team Plasma\xfffeare also fighting for their Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was so obvious that I overlooked it...\xfffeThank you for reminding me of that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, I'd like you to take this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bronius: Pokémon do their best for their\xfffeTrainers even when they are injured.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder whether my lord N understands\xfffewhat that means?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bronius: Those who left Team Plasma and\xfffeare behaving with respect and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstanding toward Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThem, please forgive!\xfffeHowever, those who won't interact with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon in a kind and honest way...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEven I will never forgive them!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bronius: Those who left Team Plasma and\xfffeare behaving with respect and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstanding toward Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThem, please forgive!\xfffeHowever, those who won't interact with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon in a kind and honest way...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEven I will never forgive them!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Truly, I thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTheir innermost thoughts,\xfffetheir uttermost hopes...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThese I must and shall discover!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeOnce more, a brief farewell!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Truly, I thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTheir innermost thoughts,\xfffetheir uttermost hopes...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThese I must and shall discover!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeOnce more, a brief farewell!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, there is something\xfffeof which we must speak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA report has been received. By me.\xfffeFar from here, a sighting occurred of a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeperson like N and--a dragon Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI must instantly go to confirm the\xfffecomplete confirmation of this report.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI will see you again, and soon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince we both hold the Jet Badge now,\xfffelet's see which of us is stronger!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Oh, honestly, Cheren.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust accept the compliment without the\xfffestinging remark.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've asked you this before, but what do\xfffeyou plan to do after becoming strong?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: If I get strong and become a\xfffeChampion, that will be the reason for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy existence.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to prove that I'm really living.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Hmmm...\xfffeYou remind me of Marshal.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOf course, having something you want\xfffeto become is important.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut what is even more important is\xfffewhat you do with your newfound power.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyway, take this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xfffeNext time, I will win!\xf000븁\x0000
