texts.original_text: You are \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you surprised that I know?\xfffeClay told me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh-oh! To go inside Twist Mountain,\xfffeyou need to have a Gym Badge from the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMistralton Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe wild Pokémon here are tougher, and\xfffewe want to be sure you're ready!
texts.translated_text: You are \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you surprised that I know?\xfffeClay told me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh-oh! To go inside Twist Mountain,\xfffeyou need to have a Gym Badge from the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMistralton Gym!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe wild Pokémon here are tougher, and\xfffewe want to be sure you're ready!

texts.original_text: Twist Mountain ahead.\xfffeWatch out for wild Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: Twist Mountain ahead.\xfffeWatch out for wild Pokémon.

texts.original_text: In winter, the appearance of\xfffeTwist Mountain changes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I see that, I feel a sense of relief.
texts.translated_text: In winter, the appearance of\xfffeTwist Mountain changes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I see that, I feel a sense of relief.

texts.original_text: Snow is so amazing...\xfffeIt's like a clean slate for the world.
texts.translated_text: Snow is so amazing...\xfffeIt's like a clean slate for the world.

texts.original_text: When I can stand firm, even though the\xfffeground beneath me is slanted, it makes me\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefeel even more alive!
texts.translated_text: When I can stand firm, even though the\xfffeground beneath me is slanted, it makes me\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefeel even more alive!

texts.original_text: Clay: What a surprise. Seein' ya here\xfffewhile I was inspectin' Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTh' two of ya seem a bit more rugged\xfffethan the last time I saw ya.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA li'l bit, anyway...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: What a surprise. Seein' ya here\xfffewhile I was inspectin' Twist Mountain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTh' two of ya seem a bit more rugged\xfffethan the last time I saw ya.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA li'l bit, anyway...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Is that so.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Is that so.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Clay: By th' by... You folks seen that\xfffeTeam Plasma crowd lately?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter all the trouble, we Gym Leaders\xfffemet up and had a chat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut we've got no clue where they are.\xfffeIt's like they're hidin' under a rock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, not much to do but wait for 'em\xfffeto move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyhow, this's none o' yer concern.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSquirts like the two of ya should just\xfffeenjoy travelin' with yer Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Clay: By th' by... You folks seen that\xfffeTeam Plasma crowd lately?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter all the trouble, we Gym Leaders\xfffemet up and had a chat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut we've got no clue where they are.\xfffeIt's like they're hidin' under a rock.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, not much to do but wait for 'em\xfffeto move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyhow, this's none o' yer concern.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSquirts like the two of ya should just\xfffeenjoy travelin' with yer Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Twist Mountain's a fine place\xfffeto explore!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll have some fun if you just leave\xfffethis here path...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWeeell... Better ya just see it yerself,\xfffe'stead o' listenin' to me yammer.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Twist Mountain's a fine place\xfffeto explore!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll have some fun if you just leave\xfffethis here path...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWeeell... Better ya just see it yerself,\xfffe'stead o' listenin' to me yammer.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Be seein' ya, sprouts!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel free to train yerselves on my\xfffemountain fer as long's ya like.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Be seein' ya, sprouts!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel free to train yerselves on my\xfffemountain fer as long's ya like.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I thought he was going to get us\xfffeinvolved in all that bother again, so I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas bracing myself before I knew it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going in first, but I'll be seeing you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I thought he was going to get us\xfffeinvolved in all that bother again, so I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas bracing myself before I knew it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going in first, but I'll be seeing you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Huh. Pretty strong...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you're only strong because you\xfffeTrainers are controlling Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Huh. Pretty strong...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you're only strong because you\xfffeTrainers are controlling Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: So if you want to set\xfffePokémon free...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's what you want, you should\xfffestart with your own.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut taking people's Pokémon by force\xfffeis not right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is not real strength!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: So if you want to set\xfffePokémon free...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's what you want, you should\xfffestart with your own.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut taking people's Pokémon by force\xfffeis not right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is not real strength!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Hey, there you are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe found that thing we were looking for.\xfffeWe should head for the tower now!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Get this! Team Plasma has obtained\xfffethe power to change this world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand end people's control over Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Get this! Team Plasma has obtained\xfffethe power to change this world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand end people's control over Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: That's right!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe must use force in order to right\xfffethe wrongs of the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, let's gather around our king.\xfffeOur lord N!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Those guys... I don't know what\xfffethey've found, but they go the extra\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemile to gain power and cause trouble.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat a bothersome bunch...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you look for something in an empty\xfffeplace like this, you can discover things!

texts.original_text: It's a rock covered with ice.\xfffeTouching it could make you freeze.
texts.translated_text: It's a rock covered with ice.\xfffeTouching it could make you freeze.

texts.original_text: Cedric: That building serenely towering\xfffeover everything is Dragonspiral Tower.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom far in the past, before Unova was\xfffefounded, it still stands tall today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn the top floor, so it's been told,\xfffethe legendary Pokémon is waiting for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea person seeking the truth to appear.

texts.original_text: ???: Of course!\xfffeAnd no one can get away from themselves.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ???: Of course!\xfffeAnd no one can get away from themselves.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: ...Marshal?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: ...Marshal?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Marshal: My mentor told me you were\xfffehere, so I came to see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeListen. Even if you lose in battle, if you\xfffesurpass what you've done before, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave bested yourself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTake the opportunity of a battle to\xfffelook at your opponent,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelook at the Pokémon involved,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand look at yourself!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Marshal: My mentor told me you were\xfffehere, so I came to see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeListen. Even if you lose in battle, if you\xfffesurpass what you've done before, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave bested yourself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTake the opportunity of a battle to\xfffelook at your opponent,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelook at the Pokémon involved,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand look at yourself!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Are those Alder's words?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Are those Alder's words?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Marshal: Maybe. But I'm borrowing them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want are battles with Trainers\xfffewho believe in themselves like that...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I mix it up with a Trainer like\xfffethat, both my Pokémon and I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeget even stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, I'll be waiting for your\xfffechallenge in the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Marshal: Maybe. But I'm borrowing them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want are battles with Trainers\xfffewho believe in themselves like that...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I mix it up with a Trainer like\xfffethat, both my Pokémon and I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeget even stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell then, I'll be waiting for your\xfffechallenge in the Pokémon League.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I guess that's that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeAccept this Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I guess that's that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeAccept this Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'll keep battling many Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon like this, and if I can learn\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat kind of person I am, it will open up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy path.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure this path will lead me to become\xfffethe person I'm meant to be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon will always be with you and me as\xfffewe go down our own paths.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur important friends, Pokémon...
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'll keep battling many Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon like this, and if I can learn\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat kind of person I am, it will open up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy path.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure this path will lead me to become\xfffethe person I'm meant to be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon will always be with you and me as\xfffewe go down our own paths.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur important friends, Pokémon...

texts.original_text: Cheren: Oh, you showed up, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to surpass myself up to this\xfffepoint, and to beat a purely strong\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon Trainer such as yourself, I'm\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechallenging you to a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Oh, you showed up, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to surpass myself up to this\xfffepoint, and to beat a purely strong\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon Trainer such as yourself, I'm\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechallenging you to a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'll keep battling many Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon like this, and if I can learn\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat kind of person I am, it will open up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy path.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure this path will lead me to become\xfffethe person I'm meant to be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon will always be with you and me as\xfffewe go down our own paths.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur important friends, Pokémon...
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'll keep battling many Trainers\xfffeand Pokémon like this, and if I can learn\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat kind of person I am, it will open up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy path.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure this path will lead me to become\xfffethe person I'm meant to be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon will always be with you and me as\xfffewe go down our own paths.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOur important friends, Pokémon...

texts.original_text: Gurooooohhh!
texts.translated_text: Gurooooohhh!

texts.original_text: The Pokémon vanished into\xfffethe darkness of the cave...
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon vanished into\xfffethe darkness of the cave...

texts.original_text: Haaahraaan!
texts.translated_text: Haaahraaan!

texts.original_text: Haaahraaan!
texts.translated_text: Haaahraaan!

texts.original_text: The Pokémon disappeared\xfffeinto the darkness of the cave.
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon disappeared\xfffeinto the darkness of the cave.

texts.original_text: Do you want to go back to Castelia City?
texts.translated_text: Do you want to go back to Castelia City?

texts.original_text: We are just about to leave, so please\xfffeget on board and wait a moment.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We are just about to leave, so please\xfffeget on board and wait a moment.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Just come talk to me when you want\xfffeto return to Castelia City!
texts.translated_text: Just come talk to me when you want\xfffeto return to Castelia City!

texts.original_text: That Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey sure do terrible things!
texts.translated_text: That Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey sure do terrible things!

texts.original_text: The smell of the ocean is so soothing!
texts.translated_text: The smell of the ocean is so soothing!

texts.original_text: Waaah! I'm scared!
texts.translated_text: Waaah! I'm scared!

texts.original_text: You sure took care of\xfffethose bad guys, mister!
texts.translated_text: You sure took care of\xfffethose bad guys, mister!

texts.original_text: You sure took care of\xfffethose bad guys, miss!
texts.translated_text: You sure took care of\xfffethose bad guys, miss!

texts.original_text: Making my grandchild cry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they are underestimating me because\xfffeI'm old... Grrr!
texts.translated_text: Making my grandchild cry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they are underestimating me because\xfffeI'm old... Grrr!

texts.original_text: Thank you very much for\xfffesaving my grandchild.
texts.translated_text: Thank you very much for\xfffesaving my grandchild.

texts.original_text: Shut your trap!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you stay here quietly,\xfffewe won't be rough.
texts.translated_text: Shut your trap!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you stay here quietly,\xfffewe won't be rough.

texts.original_text: What do they hope to accomplish\xfffeby occupying the island?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat a sketchy group!
texts.translated_text: What do they hope to accomplish\xfffeby occupying the island?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat a sketchy group!

texts.original_text: If I had known this island's secret\xfffeearlier, I would've...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? No! Nothing!\xfffeJust talking to myself!
texts.translated_text: If I had known this island's secret\xfffeearlier, I would've...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? No! Nothing!\xfffeJust talking to myself!

texts.original_text: What are they doing in this little\xfffememorial park? There's nothing here\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebut an old lighthouse...
texts.translated_text: What are they doing in this little\xfffememorial park? There's nothing here\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebut an old lighthouse...

texts.original_text: Too many people use Pokémon\xfffefor bad deeds!
texts.translated_text: Too many people use Pokémon\xfffefor bad deeds!

texts.original_text: This officer's Pokémon couldn't stand up\xfffeto them!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat blasted Team Plasma!
texts.translated_text: This officer's Pokémon couldn't stand up\xfffeto them!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat blasted Team Plasma!

texts.original_text: I'm really glad a strong Trainer\xfffelike you is around!
texts.translated_text: I'm really glad a strong Trainer\xfffelike you is around!

texts.original_text: Recently, I've been bored because\xfffethe number of tourists has decreased.
texts.translated_text: Recently, I've been bored because\xfffethe number of tourists has decreased.

texts.original_text: Two hundred years ago, an ultra-rich\xfffefamily bought this island and named it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLiberty Garden.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a place where people and Pokémon\xfffecould live freely.
texts.translated_text: Two hundred years ago, an ultra-rich\xfffefamily bought this island and named it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLiberty Garden.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a place where people and Pokémon\xfffecould live freely.

texts.original_text: Dock 2\xfffeTo board the tour boat, go to Dock 1.
texts.translated_text: Dock 2\xfffeTo board the tour boat, go to Dock 1.

texts.original_text: This lighthouse shines with the light\xfffeof freedom.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly authorized personnel may enter.
texts.translated_text: This lighthouse shines with the light\xfffeof freedom.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnly authorized personnel may enter.

texts.original_text: My fellow officers rushed here by\xfffepolice boat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to them, we rounded up\xfffethese baddies!
texts.translated_text: My fellow officers rushed here by\xfffepolice boat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to them, we rounded up\xfffethese baddies!

texts.original_text: How's that Pokémon doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe island sure has been quiet since\xfffethat incident.
texts.translated_text: How's that Pokémon doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe island sure has been quiet since\xfffethat incident.

texts.original_text: Team Plasma forever!
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma forever!

texts.original_text: We won't give up!
texts.translated_text: We won't give up!

texts.original_text: You're irredeemable!
texts.translated_text: You're irredeemable!

texts.original_text: Get moving!
texts.translated_text: Get moving!

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Thanks to you,\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, this group that was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeup to no good has been captured!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Thanks to you,\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, this group that was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeup to no good has been captured!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Victini is a mythical Pokémon that is said\xfffeto radiate energy from its body...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen Pokémon or people come into contact\xfffewith that energy, it fills up their bodies,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand they exhibit more power than usual.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why there was no end to the\xfffepeople who wanted to use Victini for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetheir own evil ends...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the rich person who built this\xfffeunderground room for Victini was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesincerely trying to help it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I think shutting the poor thing up in\xfffethis room was a mistake.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to you, Victini has a new destiny\xfffethat does not involve being used in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma's schemes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaking sure no one misuses Victini's\xfffepowers is now your duty!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Victini is a mythical Pokémon that is said\xfffeto radiate energy from its body...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen Pokémon or people come into contact\xfffewith that energy, it fills up their bodies,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand they exhibit more power than usual.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why there was no end to the\xfffepeople who wanted to use Victini for\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetheir own evil ends...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the rich person who built this\xfffeunderground room for Victini was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesincerely trying to help it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I think shutting the poor thing up in\xfffethis room was a mistake.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to you, Victini has a new destiny\xfffethat does not involve being used in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma's schemes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaking sure no one misuses Victini's\xfffepowers is now your duty!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Also...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the Unova Pokédex, Victini was\xfffeassigned a special number: zero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard the special number was\xfffeassigned in the hope that Victini's power\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto bring victory would be shared with the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainer who travels with this Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Also...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the Unova Pokédex, Victini was\xfffeassigned a special number: zero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard the special number was\xfffeassigned in the hope that Victini's power\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto bring victory would be shared with the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainer who travels with this Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe cornered the crooks with our\xfffehigh-speed police boat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will return to Castelia City!\xfffePlease come on board, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe cornered the crooks with our\xfffehigh-speed police boat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will return to Castelia City!\xfffePlease come on board, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Thank you!\xfffeI'll be right there!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Thank you!\xfffeI'll be right there!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I can't believe it when people are led\xfffeastray by Pokémon's astounding abilities\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand try to misuse them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's only when we face Pokémon with a\xfffegood heart that we can make a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebrighter future!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I can't believe it when people are led\xfffeastray by Pokémon's astounding abilities\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand try to misuse them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's only when we face Pokémon with a\xfffegood heart that we can make a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebrighter future!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It makes me feel better knowing\xfffethere's a strong Trainer like you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like me to help\xfffeby healing your Pokémon?
texts.translated_text: It makes me feel better knowing\xfffethere's a strong Trainer like you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like me to help\xfffeby healing your Pokémon?

texts.original_text: Please stop Team Plasma's tyranny!
texts.translated_text: Please stop Team Plasma's tyranny!

texts.original_text: When your Pokémon are hurt in\xfffebattle, let me know!
texts.translated_text: When your Pokémon are hurt in\xfffebattle, let me know!

texts.original_text: The one who obtains this Pokémon is said\xfffeto be victorious in any type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof competition...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can obtain a power that would make\xfffeus invincible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is the value of this mythical\xfffePokémon, Victini!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The one who obtains this Pokémon is said\xfffeto be victorious in any type\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof competition...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can obtain a power that would make\xfffeus invincible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is the value of this mythical\xfffePokémon, Victini!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is a secret room meant\xfffeto hide Victini!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTwo hundred years ago, a certain rich\xfffeperson bought this entire island and hid\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeVictini in this underground room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter that, no one saw Victini, and it\xfffebecame a mythical Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This is a secret room meant\xfffeto hide Victini!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTwo hundred years ago, a certain rich\xfffeperson bought this entire island and hid\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeVictini in this underground room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter that, no one saw Victini, and it\xfffebecame a mythical Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We, Team Plasma, will liberate Victini\xfffefrom this room and use its powers to make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeour goal a reality!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe won't let a brat like you get in\xfffeour way!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We, Team Plasma, will liberate Victini\xfffefrom this room and use its powers to make\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeour goal a reality!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe won't let a brat like you get in\xfffeour way!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It looks like I underestimated\xfffeyour strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut Victini won't be so simple!\xfffeLook!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It looks like I underestimated\xfffeyour strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut Victini won't be so simple!\xfffeLook!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looks like it's waiting to test your\xfffestrength. You'd better get ready!
texts.translated_text: Looks like it's waiting to test your\xfffestrength. You'd better get ready!

texts.original_text: Living with Victini means accepting\xfffeVictini's cruel destiny...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeday we will test you to see if you are\xfffetruly ready for that.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Living with Victini means accepting\xfffeVictini's cruel destiny...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeday we will test you to see if you are\xfffetruly ready for that.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Victini is still close by and watching\xfffeyour movements...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you exit this room and come back, it\xfffemight return...
texts.translated_text: Victini is still close by and watching\xfffeyour movements...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you exit this room and come back, it\xfffemight return...

texts.original_text: Ta-ta-ta-tah!
texts.translated_text: Ta-ta-ta-tah!

texts.original_text: Victini vanished from the\xfffeunderground room...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Victini vanished from the\xfffeunderground room...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, it's just a kid...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, it's just a kid...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You... It couldn't be...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe fact that you are here means you\xfffecame to learn about the secret\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof Genesect!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You... It couldn't be...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe fact that you are here means you\xfffecame to learn about the secret\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof Genesect!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We, Team Plasma, revived Genesect from\xfffea Fossil.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen we enhanced the Pokémon with the\xfffepower of science!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We, Team Plasma, revived Genesect from\xfffea Fossil.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen we enhanced the Pokémon with the\xfffepower of science!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It is the strongest Pokémon in history!!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It is the strongest Pokémon in history!!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, our lord N was not interested in\xfffethis Genesect that was modified by the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepower of science!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: But, our lord N was not interested in\xfffethis Genesect that was modified by the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepower of science!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: “Science damages the natural beauty\xfffeof Pokémon! They're perfect beings!"\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “Science damages the natural beauty\xfffeof Pokémon! They're perfect beings!"\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That's what he said...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo our research was halted, and this\xfffefacility was closed...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That's what he said...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo our research was halted, and this\xfffefacility was closed...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: However!!\xfffeThe Genesect research is all mine!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo if you want to know Genesect's\xfffesecret, you'll have to beat me in battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: However!!\xfffeThe Genesect research is all mine!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo if you want to know Genesect's\xfffesecret, you'll have to beat me in battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Battle the Scientist?
texts.translated_text: Battle the Scientist?

texts.original_text: I've lost everything...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI forgot my duty as a Scientist is\xfffeto make the world happy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, this must be what I get for trying to\xfffemake a Pokémon into a tool for fighting...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I've lost everything...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI forgot my duty as a Scientist is\xfffeto make the world happy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, this must be what I get for trying to\xfffemake a Pokémon into a tool for fighting...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm going to wash my hands of this\xfffeGenesect matter...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't need this anymore...\xfffeI'll give it to you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I'm going to wash my hands of this\xfffeGenesect matter...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't need this anymore...\xfffeI'll give it to you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There was another one in my\xfffeother pocket...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There was another one in my\xfffeother pocket...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The item I just gave you was made\xfffefor Genesect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it holds an item like this, it\xfffechanges the type of the move called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTechno Blast, so it can always have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean advantage.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The item I just gave you was made\xfffefor Genesect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it holds an item like this, it\xfffechanges the type of the move called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTechno Blast, so it can always have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean advantage.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There sure are some very cowardly\xfffeTrainers, aren't there!
texts.translated_text: There sure are some very cowardly\xfffeTrainers, aren't there!

texts.original_text: So you want to battle me?!
texts.translated_text: So you want to battle me?!

texts.original_text: I've given you all of the Drives.\xfffeUse them how you wish...
texts.translated_text: I've given you all of the Drives.\xfffeUse them how you wish...

texts.original_text: There is a memo stuck to the\xfffeside of the monitor.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRead it?
texts.translated_text: There is a memo stuck to the\xfffeside of the monitor.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRead it?

texts.original_text: My lord N apparently rejected\xfffemy research...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut my research is necessary for\xfffeTeam Plasma to reach its goal...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe strongest Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rest of the memo is torn and\xfffeimpossible to read.
texts.translated_text: My lord N apparently rejected\xfffemy research...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut my research is necessary for\xfffeTeam Plasma to reach its goal...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThe strongest Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe rest of the memo is torn and\xfffeimpossible to read.

texts.original_text: TESPXTHOJL\xfffePUOFUTJM
texts.translated_text: TESPXTHOJL\xfffePUOFUTJM

texts.original_text: Sometimes, above the bridge, you can\xfffesee the shadows of bird Pokémon, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTheir feathers drift to the ground here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd when you try to pick them up,\xfffeoccasionally, you'll run into a Pokémon.

texts.original_text: This is not necessary, however.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom his infancy, I provided him with the\xfffeeducation required to become the hero\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof legend. texts.translated_text: The liberation of Pokémon of which I... texts.original_text: The preparations are complete!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my perfect plan is set in motion,\xfffefirst a few gullible Pokémon Trainers who\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare unable to resist Team Plasma will\xf000븀\x0000\xffferelease their Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen that number will become a hundred,\xfffethen a thousand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn no time, even the Gym Leaders and the\xfffeChampion will become unable to fight us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving a Pokémon will be considered\xfffea bad thing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven people like the sad little Bianca,\xfffewhose Pokémon was stolen in Castelia,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be unable to face public opinion\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand will release their Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the kind of world we'll make!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The preparations are complete!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen my perfect plan is set in motion,\xfffefirst a few gullible Pokémon Trainers who\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare unable to resist Team Plasma will\xf000븀\x0000\xffferelease their Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen that number will become a hundred,\xfffethen a thousand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn no time, even the Gym Leaders and the\xfffeChampion will become unable to fight us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving a Pokémon will be considered\xfffea bad thing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven people like the sad little Bianca,\xfffewhose Pokémon was stolen in Castelia,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be unable to face public opinion\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand will release their Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the kind of world we'll make!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You may have the Stone, but there's no\xfffechance whatsoever that the legendary\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon will accept you as the hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, if you're not willing to hand over\xfffeyour precious Pokémon, I suggest you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesearch for some courage--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause you're going to need it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You may have the Stone, but there's no\xfffechance whatsoever that the legendary\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon will accept you as the hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, if you're not willing to hand over\xfffeyour precious Pokémon, I suggest you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesearch for some courage--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause you're going to need it!\xf000븁\x0000

Who said ya can pass through here?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen Friday night rolls around, this place\xfffebelongs to us, the Black \xf000ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's like our Gym, kid!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo scram! texts.original_text: First, you might want to revisit places\xfffeyou've already been.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRetrace your steps in the Unova region\xfffeand see what new Pokémon turn up!
texts.translated_text: First, you might want to revisit places\xfffeyou've already been.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRetrace your steps in the Unova region\xfffeand see what new Pokémon turn up!

texts.original_text: Remember Rule No. 1! To catch a Pokémon,\xfffeyou first have to reduce its HP.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're pretty good at this now,\xfffebut don't forget the basics!
texts.translated_text: Remember Rule No. 1! To catch a Pokémon,\xfffeyou first have to reduce its HP.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're pretty good at this now,\xfffebut don't forget the basics!

texts.original_text: Are you going to the Day Care?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've heard that some Pokémon can only be\xfffecaught if they are hatched from Eggs.

texts.original_text: Do you have a fishing rod?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are many Pokémon that live in the\xfffewater. Try searching rivers and oceans!

texts.original_text: Do you know the move False Swipe?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFalse Swipe always leaves a tiny bit of\xfffethe targeted Pokémon's HP.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's great for catching, because it\xfffedoesn't make them faint!

texts.original_text: You've caught more than 400\xfffedifferent Pokémon?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's incredible!\xfffeYou're an amazing Trainer!

texts.original_text: You've caught 500 different Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy, the variation of these beings called\xfffePokémon certainly is surprising!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the fact that you've caught so many\xfffedifferent kinds... That's pretty\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesurprising, too!

texts.original_text: Oh, that performance was so inspiring!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was so full of hopes and dreams! It\xfffemade me feel like I could climb mountains!

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! Great show today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm moved no matter how many\xfffetimes I see your performance!

texts.original_text: Everyone's talking about the musical\xfffeat work, and it's all thanks to you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe all love your innovative Dress Up.\xfffeYou're like our fashion muse!

texts.original_text: I'm so glad I got to see your Pokémon on\xfffestage. I'm overwhelmed with emotion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm not exaggerating!

texts.original_text: What's the Pokémon Musical?
texts.translated_text: What's the Pokémon Musical?

texts.original_text: The Pokémon Musical is a show where\xfffePokémon wearing Props perform on stage.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnyone can participate!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe encourage all Trainers to show the\xfffeworld how charming their Pokémon are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe audience is looking forward to seeing\xfffehow you Dress Up your Pokémon, and how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokémon perform!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon Musical is a show where\xfffePokémon wearing Props perform on stage.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnyone can participate!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe encourage all Trainers to show the\xfffeworld how charming their Pokémon are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe audience is looking forward to seeing\xfffehow you Dress Up your Pokémon, and how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour Pokémon perform!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How to Participate
texts.translated_text: How to Participate

texts.original_text: You can join the musical from any of the\xfffethree reception areas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reception area in the center is for\xfffeparticipating alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you participate alone, you will\xfffebe joined by other Trainers from around\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to put on a musical with your\xfffefriends, go to the left reception area.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll be asked to pick a Leader who\xfffewill choose which show to perform,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the others will join the group.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reception area to the right is where\xfffeyou go to Dress Up only.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You can join the musical from any of the\xfffethree reception areas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reception area in the center is for\xfffeparticipating alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you participate alone, you will\xfffebe joined by other Trainers from around\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to put on a musical with your\xfffefriends, go to the left reception area.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll be asked to pick a Leader who\xfffewill choose which show to perform,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the others will join the group.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reception area to the right is where\xfffeyou go to Dress Up only.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Eligible Pokémon
texts.translated_text: Eligible Pokémon

texts.original_text: The Pokémon that will participate in the\xfffemusical are chosen from your party at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe reception area.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause of their shape, some Pokémon\xfffehave a hard time wearing certain Props.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou might want to try Dress Up in the\xfffechanging room first if you're worried!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon that will participate in the\xfffemusical are chosen from your party at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe reception area.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause of their shape, some Pokémon\xfffehave a hard time wearing certain Props.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou might want to try Dress Up in the\xfffechanging room first if you're worried!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Dress Up
texts.translated_text: Dress Up

texts.original_text: Oh, Dress Up is my favorite part! That's\xfffewhere you put the Props you've collected\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon the Pokémon that will be performing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDepending on the Pokémon, you can put\xfffethe Props in different places.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you use Props that fit the theme of\xfffethe show you've chosen, the audience\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill notice your Pokémon more!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes a Prop that doesn't fit the\xfffetheme will also make your Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestand out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to get an idea of how it's\xfffedone, you can watch how other people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDress Up and then try it yourself!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, Dress Up is my favorite part! That's\xfffewhere you put the Props you've collected\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeon the Pokémon that will be performing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDepending on the Pokémon, you can put\xfffethe Props in different places.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you use Props that fit the theme of\xfffethe show you've chosen, the audience\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill notice your Pokémon more!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes a Prop that doesn't fit the\xfffetheme will also make your Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestand out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to get an idea of how it's\xfffedone, you can watch how other people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDress Up and then try it yourself!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Shows
texts.translated_text: Shows

texts.original_text: You can choose which show to perform\xfffewhen you participate in the musical.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is no need for Trainers to give\xfffecommands, but if your Pokémon is carrying\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Prop in its arms, it can use that Prop\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto show off and appeal to the audience.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDepending on how you Dress Up your\xfffePokémon, the reactions from the audience\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill change!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You can choose which show to perform\xfffewhen you participate in the musical.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is no need for Trainers to give\xfffecommands, but if your Pokémon is carrying\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Prop in its arms, it can use that Prop\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto show off and appeal to the audience.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDepending on how you Dress Up your\xfffePokémon, the reactions from the audience\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill change!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Giallo: Ghetsis called us the chosen ones.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe chose us and gathered us here\xfffeso we can change the world!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeFor us, defeat is impossible!
texts.translated_text: Giallo: Ghetsis called us the chosen ones.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe chose us and gathered us here\xfffeso we can change the world!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeFor us, defeat is impossible!

texts.original_text: Bronius: You shall not interfere with\xfffeTeam Plasma... Or our king!
texts.translated_text: Bronius: You shall not interfere with\xfffeTeam Plasma... Or our king!

texts.original_text: Ryoku: We can only do our best and\xfffeleave the rest to fate.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe've done everything in our power.\xfffeAll we can do now is believe in our\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelord N...and wait.
texts.translated_text: Ryoku: We can only do our best and\xfffeleave the rest to fate.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe've done everything in our power.\xfffeAll we can do now is believe in our\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelord N...and wait.

texts.original_text: Gorm: A single fallen leaf signals the\xfffestart of autumn.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe know our history.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe emergence of this castle is\xfffethe harbinger of change in Unova...
texts.translated_text: Gorm: A single fallen leaf signals the\xfffestart of autumn.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe know our history.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe emergence of this castle is\xfffethe harbinger of change in Unova...

texts.original_text: Rood: Constant dripping wears away\xfffethe stone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been waiting in the abyss for\xfffethis day. No one shall interfere!
texts.translated_text: Rood: Constant dripping wears away\xfffethe stone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been waiting in the abyss for\xfffethis day. No one shall interfere!

texts.original_text: Zinzolin: It is the way of the universe to\xfffetake from excess and fill emptiness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTaking Pokémon from people is restoring\xfffebalance to nature!
texts.translated_text: Zinzolin: It is the way of the universe to\xfffetake from excess and fill emptiness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTaking Pokémon from people is restoring\xfffebalance to nature!

texts.original_text: Lenora: We have been and will continue\xfffeto be together with Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: Lenora: We have been and will continue\xfffeto be together with Pokémon.

texts.original_text: Burgh: Your Pokémon, they are doing\xfffetheir best for you, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy would you want to be separated\xfffefrom them like that?
texts.translated_text: Burgh: Your Pokémon, they are doing\xfffetheir best for you, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy would you want to be separated\xfffefrom them like that?

texts.original_text: Elesa: I do not appreciate\xfffestubborn people.
texts.translated_text: Elesa: I do not appreciate\xfffestubborn people.

texts.original_text: Clay: Things aren't gonna go th' way ya\xfffefellas think they are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure o' that!
texts.translated_text: Clay: Things aren't gonna go th' way ya\xfffefellas think they are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure o' that!

texts.original_text: Skyla: Now! Acrobatics!!
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Now! Acrobatics!!

texts.original_text: Brycen: ...
texts.translated_text: Brycen: ...

texts.original_text: Iris: I won't lose!\xfffeNo way! No way! No way!
texts.translated_text: Iris: I won't lose!\xfffeNo way! No way! No way!

texts.original_text: Drayden: I can empathize with some of\xfffewhat you say, but I can't forgive the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeway you reject everything else!
texts.translated_text: Drayden: I can empathize with some of\xfffewhat you say, but I can't forgive the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeway you reject everything else!

texts.original_text: In this castle, you may rest your\xfffePokémon and access your PC.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeFear not.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In this castle, you may rest your\xfffePokémon and access your PC.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeFear not.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: First, have your Pokémon rest in\xfffethat room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen they are healed, it is our lord N's\xfffewish that you be moved to the innermost\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepart of this castle.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: First, have your Pokémon rest in\xfffethat room.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen they are healed, it is our lord N's\xfffewish that you be moved to the innermost\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepart of this castle.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Our lord N proved that he is stronger\xfffethan the Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow many Trainers will admire our lord N\xfffeand follow his orders!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn other words, they will do whatever\xfffeTeam Plasma says!
texts.translated_text: Our lord N proved that he is stronger\xfffethan the Champion!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow many Trainers will admire our lord N\xfffeand follow his orders!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn other words, they will do whatever\xfffeTeam Plasma says!

texts.original_text: Ha ha! We, Team Plasma, were using the\xfffePokémon we took from others all along!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAww, poor widdle Pokémon.\xfffeThey had to do what we told them.
texts.translated_text: Ha ha! We, Team Plasma, were using the\xfffePokémon we took from others all along!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAww, poor widdle Pokémon.\xfffeThey had to do what we told them.

texts.original_text: I am Anthea...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainer. Before you go to confront my\xfffelord N, please take a moment to rest...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I am Anthea...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainer. Before you go to confront my\xfffelord N, please take a moment to rest...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ah, good. Both you and your Pokémon\xffferegained energy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers battle to practice their skills\xfffeand to grow in experience, but never\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto hurt their Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy lord N has realized this, deep down in\xfffehis heart...but he has spent too much\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepainful time here in this castle to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadmit it...
texts.translated_text: Ah, good. Both you and your Pokémon\xffferegained energy...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers battle to practice their skills\xfffeand to grow in experience, but never\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto hurt their Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy lord N has realized this, deep down in\xfffehis heart...but he has spent too much\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepainful time here in this castle to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadmit it...

texts.original_text: I am Concordia.\xfffeI give peace and comfort to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN has been separated from people\xfffesince he was young. He was brought up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon that were betrayed, mistreated\xfffeand hurt by bad people...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis deliberately brought only those\xfffepoor Pokémon closer to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN was touched by their plight, and\xfffestarted pursuing the truth,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking only of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN's heart is pure and innocent.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there is nothing more beautiful\xfffeand terrifying than innocence.
texts.translated_text: I am Concordia.\xfffeI give peace and comfort to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN has been separated from people\xfffesince he was young. He was brought up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon that were betrayed, mistreated\xfffeand hurt by bad people...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis deliberately brought only those\xfffepoor Pokémon closer to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN was touched by their plight, and\xfffestarted pursuing the truth,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking only of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN's heart is pure and innocent.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there is nothing more beautiful\xfffeand terrifying than innocence.

texts.original_text: I am Concordia.\xfffeI give peace and comfort to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN has been separated from people\xfffesince he was young. He was brought up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon that were betrayed, mistreated\xfffeand hurt by bad people...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis deliberately brought only those\xfffepoor Pokémon closer to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN was touched by their plight, and\xfffestarted pursuing his ideals,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking only of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN's heart is pure and innocent.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there is nothing more beautiful\xfffeand terrifying than innocence.
texts.translated_text: I am Concordia.\xfffeI give peace and comfort to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN has been separated from people\xfffesince he was young. He was brought up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon that were betrayed, mistreated\xfffeand hurt by bad people...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGhetsis deliberately brought only those\xfffepoor Pokémon closer to N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN was touched by their plight, and\xfffestarted pursuing his ideals,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethinking only of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeN's heart is pure and innocent.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there is nothing more beautiful\xfffeand terrifying than innocence.

texts.original_text: We had been secretly building this castle\xfffefor several years by overworking\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon that we took away.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWithout being noticed by anyone...
texts.translated_text: We had been secretly building this castle\xfffefor several years by overworking\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon that we took away.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWithout being noticed by anyone...

texts.original_text: Everything is going perfectly as\xfffeGhetsis of the Seven Sages\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecalculated and planned.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's been thinking about how he can\xfffemanipulate people's hearts as he wishes.
texts.translated_text: Everything is going perfectly as\xfffeGhetsis of the Seven Sages\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecalculated and planned.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's been thinking about how he can\xfffemanipulate people's hearts as he wishes.

texts.original_text: A battle between you and our lord N will\xfffereveal whether our lord N is a true hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt will also reveal how you feel about\xfffeprotecting the current world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere people live with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A battle between you and our lord N will\xfffereveal whether our lord N is a true hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt will also reveal how you feel about\xfffeprotecting the current world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere people live with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A battle between you and our lord N\xfffewill reveal whether our lord N is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean ideal hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt will also reveal how you feel about\xfffeprotecting the current world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere people live with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A battle between you and our lord N\xfffewill reveal whether our lord N is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean ideal hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt will also reveal how you feel about\xfffeprotecting the current world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere people live with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ah, our young wanderer!\xfffeAre you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis castle is the hub of Team Plasma's--\xfffeno, Ghetsis of the Seven Sages'--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffescientific capability!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA manifestation of knowledge!
texts.translated_text: Ah, our young wanderer!\xfffeAre you surprised?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis castle is the hub of Team Plasma's--\xfffeno, Ghetsis of the Seven Sages'--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffescientific capability!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA manifestation of knowledge!

texts.original_text: Ha ha! Now we can even infiltrate the\xfffePokémon Storage System inside every\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainer's PC!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf our king wills it, we can steal every\xfffePokémon stored in a PC Box and release\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethem all!
texts.translated_text: Ha ha! Now we can even infiltrate the\xfffePokémon Storage System inside every\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrainer's PC!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf our king wills it, we can steal every\xfffePokémon stored in a PC Box and release\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethem all!

texts.original_text: As part of his plan to take Pokémon away\xfffefrom their people, my lord N entrusted\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesome Pokémon to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been spending time with them...\xfffeand I don't think I want to let them go.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI...may not be cut out for Team Plasma.
texts.translated_text: As part of his plan to take Pokémon away\xfffefrom their people, my lord N entrusted\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesome Pokémon to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been spending time with them...\xfffeand I don't think I want to let them go.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI...may not be cut out for Team Plasma.

texts.original_text: Skreeree...
texts.translated_text: Skreeree...

texts.original_text: This Pokémon has become attached to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut as far as I'm concerned, a Pokémon\xfffeis just a simple tool.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand...
texts.translated_text: This Pokémon has become attached to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut as far as I'm concerned, a Pokémon\xfffeis just a simple tool.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand...

texts.original_text: Will you go to the Pokémon League?
texts.translated_text: Will you go to the Pokémon League?

texts.original_text: I see.
texts.translated_text: I see.

texts.original_text: I don't need an item to catch\xfffePokémon anymore...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I don't need an item to catch\xfffePokémon anymore...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Poké Balls...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom my point of view, they are items\xfffethat keep Pokémon confined.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut for Trainers like you, they are a way\xfffeto bond with Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you run out of Poké Balls,\xfffecome see me. I will give one to you.
texts.translated_text: Poké Balls...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom my point of view, they are items\xfffethat keep Pokémon confined.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut for Trainers like you, they are a way\xfffeto bond with Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you run out of Poké Balls,\xfffecome see me. I will give one to you.

texts.original_text: You need a Poké Ball?\xfffeOK. Take this.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You need a Poké Ball?\xfffeOK. Take this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That room was the world\xfffethat was provided to our lord N...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That room was the world\xfffethat was provided to our lord N...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I don't feel anything, even when\xfffeI go into the room...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut you may feel something.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I don't feel anything, even when\xfffeI go into the room...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut you may feel something.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's a basketball that looks like\xfffeit's been used a lot.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt says Harmonia on it...
texts.translated_text: It's a basketball that looks like\xfffeit's been used a lot.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt says Harmonia on it...

texts.original_text: It's a home-style basketball hoop...
texts.translated_text: It's a home-style basketball hoop...

texts.original_text: This toy box is full of new toys...
texts.translated_text: This toy box is full of new toys...

texts.original_text: A skateboard is resting on\xfffea pile of wheels.
texts.translated_text: A skateboard is resting on\xfffea pile of wheels.

texts.original_text: A halfpipe for skateboards...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt has Pokémon scratch marks\xfffeon it here and there...
texts.translated_text: A halfpipe for skateboards...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt has Pokémon scratch marks\xfffeon it here and there...

texts.original_text: An art panel with a\xfffeprinted geometric pattern.
texts.translated_text: An art panel with a\xfffeprinted geometric pattern.

texts.original_text: This panel has a dart stuck in it.
texts.translated_text: This panel has a dart stuck in it.

texts.original_text: It's a set of trains and tracks.\xfffeHas it been played with recently?
texts.translated_text: It's a set of trains and tracks.\xfffeHas it been played with recently?

texts.original_text: This toy box contains\xfffepieces of a train set.
texts.translated_text: This toy box contains\xfffepieces of a train set.

texts.original_text: Somewhere far from here, Team Galactic\xfffeand Team Rocket drew too much attention\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto themselves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why their plans were thwarted.
texts.translated_text: Somewhere far from here, Team Galactic\xfffeand Team Rocket drew too much attention\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto themselves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why their plans were thwarted.

texts.original_text: A Trainer who loved Pokémon until\xfffeyesterday...will release Pokémon today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTomorrow, another Trainer will let\xfffePokémon go...
texts.translated_text: A Trainer who loved Pokémon until\xfffeyesterday...will release Pokémon today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTomorrow, another Trainer will let\xfffePokémon go...

texts.original_text: If we use force to take Pokémon away\xfffefrom people, the people will rebel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, if we manipulate their hearts...\xfffepeople will release Pokémon voluntarily.
texts.translated_text: If we use force to take Pokémon away\xfffefrom people, the people will rebel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, if we manipulate their hearts...\xfffepeople will release Pokémon voluntarily.

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Welcome,\xfffeholder of the Dark Stone.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Welcome,\xfffeholder of the Dark Stone.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Welcome,\xfffeholder of the Light Stone.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Welcome,\xfffeholder of the Light Stone.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The castle that appeared as if it were\xfffeenveloping the Pokémon League\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis a symbol.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt means Unova will change.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The castle that appeared as if it were\xfffeenveloping the Pokémon League\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis a symbol.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt means Unova will change.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The king of this castle is the strongest\xfffeTrainer in the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is accompanied by the\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe has defeated the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAdded to all that, his heart burns\xfffewith the desire to improve the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's not what makes a hero,\xfffewhat more do you need?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The king of this castle is the strongest\xfffeTrainer in the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is accompanied by the\xfffelegendary Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe has defeated the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAdded to all that, his heart burns\xfffewith the desire to improve the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's not what makes a hero,\xfffewhat more do you need?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now that the stage is set, we can\xfffeseize people's minds and hearts.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can bring into being the world\xfffethat I--no, that Team Plasma--desires\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemore easily than you can imagine!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe and only we will use Pokémon, and\xfffewe shall rule the powerless populace!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now that the stage is set, we can\xfffeseize people's minds and hearts.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe can bring into being the world\xfffethat I--no, that Team Plasma--desires\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemore easily than you can imagine!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe and only we will use Pokémon, and\xfffewe shall rule the powerless populace!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I've been waiting so long for this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've kept my silence so no one\xfffecould piece together what I planned.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNow, those painful days are at an end!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I've been waiting so long for this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've kept my silence so no one\xfffecould piece together what I planned.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNow, those painful days are at an end!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Go! Onward!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Go! Onward!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Discover whether you have what\xfffeit takes to be a hero!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Discover whether you have what\xfffeit takes to be a hero!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Go!\xfffeHolder of the Dark Stone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this room, you can learn whether\xfffeyou, too, can be a hero!
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Go!\xfffeHolder of the Dark Stone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this room, you can learn whether\xfffeyou, too, can be a hero!

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Go!\xfffeHolder of the Light Stone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this room, you can learn whether\xfffeyou, too, can be a hero!
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Go!\xfffeHolder of the Light Stone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this room, you can learn whether\xfffeyou, too, can be a hero!

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001What I desire is a world for Pokémon,\xfffeand Pokémon alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will separate Pokémon from people, so\xfffePokémon can regain their original power.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001What I desire is a world for Pokémon,\xfffeand Pokémon alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will separate Pokémon from people, so\xfffePokémon can regain their original power.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's time to settle this once and for all!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy determination is absolute!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will prove the value of my beliefs even\xfffeif it means my Pokémon friends get hurt!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you've come this far,\xfffeI believe you are equally determined.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's so, prove it to me!\xfffeShow me the depth of your determination!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's time to settle this once and for all!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy determination is absolute!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will prove the value of my beliefs even\xfffeif it means my Pokémon friends get hurt!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you've come this far,\xfffeI believe you are equally determined.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's so, prove it to me!\xfffeShow me the depth of your determination!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001What I desire is a world for Pokémon,\xfffeand Pokémon alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will separate Pokémon from people, so\xfffePokémon can regain their original power.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's time to settle this once and for all!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy determination is absolute!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will prove the value of my beliefs even\xfffeif it means my Pokémon friends get hurt!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you've come this far,\xfffeI believe you are equally determined.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that's so, prove it to me!\xfffeShow me the depth of your determination!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This doesn't change my goal.\xfffeMy plans have not been disturbed!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to rule this world utterly,\xfffein order to manipulate the hearts\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof people who know nothing,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI will have N be the king of Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, for that to work, you--\xfffesince you know the truth--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou must be eliminated!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: You can say whatever you want.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon, even if it's revered as a\xfffedeity, is still just a Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, so what if it chose you!\xfffeThat doesn't mean you're a threat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on! Now you'll face ME in battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't wait to see the look on your face\xfffewhen you've lost all hope!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: You can say whatever you want.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon, even if it's revered as a\xfffedeity, is still just a Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, so what if it chose you!\xfffeThat doesn't mean you're a threat.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on! Now you'll face ME in battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't wait to see the look on your face\xfffewhen you've lost all hope!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: I won't allow anyone to stop me!\xfffeNo matter who does what!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'll never forgive you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUsing power for your selfish purposes...\xfffeYour selfish and evil purposes!
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'll never forgive you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUsing power for your selfish purposes...\xfffeYour selfish and evil purposes!

texts.original_text: Alder: You've taken shameful advantage\xfffeof N and his sincere, heartfelt beliefs.
texts.translated_text: Alder: You've taken shameful advantage\xfffeof N and his sincere, heartfelt beliefs.

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: What?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI created Team Plasma with my own hands.\xfffeI'm absolutely perfect! I AM PERFECTION!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am the perfect ruler of\xfffea perfect new world!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Mwa ha ha!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince I couldn't become the hero and\xfffeobtain the legendary Pokémon myself...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI prepared someone for that purpose--N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's nothing more than a freak\xfffewithout a human heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you think you're going to get\xfffethrough to a warped person like that?!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Alder, it's a waste of valuable\xfffetime listening to him ramble on.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe is the one without a human heart!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: N...\xfffeI'm sure you have much to think about.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know you were not pursuing the truth\xfffebecause of Ghetsis's manipulation, but\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause your heart was truly inspired.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat is why you were able to meet the\xfffelegendary Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's about when I first met\xfffeyou in Accumula Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was shocked when I heard what\xfffeyour Pokémon was saying.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001It's about when I first met\xfffeyou in Accumula Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was shocked when I heard what\xfffeyour Pokémon was saying.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001I was shocked because that\xfffePokémon said it liked you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt said it wanted to be with you.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001I was shocked because that\xfffePokémon said it liked you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt said it wanted to be with you.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001I couldn't understand it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI couldn't believe there were\xfffePokémon that liked people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause, up until that moment,\xfffeI'd never known a Pokémon like that.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001I couldn't understand it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI couldn't believe there were\xfffePokémon that liked people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause, up until that moment,\xfffeI'd never known a Pokémon like that.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001The longer my journey continued,\xfffethe more unsure I became.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll I kept meeting were Pokémon and\xfffepeople who communicated with one another\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand helped one another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was why I needed to confirm my\xfffebeliefs by battling with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wanted to confront you hero-to-hero.\xfffeI needed that more than anything.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001The longer my journey continued,\xfffethe more unsure I became.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll I kept meeting were Pokémon and\xfffepeople who communicated with one another\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand helped one another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was why I needed to confirm my\xfffebeliefs by battling with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wanted to confront you hero-to-hero.\xfffeI needed that more than anything.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001There's no way a person like me,\xfffesomeone who understands only Pokémon--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, actually...\xfffeI didn't understand them, either.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo way could I measure up to you,\xfffewhen you had met so many Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand were surrounded by friends...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001There's no way a person like me,\xfffesomeone who understands only Pokémon--\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo, actually...\xfffeI didn't understand them, either.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo way could I measure up to you,\xfffewhen you had met so many Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand were surrounded by friends...\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: N: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001The Champion has forgiven me, and...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I should do now is something\xfffeI'll have to decide for myself.\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001You said you have a dream...\xfffeThat dream... Make it come true!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWonderful dreams and ideals give\xfffeyou the power to change the world!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIf anyone can, it's you!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000 \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000븉\x0001\x0001Dream your dream!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, pursue the ideals to make that\xfffedream a reality, and someday\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou will achieve all that you dreamed of!\xf000븉\x0001\x0000\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout the Entralink?

texts.original_text: If there is anything you don't\xfffeunderstand, you may ask the girls, too.

texts.original_text: The Entralink is a mysterious place to\xfffeconnect with someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you cross a bridge in the Entralink,\xfffeyou will be able to go to someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere, you should be able to help the\xfffeadventurer in that world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The power stored in this tree is called\xfffePass Power.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can register only one Pass Power in\xfffeyour C-Gear. You use it by aiming at\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople you pass by with the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTag Log.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you need a Pass Orb to use\xfffePass Power.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCarry out a mission in someone else's\xfffeworld and collect Pass Orbs.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, someone showed up...\xfffeWelcome to the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHm?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJudging by the look of you, you don't\xfffeseem to know where you are.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, someone showed up...\xfffeWelcome to the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHm?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJudging by the look of you, you don't\xfffeseem to know where you are.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is an island called the Entralink.\xfffeIt's located in the center of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUnova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Entralink is a mysterious place where\xfffeyou can connect with someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you go to someone's world by passing\xfffethrough this island, you will be able to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemeet an adventurer in the world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This is an island called the Entralink.\xfffeIt's located in the center of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUnova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Entralink is a mysterious place where\xfffeyou can connect with someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you go to someone's world by passing\xfffethrough this island, you will be able to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemeet an adventurer in the world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And you can help that adventurer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes! If you want to help, cross a bridge\xfffein this island and go to someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be someone who is waiting\xfffefor you there!
texts.translated_text: And you can help that adventurer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYes! If you want to help, cross a bridge\xfffein this island and go to someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be someone who is waiting\xfffefor you there!

texts.original_text: This bridge will connect to someone\xfffeelse's world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This bridge will connect to someone\xfffeelse's world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout a connection at a bridge?

texts.original_text: When you are on a bridge, a search will\xfffestart to find a person to connect with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf the bridge connects, you will be able\xfffeto cross into that person's world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: When you are on a bridge, a search will\xfffestart to find a person to connect with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf the bridge connects, you will be able\xfffeto cross into that person's world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This bridge will connect to the world of a\xfffeperson who is having an adventurous\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejourney in a town or on a road\xf000븀\x0000\xfffearound the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you cross the bridge, you will be able\xfffeto help with that person's adventure.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This bridge will connect to the world of a\xfffeperson who is having an adventurous\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejourney in a town or on a road\xf000븀\x0000\xfffearound the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you cross the bridge, you will be able\xfffeto help with that person's adventure.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now, please go to the bridge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it connects to someone else's world,\xfffeyou'll be able to cross.

texts.original_text: This bridge will connect to someone\xfffeelse's world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This bridge will connect to someone\xfffeelse's world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout a connection at a bridge?
texts.translated_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout a connection at a bridge?

texts.original_text: When you are on a bridge, a search will\xfffestart to find a person to connect with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf the bridge connects, you will be able\xfffeto cross into that person's world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: When you are on a bridge, a search will\xfffestart to find a person to connect with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf the bridge connects, you will be able\xfffeto cross into that person's world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This bridge will connect to the world of a\xfffeperson who is having an adventurous\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejourney in a town or on a road\xf000븀\x0000\xfffearound the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you cross the bridge, you will be able\xfffeto help with that person's adventure.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This bridge will connect to the world of a\xfffeperson who is having an adventurous\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejourney in a town or on a road\xf000븀\x0000\xfffearound the Entralink.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you cross the bridge, you will be able\xfffeto help with that person's adventure.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now, please go to the bridge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it connects to someone else's world,\xfffeyou'll be able to cross.
texts.translated_text: Now, please go to the bridge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf it connects to someone else's world,\xfffeyou'll be able to cross.

texts.original_text: The Entree Forest connects dreams\xfffeand reality.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople say dreams come true here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Entree Forest connects dreams\xfffeand reality.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople say dreams come true here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout the Entree Forest?
texts.translated_text: Is there anything you'd like to know\xfffeabout the Entree Forest?

texts.original_text: The Entree Forest is a place where\xfffedreams come true.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a dreaming Pokémon wakes up in\xfffeGame Sync, its dream will come true in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis forest.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Entree Forest is a place where\xfffedreams come true.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a dreaming Pokémon wakes up in\xfffeGame Sync, its dream will come true in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis forest.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Pokémon that your Pokémon met in its\xfffedream will show up in the Entralink\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a Forest Clearing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon in a Forest Clearing will be\xfffeyour friends for sure!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you move the Pokémon to the Deepest\xfffeClearing, they will wait for you there.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Pokémon that your Pokémon met in its\xfffedream will show up in the Entralink\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a Forest Clearing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon in a Forest Clearing will be\xfffeyour friends for sure!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you move the Pokémon to the Deepest\xfffeClearing, they will wait for you there.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When your Pokémon wakes up from a\xfffedream, please come to this forest.

texts.translated_text: To help the adventurer traveling in this\xfffeworld, touch this tree and receive\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea mission.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A mission is a means to help the\xfffeadventurer in this world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you check this tree, you can receive\xfffea mission.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, receive a mission and go find\xfffethe adventurer.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In this world, you can travel by warping\xfffearound, because this world is made of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour dream.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you imagine a place, you can\xfffewarp there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, receive a mission and go find\xfffethe adventurer.\xf000븁\x0000
