texts.original_text: First, cross a bridge in the Entralink,\xfffeand go to someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be someone who is waiting\xfffefor you there.
texts.translated_text: First, cross a bridge in the Entralink,\xfffeand go to someone's world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be someone who is waiting\xfffefor you there.

texts.original_text: You've chosen a mission!\xfffeIn order to accomplish the mission,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego find the adventurer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe adventurer's location is shown on\xfffethe map below.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch the place on the map and you can\xfffewarp there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRely on the map, meet the adventurer,\xfffeand accomplish the mission!
texts.translated_text: You've chosen a mission!\xfffeIn order to accomplish the mission,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego find the adventurer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe adventurer's location is shown on\xfffethe map below.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch the place on the map and you can\xfffewarp there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRely on the map, meet the adventurer,\xfffeand accomplish the mission!

texts.original_text: Wonderful! You accomplished the mission!\xfffeI didn't expect you to make it this far...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour success brought happiness to the\xfffeEntralink, and the tree grew a little bit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMysterious power will gather here as this\xfffetree grows bigger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may be able to receive this power!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch this tree and try to receive the\xfffemysterious power...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePass Power.
texts.translated_text: Wonderful! You accomplished the mission!\xfffeI didn't expect you to make it this far...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour success brought happiness to the\xfffeEntralink, and the tree grew a little bit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMysterious power will gather here as this\xfffetree grows bigger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may be able to receive this power!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch this tree and try to receive the\xfffemysterious power...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePass Power.

texts.original_text: Oh, it seems you've failed in the mission.\xfffeWell, nobody's perfect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease cross the bridge and try it again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe tip is to look at the map closely and\xfffefind the adventurer.
texts.translated_text: Oh, it seems you've failed in the mission.\xfffeWell, nobody's perfect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease cross the bridge and try it again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe tip is to look at the map closely and\xfffefind the adventurer.

texts.original_text: Oooooh! You've received a Pass Power!\xfffeIt's wonderful! Really wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePass Power can help people who\xfffepassed by.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the Tag Log in your\xfffeC-Gear later.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Well, that's really all I can\xfffeteach you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe power of this Entralink is all yours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHelp a lot of adventurers via the\xfffeEntralink, and collect a lot of happiness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCollect a lot of happiness, and get\xfffeall the powers!
texts.translated_text: Oooooh! You've received a Pass Power!\xfffeIt's wonderful! Really wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePass Power can help people who\xfffepassed by.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCheck the Tag Log in your\xfffeC-Gear later.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Well, that's really all I can\xfffeteach you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe power of this Entralink is all yours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHelp a lot of adventurers via the\xfffeEntralink, and collect a lot of happiness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCollect a lot of happiness, and get\xfffeall the powers!

texts.original_text: Hey, le Trainer fantastique! Want to be\xfffepart of the experiment of the century?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou need two DS systems to play with\xfffePoké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you have a second DS system that you\xfffecan use?
texts.translated_text: Hey, le Trainer fantastique! Want to be\xfffepart of the experiment of the century?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou need two DS systems to play with\xfffePoké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you have a second DS system that you\xfffecan use?

texts.original_text: If you decide that you want to play with\xfffePoké Transfer sometime, you're welcome\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto come back and ask me.
texts.translated_text: If you decide that you want to play with\xfffePoké Transfer sometime, you're welcome\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto come back and ask me.

texts.original_text: I'm sorry! Sumimasen! But you don't have\xfffeenough space in your PC Box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease make room for six Pokémon and\xfffetry again.
texts.translated_text: I'm sorry! Sumimasen! But you don't have\xfffeenough space in your PC Box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease make room for six Pokémon and\xfffetry again.

texts.original_text: OK! But just remember! ¡Muy importante!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you bring a Pokémon here, you can't\xfffesend it back. Do you still want to do it?
texts.translated_text: OK! But just remember! ¡Muy importante!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce you bring a Pokémon here, you can't\xfffesend it back. Do you still want to do it?

texts.original_text: DS Wireless Communications will\xfffebe launched.
texts.translated_text: DS Wireless Communications will\xfffebe launched.

texts.original_text: OK, OK. Come here. Stand right there!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: OK, OK. Come here. Stand right there!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, let's begin! Allons-y!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Well, let's begin! Allons-y!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Great! Molto bene!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Great! Molto bene!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're just as skillful as I expected!\xfffePoké Transfer is working!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you can't fool me!\xfffeI bet you can do even better than this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer of your caliber can make\xfffereally good use of Poké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You're just as skillful as I expected!\xfffePoké Transfer is working!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you can't fool me!\xfffeI bet you can do even better than this.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer of your caliber can make\xfffereally good use of Poké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wunderbar! Magnifique! Brilliant!\xfffeYour skill is impressive!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the very reason why we scientists\xfffeare doing research!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! I think a Trainer with\xfffeyour experience can make use of it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeven more elegantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease master your genius handling of\xfffePoké Transfer, and show us how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit's done!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wunderbar! Magnifique! Brilliant!\xfffeYour skill is impressive!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the very reason why we scientists\xfffeare doing research!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! I think a Trainer with\xfffeyour experience can make use of it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeven more elegantly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease master your genius handling of\xfffePoké Transfer, and show us how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit's done!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Great! Greeeeeeat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePoké Transfer is making\xfffetremendous progress!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, it's unbelievable! ¡Es gigante!\xfffeI owe everything to you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease assist our research in the\xfffefuture, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease feel free to use Poké Transfer\xfffeanytime you want!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Great! Greeeeeeat!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePoké Transfer is making\xfffetremendous progress!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, it's unbelievable! ¡Es gigante!\xfffeI owe everything to you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease assist our research in the\xfffefuture, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease feel free to use Poké Transfer\xfffeanytime you want!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ohhhhhhhh.\xfffeAny moment! Any moment!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePoké Transfer is only one step away\xfffefrom going down in history as a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefantastic invention!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: W-w-what? You!\xfffeYou have all the Gym Badges?!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Great!\xfffeYou may be able to...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Great!\xfffeYou may be able to...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Paaaaaark!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Paaaaaark!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, there you are!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I have told you many times.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis invention is great indeed, but\xfffewithout a professional Trainer...\xf000븁\x0000

Are you willing to\xfffeparticipate in an ambitious experiment\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat will make history?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis device is called Poké Transfer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt connects...blah blah blah...\xfffe...called DS system...meanwhile...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...blah blah...of molecules...and then...\xfffe...while evoking...blah blah...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...ergo, energy particles will...\xfffe...blah blah...and if the frequency...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...as you see...with faraway Pokémon...\xfffe...the Alpha waves...blah blah...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...following which...reach convergence...\xfffe...blah blah...spectacular results!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: To put it more simply, if you use this\xfffedevice, you may be able to bring Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehere from other regions.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut just for safety's sake, the Pokémon\xfffeyou're transferring shouldn't be holding\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeanything! texts.original_text: You are a fantastic Pokémon Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you participate in the great\xfffeexperiment of the century?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou need two DS systems to use\xfffePoké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will conduct the experiment with\xfffeanother DS. Is that OK?
texts.translated_text: You are a fantastic Pokémon Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you participate in the great\xfffeexperiment of the century?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou need two DS systems to use\xfffePoké Transfer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe will conduct the experiment with\xfffeanother DS. Is that OK?

texts.original_text: Your Pokémon can't be holding items when\xfffeyou transfer them. It's safer that way.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn rare cases, there are Pokémon that\xfffecannot be transferred, but\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeProfessor Park will explain it to you.
texts.translated_text: Your Pokémon can't be holding items when\xfffeyou transfer them. It's safer that way.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn rare cases, there are Pokémon that\xfffecannot be transferred, but\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeProfessor Park will explain it to you.

texts.original_text: With this research of mine, I also want to\xfffehave an impact on people in the future...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople living 100 or 200 years from now!
texts.translated_text: With this research of mine, I also want to\xfffehave an impact on people in the future...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepeople living 100 or 200 years from now!

texts.original_text: Here, we are monitoring Poké Transfer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're keeping a careful eye to make sure\xfffeall the Pokémon have safe travels!
texts.translated_text: Here, we are monitoring Poké Transfer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're keeping a careful eye to make sure\xfffeall the Pokémon have safe travels!

texts.original_text: My name is Loblolly.\xfffeI'm a designer of Décor items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'm stuck now... I just can't come\xfffeup with a good design.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been thinking about Décor\xfffeso great that it will appear in a dream...
texts.translated_text: My name is Loblolly.\xfffeI'm a designer of Décor items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'm stuck now... I just can't come\xfffeup with a good design.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been thinking about Décor\xfffeso great that it will appear in a dream...

texts.original_text: Loblolly: Hmmm... I still can't think of a\xfffegreat new Décor item.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you come back again?
texts.translated_text: Loblolly: Hmmm... I still can't think of a\xfffegreat new Décor item.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you come back again?

texts.original_text: Loblolly: When I come up with some good\xfffedesigns, please help me again!
texts.translated_text: Loblolly: When I come up with some good\xfffedesigns, please help me again!

texts.original_text: Loblolly: I finally came up with some new\xfffedesigns. I'm really proud of them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'd like your opinion! Look at these\xfffeDécor items and tell me which one you'd\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedream about!
texts.translated_text: Loblolly: I finally came up with some new\xfffedesigns. I'm really proud of them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'd like your opinion! Look at these\xfffeDécor items and tell me which one you'd\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedream about!

texts.original_text: I think I've finally designed Décor\xfffeitems so great that people will dream\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere! Which one would you dream about?
texts.translated_text: I think I've finally designed Décor\xfffeitems so great that people will dream\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout them!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere! Which one would you dream about?

texts.original_text: Loblolly: Oh, are you going to help me\xfffewith my dream Décor design?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGreat! Which of these Décor items would\xfffeyou dream about?
texts.translated_text: Loblolly: Oh, are you going to help me\xfffewith my dream Décor design?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGreat! Which of these Décor items would\xfffeyou dream about?

texts.original_text: Well, if you'd like to give me your opinion\xfffeon my dream Décor, please come back!
texts.translated_text: Well, if you'd like to give me your opinion\xfffeon my dream Décor, please come back!

texts.original_text: Oh, you have impeccable taste!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's it. This Décor is so great that\xfffepeople will dream about it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour advice was very helpful. Next time I\xfffecome up with great designs, I'd love to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebounce my ideas off you again!
texts.translated_text: Oh, you have impeccable taste!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's it. This Décor is so great that\xfffepeople will dream about it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour advice was very helpful. Next time I\xfffecome up with great designs, I'd love to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebounce my ideas off you again!

texts.original_text: Everybody is talking about Décor\xfffethey dream about. Do you know it?
texts.translated_text: Everybody is talking about Décor\xfffethey dream about. Do you know it?

texts.original_text: Hello! My name is Loblolly, and I'm\xfffea Décor designer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am trying to design Décor items that\xfffeeverybody loves and dreams about.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTables and chairs so great you can't\xfffestop thinking about them, even in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour sleep...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the kind of Décor I'm\xfffetalking about.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hello! My name is Loblolly, and I'm\xfffea Décor designer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am trying to design Décor items that\xfffeeverybody loves and dreams about.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTables and chairs so great you can't\xfffestop thinking about them, even in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyour sleep...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the kind of Décor I'm\xfffetalking about.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cancel
texts.translated_text: Cancel

texts.original_text: Oh! I was looking for a Pass Orb, and I\xfffesomehow ended up here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are often found at the entrance of\xfffea Pokémon Center, though.
texts.translated_text: Oh! I was looking for a Pass Orb, and I\xfffesomehow ended up here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are often found at the entrance of\xfffea Pokémon Center, though.

texts.original_text: Hey! When I looked at myself, I noticed\xfffeI've become an Infielder!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHow did this happen?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever shall I do?\xfffeI have to go to school soon!
texts.translated_text: Hey! When I looked at myself, I noticed\xfffeI've become an Infielder!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHow did this happen?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever shall I do?\xfffeI have to go to school soon!

texts.original_text: Pass Orbs are often found under\xfffesignboards of cities or towns!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...But where am I?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I passed under a signboard,\xfffeeverybody disappeared.
texts.translated_text: Pass Orbs are often found under\xfffesignboards of cities or towns!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...But where am I?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I passed under a signboard,\xfffeeverybody disappeared.

texts.original_text: People say Pass Orbs are created by\xfffefeelings of gratitude!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey say the orbs will pour out if you\xfffehelp someone!
texts.translated_text: People say Pass Orbs are created by\xfffefeelings of gratitude!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey say the orbs will pour out if you\xfffehelp someone!

texts.original_text: W-what? We came here to watch\xfffethe airplanes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy did everyone disappear?\xfffeYoo-hoo, anybody here?
texts.translated_text: W-what? We came here to watch\xfffethe airplanes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy did everyone disappear?\xfffeYoo-hoo, anybody here?

texts.original_text: Wow! I've become a Pilot!\xfffeIt was my dream to be a Pilot!
texts.translated_text: Wow! I've become a Pilot!\xfffeIt was my dream to be a Pilot!

texts.original_text: Back home, I'm a boy.\xfffeBut when I looked at a mirror earlier...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Why did I become like this?!\xfffeIs this also a power of the Entralink?
texts.translated_text: Back home, I'm a boy.\xfffeBut when I looked at a mirror earlier...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Why did I become like this?!\xfffeIs this also a power of the Entralink?

texts.original_text: Hmmm. I came back here again.\xfffeI was fast asleep until a while ago.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe this is a dream world.\xfffeA dream world is always black and white.
texts.translated_text: Hmmm. I came back here again.\xfffeI was fast asleep until a while ago.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe this is a dream world.\xfffeA dream world is always black and white.

texts.original_text: There must be a reason why the\xfffelandscape of Unova forms a circle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was researching each area thinking\xfffeabout that, and I ended up here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhere am I?
texts.translated_text: There must be a reason why the\xfffelandscape of Unova forms a circle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was researching each area thinking\xfffeabout that, and I ended up here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhere am I?

texts.original_text: People say the Entree Forest was much\xfffebigger in the past, and people were able\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto use various Pass Powers.
texts.translated_text: People say the Entree Forest was much\xfffebigger in the past, and people were able\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto use various Pass Powers.

texts.original_text: Leo: Oh, I'm moving to Black City!\xfffeThe excitement of the city is waiting\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor me!
texts.translated_text: Leo: Oh, I'm moving to Black City!\xfffeThe excitement of the city is waiting\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor me!

texts.original_text: Leo: White Forest has a lot of nice\xfffeplaces too, but...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm bored with the lack of things to do!
texts.translated_text: Leo: White Forest has a lot of nice\xfffeplaces too, but...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm bored with the lack of things to do!

texts.original_text: Leo: There are a lot of nice things about\xfffeWhite Forest, but I'm craving the bright\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelights of the big city!
texts.translated_text: Leo: There are a lot of nice things about\xfffeWhite Forest, but I'm craving the bright\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelights of the big city!

texts.original_text: Leo: The place for a person craving\xfffeexcitement, like me, is Black City!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWould you mind taking me with you?
texts.translated_text: Leo: The place for a person craving\xfffeexcitement, like me, is Black City!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWould you mind taking me with you?

texts.original_text: Really! No good, huh? Well, I'll be here if\xfffeyou change your mind.
texts.translated_text: Really! No good, huh? Well, I'll be here if\xfffeyou change your mind.

texts.original_text: Oh, sorry! I got an invitation\xfffefrom somewhere else.
texts.translated_text: Oh, sorry! I got an invitation\xfffefrom somewhere else.

texts.original_text: What? Really?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's great! New excitement\xfffeis waiting for me!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll be waiting in Black City, OK?
texts.translated_text: What? Really?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's great! New excitement\xfffeis waiting for me!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll be waiting in Black City, OK?

texts.original_text: Silvia: I'm going to get out of this\xffferut and move to Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm looking forward to the\xfffebig-city atmosphere.
texts.translated_text: Silvia: I'm going to get out of this\xffferut and move to Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm looking forward to the\xfffebig-city atmosphere.

texts.original_text: Silvia: A new life in a new place, far away\xfffefrom everything you know!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's something every girl longs for.
texts.translated_text: Silvia: A new life in a new place, far away\xfffefrom everything you know!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's something every girl longs for.

texts.original_text: Silvia: Girls all pine for the big city!
texts.translated_text: Silvia: Girls all pine for the big city!

texts.original_text: Silvia: A new life in a new place, far away\xfffefrom everything I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, the one reflecting in my glasses,\xfffetake me to Black City!
texts.translated_text: Silvia: A new life in a new place, far away\xfffefrom everything I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou, the one reflecting in my glasses,\xfffetake me to Black City!

texts.original_text: So it's not going to work out? I'd sure\xfffelike it if you'd take me along, though...
texts.translated_text: So it's not going to work out? I'd sure\xfffelike it if you'd take me along, though...

texts.original_text: I'm sorry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like my glinting glasses caught\xfffesomeone else's eye!
texts.translated_text: I'm sorry!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like my glinting glasses caught\xfffesomeone else's eye!

texts.original_text: That someone who was reflected in my\xfffeglasses is you!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll be waiting in Black City!
texts.translated_text: That someone who was reflected in my\xfffeglasses is you!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll be waiting in Black City!

texts.original_text: Dave: Hey, sorry, yo!\xfffeI'm movin' to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone's got a place\xfffethey're headin', right?
texts.translated_text: Dave: Hey, sorry, yo!\xfffeI'm movin' to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone's got a place\xfffethey're headin', right?

texts.original_text: Dave: Wish I had someone 'round to drag\xfffeme along. Man, I want to go to Black City.
texts.translated_text: Dave: Wish I had someone 'round to drag\xfffeme along. Man, I want to go to Black City.

texts.original_text: Dave: That Black City sure is\xfffeshinin' bright.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to go there too.
texts.translated_text: Dave: That Black City sure is\xfffeshinin' bright.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to go there too.

texts.original_text: Dave: Nobody's 'round to drag me along.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, why don'tcha take me to Black City?
texts.translated_text: Dave: Nobody's 'round to drag me along.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, why don'tcha take me to Black City?

texts.original_text: So that's it, huh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust you watch. I'll make myself into the\xfffekind of guy you want to take along.
texts.translated_text: So that's it, huh...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust you watch. I'll make myself into the\xfffekind of guy you want to take along.

texts.original_text: Hey, sorry, yo. Someone else\xfffeasked me to go.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeInvite me again sometime.
texts.translated_text: Hey, sorry, yo. Someone else\xfffeasked me to go.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeInvite me again sometime.

texts.original_text: Thanks, yo! This Roughneck is going to be\xfffethe head of Black City!
texts.translated_text: Thanks, yo! This Roughneck is going to be\xfffethe head of Black City!

texts.original_text: Britney: I've done decided to\xfffehead over to the city!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe laid-back livin' is\xfffeover fer now!
texts.translated_text: Britney: I've done decided to\xfffehead over to the city!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe laid-back livin' is\xfffeover fer now!

texts.original_text: Britney: Windin' down sure is nice, but\xfffeI like freewheelin' in the big city too!
texts.translated_text: Britney: Windin' down sure is nice, but\xfffeI like freewheelin' in the big city too!

texts.original_text: Britney: Black City...\xfffeThat's where I wanna be!
texts.translated_text: Britney: Black City...\xfffeThat's where I wanna be!

texts.original_text: Britney: Won't somebody take\xfffeme to Black City?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey there! I'd be much obliged if\xfffeyou could take me to Black City...
texts.translated_text: Britney: Won't somebody take\xfffeme to Black City?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey there! I'd be much obliged if\xfffeyou could take me to Black City...

texts.original_text: Now, whyever not?!\xfffeWell, take me next time, OK?
texts.translated_text: Now, whyever not?!\xfffeWell, take me next time, OK?

texts.original_text: Oh, I'm sorry!\xfffeSomeone else done invited me!
texts.translated_text: Oh, I'm sorry!\xfffeSomeone else done invited me!

texts.original_text: Thankee!\xfffeI'll go on ahead to the city!
texts.translated_text: Thankee!\xfffeI'll go on ahead to the city!

texts.original_text: Robbie: Guess what? I'm moving to\xfffeBlack City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWithout biiig buildings around, it's hard\xfffeto settle in, right?!
texts.translated_text: Robbie: Guess what? I'm moving to\xfffeBlack City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWithout biiig buildings around, it's hard\xfffeto settle in, right?!

texts.original_text: Robbie: Aaah! Boooring! I'm so bored!\xfffeI sure want to go to Black City!
texts.translated_text: Robbie: Aaah! Boooring! I'm so bored!\xfffeI sure want to go to Black City!

texts.original_text: Robbie: Hey! Over there!\xfffeBlack City looks like so much fun.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI sure wish I could go!
texts.translated_text: Robbie: Hey! Over there!\xfffeBlack City looks like so much fun.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI sure wish I could go!

texts.original_text: Robbie: Aaah! Boooring! I'm so bored!\xfffeI sure want to go to Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've got it! You can take me with\xfffeyou! Come on!
texts.translated_text: Robbie: Aaah! Boooring! I'm so bored!\xfffeI sure want to go to Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've got it! You can take me with\xfffeyou! Come on!

texts.original_text: Robbie: Aww. Why not?\xfffeWell, if you change your mind...
texts.translated_text: Robbie: Aww. Why not?\xfffeWell, if you change your mind...

texts.original_text: Oh! I'm sorry!!\xfffeI'm going to someone else's place.
texts.translated_text: Oh! I'm sorry!!\xfffeI'm going to someone else's place.

texts.original_text: Thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm heading to Black City now.\xfffeSee you there!
texts.translated_text: Thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm heading to Black City now.\xfffeSee you there!

texts.original_text: Miki: I decided to go to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a little laid back, so I'm worried\xfffeI won't fit in.
texts.translated_text: Miki: I decided to go to Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a little laid back, so I'm worried\xfffeI won't fit in.

texts.original_text: Miki: It's comfortable here, but I\xfffecould use a little more excitement.
texts.translated_text: Miki: It's comfortable here, but I\xfffecould use a little more excitement.

texts.original_text: Miki: Black City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSounds like fun, doesn't it?\xfffeIf I had the chance, I'd sure love to go.
texts.translated_text: Miki: Black City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSounds like fun, doesn't it?\xfffeIf I had the chance, I'd sure love to go.

texts.original_text: Silvia: All girls fall in love with\xfffebig, natural places!

texts.original_text: That someone who was\xfffereflected in my glasses is you!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll be waiting in White Forest!

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Now that everyone's\xfffehere, I'll explain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokédex's pages update automatically\xfffewhenever you meet a Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMoreover, it's set up so that\xfffeyou obtain even more information\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen you catch a Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo make this clear, I'm going to\xfffedemonstrate how to catch a Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Did you see that,\xfffejust now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere's how it goes, step by step.\xfffeFirst, reduce the Pokémon's HP!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon that still have all of\xfffetheir energy are difficult to catch.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you can, use your Pokémon's moves to\xfffemake the Pokémon you want to catch\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefall asleep. texts.translated_text: Pokémon Day Care\xfffeWe Take Care of Your Precious Pokémon

texts.original_text: I happen to be the daughter of the\xfffecouple running the Pokémon Day Care\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenext door!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know, it's sweet, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeParents and daughter all bringing up\xfffeyoungsters for a living.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHelping Pokémon and people grow up\xfffehealthy is a wonderful thing!
texts.translated_text: I happen to be the daughter of the\xfffecouple running the Pokémon Day Care\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenext door!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know, it's sweet, isn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeParents and daughter all bringing up\xfffeyoungsters for a living.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHelping Pokémon and people grow up\xfffehealthy is a wonderful thing!

texts.original_text: Are you familiar with Double Battles?
texts.translated_text: Are you familiar with Double Battles?

texts.original_text: Oh, I do love explaining how things work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, a Double Battle is a Pokémon battle\xfffewith two Pokémon on each side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChoosing two that combine well is vital.
texts.translated_text: Oh, I do love explaining how things work.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, a Double Battle is a Pokémon battle\xfffewith two Pokémon on each side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChoosing two that combine well is vital.

texts.original_text: You do have a Gym Badge, after all.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're well aware that Double Battles\xfffeare Pokémon battles where each side\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuses two Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: You do have a Gym Badge, after all.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're well aware that Double Battles\xfffeare Pokémon battles where each side\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuses two Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Seriously. Guys are all just little boys.
texts.translated_text: Seriously. Guys are all just little boys.

texts.original_text: Yeah! Yeah!
texts.translated_text: Yeah! Yeah!

texts.original_text: Rrrraaaaar!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll run! You gonna chase me? \xfffeYou run! Am I gonna chase you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChange your perspective--\xfffeand the reality changes.
texts.translated_text: Rrrraaaaar!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll run! You gonna chase me? \xfffeYou run! Am I gonna chase you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeChange your perspective--\xfffeand the reality changes.

texts.original_text: Cheren: So, there were more of them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, why are Pokémon robbers\xfffeacting so self-righteous?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: So, there were more of them...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, why are Pokémon robbers\xfffeacting so self-righteous?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe've been friends our whole lives.\xfffeWe've got each other's back when it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecounts. Let's show them how it's done!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe've been friends our whole lives.\xfffeWe've got each other's back when it\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecounts. Let's show them how it's done!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: In order to liberate\xfffePokémon from foolish people,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe will take their Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: In order to liberate\xfffePokémon from foolish people,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe will take their Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Whatever...\xfffeWhat a waste of time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on, what reason could possibly\xfffejustify stealing Pokémon from people?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Whatever...\xfffeWhat a waste of time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on, what reason could possibly\xfffejustify stealing Pokémon from people?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Pokémon Trainers\xfffelike you are making Pokémon suffer...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Pokémon Trainers\xfffelike you are making Pokémon suffer...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: What do you mean, Trainers are\xfffemaking Pokémon suffer?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI don't get that at all!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: What do you mean, Trainers are\xfffemaking Pokémon suffer?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI don't get that at all!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: We'll give you back\xfffethe Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut be aware of how this Pokémon suffers\xfffefrom being used by people.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: We'll give you back\xfffethe Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut be aware of how this Pokémon suffers\xfffefrom being used by people.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Team Plasma: Someday, open your eyes\xfffeto your own complicity.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Team Plasma: Someday, open your eyes\xfffeto your own complicity.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Trainers bring out\xfffetheir Pokémon's strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon believe in their\xfffeTrainers and respond to that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand what about\xfffethat makes Pokémon suffer!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Trainers bring out\xfffetheir Pokémon's strength.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon believe in their\xfffeTrainers and respond to that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't understand what about\xfffethat makes Pokémon suffer!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeI'll return the Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: OK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeI'll return the Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey! Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is a bit of a problem up ahead.\xfffeSorry, but you can't pass now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should go kill some time by\xfffechallenging the Castelia City Gym!
texts.translated_text: Hey! Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is a bit of a problem up ahead.\xfffeSorry, but you can't pass now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should go kill some time by\xfffechallenging the Castelia City Gym!

texts.original_text: Hey! Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is a bit of a problem up ahead.\xfffeSorry, but you can't pass now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should go kill some time by\xfffechallenging the Castelia City Gym!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Deep in the desert ahead of here,\xfffeat the Desert Resort,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere are some ruins that have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecome a little tourist destination!
texts.translated_text: Deep in the desert ahead of here,\xfffeat the Desert Resort,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere are some ruins that have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecome a little tourist destination!

texts.original_text: Cheren: I believe it would be wise for me\xfffeto catch some Ground-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr perhaps I should strengthen my\xfffePokémon. What's my best path forward?
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I believe it would be wise for me\xfffeto catch some Ground-type Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr perhaps I should strengthen my\xfffePokémon. What's my best path forward?

texts.original_text: Cheren: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been waiting for you to get\xfffethe Insect Badge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now it's time to see which one of us\xfffeis the stronger Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been waiting for you to get\xfffethe Insect Badge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now it's time to see which one of us\xfffeis the stronger Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: It's now clear to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reason you are so tough is the trust\xfffebetween you and your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut...that shouldn't be a problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can get more out of \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffeand my other Pokémon, too.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: It's now clear to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe reason you are so tough is the trust\xfffebetween you and your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut...that shouldn't be a problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can get more out of \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffeand my other Pokémon, too.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Xtransceiver is ringing.
texts.translated_text: The Xtransceiver is ringing.

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 picked up the Xtransceiver.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 picked up the Xtransceiver.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Nimbasa City's gate is\xfffestraight down Route 4.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Nimbasa City's gate is\xfffestraight down Route 4.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When I look at the freeway,\xfffeI feel exhilarated!
texts.translated_text: When I look at the freeway,\xfffeI feel exhilarated!

texts.original_text: Ruins buried in the desert...\xfffeIt's like a grand adventure in a story.
texts.translated_text: Ruins buried in the desert...\xfffeIt's like a grand adventure in a story.

texts.original_text: Oh! Trainer, take a look at the sand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you see how some areas are lighter?\xfffeAnd some of the sand looks...darker...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are hiding in the darker sand!
texts.translated_text: Oh! Trainer, take a look at the sand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you see how some areas are lighter?\xfffeAnd some of the sand looks...darker...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon are hiding in the darker sand!

texts.original_text: Route 4
texts.translated_text: Route 4

texts.original_text: Trainer Tips!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xfffePokémon have a source of energy\xfffefor using moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's called PP, meaning Power Points.\xfffeThey have PP for each move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a move has no PP remaining,\xfffethat Pokémon cannot use that move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's a good time to head for\xfffethe Pokémon Center!
texts.translated_text: Trainer Tips!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xfffePokémon have a source of energy\xfffefor using moves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's called PP, meaning Power Points.\xfffeThey have PP for each move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a move has no PP remaining,\xfffethat Pokémon cannot use that move.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's a good time to head for\xfffethe Pokémon Center!

texts.original_text: Tired Workers should head\xfffeto the prefab house by Castelia City!
texts.translated_text: Tired Workers should head\xfffeto the prefab house by Castelia City!

texts.original_text: If you are that full of energy, you can\xfffego anywhere, even in a sandstorm!
texts.translated_text: If you are that full of energy, you can\xfffego anywhere, even in a sandstorm!

texts.original_text: What? Are you worn out?\xfffeOK! Then rest here for a minute!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: What? Are you worn out?\xfffeOK! Then rest here for a minute!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Glugluglug!
texts.translated_text: Glugluglug!

texts.original_text: Sandstorms are terrible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut Rock-type, Ground-type, and\xfffeSteel-type Pokémon can weather\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Sandstorm without damage.
texts.translated_text: Sandstorms are terrible!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut Rock-type, Ground-type, and\xfffeSteel-type Pokémon can weather\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea Sandstorm without damage.

texts.original_text: I don't mean to brag, but I'm a Dig pro!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you this TM so you can\xfffeuse it, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I don't mean to brag, but I'm a Dig pro!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll give you this TM so you can\xfffeuse it, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Using Dig in a cave takes you back to\xfffethe entrance instantly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you think of that? Amazing, eh?\xfffeBe sure to Dig and Dig some more!
texts.translated_text: Using Dig in a cave takes you back to\xfffethe entrance instantly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you think of that? Amazing, eh?\xfffeBe sure to Dig and Dig some more!

texts.original_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, stop!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've got a Bolt Badge...\xfffeI've got a Bolt Badge...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's test who's stronger--you or me!\xfffeThis time, I'm going to win!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, stop!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've got a Bolt Badge...\xfffeI've got a Bolt Badge...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's test who's stronger--you or me!\xfffeThis time, I'm going to win!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Why?\xfffeWhy can't I beat you?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Why?\xfffeWhy can't I beat you?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: Oh, you two are friends...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's nice, how you're helping each\xfffeother get better by competing.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Oh, you two are friends...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's nice, how you're helping each\xfffeother get better by competing.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK, let's go.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: OK, let's go.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ???: Oh!\xfffeWhy, if it isn't Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ???: Oh!\xfffeWhy, if it isn't Elesa!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ???: Aren't festivals grand?\xfffeLife should be enjoyed!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ???: Aren't festivals grand?\xfffeLife should be enjoyed!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Who is this man?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Who is this man?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: This is Alder,\xfffethe Unova region's Champion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: This is Alder,\xfffethe Unova region's Champion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Champion?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy would the Champion be\xfffegoofing off in a place like this?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Champion?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy would the Champion be\xfffegoofing off in a place like this?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: I heard that remark.\xfffeYou're quite a judgmental young person,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare you not?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy name is Alder. I'm the Unova\xfffePokémon League's Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePleased to make your acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor your information, I'm not\xfffegoofing off. I'm on a voyage.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI know every corner of Unova.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: I heard that remark.\xfffeYou're quite a judgmental young person,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare you not?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy name is Alder. I'm the Unova\xfffePokémon League's Champion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePleased to make your acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor your information, I'm not\xfffegoofing off. I'm on a voyage.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI know every corner of Unova.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Um. I'm Cheren, from\xfffeNuvema Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy goal as a Trainer is to\xfffebecome the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Um. I'm Cheren, from\xfffeNuvema Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy goal as a Trainer is to\xfffebecome the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Hm. Traveling with a goal in mind\xfffeis a commendable thing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd what do you plan to do\xfffeafter becoming the Champion?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Hm. Traveling with a goal in mind\xfffeis a commendable thing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd what do you plan to do\xfffeafter becoming the Champion?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: What else is there other than\xfffestriving to become stronger?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe strongest Trainer--\xfffethat's the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: What else is there other than\xfffestriving to become stronger?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe strongest Trainer--\xfffethat's the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Hmm. Becoming stronger...\xfffeBecoming stronger, you say...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIs that alone enough of a goal? Hmmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's not that I'm trying to say your way\xfffeof thinking is wrong...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Hmm. Becoming stronger...\xfffeBecoming stronger, you say...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIs that alone enough of a goal? Hmmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's not that I'm trying to say your way\xfffeof thinking is wrong...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In my travels, I've helped many people\xfffelearn to love Pokémon. I think that's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeimportant, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you play with those children,\xfffeyou might gain more of an understanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you two have a Pokémon battle\xfffewith those two?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In my travels, I've helped many people\xfffelearn to love Pokémon. I think that's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeimportant, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you play with those children,\xfffeyou might gain more of an understanding.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWill you two have a Pokémon battle\xfffewith those two?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey, you two. Come\xfffehere for a moment.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hey, you two. Come\xfffehere for a moment.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: ...Understood.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, before that...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: ...Understood.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, before that...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren fully healed \xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: Cheren fully healed \xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Cheren: OK, let's battle.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: OK, let's battle.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: Nicely done! You didn't win, but\xfffethat was a good battle. Your Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelooked like they were having fun.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Alder: Nicely done! You didn't win, but\xfffethat was a good battle. Your Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelooked like they were having fun.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Young man, if there are people\xfffelike you who pursue strength,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere are also people who are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehappy just being with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are many different people\xfffeand many different answers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it comes to what a Champion\xfffeshould be, you and I may hold differing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeviews, but so be it! Give it some thought.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Young man, if there are people\xfffelike you who pursue strength,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethere are also people who are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehappy just being with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are many different people\xfffeand many different answers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it comes to what a Champion\xfffeshould be, you and I may hold differing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeviews, but so be it! Give it some thought.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Alder: It's tremendous that people and\xfffePokémon, each so different, can\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeacknowledge each other and be together!
texts.translated_text: Alder: It's tremendous that people and\xfffePokémon, each so different, can\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeacknowledge each other and be together!

texts.original_text: Alder is so strong!\xfffeAnd he's nice to Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: Alder is so strong!\xfffeAnd he's nice to Pokémon!

texts.original_text: I was scared of Pokémon, but Alder\xfffetaught me that they're nice and friendly.
texts.translated_text: I was scared of Pokémon, but Alder\xfffetaught me that they're nice and friendly.

texts.original_text: Elesa: Let's roll.\xfffeThe Driftveil Drawbridge is just ahead.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Let's roll.\xfffeThe Driftveil Drawbridge is just ahead.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: The Champion is the strongest\xfffeof the strong! That's all there is to it.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: The Champion is the strongest\xfffeof the strong! That's all there is to it.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: This way.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: This way.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: Now to contact him...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Now to contact him...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's me, Elesa.\xfffePlease lower the drawbridge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a couple of Trainers here\xfffewho want to challenge you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK...\xfffeThanks.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It's me, Elesa.\xfffePlease lower the drawbridge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a couple of Trainers here\xfffewho want to challenge you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK...\xfffeThanks.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Now, watch this!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Now, watch this!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Elesa: I have a TV gig, so I've got to go.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Gym Leader of the next town\xfffemay take some getting used to...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDo your best, both of you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Elesa: I have a TV gig, so I've got to go.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Gym Leader of the next town\xfffemay take some getting used to...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDo your best, both of you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: What I am is a Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI prove I'm right by getting stronger\xfffeand winning in battle--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeven against the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: What I am is a Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI prove I'm right by getting stronger\xfffeand winning in battle--\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeven against the Champion.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Excuse me!\xfffePlease stop right there!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Excuse me!\xfffePlease stop right there!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The drawbridge is raised right now\xfffeso ships can pass. You can't cross.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you make a request to Driftveil's Gym\xfffeLeader, Clay, he could... Well, I'm not\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesure how you'd reach him over there...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you talk to Nimbasa City's Gym Leader,\xfffeElesa, she might be able to do something.
texts.translated_text: The drawbridge is raised right now\xfffeso ships can pass. You can't cross.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you make a request to Driftveil's Gym\xfffeLeader, Clay, he could... texts.original_text: A bridge would be meaningless\xfffeif no one ever crossed it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBridges connect the world...\xfffeThat's as solid as a symbol can get.
texts.translated_text: A bridge would be meaningless\xfffeif no one ever crossed it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBridges connect the world...\xfffeThat's as solid as a symbol can get.

texts.original_text: Hum fiercely! My battle song!\xfffeBattle fiercely! My Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hum fiercely! My battle song!\xfffeBattle fiercely! My Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In battling you, I came to understand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're the best!\xfffeHere! This is for you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In battling you, I came to understand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're the best!\xfffeHere! This is for you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you want your Pokémon to\xfffehold this Electric Guitar,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego to the Musical Theater!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCooler than cool!
texts.translated_text: If you want your Pokémon to\xfffehold this Electric Guitar,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego to the Musical Theater!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCooler than cool!

texts.original_text: Cheren: Strength and strength alone\xfffeis what matters in this world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I believed, until I met Alder here.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Strength and strength alone\xfffeis what matters in this world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I believed, until I met Alder here.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, winning in Pokémon battles\xfffeisn't all there is to life.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce I learned that lesson, my eyes\xfffewere opened to many different things.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: But, winning in Pokémon battles\xfffeisn't all there is to life.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOnce I learned that lesson, my eyes\xfffewere opened to many different things.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: We all have our own brand of strength,\xfffepeople and Pokémon both.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe strength to make our dreams\xfffea reality, the strength to protect\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat we hold most dear...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We all have our own brand of strength,\xfffepeople and Pokémon both.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe strength to make our dreams\xfffea reality, the strength to protect\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhat we hold most dear...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Why do I think this way now?\xfffeIt's thanks to you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd Bianca...\xfffeAnd Alder...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf only N could see this, too, someday.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Why do I think this way now?\xfffeIt's thanks to you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd Bianca...\xfffeAnd Alder...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf only N could see this, too, someday.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm going to take a long, hard look\xfffeat myself on Victory Road.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to think about what I can do\xfffeand who I can become...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVisit me sometime, if you want.\xfffeWe'll have a battle like old times.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokémon and the performers\xfffeall have amazing moves!
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon and the performers\xfffeall have amazing moves!

texts.original_text: I think being able to make people\xfffesmile is a super-awesome talent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why Pokémon are so awesome!\xfffeBecause they can make you smile!
texts.translated_text: I think being able to make people\xfffesmile is a super-awesome talent!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why Pokémon are so awesome!\xfffeBecause they can make you smile!

texts.original_text: Here on Route 6, there's a place called\xfffeMistralton Cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSupposedly, deep in that cave you can\xfffefind an amazing Pokémon called Cobalion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewho was said to have protected Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom a sea of fire in ancient Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you can use a move called Surf\xfffethat lets you move over the water's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesurface, maybe you can see Cobalion.
texts.translated_text: Here on Route 6, there's a place called\xfffeMistralton Cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSupposedly, deep in that cave you can\xfffefind an amazing Pokémon called Cobalion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewho was said to have protected Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom a sea of fire in ancient Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you can use a move called Surf\xfffethat lets you move over the water's\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesurface, maybe you can see Cobalion.

texts.original_text: I've heard that there are also Pokémon\xfffethat should be called Cobalion's allies.
texts.translated_text: I've heard that there are also Pokémon\xfffethat should be called Cobalion's allies.

texts.original_text: Now what should I do?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe entrance to Chargestone Cave,\xfffejust ahead, is blocked off.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's because of a Pokémon called\xfffeGalvantula, and if I don't ask Clay\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto do something, there's no way to pass.

texts.original_text: Researching the Year's Seasons:\xfffeThe Season Research Lab
texts.translated_text: Researching the Year's Seasons:\xfffeThe Season Research Lab

texts.original_text: This is the Season Research Lab.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTwist Mountain, just beyond Mistralton,\xfffehas snow, depending on the season.
texts.translated_text: This is the Season Research Lab.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTwist Mountain, just beyond Mistralton,\xfffehas snow, depending on the season.

texts.original_text: Some Pokémon change their appearance\xfffedepending on the season.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCould that also be considered\xfffea type of evolution?
texts.translated_text: Some Pokémon change their appearance\xfffedepending on the season.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCould that also be considered\xfffea type of evolution?

texts.original_text: We research changes in nature that\xfffeoccur due to the seasons.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeConsider the Pokémon called \xf000ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffewhich lives in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts appearance is said to change\xfffeaccording to the season.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis characteristic is of great interest\xfffeto us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe want to research this Pokémon and\xfffeobserve its seasonal changes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why we developed a marvelous\xfffeclimate-control system that transcends\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe seasons and allows us to freely\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadjust temperature and humidity!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We research changes in nature that\xfffeoccur due to the seasons.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeConsider the Pokémon called \xf000ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffewhich lives in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts appearance is said to change\xfffeaccording to the season.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis characteristic is of great interest\xfffeto us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe want to research this Pokémon and\xfffeobserve its seasonal changes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why we developed a marvelous\xfffeclimate-control system that transcends\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe seasons and allows us to freely\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadjust temperature and humidity!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Up to this point, everything has been\xfffefine...but we are very busy, and we\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehaven't really had a chance to catch\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 to study.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, this is what we would like to ask you.\xfffeFirst, please capture a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when its appearance changes,\xfffecould you bring it back to the lab?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when we've confirmed the change to\xfffethe \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 you bring us, we will also\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego search for that season's \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Up to this point, everything has been\xfffefine...but we are very busy, and we\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehaven't really had a chance to catch\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 to study.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, this is what we would like to ask you.\xfffeFirst, please capture a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when its appearance changes,\xfffecould you bring it back to the lab?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when we've confirmed the change to\xfffethe \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 you bring us, we will also\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego search for that season's \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How about it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, would you please show\xfffeus what \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 looks like now?
texts.translated_text: How about it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, would you please show\xfffeus what \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 looks like now?

texts.original_text: \xf000ā\x0001\x0000's Spring Form!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe luster of its body and its coloring is\xfffelike a flower field in the spring!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe scent emanating from it is also\xfffevery floral.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you so much! I want to go catch\xfffemy own \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 right away!

texts.original_text: Oh, I see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe would be really grateful if you could\xfffeassist us with our research, but if\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou're too busy...

It's you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks to you, we've caught all of\xfffethe Forms of \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow we can thoroughly study the\xffferelationship between Pokémon, seasons,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand climate.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you very much.\xfffeIt isn't much, but please accept this.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is the only place in the world where\xfffeyou can see \xf000ā\x0001\x0000's four seasonal\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeForms all at one time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey've kind of become our mascots!

texts.original_text: I hate to say this, but that Pokémon is\xfffenot the \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 we're looking for.

texts.original_text: The Pokémon climbed up the rock wall and\xfffedisappeared somewhere into the cave...

texts.original_text: The strength you exhibited communicating\xfffewith your Pokémon also got through\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Cobalion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you and your Pokémon train together\xfffeand get even stronger, it will probably\xf000븀\x0000\xfffereturn to this place.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The strength you exhibited communicating\xfffewith your Pokémon also got through\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto Cobalion.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you and your Pokémon train together\xfffeand get even stronger, it will probably\xf000븀\x0000\xfffereturn to this place.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It seems that thanks to you, Cobalion\xfffehas sensed a change in the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a world where people and Pokémon\xfffehelp each other and live together.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI believe Cobalion wants to remain\xfffewith you and travel by your side.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It seems that thanks to you, Cobalion\xfffehas sensed a change in the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a world where people and Pokémon\xfffehelp each other and live together.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI believe Cobalion wants to remain\xfffewith you and travel by your side.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The fact that you battled Cobalion and\xfffeyou related to each other should be\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeasily communicated to Terrakion and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeVirizion because of the close bond\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween the three.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure they will also give you a chance\xfffeto prove your worth.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The fact that you battled Cobalion and\xfffeyou related to each other should be\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeasily communicated to Terrakion and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeVirizion because of the close bond\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween the three.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure they will also give you a chance\xfffeto prove your worth.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The obstacles that separated Terrakion\xfffeand Virizion from people are probably\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegone now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhether you want to search\xfffefor those two is up to you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebut they are definitely waiting for you...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The obstacles that separated Terrakion\xfffeand Virizion from people are probably\xf000븀\x0000\xfffegone now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhether you want to search\xfffefor those two is up to you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebut they are definitely waiting for you...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I saw your skill. It's impressive for one\xfffeso young.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you're the one...\xfffeHmmm... It may be possible...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow about it? Will you listen to\xfffean old man's story?
texts.translated_text: I saw your skill. It's impressive for one\xfffeso young.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe you're the one...\xfffeHmmm... It may be possible...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow about it? Will you listen to\xfffean old man's story?

texts.original_text: In the distant past, when Pokémon and\xfffepeople lived in different worlds,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea war between people started\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean intense fire in a forest where\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany Pokémon lived.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon were surrounded by smoke\xfffeand flames. They were in big trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd then, the legends Cobalion,\xfffeTerrakion, and Virizion appeared!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTerrakion used its amazing strength to\xfffedestroy rocks blocking the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeescape route.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVirizion used its quick movements\xfffeto protect Pokémon from looming flames.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd Cobalion led the frightened\xfffePokémon out of the burning woods.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In the distant past, when Pokémon and\xfffepeople lived in different worlds,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea war between people started\xf000븀\x0000\xfffean intense fire in a forest where\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemany Pokémon lived.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon were surrounded by smoke\xfffeand flames. They were in big trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd then, the legends Cobalion,\xfffeTerrakion, and Virizion appeared!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTerrakion used its amazing strength to\xfffedestroy rocks blocking the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeescape route.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeVirizion used its quick movements\xfffeto protect Pokémon from looming flames.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd Cobalion led the frightened\xfffePokémon out of the burning woods.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The people who started the war were\xffferouted by the power of the legends.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause of Cobalion, Terrakion, and\xfffeVirizion, the war was ended.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The people who started the war were\xffferouted by the power of the legends.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause of Cobalion, Terrakion, and\xfffeVirizion, the war was ended.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: When people fight, there's no peace for\xfffePokémon, either.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe three legends learned that\xfffethe deeds of humans could lead\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto dire consequences for their world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: When people fight, there's no peace for\xfffePokémon, either.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe three legends learned that\xfffethe deeds of humans could lead\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto dire consequences for their world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: They cut themselves off from people\xfffeand disappeared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo one saw much of them after that, and\xfffethe three faded into myth...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: They cut themselves off from people\xfffeand disappeared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo one saw much of them after that, and\xfffethe three faded into myth...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I've been searching for them for\xfffedecades, and I finally figured out that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone of them was deep in this cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the legendary three do not\xfffetrust people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf people approach, they bare their\xfffefangs and attack.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I've been searching for them for\xfffedecades, and I finally figured out that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone of them was deep in this cave.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut the legendary three do not\xfffetrust people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf people approach, they bare their\xfffefangs and attack.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It can't be helped, because they only\xfffeknow the old world...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey still don't know the world has\xfffebecome a place where people and Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetry to understand and help each other.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It can't be helped, because they only\xfffeknow the old world...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey still don't know the world has\xfffebecome a place where people and Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetry to understand and help each other.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You seem like you might be able to show\xfffethem that people and Pokémon can trust\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeach other and live together.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they take another look at people,\xfffeI think they will stop hiding from us...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's not just about bonds between\xfffepeople and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving all living things appreciate and\xfffetrust each other would be best.
texts.translated_text: It's not just about bonds between\xfffepeople and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving all living things appreciate and\xfffetrust each other would be best.

texts.original_text: If you don't listen to what your elders\xfffehave to say, I can't expect much\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou shouldn't have come to this place!\xfffeLeave now!\xf000븁\x0000

Points you get\xfffeafter a battle is based on levels.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen your Pokémon is weaker than\xfffeits opponent, it will get more.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if your Pokémon is stronger,\xfffeit won't get as many.

texts.original_text: My old partner is resting\xfffehere in the Celestial Tower.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was the first Pokémon\xfffeI received when I became a Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI come here to ring the bell\xfffeand comfort its spirit.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It was a strong Pokémon.\xfffeIt was courageous, noble, and kind...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTogether, we madly pursued strength...\xfffeWithout even knowing the meaning\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof strength.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, in the same way that all stories\xfffehave a beginning and an end,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeall lives have an end, as well...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was then that I understood that\xfffestrength isn't something that\xf000븀\x0000\xffferemains unchanged forever.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: However, the joy one feels in being with\xfffePokémon--that is the real thing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to spread the word, I left\xfffethe Pokémon League and kept traveling...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's right! Traveling is wonderful.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've met many different Pokémon,\xfffemany different Trainers,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand now I've met all of you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I see... Well, come talk to me again if you\xfffechange your mind!
texts.translated_text: I see... Well, come talk to me again if you\xfffechange your mind!

texts.original_text: Trading Pokémon lets you get to know\xfffeother Trainers!
texts.translated_text: Trading Pokémon lets you get to know\xfffeother Trainers!

texts.original_text: I love the Pokémon moves Mega Drain\xfffeand Giga Drain!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour opponent's HP is reduced, and the\xfffeuser's HP increases!
texts.translated_text: I love the Pokémon moves Mega Drain\xfffeand Giga Drain!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour opponent's HP is reduced, and the\xfffeuser's HP increases!

texts.original_text: Fwoo-ooo-ooosh...
texts.translated_text: Fwoo-ooo-ooosh...

texts.original_text: Tralalala! ♪
texts.translated_text: Tralalala! ♪

texts.original_text: I'm making a delicious soup with\xfffewell-stewed vegetables.
texts.translated_text: I'm making a delicious soup with\xfffewell-stewed vegetables.

texts.original_text: Since her yammering stops while she's\xfffecooking, it's another bonus for me.
texts.translated_text: Since her yammering stops while she's\xfffecooking, it's another bonus for me.

texts.original_text: Even a young 'un like yourself will catch\xfffecold if you get soaked by that cold rain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSit right down and have some soup,\xfffewhy don't you?
texts.translated_text: Even a young 'un like yourself will catch\xfffecold if you get soaked by that cold rain.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSit right down and have some soup,\xfffewhy don't you?

texts.original_text: That's nice. A young 'un like you\xfffeshouldn't be shy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That's nice. A young 'un like you\xfffeshouldn't be shy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Come now, just have a little.\xfffeIt's good for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you listen to an old lady's story\xfffefor a moment?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Come now, just have a little.\xfffeIt's good for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you listen to an old lady's story\xfffefor a moment?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In the Unova region, you see, there is a\xfffePokémon called Thundurus\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat creates thunderstorms.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt flies around the region and sets loose\xfffewild winds and crashing lightning.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In the Unova region, you see, there is a\xfffePokémon called Thundurus\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat creates thunderstorms.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt flies around the region and sets loose\xfffewild winds and crashing lightning.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In the Unova region, you see, there is a\xfffePokémon called Tornadus that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecauses windstorms.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt flies around the region while letting\xfffeloose wild winds and pounding rain.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In the Unova region, you see, there is a\xfffePokémon called Tornadus that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecauses windstorms.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt flies around the region while letting\xfffeloose wild winds and pounding rain.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Have some soup now, dear.\xfffeIt'll warm you up.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Have some soup now, dear.\xfffeIt'll warm you up.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A soup jam-packed with healthy\xfffevegetables. It's delicious!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A soup jam-packed with healthy\xfffevegetables. It's delicious!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The heavy rain is ruining the crops\xfffeI've worked so hard to raise!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a troublesome Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The heavy rain is ruining the crops\xfffeI've worked so hard to raise!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat a troublesome Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I thought I would try to catch it, but it\xfffeflies around so fast that even when I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethought I'd found it, it just flew away.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I thought I would try to catch it, but it\xfffeflies around so fast that even when I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethought I'd found it, it just flew away.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In one day, it can make a lap around the\xfffeentire Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the mornings, it's in the south,\xfffeand in the evenings, it's in the north.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt shows up here in the evenings!
texts.translated_text: In one day, it can make a lap around the\xfffeentire Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the mornings, it's in the south,\xfffeand in the evenings, it's in the north.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt shows up here in the evenings!

texts.original_text: It seems like someone somewhere\xfffetaught that stormy Pokémon a lesson.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if it was...?
texts.translated_text: It seems like someone somewhere\xfffetaught that stormy Pokémon a lesson.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if it was...?

texts.original_text: Long ago, I was a sharp-lookin' young\xfffeman, and my wife was a fiiine-lookin' girl.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis is a story from way back then.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight around here, a certain Pokémon\xfffetaught a lesson to Thundurus, who had\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebeen causin' trouble dropping lightning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor around 30 years after that,\xfffeThundurus kept calm, and it hid\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesomewhere around here.

texts.original_text: If you go in the tall grass during\xfffea storm, it might pop out.
texts.translated_text: If you go in the tall grass during\xfffea storm, it might pop out.

texts.original_text: There is a Pokémon that\xfffequieted Thundurus.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI remember hearing that there is a\xfffeshrine built to honor that Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesomewhere on Route 14.

texts.original_text: Phew... I tried a little too hard.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI bought way too much\xfffeat Shopping Mall Nine!

texts.translated_text: I come shop at the Shopping Mall a lot\xfffebecause I want all the TMs!

texts.original_text: On the first floor, they sell medicines.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn the second floor, they sell TMs\xfffeand different kinds of Mail.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn the third floor, they sell items for\xffferaising stats and battle items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI really admire Mr. Clyde, the\xfffePokémon Gym guide, so I'm practicing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebeing a guide, too!

texts.original_text: There are even some people in the mall\xfffewho will challenge you to battles.
texts.translated_text: There are even some people in the mall\xfffewho will challenge you to battles.

texts.original_text: The thing I buy most often is the item\xfffethat raises a Pokémon's HP, called HP Up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are also a lot of other items that\xfffecatch my eye.
texts.translated_text: The thing I buy most often is the item\xfffethat raises a Pokémon's HP, called HP Up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are also a lot of other items that\xfffecatch my eye.

texts.original_text: Good Trainers never use only\xfffebrute force.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey think about many different\xfffestrategies, such as which Pokémon and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoves to use in battle, or the best time\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto use an item.

texts.translated_text: Playing hide-and-seek would be fun!

texts.translated_text: Shopping Mall Nine\xfffeColorful and wonderful!
