texts.translated_text: Drayden and Professor Juniper told me.\xfffeYou're heading for the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon League, right?

texts.original_text: Cheren: Since it's Alder...\xfffeSince it's the Champion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI think it will be all right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWorst-case scenario...\xfffeyou'll be battling Team Plasma's boss, N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI need to know if you can handle it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Since it's Alder...\xfffeSince it's the Champion,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI think it will be all right.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWorst-case scenario...\xfffeyou'll be battling Team Plasma's boss, N.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI need to know if you can handle it!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Now is not the time for modesty.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWorst-case scenario, you'll be battling\xfffeTeam Plasma's boss, N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI need proof you can handle it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Now is not the time for modesty.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWorst-case scenario, you'll be battling\xfffeTeam Plasma's boss, N!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI need proof you can handle it!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Yep, you are something else.\xfffeAnd I mean that sincerely.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight. Now, I have to make\xfffeyour Pokémon healthy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Yep, you are something else.\xfffeAnd I mean that sincerely.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight. Now, I have to make\xfffeyour Pokémon healthy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren fully healed\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: Cheren fully healed\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokémon!

texts.original_text: Cheren: Right now, there's no way\xfffeI can compete with you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is anything I can do to help in\xfffethe battle with N, just say so...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Right now, there's no way\xfffeI can compete with you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf there is anything I can do to help in\xfffethe battle with N, just say so...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's not much I can do to help you,\xfffebut I want you to have these!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's not much I can do to help you,\xfffebut I want you to have these!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Still, it's kind of funny.\xfffeEveryone's so different.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Still, it's kind of funny.\xfffeEveryone's so different.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Funny?\xfffeAt a time like this...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Funny?\xfffeAt a time like this...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Come on, Cheren.\xfffeCould you smile just for once?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTaking everything so seriously all the\xfffetime isn't going to change anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know... Since we've met our Pokémon\xfffeand walked the same roads together,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea lot has happened...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe've all changed a lot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe found out that the things we want\xfffeto do and the things we can do\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare different for each of us, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what's made our journey\xfffeso worth it.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSomehow, all this just makes me happy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Come on, Cheren.\xfffeCould you smile just for once?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTaking everything so seriously all the\xfffetime isn't going to change anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know... Since we've met our Pokémon\xfffeand walked the same roads together,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea lot has happened...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWe've all changed a lot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe found out that the things we want\xfffeto do and the things we can do\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare different for each of us, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what's made our journey\xfffeso worth it.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSomehow, all this just makes me happy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: ...So that's what you mean.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...You are right that we're all different\xfffeand we should do the things\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat we can do.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: ...So that's what you mean.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...You are right that we're all different\xfffeand we should do the things\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat we can do.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: There are as many\xfffetruths and ideals as there\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare people and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe most important thing is\xfffethat we help one another out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why people and Pokémon\xfffeare always by each other's side.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's what I've come to think lately...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeIf anything happens to you or Alder,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI will do everything I can to help you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I have to keep training and\xfffegetting stronger.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeJust...don't be reckless, OK?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: There are as many\xfffetruths and ideals as there\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeare people and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe most important thing is\xfffethat we help one another out.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why people and Pokémon\xfffeare always by each other's side.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's what I've come to think lately...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeIf anything happens to you or Alder,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI will do everything I can to help you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I have to keep training and\xfffegetting stronger.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeJust...don't be reckless, OK?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: He's gone.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: He's gone.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMe, too! I'll do my best to help if I can!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...\xfffeUmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wish I could say something, like,\xfffetotally inspiring, you know?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUmm...\xfffeOK... Best foot forward!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMe, too! I'll do my best to help if I can!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo...\xfffeUmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wish I could say something, like,\xfffetotally inspiring, you know?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUmm...\xfffeOK... Best foot forward!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You made it this far. Well done.\xfffeThat's an impressive accomplishment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo show the respect I feel for you,\xfffeI would like to present you with this gift.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You made it this far. Well done.\xfffeThat's an impressive accomplishment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo show the respect I feel for you,\xfffeI would like to present you with this gift.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's a Dusk Stone.\xfffeThis item makes certain Pokémon evolve.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI used one to evolve a Lampent\xfffefrom the Celestial Tower.
texts.translated_text: It's a Dusk Stone.\xfffeThis item makes certain Pokémon evolve.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI used one to evolve a Lampent\xfffefrom the Celestial Tower.

texts.translated_text: Badge Check Gates\xfffeOpen the gates and change history!

texts.translated_text: Oh, holder of the Trio Badge!\xfffeChallenge all that you face!

texts.translated_text: First, obtain the Trio Badge from the\xfffeStriaton Pokémon Gym!

texts.original_text: Gates are placed at the border of one\xfffespace and another space.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn other words, gates mean that the\xfffeworld beyond here is a different world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt does feel like every time you pass\xfffethrough a gate, you're going to a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifferent world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you remember the Gym Leader who\xfffegave you the Badge at the same time...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut without the Quake Badge,\xfffeyou cannot proceed.

texts.original_text: ...I'm sorry. I forgot my uniform.
texts.translated_text: ...I'm sorry. I forgot my uniform.

texts.original_text: It's difficult to decide which Pokémon is\xfffethe best for my grandchild to meet first.
texts.translated_text: It's difficult to decide which Pokémon is\xfffethe best for my grandchild to meet first.

texts.original_text: My grandpa is going to catch a Pokémon\xfffefor me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will become a friend of my Pokémon, and\xfffesomeday we will travel in Unova together!
texts.translated_text: My grandpa is going to catch a Pokémon\xfffefor me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will become a friend of my Pokémon, and\xfffesomeday we will travel in Unova together!

texts.original_text: What am I doing?\xfffeI'm hunting for TREASURE!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTreasure hunting is fun. Sometimes things\xfffeare buried in the sand dunes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, I just found something!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's the same one as I found before,\xfffeso I will give this to you.\xf000븁\x0000

Sometimes things\xfffeare buried in the sand dunes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, I just found something!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's the same one as I found before,\xfffeso I will give this to you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I just found a treasure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's the same one as I found before,\xfffeso I'll give you this one.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wreek... Wree...
texts.translated_text: Wreek... Wree...

texts.original_text: Wreek!
texts.translated_text: Wreek!

texts.original_text: Wree wreek!
texts.translated_text: Wree wreek!

texts.original_text: Wingull flew away looking happy!\xfffe...Oh? Something is on the ground.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wingull flew away looking happy!\xfffe...Oh? Something is on the ground.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This Wingull looks like it lost three Grams\xfffeon Route 13. I wish I could help it...
texts.translated_text: This Wingull looks like it lost three Grams\xfffeon Route 13. I wish I could help it...

texts.original_text: Oh, great! Could that be the Gram?\xfffeLet's show it to Wingull!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, great! Could that be the Gram?\xfffeLet's show it to Wingull!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Two more!\xfffeWingull looks happy.
texts.translated_text: Two more!\xfffeWingull looks happy.

texts.original_text: One more!\xfffeWingull looks happy.
texts.translated_text: One more!\xfffeWingull looks happy.

texts.original_text: We've got them all!\xfffeThis helps Wingull a lot!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: We've got them all!\xfffeThis helps Wingull a lot!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Thank you, Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen we see happy Pokémon faces,\xfffewe feel happy, don't we?
texts.translated_text: Thank you, Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen we see happy Pokémon faces,\xfffewe feel happy, don't we?

texts.original_text: Eh? What's that?\xfffeA letter fell from the sky?
texts.translated_text: Eh? What's that?\xfffeA letter fell from the sky?

texts.original_text: Looking for a Gram, are you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, could this be it? It fell on my head\xfffejust now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, give this to Wingull.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looking for a Gram, are you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, could this be it? It fell on my head\xfffejust now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, give this to Wingull.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I see. That Wingull was working hard\xfffefor us, too!
texts.translated_text: I see. That Wingull was working hard\xfffefor us, too!

texts.original_text: Why did the letter I mailed\xfffefall from the sky...?
texts.translated_text: Why did the letter I mailed\xfffefall from the sky...?

texts.original_text: Why did the letter I mailed\xfffefall from the sky...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...I got it!\xfffeWingull dropped it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere it is! Please give this to Wingull!\xfffeTell Wingull not to drop it this time!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Why did the letter I mailed\xfffefall from the sky...?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...I got it!\xfffeWingull dropped it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere it is! Please give this to Wingull!\xfffeTell Wingull not to drop it this time!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm not so good at talking, so I write\xfffeMail instead. I can write all about my trip\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand how it made me feel.
texts.translated_text: I'm not so good at talking, so I write\xfffeMail instead. I can write all about my trip\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand how it made me feel.

texts.original_text: I found this plate when I used the move\xfffeDive in the sea around Undella Town!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I don't know how to use it.\xfffeYou can have it if you like.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I found this plate when I used the move\xfffeDive in the sea around Undella Town!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I don't know how to use it.\xfffeYou can have it if you like.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I have another one.\xfffeTake this, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I have another one.\xfffeTake this, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: They say there's a sunken temple at the\xfffebottom of the sea around Undella Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThose plates were resting in the temple.\xfffeMaybe they're treasure...
texts.translated_text: They say there's a sunken temple at the\xfffebottom of the sea around Undella Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThose plates were resting in the temple.\xfffeMaybe they're treasure...

texts.original_text: I'm one of the gate receptionists.\xfffeOur assigned places change daily.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCan you believe it?
texts.translated_text: I'm one of the gate receptionists.\xfffeOur assigned places change daily.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCan you believe it?

texts.original_text: Do you check electric bulletin boards?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe news about Pokémon mass outbreaks\xfffeis hot now!
texts.translated_text: Do you check electric bulletin boards?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe news about Pokémon mass outbreaks\xfffeis hot now!

texts.original_text: My husband can teach some Pokémon the\xfffeultimate moves! I'll tell you their names.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe blazing Fire-type Pokémon:\xfffeCharizard, Typhlosion, Blaziken,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeInfernape, and Emboar!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe restless Water-type Pokémon:\xfffeBlastoise, Feraligatr, Swampert,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEmpoleon, and Samurott!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe quiet Grass-type Pokémon: Venusaur,\xfffeMeganium, Sceptile, Torterra,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Serperior!
texts.translated_text: My husband can teach some Pokémon the\xfffeultimate moves! I'll tell you their names.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe blazing Fire-type Pokémon:\xfffeCharizard, Typhlosion, Blaziken,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeInfernape, and Emboar!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe restless Water-type Pokémon:\xfffeBlastoise, Feraligatr, Swampert,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEmpoleon, and Samurott!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe quiet Grass-type Pokémon: Venusaur,\xfffeMeganium, Sceptile, Torterra,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Serperior!

texts.original_text: There is a saying...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf somewhere in this world there is\xfffesomeone who understands you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit feels like that person is right beside\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou, even if you’re as far apart as the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeend of the land and the top of the sky.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs my lord N and his Pokémon understand\xfffeone another, so, too, do you and your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon understand one another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich is my reason for giving you this...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There is a saying...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf somewhere in this world there is\xfffesomeone who understands you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit feels like that person is right beside\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou, even if you’re as far apart as the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeend of the land and the top of the sky.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs my lord N and his Pokémon understand\xfffeone another, so, too, do you and your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon understand one another.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich is my reason for giving you this...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Giallo: The legend of Unova is about\xfffePokémon and people working together\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto build a new world!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe message is that simple\xfffeand that strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf changing the world makes you a hero,\xfffeanyone can become a hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs each of us changes what is\xfffein our power to change, so the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeitself changes.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Giallo: The legend of Unova is about\xfffePokémon and people working together\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto build a new world!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe message is that simple\xfffeand that strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf changing the world makes you a hero,\xfffeanyone can become a hero.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs each of us changes what is\xfffein our power to change, so the world\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeitself changes.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Regarding Team Plasma...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am an officer of the International\xfffePolice, and you must supply the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinformation I request!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Giallo: Indeed, I shall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma changed me, but it could not\xfffechange the world. I'm looking forward to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeseeing how you lot will do.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Giallo: Indeed, I shall.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma changed me, but it could not\xfffechange the world. I'm looking forward to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeseeing how you lot will do.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: I beg you will accept my thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do they think of?\xfffeWhat do they hope for?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am intensely interested to know this.\xfffeTo depart at once!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: I beg you will accept my thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, Ghetsis notwithstanding,\xfffethere yet remains but \xf000Ȁ\x0001\x0000 of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages still at large.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do they think of?\xfffeWhat do they hope for?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am intensely interested to know this.\xfffeTo depart at once!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: I thank you extremely!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCuriously, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xfffeThere is a topic on which we must speak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA report has reached my ears of someone\xfffefar from here. Indeed, this someone has\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespotted a person like N and a...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedragon Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI depart to substantiate the substance\xfffeof this information.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUntil next time, I say cheers to you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: I thank you extremely!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCuriously, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xfffeThere is a topic on which we must speak.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA report has reached my ears of someone\xfffefar from here. Indeed, this someone has\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespotted a person like N and a...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedragon Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI depart to substantiate the substance\xfffeof this information.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUntil next time, I say cheers to you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Trainer Tips!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xfffeChange your type on the Trainer Card\xfffeto change how other players see you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll look different to others in the\xfffeUnion Room and the Tag Log!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMatch it with your introduction or\xfffecharacter to show your individuality!

texts.original_text: If you want to enjoy the slow life, visit\xfffeWhite Forest.
texts.translated_text: If you want to enjoy the slow life, visit\xfffeWhite Forest.

texts.original_text: If you want to enjoy vibrant city life,\xfffevisit Black City.
texts.translated_text: If you want to enjoy vibrant city life,\xfffevisit Black City.

texts.original_text: White Forest is full of nature!\xfffePeople and Pokémon live together.
texts.translated_text: White Forest is full of nature!\xfffePeople and Pokémon live together.

texts.original_text: People in this city are really something!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBe careful, 'cause they'll challenge you\xfffeif you talk to them!
texts.translated_text: People in this city are really something!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBe careful, 'cause they'll challenge you\xfffeif you talk to them!

texts.original_text: If you wreck Great Landorus's little\xfffeshrine, it'll cause a bad bad storm!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If you wreck Great Landorus's little\xfffeshrine, it'll cause a bad bad storm!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That's not true!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon that brings bad\xfffethunderstorms is a different Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No, silly, you've got it wrong!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is a shrine for Great Landorus. It\xfffepunished a Pokémon that did a bad thing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you wreck the shrine, it can't punish\xfffethat stormy Pokémon if it comes back!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But that doesn't make any sense!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf a Pokémon does a bad thing,\xfffeGreat Landorus will come to help us,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhether it has a shrine or not!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're the silly one!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No, YOU'RE silly! Hey, wait!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: No, YOU'RE silly! Hey, wait!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This little shrine is dedicated to a\xfffePokémon called Landorus.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey say that when Tornadus and\xfffeThundurus were whipping up storms that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedamaged houses and fields all over the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUnova region, Landorus made them stop.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: This little shrine is dedicated to a\xfffePokémon called Landorus.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey say that when Tornadus and\xfffeThundurus were whipping up storms that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedamaged houses and fields all over the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeUnova region, Landorus made them stop.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That's a story from way long ago, when\xfffemy grandpa was a little boy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That's a story from way long ago, when\xfffemy grandpa was a little boy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: So if Tornadus and Thundurus come here\xfffeagain, Great Landorus may come back.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: So if Tornadus and Thundurus come here\xfffeagain, Great Landorus may come back.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: That's what my grandpa told me!
texts.translated_text: That's what my grandpa told me!

texts.translated_text: It's a small, weathered shrine.

texts.original_text: It's a small, weathered shrine.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Landorus flew far away into the sky...

texts.original_text: It is the Great Landorus that protects\xfffethis land.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith its help, we are assured of rich soil\xfffeand a prosperous harvest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should visit Great Landorus's little\xfffeshrine and pay your respects.
texts.translated_text: It is the Great Landorus that protects\xfffethis land.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith its help, we are assured of rich soil\xfffeand a prosperous harvest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should visit Great Landorus's little\xfffeshrine and pay your respects.

texts.original_text: Tornadus brings howling windstorms.\xfffeThundurus pelts us with lightning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen these two are together in the same\xfffeplace, Great Landorus will come again.
texts.translated_text: Tornadus brings howling windstorms.\xfffeThundurus pelts us with lightning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen these two are together in the same\xfffeplace, Great Landorus will come again.

texts.translated_text: As the residents change, the city\xfffealso changes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I look at the changes for a while,\xfffethe city looks like a gigantic creature.

texts.translated_text: I decided to find a new Pokémon partner\xfffearound Route 13.

texts.original_text: Marvelous Bridge is really mind boggling!\xfffeSo I am taking a rest!
texts.translated_text: Marvelous Bridge is really mind boggling!\xfffeSo I am taking a rest!

texts.original_text: Did you know? Before Marvelous Bridge\xfffewas built, there was a girl who always\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeplayed with Abra around here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe was so full of energy...
texts.translated_text: Did you know? Before Marvelous Bridge\xfffewas built, there was a girl who always\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeplayed with Abra around here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe was so full of energy...

texts.translated_text: What do people buy from the\xfffevending machine?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo keep checking on that...\xfffeThis is my life.

texts.original_text: Hey, you!\xfffeDon't you want to try a Triple Battle?
texts.translated_text: Hey, you!\xfffeDon't you want to try a Triple Battle?

texts.original_text: Triple Battles are battles with\xfffethree Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease get three Pokémon ready\xfffefor battle!
texts.translated_text: Triple Battles are battles with\xfffethree Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease get three Pokémon ready\xfffefor battle!

texts.original_text: You are a Trainer, yet you are not\xfffeprepared to battle?
texts.translated_text: You are a Trainer, yet you are not\xfffeprepared to battle?

texts.original_text: They say chance favors\xfffethe prepared mind.
texts.translated_text: They say chance favors\xfffethe prepared mind.

texts.original_text: I want to research an effective\xfffefighting method for Rotation Battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you have a battle with me?
texts.translated_text: I want to research an effective\xfffefighting method for Rotation Battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you have a battle with me?

texts.original_text: A Rotation Battle is a new kind of battle\xfffethat uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease prepare at least three Pokémon\xfffefor battle!
texts.translated_text: A Rotation Battle is a new kind of battle\xfffethat uses three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease prepare at least three Pokémon\xfffefor battle!

texts.original_text: If you're a Trainer, you should be\xfffemore aggressive.
texts.translated_text: If you're a Trainer, you should be\xfffemore aggressive.

texts.original_text: Now you can have Rotation Battles with\xfffeyour friends!
texts.translated_text: Now you can have Rotation Battles with\xfffeyour friends!

texts.original_text: By any chance, have you caught a\xfffePokémon called \xf000ā\x0001\x0000?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI would be very happy if you would trade\xfffemy \xf000ā\x0001\x0001 for your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.
texts.translated_text: By any chance, have you caught a\xfffePokémon called \xf000ā\x0001\x0000?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI would be very happy if you would trade\xfffemy \xf000ā\x0001\x0001 for your \xf000ā\x0001\x0000.

texts.original_text: My heart is beating so fast!\xfffeOK, let's trade!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My heart is beating so fast!\xfffeOK, let's trade!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Thank you very much! Please treat my\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0001 with love!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will also take good care of the\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000 that you traded to me!
texts.translated_text: Thank you very much! Please treat my\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0001 with love!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will also take good care of the\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000 that you traded to me!

texts.original_text: I'd like to trade for a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...
texts.translated_text: I'd like to trade for a \xf000ā\x0001\x0000...

texts.original_text: Well, if you don't want to, I understand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you ever change your mind, please\xfffetrade Pokémon with me!
texts.translated_text: Well, if you don't want to, I understand.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if you ever change your mind, please\xfffetrade Pokémon with me!

texts.original_text: I am so grateful that you traded Pokémon\xfffewith me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy research is making progress, and\xfffeabove all, I'm happy because it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefriendly to me.
texts.translated_text: I am so grateful that you traded Pokémon\xfffewith me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy research is making progress, and\xfffeabove all, I'm happy because it is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefriendly to me.

texts.original_text: They said Marvelous Bridge\xfffeis being checked!
texts.translated_text: They said Marvelous Bridge\xfffeis being checked!

texts.original_text: Marvelous Bridge\xfffeTruly marvelous! And also a bridge!
texts.translated_text: Marvelous Bridge\xfffeTruly marvelous! And also a bridge!

texts.original_text: I am me.\xfffeYou are you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...You really don't know what to do when\xfffesomeone suddenly says that, do you?
texts.translated_text: I am me.\xfffeYou are you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...You really don't know what to do when\xfffesomeone suddenly says that, do you?

texts.translated_text: A parasol inside the gate! Well, I\xfffereally don't want to get wet and dirty.

texts.original_text: Oh, awesome! That just made my day!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis vending machine gave me\xfffean extra drink! For free!!
texts.translated_text: Oh, awesome! That just made my day!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis vending machine gave me\xfffean extra drink! For free!!

texts.original_text: You know, there are people in the world\xfffewith many different values.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You know, there are people in the world\xfffewith many different values.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Some people enjoy things you might not\xfffethink are fun...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving a lot of different values in the\xfffeworld makes it a richer place.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think, anyway.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Some people enjoy things you might not\xfffethink are fun...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHaving a lot of different values in the\xfffeworld makes it a richer place.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think, anyway.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I really enjoy traveling around the world\xfffeand talking with different people, but\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe woman who lives here seems to think\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeliving quietly by herself is important.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I really enjoy traveling around the world\xfffeand talking with different people, but\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe woman who lives here seems to think\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeliving quietly by herself is important.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Growwwwf!
texts.translated_text: Growwwwf!

texts.original_text: So this was Zoroark's home, then!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: So this was Zoroark's home, then!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Zoroark was using its illusion to\xfffetrick people and Pokémon. It\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewanted to keep people away from its lair.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard this place was suspicious, so I\xfffecame to have a look, but it looks like I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas tricked as well.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Zoroark was using its illusion to\xfffetrick people and Pokémon. It\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewanted to keep people away from its lair.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard this place was suspicious, so I\xfffecame to have a look, but it looks like I\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas tricked as well.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Zoroark really reacted strongly to the\xfffePokémon you have with you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be some history there.\xfffeA quarrel, or something.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Zoroark really reacted strongly to the\xfffePokémon you have with you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere must be some history there.\xfffeA quarrel, or something.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Such a beautiful field, in a place\xfffelike this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's almost as if this lovely scenery is\xfffethe illusion!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Such a beautiful field, in a place\xfffelike this...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's almost as if this lovely scenery is\xfffethe illusion!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The suspicious woman attacked!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The suspicious woman attacked!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokémon vanished deep into\xfffethe forest...
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon vanished deep into\xfffethe forest...

texts.original_text: Rood: It smells of the sea here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis place has the same ocean smell\xfffeas where I was born...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Rood: It smells of the sea here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis place has the same ocean smell\xfffeas where I was born...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ghetsis wandered the lands of this world\xfffeall over, collecting knowledge of all kinds\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhile searching for like-minded people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom the moment we met, he\xfffeunderstood what I desired.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis wandered the lands of this world\xfffeall over, collecting knowledge of all kinds\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhile searching for like-minded people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFrom the moment we met, he\xfffeunderstood what I desired.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The ability to understand the minds and\xfffethe needs of others...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is an ability that everyone needs\xfffeto survive.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy lord N is a kind and excellent person\xfffewho understands the hearts of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, conversely, perhaps his ability to\xfffeunderstand the hearts and feelings\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeof people is not developed enough.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Heya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe professor gave you a Pokémon to\xfffestart your journey, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf that Pokémon is still with you, and if\xfffeyou two have a strong bond, there's a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffespecial move it can learn...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWant me to teach it a battle combo move?

texts.original_text: The Pokémon I've taken a shine to are\xfffethe ones you get from the professor!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo teach all of these Pokémon a\xfffespecial move, a battle combo move...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat's my pledge!

texts.original_text: I'm the Day-Care Man.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe take care of the precious Pokémon\xfffeof other Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you'd like us to raise your\xfffePokémon, have a word with my wife.

texts.original_text: Ah, it's you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe were raising your Pokémon,\xfffeand my goodness, were we surprised!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour Pokémon was holding an Egg!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe don't know how it got there,\xfffebut your Pokémon had it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou do want it, don't you?

texts.translated_text: You take good care of it.

texts.original_text: Well then, I'll hang on to it.\xfffeThanks!
texts.translated_text: Well then, I'll hang on to it.\xfffeThanks!

texts.original_text: Cheren: That's the city on the other side\xfffeof Route 16 when you leave from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNimbasa City. Hmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you go that way, you might be able to\xfffemeet all sorts of Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou've never seen before.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: That's the city on the other side\xfffeof Route 16 when you leave from\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNimbasa City. Hmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you go that way, you might be able to\xfffemeet all sorts of Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou've never seen before.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cedric: Oh!\xfffeWell, this is nice timing!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI see you're all here!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cedric: Oh!\xfffeWell, this is nice timing!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI see you're all here!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Just a moment ago, I got some National\xfffePokédex data from an acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you're here, let's upgrade your\xfffePokédex with the National Pokédex data.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure you'll be visiting a wider range\xfffeof places. Naturally, that means\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou'll be encountering more Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see your Pokédex for a sec!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Just a moment ago, I got some National\xfffePokédex data from an acquaintance.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince you're here, let's upgrade your\xfffePokédex with the National Pokédex data.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure you'll be visiting a wider range\xfffeof places. Naturally, that means\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou'll be encountering more Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me see your Pokédex for a sec!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There you go, Bianca!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There you go, Bianca!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Next up is Cheren!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Next up is Cheren!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And last, but not least...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: And last, but not least...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokédex was upgraded\xfffewith the National Mode!
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's Pokédex was upgraded\xfffewith the National Mode!

texts.original_text: Cedric: You can now switch your\xfffePokédexes to the National Mode Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCompleting the National Pokédex will\xfffesurely be a big challenge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, take your time, enjoy yourselves,\xfffeand meet lots of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cedric: You can now switch your\xfffePokédexes to the National Mode Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCompleting the National Pokédex will\xfffesurely be a big challenge.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, take your time, enjoy yourselves,\xfffeand meet lots of Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Wow, the National Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like there are tons of Pokémon\xfffeI don't know yet! \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! Ooh! I want to show Mom and Dad\xfffemy Pokédex! I gotta go!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's meet again somewhere, OK?!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Wow, the National Pokédex...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt looks like there are tons of Pokémon\xfffeI don't know yet! \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh! Ooh! I want to show Mom and Dad\xfffemy Pokédex! I gotta go!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's meet again somewhere, OK?!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Huh. Bianca's as impetuous as\xfffeever, no matter what is going on.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Huh. Bianca's as impetuous as\xfffeever, no matter what is going on.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I think I'll travel all the way around\xfffeUnova, starting at Route 1 again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure I'll discover lots of new things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCould be I'll encounter the Seven Sages\xfffealong the way...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, if we spy each other\xfffealong the way, let's battle again, OK?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I think I'll travel all the way around\xfffeUnova, starting at Route 1 again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure I'll discover lots of new things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCould be I'll encounter the Seven Sages\xfffealong the way...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, if we spy each other\xfffealong the way, let's battle again, OK?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'm very sorry about\xfffeall the trouble, ma'am.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'm very sorry about\xfffeall the trouble, ma'am.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Well, um...\xfffeWe can clean up...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Well, um...\xfffeWe can clean up...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: Cleaning up?\xfffeNo worries. I'll take care of it later.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShouldn't you be on your way to\xfffemeet Professor Juniper?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: Cleaning up?\xfffeNo worries. I'll take care of it later.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShouldn't you be on your way to\xfffemeet Professor Juniper?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Yes, thank you!\xfffePlease excuse us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on.\xfffeLet's go thank Professor Juniper.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Yes, thank you!\xfffePlease excuse us.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on.\xfffeLet's go thank Professor Juniper.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: I'll be waiting in front of\xfffethe Pokémon Research Lab.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: I'll be waiting in front of\xfffethe Pokémon Research Lab.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Oh! Wait!\xfffeI've gotta go home first.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Oh! Wait!\xfffeI've gotta go home first.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Thanks for having us over!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Thanks for having us over!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: My, my, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battles are so lively,\xfffearen't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI could hear the Pokémon's\xfffecries clear down here!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: My, my, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battles are so lively,\xfffearen't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI could hear the Pokémon's\xfffecries clear down here!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hm. That sure reminded me of\xfffemy first Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hm. That sure reminded me of\xfffemy first Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, and you know? After a battle,\xfffeyou need to rest your Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, and you know? After a battle,\xfffeyou need to rest your Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Your Pokémon is looking great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, if you're going out,\xfffedon't forget your “cross-transceiver"!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Your Pokémon is looking great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, if you're going out,\xfffedon't forget your “cross-transceiver"!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're going to thank the\xfffeprofessor too, right?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBetter get going, honey!
texts.translated_text: You're going to thank the\xfffeprofessor too, right?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBetter get going, honey!

texts.original_text: Mom: Phew! I'm taking a little break\xfffefrom cleaning up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou and your Pokémon should take\xfffea break, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood Trainers don't push their\xfffePokémon too hard.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: Phew! I'm taking a little break\xfffefrom cleaning up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou and your Pokémon should take\xfffea break, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood Trainers don't push their\xfffePokémon too hard.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: You and your Pokémon should all be\xfffefilled with energy again!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNow, you can go anywhere!
texts.translated_text: Mom: You and your Pokémon should all be\xfffefilled with energy again!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNow, you can go anywhere!

texts.original_text: Mom: I wonder where you'll go next\xfffeand what kind of Pokémon you'll meet.
texts.translated_text: Mom: I wonder where you'll go next\xfffeand what kind of Pokémon you'll meet.

texts.original_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeHow are your Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should rest a little!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood Trainers don't push\xfffetheir Pokémon too hard.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeHow are your Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou should rest a little!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood Trainers don't push\xfffetheir Pokémon too hard.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: Great! You and your Pokémon\xfffelook raring to go, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBest get back to your journey!
texts.translated_text: Mom: Great! You and your Pokémon\xfffelook raring to go, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBest get back to your journey!

texts.original_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeare you being kind to your Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon work so hard to help you out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're normally very kind to your\xfffePokémon, aren't you?
texts.translated_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeare you being kind to your Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon work so hard to help you out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're normally very kind to your\xfffePokémon, aren't you?

texts.original_text: Mom: Now that you mention it...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour father went on a journey\xfffewith Pokémon, just as you are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe met during his trip...
texts.translated_text: Mom: Now that you mention it...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour father went on a journey\xfffewith Pokémon, just as you are!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe met during his trip...

texts.original_text: Mom: How are things going?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you caught many Pokémon?\xfffeThat was the professor's request, right?
texts.translated_text: Mom: How are things going?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you caught many Pokémon?\xfffeThat was the professor's request, right?

texts.original_text: Mom: I wonder what Cheren and Bianca\xfffewill find during their travels.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat they really want from life...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they figure that out for themselves,\xfffeI think their journeys will prove to be\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeall they could hope for!
texts.translated_text: Mom: I wonder what Cheren and Bianca\xfffewill find during their travels.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat they really want from life...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf they figure that out for themselves,\xfffeI think their journeys will prove to be\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeall they could hope for!

texts.original_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeWelcome home!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSounds like you've been through a lot!\xfffeYou should rest a little bit!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeWelcome home!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSounds like you've been through a lot!\xfffeYou should rest a little bit!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: Oh, my!\xfffeYou and your Pokémon look full of bounce!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is just a little advice from your\xfffemother, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a Pokémon's energy--um, I mean,\xfffeHP--runs out, hurry to a Pokémon Center\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand get it restored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's also a good idea to buy Potions\xfffeat a Pokémon Mart for times when you're\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadventuring far from civilization.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease be careful!\xfffeHave a good trip!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll always be cheering for you!
texts.translated_text: Mom: Oh, my!\xfffeYou and your Pokémon look full of bounce!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is just a little advice from your\xfffemother, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen a Pokémon's energy--um, I mean,\xfffeHP--runs out, hurry to a Pokémon Center\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand get it restored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's also a good idea to buy Potions\xfffeat a Pokémon Mart for times when you're\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeadventuring far from civilization.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease be careful!\xfffeHave a good trip!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll always be cheering for you!

texts.original_text: “Mom": Welcome home, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like you've been through\xfffemany amazing things, is it not so?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “Mom": Welcome home, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSeems like you've been through\xfffemany amazing things, is it not so?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: “Mom": Incredible, really.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAmazing, absolutely, meeting these\xfffetwo Pokémon of legend!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “Mom": Incredible, really.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAmazing, absolutely, meeting these\xfffetwo Pokémon of legend!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: “Mom": Ah, ah, this is...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “Mom": Ah, ah, this is...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: “Mom": Oh!\xfffeI still wear my disguise! Pardon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr, rather, let me introduce myself.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: “Mom": Oh!\xfffeI still wear my disguise! Pardon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOr, rather, let me introduce myself.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I am a globe-trotting elite of the\xfffeInternational Police.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy name... Ah, no, I shall inform you\xfffeof my code name only.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy code name, it is Looker.\xfffeIt is how I am called!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I am a globe-trotting elite of the\xfffeInternational Police.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy name... Ah, no, I shall inform you\xfffeof my code name only.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy code name, it is Looker.\xfffeIt is how I am called!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Behind the scenes in this region\xfffeof Unova, an organization called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma conspires...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis I have heard, and therefore,\xfffeto this region I must come, but...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Behind the scenes in this region\xfffeof Unova, an organization called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTeam Plasma conspires...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis I have heard, and therefore,\xfffeto this region I must come, but...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Thanks to the Gym Leaders and to you,\xfffeyes, Team Plasma's castle has fallen.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the members, they have gone upon\xfffetheir separate ways!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis is what I hear, most certainly!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Thanks to the Gym Leaders and to you,\xfffeyes, Team Plasma's castle has fallen.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd the members, they have gone upon\xfffetheir separate ways!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis is what I hear, most certainly!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, however!\xfffeHowever, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ones known as the Seven Sages--still,\xfffethey hide themselves in the Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: But, however!\xfffeHowever, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe ones known as the Seven Sages--still,\xfffethey hide themselves in the Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: And so, in the end, it explains why I must\xfffeask this of you, Trainer of amazing skill!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTravel the Unova region and search it up\xfffeand search it down for the Seven Sages!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlder, the Champion of renown,\xffferecommended you to my notice.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you willing to help me?
texts.translated_text: And so, in the end, it explains why I must\xfffeask this of you, Trainer of amazing skill!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTravel the Unova region and search it up\xfffeand search it down for the Seven Sages!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlder, the Champion of renown,\xffferecommended you to my notice.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you willing to help me?

texts.original_text: Ah, ah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYet once more shall I ask!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you please, travel the Unova region\xfffeand search it low and high for these\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages!
texts.translated_text: Ah, ah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYet once more shall I ask!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you please, travel the Unova region\xfffeand search it low and high for these\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSeven Sages!

texts.original_text: Looker: Excellent! I thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow I feel as if I have perhaps \xfffea million people on my side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePermit me to give this into your hands!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Excellent! I thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow I feel as if I have perhaps \xfffea million people on my side.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePermit me to give this into your hands!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: ...That's a Super Rod, right?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: ...That's a Super Rod, right?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Yes, correct!\xfffeIt is certainly a Super Rod!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Yes, correct!\xfffeIt is certainly a Super Rod!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: Weren't we talking about\xfffeTeam Plasma's Seven Sages?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat does this have to do with\xfffelooking for those people?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: Weren't we talking about\xfffeTeam Plasma's Seven Sages?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat does this have to do with\xfffelooking for those people?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: I see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is truly \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's mama to ask so!\xfffeWhat a magnificent question! I admire it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is my pleasure to answer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAbsolutely nothing!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: I see.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is truly \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's mama to ask so!\xfffeWhat a magnificent question! I admire it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt is my pleasure to answer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAbsolutely nothing!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: I see...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Mom: I see...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Looker: Yes, I shall provide the\xfffeexplanation of this, the Super Rod!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst!\xfffeFace the water and employ the rod!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSecond!\xfffeConcentrate your focal point!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it occurs that these Pokémon bite,\xfffe“!" will indicate. Immediately, reel in!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor the rest, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeI depend upon you!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Looker: Yes, I shall provide the\xfffeexplanation of this, the Super Rod!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst!\xfffeFace the water and employ the rod!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSecond!\xfffeConcentrate your focal point!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it occurs that these Pokémon bite,\xfffe“!" will indicate. Immediately, reel in!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor the rest, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeI depend upon you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Mom: People from the International\xfffePolice are kind of...unique, aren't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, no worries. I think you should just\xfffedo what you want to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're practically a grown-up now!
texts.translated_text: Mom: People from the International\xfffePolice are kind of...unique, aren't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, no worries. I think you should just\xfffedo what you want to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're practically a grown-up now!

texts.original_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard from Professor Juniper.\xfffeWe can have a Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard from Professor Juniper.\xfffeWe can have a Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ...\xfffe...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat's keeping Bianca?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: ...\xfffe...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat's keeping Bianca?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Am I a little late again?\xfffeSo-oooo-orry!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Am I a little late again?\xfffeSo-oooo-orry!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Bianca...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've known for ten years that you\xfffehave no sense of time, but...seriously...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's the day we can get a\xfffePokémon from Professor Juniper!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Bianca...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've known for ten years that you\xfffehave no sense of time, but...seriously...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's the day we can get a\xfffePokémon from Professor Juniper!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: I know. Sorry, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeSorry, Cheren.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: I know. Sorry, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeSorry, Cheren.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: So, where are the Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey were delivered to \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's\xfffehouse, so \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 gets first pick.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: So, where are the Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey were delivered to \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's\xfffehouse, so \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 gets first pick.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Naturally.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Naturally.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokémon are waiting for us\xfffeinside that gift box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you go first and take\xfffea peek at the gift box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to meet the Pokémon right now!
texts.translated_text: The Pokémon are waiting for us\xfffeinside that gift box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you go first and take\xfffea peek at the gift box.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to meet the Pokémon right now!

texts.original_text: Cheren: Aren't you going to check\xfffeout the gift box? Where are you going?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Aren't you going to check\xfffeout the gift box? Where are you going?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Would you get a move on\xfffeand open the gift box already?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the Pokémon are just as\xfffeexcited to meet us!
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Would you get a move on\xfffeand open the gift box already?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the Pokémon are just as\xfffeexcited to meet us!

texts.original_text: Bianca: Ooh!\xfffeWhat kind of Pokémon could they be?
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Ooh!\xfffeWhat kind of Pokémon could they be?

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 opened the gift box!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 opened the gift box!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wow! Pokémon are amaaaaazing!!\xfffeSo little, but so strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm so glad that I get to have a Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Oh.\xfffeUm, sorry about your room, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's decided. You'll be my opponent...\xfffein our first Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's see what you can do, \xf000ā\x0001\x0001!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: What nonsense is this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow could my daughter, who knows\xfffenothing about the world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebe going on a journey with Pokémon?
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: What nonsense is this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow could my daughter, who knows\xfffenothing about the world,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebe going on a journey with Pokémon?

texts.original_text: Bianca's Mom: Don't mind my husband,\xfffedear. He's just being overprotective.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll children go on adventures\xfffewith Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's part of growing up.
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Mom: Don't mind my husband,\xfffedear. He's just being overprotective.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll children go on adventures\xfffewith Pokémon.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's part of growing up.

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Well, then.\xfffeI look forward to the stories Bianca will\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave for us next time she comes home.
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Well, then.\xfffeI look forward to the stories Bianca will\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave for us next time she comes home.

texts.original_text: Bianca's Dad: Even if there are many\xfffethings you want to do,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou're only one person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's frustrating, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Dad: Even if there are many\xfffethings you want to do,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou're only one person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's frustrating, isn't it?

texts.original_text: Bianca's Mom: Choosing one thing means\xfffehaving to give up something else.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, of course it's very hard to decide.
texts.translated_text: Bianca's Mom: Choosing one thing means\xfffehaving to give up something else.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, of course it's very hard to decide.

texts.original_text: Bianca: I was just looking over\xfffemy Pokédex again and thinking...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI sure have met a lot\xfffeof different Pokémon.
texts.translated_text: Bianca: I was just looking over\xfffemy Pokédex again and thinking...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI sure have met a lot\xfffeof different Pokémon.

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 checked the PC!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon Basics...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople live alongside Pokémon in\xfffethis world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe people who battle with Pokémon are\xfffecalled Pokémon Trainers.
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 checked the PC!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon Basics...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople live alongside Pokémon in\xfffethis world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe people who battle with Pokémon are\xfffecalled Pokémon Trainers.

texts.original_text: Cheren's Dad: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it from the professor!\xfffeSo, you're getting a Pokémon, eh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you've already got it!\xfffeHm, that sure is a cute Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you're all finally\xfffestarting your journeys as Trainers?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, let me read you a passage from\xfffea book called “Adventure Rules."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“The X Button is vitally important\xfffefor Trainers." Never forget that.
texts.translated_text: Cheren's Dad: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI heard it from the professor!\xfffeSo, you're getting a Pokémon, eh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, you've already got it!\xfffeHm, that sure is a cute Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you're all finally\xfffestarting your journeys as Trainers?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, let me read you a passage from\xfffea book called “Adventure Rules."\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“The X Button is vitally important\xfffefor Trainers." Never forget that.

texts.original_text: Cheren's Mom: That Cheren.\xfffeI'm sure he's at the laboratory. \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's so... How should I put it?\xfffeDiligent or, better, conscientious.
texts.translated_text: Cheren's Mom: That Cheren.\xfffeI'm sure he's at the laboratory. \xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHe's so... How should I put it?\xfffeDiligent or, better, conscientious.

texts.original_text: Cheren's Dad: Traveling is great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou encounter so many things you've\xfffenever seen and things you don't yet\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand. Wherever you go, you'll\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelearn something new and grow up a little.
texts.translated_text: Cheren's Dad: Traveling is great!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou encounter so many things you've\xfffenever seen and things you don't yet\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand. Wherever you go, you'll\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelearn something new and grow up a little.

texts.original_text: Cheren's Mom: Why, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hear the professor asked you to\xfffecomplete the Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't worry!\xfffeYou'll always have Pokémon by your side.
texts.translated_text: Cheren's Mom: Why, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hear the professor asked you to\xfffecomplete the Pokédex.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't worry!\xfffeYou'll always have Pokémon by your side.

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 checked the PC screen.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAdventure Rule No. 1\xfffeThe X Button opens the menu!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAdventure Rule No. 2\xfffeRecord your progress with SAVE.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is nothing else on here...

texts.original_text: Hi there!\xfffeI've been waiting for you young people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me introduce myself again.\xfffeMy name is...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hi there!\xfffeI've been waiting for you young people!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me introduce myself again.\xfffeMy name is...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Professor Juniper?\xfffeWe know your name.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cheren: Professor Juniper?\xfffeWe know your name.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Come, come, Cheren!\xfffeThis is not a time to take things lightly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday is a day to remember always, so\xfffeit's best to behave with some formality.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat being so, once again, my name is\xfffeProfessor Juniper, and I am researching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen and how the creatures called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon came into existence.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Come, come, Cheren!\xfffeThis is not a time to take things lightly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday is a day to remember always, so\xfffeit's best to behave with some formality.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat being so, once again, my name is\xfffeProfessor Juniper, and I am researching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen and how the creatures called\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon came into existence.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, that's unusual!\xfffeYou've already had a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo maybe that's why...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt feels as though your Pokémon have\xfffealready begun to trust you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, would you like to give your\xfffePokémon a nickname?
texts.translated_text: Oh, that's unusual!\xfffeYou've already had a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo maybe that's why...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt feels as though your Pokémon have\xfffealready begun to trust you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, would you like to give your\xfffePokémon a nickname?

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Uh-huh, I see.\xfffeAre you OK with the nickname \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000?
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Uh-huh, I see.\xfffeAre you OK with the nickname \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000?

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: \xf000Ă\x0001\x0000 is its\xfffename. That is such a great name!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: You aren't planning\xfffeto use a nickname? Well, that's fine, too.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: As for why I gave all\xfffeof you Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: I am astonished.\xfffeNice work, Cheren!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have already studied Pokémon\xfffeextensively, haven't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill, let me explain everything from the\xfffebeginning, for everyone's sake.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The Pokédex is a high-tech device that\xfffeautomatically records the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou encounter!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, I want you three to visit many\xfffeplaces and meet all of the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein the Unova region!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: The Pokédex is a high-tech device that\xfffeautomatically records the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou encounter!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, I want you three to visit many\xfffeplaces and meet all of the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein the Unova region!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: This is my request.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeCheren! Bianca!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll go on an adventure to\xfffecomplete the Pokédex, will you not?
texts.translated_text: This is my request.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeCheren! Bianca!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll go on an adventure to\xfffecomplete the Pokédex, will you not?

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Here is what I need\xfffefrom you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want to hear are the courageous\xfffewords of people who will blaze new\xf000븀\x0000\xfffepaths around the world!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want you three to travel to many\xfffedistant places and meet all of the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon in the Unova region!

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, did you know this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you give a Pokémon called Feebas\xfffea Prism Scale and trade it with someone,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeapparently it evolves.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIsn't that amazing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon sure are mysterious beings,\xfffearen't they?

texts.original_text: Bianca: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, did you know this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Pinwheel Forest, there is a rock\xfffethat's covered in moss.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt might be related to the rock, I dunno,\xfffebut there is a Pokémon that evolves\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhen it levels up in Pinwheel Forest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon sure are mysterious beings,\xfffearen't they?

texts.original_text: Bianca: Phew!\xfffeI'm totally sure, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're really a strong Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI love your style of Pokémon\xfffebattling, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomehow your Pokémon look like\xfffethey're having so much fun!

texts.original_text: My name is Ghetsis.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am here representing Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday, ladies and gentlemen, I would like\xfffeto talk to you about Pokémon liberation.
texts.translated_text: My name is Ghetsis.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am here representing Team Plasma.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday, ladies and gentlemen, I would like\xfffeto talk to you about Pokémon liberation.

texts.original_text: Huh?
texts.translated_text: Huh?

texts.original_text: What?
texts.translated_text: What?

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: I'm sure most of you believe\xfffethat we humans and Pokémon are partners\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat have come to live together because\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe want and need each other.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever...\xfffeIs that really the truth?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you ever considered that perhaps\xfffewe humans...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeonly assume that this is the truth?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: I'm sure most of you believe\xfffethat we humans and Pokémon are partners\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat have come to live together because\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewe want and need each other.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever...\xfffeIs that really the truth?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you ever considered that perhaps\xfffewe humans...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeonly assume that this is the truth?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Pokémon are subject to the selfish\xfffecommands of Trainers...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey get pushed around when they are\xfffeour “partners" at work...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCan anyone say with confidence that\xfffethere is no truth in what I'm saying?
texts.translated_text: Pokémon are subject to the selfish\xfffecommands of Trainers...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey get pushed around when they are\xfffeour “partners" at work...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCan anyone say with confidence that\xfffethere is no truth in what I'm saying?

texts.original_text: Yikes!
texts.translated_text: Yikes!

texts.original_text: No way.
texts.translated_text: No way.

texts.original_text: I don't know...
texts.translated_text: I don't know...

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: Now, ladies and gentlemen,\xfffePokémon are different from humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are living beings that contain\xfffeunknown potential.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are living beings from whom we\xfffehumans have much to learn.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTell me, what is our responsibility toward\xfffethese wonderful beings called Pokémon?
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: Now, ladies and gentlemen,\xfffePokémon are different from humans.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are living beings that contain\xfffeunknown potential.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey are living beings from whom we\xfffehumans have much to learn.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTell me, what is our responsibility toward\xfffethese wonderful beings called Pokémon?

texts.original_text: What could it be?
texts.translated_text: What could it be?

texts.original_text: Liberation?
texts.translated_text: Liberation?

texts.original_text: Ghetsis: That's right!\xfffeWe must liberate the Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, and only then, will humans\xfffeand Pokémon truly be equals.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone, I end my words here today by\xfffeimploring you to consider the relationship\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween people and Pokémon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the correct way to proceed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe sincerely appreciate your attention.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ghetsis: That's right!\xfffeWe must liberate the Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, and only then, will humans\xfffeand Pokémon truly be equals.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone, I end my words here today by\xfffeimploring you to consider the relationship\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween people and Pokémon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand the correct way to proceed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe sincerely appreciate your attention.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cheren: Huh... Strange guy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I'm not going to worry about it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers and Pokémon help\xfffeeach other out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeListen, I'm going on ahead.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to battle the Gym Leader\xfffein the next town--Striaton City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAim to battle Gym Leader after\xfffeGym Leader. The best way for a Trainer\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto become stronger is to challenge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Gym Leaders in each area.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What's this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou and your Pokémon\xfffesomehow resemble each other!
texts.translated_text: What's this?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou and your Pokémon\xfffesomehow resemble each other!

texts.original_text: Let me give you the benefit of\xfffemy experience.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou listening? The number of Pokémon\xfffeyou can take with you at one time is six!
texts.translated_text: Let me give you the benefit of\xfffemy experience.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou listening? The number of Pokémon\xfffeyou can take with you at one time is six!

texts.original_text: Pokémon do everything in\xfffetheir power for people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople treat these Pokémon\xfffewith love and affection.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think our\xfffemutual relationship is.
texts.translated_text: Pokémon do everything in\xfffetheir power for people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople treat these Pokémon\xfffewith love and affection.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think our\xfffemutual relationship is.

texts.original_text: Beautiful scenery and relaxing sounds...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, man. I sure do loooove this place.\xfffeSure makes me feel happy.
texts.translated_text: Beautiful scenery and relaxing sounds...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, man. I sure do loooove this place.\xfffeSure makes me feel happy.

texts.original_text: Some wild Pokémon jump out of the\xfffetall grass and attack...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you can make friends with those\xfffePokémon if you reach out to them!
texts.translated_text: Some wild Pokémon jump out of the\xfffetall grass and attack...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you can make friends with those\xfffePokémon if you reach out to them!

texts.original_text: Accumula Town\xfffeThe Fast-Growing Town!
texts.translated_text: Accumula Town\xfffeThe Fast-Growing Town!

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: This is a\xfffePokémon Center!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you feel better as soon as you\xfffestep through the door?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, let's start your tour!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: This is a\xfffePokémon Center!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't you feel better as soon as you\xfffestep through the door?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, let's start your tour!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Ooh, wait for me!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Ooh, wait for me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: A Pokémon Center is a\xfffetruly incredible place!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you know why?\xfffeBecause your Pokémon can be healed!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd, what's more, it's absolutely free!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon Center is a Trainer's\xfffebest friend!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, give it a try.
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: A Pokémon Center is a\xfffetruly incredible place!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you know why?\xfffeBecause your Pokémon can be healed!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd, what's more, it's absolutely free!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pokémon Center is a Trainer's\xfffebest friend!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, give it a try.

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeWhere are you off to?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHumor me and talk to the lady at the\xfffecounter. Let her take your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Hey, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeWhere are you off to?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHumor me and talk to the lady at the\xfffecounter. Let her take your Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: You should be talking\xfffeto the lady at the counter, not to me...
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: You should be talking\xfffeto the lady at the counter, not to me...

texts.original_text: Bianca: All you need to do is give her\xfffeyour Pokémon, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.
texts.translated_text: Bianca: All you need to do is give her\xfffeyour Pokémon, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: OK. Now that your\xfffePokémon have rested, I'll show you how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto use the PC at a Pokémon Center.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: OK. Now that your\xfffePokémon have rested, I'll show you how\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto use the PC at a Pokémon Center.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: This is the PC.\xfffeIt's free for any Trainer to use.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can store Pokémon in your PC Boxes\xfffeor select Pokémon stored in your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePC Boxes to take along with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn addition, if you catch a new Pokémon\xfffewhile you have six Pokémon traveling\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith you, the Pokémon you just caught is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesent automatically to the PC network!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSurprising, isn't it? Amazing, even.\xfffeHere's something else that's cool.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you select my PC, I'll evaluate the\xfffeprogress you've made on your Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: This is the PC.\xfffeIt's free for any Trainer to use.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can store Pokémon in your PC Boxes\xfffeor select Pokémon stored in your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePC Boxes to take along with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn addition, if you catch a new Pokémon\xfffewhile you have six Pokémon traveling\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith you, the Pokémon you just caught is\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesent automatically to the PC network!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSurprising, isn't it? Amazing, even.\xfffeHere's something else that's cool.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you select my PC, I'll evaluate the\xfffeprogress you've made on your Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Professor...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt says “Someone's PC"\xfffeon the screen. Who is Someone?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Bianca: Professor...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt says “Someone's PC"\xfffeon the screen. Who is Someone?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Very good, Bianca.\xfffeThat's a great observation!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood question, and I'd like to say more,\xfffebut for now, just ignore that and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego ahead and use the PC.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Someone" is the person who made the\xfffePokémon Storage System.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Someone I'm sure you'll meet someday!\xfffeOK, let's move on!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Very good, Bianca.\xfffeThat's a great observation!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGood question, and I'd like to say more,\xfffebut for now, just ignore that and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego ahead and use the PC.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Someone" is the person who made the\xfffePokémon Storage System.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Someone I'm sure you'll meet someday!\xfffeOK, let's move on!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: Now, this is the\xfffePoké Mart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the place to buy useful items and\xfffesell the ones you don't need anymore!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat gentleman over there will\xfffehelp you with a smile!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Professor Juniper: Now, this is the\xfffePoké Mart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is the place to buy useful items and\xfffesell the ones you don't need anymore!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat gentleman over there will\xfffehelp you with a smile!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Professor Juniper: So, let's\xfffewrap this up.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've given you the basics of being\xfffea Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to head back to Nuvema Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOne final thing...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you get to Striaton City, go and\xfffemeet an inventor named Fennel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe's a friend of mine from long ago, and\xfffeI'm sure she'll help you on your way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBest of luck! I hope that your journeys\xfffeprove to be the adventure of a lifetime!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Bianca: Ooh! What should I buy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePotions and Poké Balls are definitely\xfffeimportant. Ummm...thinking...\xf000븁\x0000
