texts.original_text: Be sure to save what's happened up\xfffeto this point before you forget.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThen you can take a break.
texts.translated_text: Be sure to save what's happened up\xfffeto this point before you forget.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThen you can take a break.

texts.original_text: It is important to train your Pokémon in\xfffebattle, but when their HP goes down,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetake them to a Pokémon Center.
texts.translated_text: It is important to train your Pokémon in\xfffebattle, but when their HP goes down,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetake them to a Pokémon Center.

texts.original_text: Trainer, how many Poké Balls do\xfffeyou have?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you think you don't have enough,\xfffeit's a good idea to buy some\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeat a shop in a Pokémon Center!

texts.original_text: Oh! Your Pokémon!\xfffeYou're so lucky. I envy you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to be a Trainer, too!
texts.translated_text: Oh! Your Pokémon!\xfffeYou're so lucky. I envy you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to be a Trainer, too!

texts.original_text: Someone said that because there are\xfffedifferent ideas, disputes will arise...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeone else said that because there are\xfffedifferent ideas, the world will expand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess they're both right.
texts.translated_text: Someone said that because there are\xfffedifferent ideas, disputes will arise...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeone else said that because there are\xfffedifferent ideas, the world will expand...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess they're both right.

texts.original_text: We've just gotten married. Men and women\xfffeare so different, aren't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I don't see much difference between\xfffemale and female Pokémon...
texts.translated_text: We've just gotten married. Men and women\xfffeare so different, aren't they?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I don't see much difference between\xfffemale and female Pokémon...

texts.original_text: On Route 2, many Trainers train their\xfffePokémon by having them battle!
texts.translated_text: On Route 2, many Trainers train their\xfffePokémon by having them battle!

texts.original_text: Guess what I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know! Pokémon can remember\xfffeup to four moves at a time! Hee hee!
texts.translated_text: Guess what I know!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know! Pokémon can remember\xfffeup to four moves at a time! Hee hee!

texts.original_text: Wow, you have that great Bag that can\xfffestore anything!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you buy a lot of Potions\xfffeand put them in your Bag?
texts.translated_text: Wow, you have that great Bag that can\xfffestore anything!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't you buy a lot of Potions\xfffeand put them in your Bag?

texts.original_text: Weak Pokémon, strong Pokémon,\xfffecool Pokémon, cute Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMany Pokémon look forward\xfffeto meeting you!
texts.translated_text: Weak Pokémon, strong Pokémon,\xfffecool Pokémon, cute Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMany Pokémon look forward\xfffeto meeting you!

texts.original_text: Pokémon will be strong if you train them,\xfffeeven if they're weak now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLove is what's important!
texts.translated_text: Pokémon will be strong if you train them,\xfffeeven if they're weak now.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLove is what's important!

texts.original_text: If you get strong, you can move forward.\xfffeIf you move forward, you'll be stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the cool thing about journeys!
texts.translated_text: If you get strong, you can move forward.\xfffeIf you move forward, you'll be stronger.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the cool thing about journeys!

texts.original_text: When a hero leads the world, a Pokémon\xfffeis going to come and help the hero...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEverybody in the Unova region\xfffeknows that legend!

texts.original_text: Lacunosa Town\xfffeMethodical and Orderly
texts.translated_text: Lacunosa Town\xfffeMethodical and Orderly

texts.original_text: Welcome to Lacunosa Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this town, people live as methodically\xfffeas clockwork from morning to night.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you live your life soaking up sunlight,\xfffeyou can sleep very well at night.
texts.translated_text: Welcome to Lacunosa Town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn this town, people live as methodically\xfffeas clockwork from morning to night.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you live your life soaking up sunlight,\xfffeyou can sleep very well at night.

texts.original_text: Well, hello there, young traveler!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like to hear an old story\xfffeof Lacunosa Town?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBear with me, because I'm an old lady who\xfffelikes telling tales the old-fashioned way!
texts.translated_text: Well, hello there, young traveler!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you like to hear an old story\xfffeof Lacunosa Town?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBear with me, because I'm an old lady who\xfffelikes telling tales the old-fashioned way!

texts.original_text: There's a great big hole at the back\xfffeof this town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA long time ago, a huge meteor fell from\xfffethe sky and made the big hole.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA very scary monster was hiding\xfffeinside the meteor!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople say the monster appeared in the\xfffevillage at night, bringing a cold wind, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit stole away people and Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the villagers built big walls to keep\xfffethe monster out and made a rule that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeno one could go out after dark.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There's a great big hole at the back\xfffeof this town.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA long time ago, a huge meteor fell from\xfffethe sky and made the big hole.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA very scary monster was hiding\xfffeinside the meteor!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePeople say the monster appeared in the\xfffevillage at night, bringing a cold wind, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeit stole away people and Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the villagers built big walls to keep\xfffethe monster out and made a rule that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeno one could go out after dark.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: ...Of course, nowadays nobody believes in\xfffesuch things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you know...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven now, the people of this town\xfffestay inside after dark.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that strange?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess old stories and old traditions\xfffehave some influence on our current life.
texts.translated_text: ...Of course, nowadays nobody believes in\xfffesuch things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you know...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEven now, the people of this town\xfffestay inside after dark.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIsn't that strange?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess old stories and old traditions\xfffehave some influence on our current life.

texts.original_text: Oh, well, that's too bad. Come talk to me\xfffeif you're ever in the mood for a story!
texts.translated_text: Oh, well, that's too bad. Come talk to me\xfffeif you're ever in the mood for a story!

texts.original_text: At night, a scary monster comes out of\xfffethe big hole, so you have to go home\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand be good!
texts.translated_text: At night, a scary monster comes out of\xfffethe big hole, so you have to go home\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand be good!

texts.original_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhirrrrr...plunk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the sound my fishing rod makes.\xfffeI like to hear it every day!
texts.translated_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhirrrrr...plunk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the sound my fishing rod makes.\xfffeI like to hear it every day!

texts.original_text: My grandma loves to tell old stories.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe makes me listen to her long stories\xfffeall the time!
texts.translated_text: My grandma loves to tell old stories.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe makes me listen to her long stories\xfffeall the time!

texts.original_text: There are a lot of people in the world,\xfffeand there are just as many different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecharacteristics and ideas.
texts.translated_text: There are a lot of people in the world,\xfffeand there are just as many different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecharacteristics and ideas.

texts.original_text: I don't have anything to do ever since\xfffeI took a post here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince nobody goes outside at night,\xfffeit's very peaceful.
texts.translated_text: I don't have anything to do ever since\xfffeI took a post here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince nobody goes outside at night,\xfffeit's very peaceful.

texts.original_text: Gahoo! Gahoo!
texts.translated_text: Gahoo! Gahoo!

texts.original_text: My Pokémon always goes out\xfffefor fun without me.
texts.translated_text: My Pokémon always goes out\xfffefor fun without me.

texts.original_text: Oh, Shaymin!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it comes to Shaymin,\xfffeGracidea flowers are important!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a lot of Gracidea flowers,\xfffeso let me share one with you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I don't have anything to do ever since\xfffeI took a post here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince nobody goes outside at night,\xfffeit's very peaceful.

texts.original_text: My Pokémon is always running off\xfffeto go play on its own.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it always comes back before dark,\xfffeso I guess it's OK.
texts.translated_text: My Pokémon is always running off\xfffeto go play on its own.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it always comes back before dark,\xfffeso I guess it's OK.

texts.original_text: This is Lacunosa Town. Here, everyone\xfffelives according to the rules, from the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoment they awaken to the time they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego to sleep.
texts.translated_text: This is Lacunosa Town. Here, everyone\xfffelives according to the rules, from the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoment they awaken to the time they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffego to sleep.

texts.original_text: At night, a scary monster comes out of\xfffethe big hole, so you have to go home\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand be good!
texts.translated_text: At night, a scary monster comes out of\xfffethe big hole, so you have to go home\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand be good!

texts.original_text: Zzz... Zzz...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...W-what?\xfffeWhat do you want, now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you pick now to listen to\xfffemy stories?

texts.original_text: Mmm... OK, I'll tell you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBehind our Lacunosa Town,\xfffethere's a big hole in the ground.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat hole, way in the past...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAaaahhh, I'm so tired...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat hole, there was a...a big...\xfffecrashed down...inside was...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffebig, scary...really scary...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeZzz... Zzz... Zzz...

texts.translated_text: Aaaahhh... Oh, I should...\xfffeOK, I'll sleep then...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGoodni... Zzz...\xfffeZzz... Zzz...

texts.original_text: My grandma loves old stories!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm always having to listen\xfffeto her really long stories.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut sometimes if it's night, she'll\xfffefall asleep right in the middle of a story.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's OK, though. She's not only healthy,\xfffeshe's a free-spirited grandma, too!

She's not only healthy,\xfffeshe's a free-spirited grandma, too!

texts.original_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhirrrrr...plunk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the sound my fishing rod makes.\xfffeI like to hear it every day!
texts.translated_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhirrrrr...plunk!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's the sound my fishing rod makes.\xfffeI like to hear it every day!

texts.original_text: There are a lot of people in the world,\xfffeand there are just as many different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecharacteristics and ideas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I'd be really happy if I could\xfffemeet a lot of people and see the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifferences for myself!
texts.translated_text: There are a lot of people in the world,\xfffeand there are just as many different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecharacteristics and ideas.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think I'd be really happy if I could\xfffemeet a lot of people and see the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifferences for myself!

texts.original_text: My mama says there's a scary monster\xfffewho comes out of the big hole at night,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso we have to stay home and be good!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut that monster must be a Pokémon.\xfffeRight? So I'm not scared at all!
texts.translated_text: My mama says there's a scary monster\xfffewho comes out of the big hole at night,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso we have to stay home and be good!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut that monster must be a Pokémon.\xfffeRight? So I'm not scared at all!

texts.original_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm busy, so I won't fish at night, but\xfffethere may be big fish!
texts.translated_text: Along the road ahead, there is a\xfffecoastline that fishing fans love.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm busy, so I won't fish at night, but\xfffethere may be big fish!

texts.original_text: My grandma loves to tell old stories,\xfffeand she makes me listen to her long\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestories all the time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes I just want to go out on my\xfffeown and paint the town red!
texts.translated_text: My grandma loves to tell old stories,\xfffeand she makes me listen to her long\xf000븀\x0000\xfffestories all the time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSometimes I just want to go out on my\xfffeown and paint the town red!

texts.original_text: Ever since I took a post here, I don't\xfffereally have anything to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm so bored! I'm afraid all my policing\xfffemuscles will shrivel up because I don't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuse them anymore.
texts.translated_text: Ever since I took a post here, I don't\xfffereally have anything to do.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm so bored! I'm afraid all my policing\xfffemuscles will shrivel up because I don't\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeuse them anymore.

texts.original_text: My Pokémon always goes out\xfffeto have fun without me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder where it gets that attitude?
texts.translated_text: My Pokémon always goes out\xfffeto have fun without me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder where it gets that attitude?

texts.original_text: Gahoon! Gahoon!
texts.translated_text: Gahoon! Gahoon!

texts.original_text: My work keeps me very busy, and I only\xfffego home once a week or so.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry to leave my wife lonely, but\xfffethat's the life of a powerful executive.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, this is a souvenir from a business\xfffetrip, but she does not seem to need it,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso I will give it to you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My work keeps me very busy, and I only\xfffego home once a week or so.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry to leave my wife lonely, but\xfffethat's the life of a powerful executive.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, this is a souvenir from a business\xfffetrip, but she does not seem to need it,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso I will give it to you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I leave on a business trip\xfffeagain tomorrow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think of myself as a role model\xfffefor businesspeople.
texts.translated_text: I leave on a business trip\xfffeagain tomorrow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think of myself as a role model\xfffefor businesspeople.

texts.original_text: You have an extremely bored look\xfffeon your face!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK! I'll let you have a very exciting\xfffePokémon battle with me!
texts.translated_text: You have an extremely bored look\xfffeon your face!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK! I'll let you have a very exciting\xfffePokémon battle with me!

texts.original_text: Oh, you are not bored...
texts.translated_text: Oh, you are not bored...

texts.original_text: Well, if you insist, I'll let you have\xfffeanother very exciting battle\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith me tomorrow!
texts.translated_text: Well, if you insist, I'll let you have\xfffeanother very exciting battle\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith me tomorrow!

texts.original_text: I like you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will let you see a very special thing,\xfffeso follow me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Inside this Hidden Machine is Dive!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe darkest parts of the sea are called\xfffediving points, and if you use Dive there,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can dive all the way to the bottom of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe sea!

texts.original_text: Ah, Cynthia...\xfffeWhy are you so Cynthia...?
texts.translated_text: Ah, Cynthia...\xfffeWhy are you so Cynthia...?

texts.original_text: Even Maids sometimes have to roost.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I was confused! A Pokémon restores\xfffeits HP when it uses the move Roost!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut for people, it's called resting.

texts.original_text: The sunlight is strong...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDepending on the Pokémon, that can be\xfffeeither an advantage or a disadvantage.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStrong sunlight makes Fire-type moves\xfffestronger and Water-type moves weaker.

texts.original_text: Isn't it great? Isn't it spacious?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is my dad's villa, and\xfffeI can use it freely!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But when I came here, surprisingly there\xfffewas nothing to do, so now I'm bored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs you may know, my dad is totally\xfffeobsessed with items at the ruins...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: But when I came here, surprisingly there\xfffewas nothing to do, so now I'm bored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs you may know, my dad is totally\xfffeobsessed with items at the ruins...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hey, you're bored, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome here tomorrow, too!\xfffeI don't mind having a battle with you!
texts.translated_text: Hey, you're bored, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome here tomorrow, too!\xfffeI don't mind having a battle with you!

texts.original_text: Hey, you're bored, aren't you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome here tomorrow, too!\xfffeI don't mind having a battle with you!

texts.original_text: Oh, you came!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have an extremely bored look\xfffeon your face.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't mind having a battle with you!

texts.original_text: Ah... You are not bored...

texts.original_text: Argh!\xfffeSo frustrating! Whywhywhy?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You're awesome!\xfffeI don't mind giving you a little credit!

texts.original_text: Oh, you seem to be having fun.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, you seem to be having fun.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How are you, Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been so dreadfully bored in my\xfffefather's villa! May I join you?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: How are you, Trainer?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been so dreadfully bored in my\xfffefather's villa! May I join you?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How are you, Trainer?\xfffeI won't lose today.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: How are you, Trainer?\xfffeI won't lose today.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In my father's villa, I have too much\xfffetime on my hands.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come for a visit tomorrow, too.\xfffeI will have a battle with you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In my father's villa, I have too much\xfffetime on my hands.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come for a visit tomorrow, too.\xfffeI will have a battle with you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In my father's villa, I have too much\xfffetime on my hands.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come for a visit tomorrow, too.\xfffeI will have a battle with you.
texts.translated_text: In my father's villa, I have too much\xfffetime on my hands.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come for a visit tomorrow, too.\xfffeI will have a battle with you.

texts.original_text: You are as strong as usual.\xfffeBut I wonder what will happen next time.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You are as strong as usual.\xfffeBut I wonder what will happen next time.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: How are you?\xfffeI am pleased you came here today, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I trouble you for another battle?\xfffeLet me see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst, please have a battle\xfffewith my little brother!
texts.translated_text: How are you?\xfffeI am pleased you came here today, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMay I trouble you for another battle?\xfffeLet me see...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFirst, please have a battle\xfffewith my little brother!

texts.original_text: None of the Riches is a match for you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI admire your strength!
texts.translated_text: None of the Riches is a match for you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI admire your strength!

texts.original_text: Oh, it's quite lively for some reason.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, it's quite lively for some reason.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I truly appreciate you for having battles\xfffewith my grandchildren.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now, I'd like to see in what ways\xfffeyour skills exceed theirs.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I truly appreciate you for having battles\xfffewith my grandchildren.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd now, I'd like to see in what ways\xfffeyour skills exceed theirs.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hoho! Do you have confidence\xfffein winning against me?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hoho! Do you have confidence\xfffein winning against me?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Undella Town is a relaxing and\xfffecomfortable place.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut my grandchildren seem\xfffesomewhat bored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come visit us tomorrow, too.\xfffeMy grandchildren will be happy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto see you again.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Undella Town is a relaxing and\xfffecomfortable place.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut my grandchildren seem\xfffesomewhat bored.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come visit us tomorrow, too.\xfffeMy grandchildren will be happy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto see you again.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ho, ho. You are genuinely strong!\xfffeYou look dependable!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ho, ho. You are genuinely strong!\xfffeYou look dependable!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Welcome back, young Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy grandchildren are itching to have\xfffemore battles with you.
texts.translated_text: Welcome back, young Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy grandchildren are itching to have\xfffemore battles with you.

texts.original_text: Children of today are very strong in\xfffePokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHoho! I wonder if my grandchildren\xfffecan become Trainers like you?

texts.original_text: Hoho!\xfffePokémon battles bring back memories.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hoho! No matter how old I get,\xfffePokémon battles are fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis kind of excitement\xfffeis not bad from time to time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease come back anytime.\xfffeNext time, I will win!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I may not look like it, but I am very\xfffefamiliar with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI would like to have a battle with you\xfffesomeday again.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Welcome.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday for sure I'm going to show you\xfffethe real strength of the Riches!

texts.original_text: I didn't expect you to be this strong...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's a complete defeat...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Riches sincerely wish every success\xfffeto you in the future.

texts.original_text: You! Do you still call yourself\xfffeone of the Riches?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I am Miles, the next head of the Riches!\xfffeI will protect the honor of our family!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No matter how often you try, \xfffeyou cannot defeat me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI will protect the honor\xfffeof The Riches!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You may come back again tomorrow.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHowever, I have no intention of losing\xfffein the name of the Riches.

texts.original_text: Sigh.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess...it's still too early to identify\xfffemyself as the head of the family.

texts.original_text: Hello, there!\xfffeYou kindly traded me that Pokémon, and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenow you can hardly recognize me, eh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 is by my side,\xfffeI've trimmed down a little!

texts.original_text: We come here for vacation from\xfffefaraway Hoenn during the summer!

texts.original_text: I'm sure you know about Undella Town's\xfffeAbyssal Ruins, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm staying here at my friend's villa\xfffeso I can investigate them.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In order to get to know each other\xfffebetter as Pokémon Trainers,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI would like our Pokémon to have a match.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?
texts.translated_text: In order to get to know each other\xfffebetter as Pokémon Trainers,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI would like our Pokémon to have a match.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?

texts.original_text: Before I send out my Pokémon,\xfffemy heart always begins to race...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInteresting...\xfffeMy Pokémon in their Poké Balls are\xf000븀\x0000\xffferadiating a happy feeling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you the reason?\xfffeWhat are you?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Before I send out my Pokémon,\xfffemy heart always begins to race...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeInteresting...\xfffeMy Pokémon in their Poké Balls are\xf000븀\x0000\xffferadiating a happy feeling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you the reason?\xfffeWhat are you?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ha ha. You prefer to take things slowly\xfffeand rationally, am I right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you're ready, come and talk to me.\xfffeI'll be happy to see you.
texts.translated_text: Ha ha. You prefer to take things slowly\xfffeand rationally, am I right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you're ready, come and talk to me.\xfffeI'll be happy to see you.

texts.original_text: Cynthia: Oh.\xfffeYou've had a chance to get ready?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI do want our Pokémon to have a match...\xfffeAre you prepared to be my opponent?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: Oh.\xfffeYou've had a chance to get ready?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI do want our Pokémon to have a match...\xfffeAre you prepared to be my opponent?

texts.original_text: Cynthia: That was beyond my expectation!\xfffeWhat an exceptional battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou certainly bear a resemblance\xfffeto that Trainer who faced Giratina...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, pardon me.\xfffeI was just thinking out loud.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI love being here in spring and summer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't stay all year, because there's\xfffeso much to investigate in Sinnoh, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're a great Trainer, and it would make\xfffeme happy to see you again sometime.
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: That was beyond my expectation!\xfffeWhat an exceptional battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou certainly bear a resemblance\xfffeto that Trainer who faced Giratina...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, pardon me.\xfffeI was just thinking out loud.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI love being here in spring and summer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI can't stay all year, because there's\xfffeso much to investigate in Sinnoh, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're a great Trainer, and it would make\xfffeme happy to see you again sometime.

texts.original_text: Cynthia: I love to come here in\xfffespring and summer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there are a lot of things to\xfffeinvestigate in Sinnoh, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd be delighted to see you again.\xfffeYou're an awesome Pokémon Trainer!
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: I love to come here in\xfffespring and summer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there are a lot of things to\xfffeinvestigate in Sinnoh, as well.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd be delighted to see you again.\xfffeYou're an awesome Pokémon Trainer!

texts.original_text: Cynthia: How terrific to see you again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've got to tell you...\xfffeMy Pokémon are excited to battle yours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: How terrific to see you again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've got to tell you...\xfffeMy Pokémon are excited to battle yours.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?

texts.original_text: Cynthia: This will be such fun!\xfffeNo holds barred!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: This will be such fun!\xfffeNo holds barred!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cynthia: Oh, what a pity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSummers in Undella Town make me feel like\xfffeI'm on holiday. I forget about battling!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut in spring, I feel like getting\xfffeworked up with a good battle.
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: Oh, what a pity.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSummers in Undella Town make me feel like\xfffeI'm on holiday. I forget about battling!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut in spring, I feel like getting\xfffeworked up with a good battle.

texts.original_text: Cynthia: I can tell that my Pokémon are\xfffeexcited about battling your Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: I can tell that my Pokémon are\xfffeexcited about battling your Pokémon...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWould you care to be my opponent?

texts.original_text: Cynthia: For some reason, this reminds me\xfffeof a time when I told a Trainer like you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto go see many, many more places\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand to meet many more Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor me, it has really been worthwhile to\xfffecome all the way to far Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Because...\xfffeI met you, and my world got wider!
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: For some reason, this reminds me\xfffeof a time when I told a Trainer like you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto go see many, many more places\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand to meet many more Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor me, it has really been worthwhile to\xfffecome all the way to far Unova.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Because...\xfffeI met you, and my world got wider!

texts.original_text: Cynthia: To live their lives to the\xfffefullest, people and Pokémon need\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe chance to throw themselves into\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebattle against the fiercest opposition.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I want to battle you.\xfffeHow about it?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: To live their lives to the\xfffefullest, people and Pokémon need\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe chance to throw themselves into\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebattle against the fiercest opposition.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's why I want to battle you.\xfffeHow about it?

texts.original_text: Cynthia: As our Pokémon meet in battle,\xfffeI'll learn more about you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand how you've taken care of them.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: As our Pokémon meet in battle,\xfffeI'll learn more about you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand how you've taken care of them.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Cynthia: I'm a little disappointed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know you can battle on bigger\xfffestages than you've done so far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's so plain to me that your light can\xfffeshine brighter than this...
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: I'm a little disappointed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know you can battle on bigger\xfffestages than you've done so far!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's so plain to me that your light can\xfffeshine brighter than this...

texts.original_text: Cynthia: Are you prepared?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's battle at full strength and see\xfffehow bright our lights can shine!
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: Are you prepared?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's battle at full strength and see\xfffehow bright our lights can shine!

texts.original_text: Cynthia: When you meet Trainers, battle\xfffethem to learn about the kind of people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey are. Observe the Pokémon they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechoose, which moves they taught them,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand which items the Pokémon hold.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou don't need words at such times...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to know more about me...\xfffeCome to Sinnoh!
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: When you meet Trainers, battle\xfffethem to learn about the kind of people\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethey are. Observe the Pokémon they\xf000븀\x0000\xfffechoose, which moves they taught them,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand which items the Pokémon hold.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou don't need words at such times...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you want to know more about me...\xfffeCome to Sinnoh!

texts.original_text: Caitlin: Having everything go your way\xfffeis the road to disillusionment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnowing the difference between what's\xfffeimpossible and what's possible...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI used to know someone who \xfffetalked about that a lot.
texts.translated_text: Caitlin: Having everything go your way\xfffeis the road to disillusionment.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKnowing the difference between what's\xfffeimpossible and what's possible...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI used to know someone who \xfffetalked about that a lot.

texts.original_text: Caitlin: No matter how hard I try,\xfffeI cannot defeat Cynthia.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, I would have exploded with rage.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, I have the tranquility to reflect on\xfffemy performance to see how I can improve.
texts.translated_text: Caitlin: No matter how hard I try,\xfffeI cannot defeat Cynthia.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, I would have exploded with rage.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, I have the tranquility to reflect on\xfffemy performance to see how I can improve.

texts.original_text: Caitlin: Tell me something.\xfffeAre you familiar with Battle Castles?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can find them in Johto and Sinnoh,\xfffeso challenge them to improve yourself.
texts.translated_text: Caitlin: Tell me something.\xfffeAre you familiar with Battle Castles?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can find them in Johto and Sinnoh,\xfffeso challenge them to improve yourself.

texts.original_text: Caitlin: This is my villa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have villas all over the world,\xfffeand I allow Cynthia to use them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are welcome to come and play\xfffewhenever you wish.
texts.translated_text: Caitlin: This is my villa.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have villas all over the world,\xfffeand I allow Cynthia to use them.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou are welcome to come and play\xfffewhenever you wish.

texts.original_text: Caitlin: Having no psychic powers at all\xfffeis better than having psychic powers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can't control.
texts.translated_text: Caitlin: Having no psychic powers at all\xfffeis better than having psychic powers\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can't control.

texts.original_text: Shauntal: When I'm writing novels,\xfffeif I don't have enough input,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy output suffers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's the same thing for Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo grow stronger, Trainers need to have\xfffecountless battles and learn many things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, they must put what they've learned\xfffeto the test in real battles.
texts.translated_text: Shauntal: When I'm writing novels,\xfffeif I don't have enough input,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemy output suffers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's the same thing for Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTo grow stronger, Trainers need to have\xfffecountless battles and learn many things.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, they must put what they've learned\xfffeto the test in real battles.

texts.original_text: Shauntal: Rainbow Wing...\xfffeSilver Wing...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThey stir the imagination!
texts.translated_text: Shauntal: Rainbow Wing...\xfffeSilver Wing...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThey stir the imagination!

texts.original_text: Shauntal: Distortion World...\xfffeand the single Pokémon found there...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat an amazing scene!
texts.translated_text: Shauntal: Distortion World...\xfffeand the single Pokémon found there...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat an amazing scene!

texts.original_text: Shauntal: No matter how much research\xfffeI do, I still have no clue.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow old do you think Cynthia is?\xfffeAny idea?
texts.translated_text: Shauntal: No matter how much research\xfffeI do, I still have no clue.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHow old do you think Cynthia is?\xfffeAny idea?

texts.original_text: Shauntal: I chose my scarf with a\xfffecertain Pokémon in mind.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you get it?\xfffeUsing your imagination is important!
texts.translated_text: Shauntal: I chose my scarf with a\xfffecertain Pokémon in mind.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you get it?\xfffeUsing your imagination is important!

texts.original_text: Cynthia: What is necessary for becoming\xfffestronger than you are now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy answer is simply loving Pokémon\xfffewith all your heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I am, so that's all I can say.
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: What is necessary for becoming\xfffestronger than you are now?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy answer is simply loving Pokémon\xfffewith all your heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I am, so that's all I can say.

texts.original_text: Cynthia: Once every few years,\xfffethe Champions of each region gather\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand compete to see who is the strongest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAn interesting idea, don't you agree?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: Once every few years,\xfffethe Champions of each region gather\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand compete to see who is the strongest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAn interesting idea, don't you agree?

texts.original_text: Cynthia: I'd love to live here...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if I did, there would be a mountain\xfffeof research materials piled up...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I right? Cynthia, enough for now!\xfffeNext time, clean up.
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: I'd love to live here...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut if I did, there would be a mountain\xfffeof research materials piled up...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I right? Cynthia, enough for now!\xfffeNext time, clean up.

texts.original_text: Cynthia: Here's my problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a white swimsuit and\xfffea black swimsuit...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhich one would look better on me?
texts.translated_text: Cynthia: Here's my problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a white swimsuit and\xfffea black swimsuit...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhich one would look better on me?

texts.original_text: Iris: Oh, hey!\xfffeDid you see Cynthia's Garchomp?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's too cute!

texts.original_text: Iris: Soon, Drayden and I are going\xfffeto ride the cruise ship!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCastelia City is wall-to-wall people,\xfffebut if I'm with him, I'll be OK!

texts.original_text: Iris: Sometimes I think about the village\xfffewhere I was born, but I'm totally OK!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBecause I met lots of Pokémon--\xfffeand all of you!

texts.original_text: Iris: The ocean is so pretty. I love it!\xfffeSo I stayed underwater a long time.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI made everyone worry!
texts.translated_text: Iris: The ocean is so pretty. I love it!\xfffeSo I stayed underwater a long time.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI made everyone worry!

texts.original_text: Skyla: I get along well with Elesa, but\xfffePokémon battles are a different story!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're not super prepared,\xfffeyour battles with Electric types\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill leave you in shock!

texts.original_text: Skyla: Seeing the ground again after\xfffesafely passing through a rain cloud\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a violent rainstorm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeday, I'd like to share\xfffethat moment with you.
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Seeing the ground again after\xfffesafely passing through a rain cloud\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a violent rainstorm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSomeday, I'd like to share\xfffethat moment with you.

texts.original_text: Skyla: I was just thinking about that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it comes to swimsuits...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're either about self-composure\xfffeor you're about self-exposure!
texts.translated_text: Skyla: I was just thinking about that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen it comes to swimsuits...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're either about self-composure\xfffeor you're about self-exposure!

texts.original_text: Skyla: Even distant Sinnoh is just a hop,\xfffeskip, and a jump if I use my cargo plane.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut... I also love to travel the sky\xfffewith a Pokémon when it's using Fly!
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Even distant Sinnoh is just a hop,\xfffeskip, and a jump if I use my cargo plane.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut... I also love to travel the sky\xfffewith a Pokémon when it's using Fly!

texts.original_text: Skyla: Mmm...\xfffeSwimming in the ocean sure feels great!
texts.translated_text: Skyla: Mmm...\xfffeSwimming in the ocean sure feels great!

texts.original_text: Elesa: I must say it's difficult for people\xfffeto draw out a Pokémon's charm\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeif they don't have any themselves.
texts.translated_text: Elesa: I must say it's difficult for people\xfffeto draw out a Pokémon's charm\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeif they don't have any themselves.

texts.original_text: Elesa: You know Nimbasa City?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know it runs on energy generated\xfffeby Electric-type Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Just kidding!
texts.translated_text: Elesa: You know Nimbasa City?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know it runs on energy generated\xfffeby Electric-type Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Just kidding!

texts.original_text: Elesa: Getting wrapped up in worries\xfffeis bad for your body and spirit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's when you must short out your\xfffelogic circuits and reboot your heart.
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Getting wrapped up in worries\xfffeis bad for your body and spirit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's when you must short out your\xfffelogic circuits and reboot your heart.

texts.original_text: Elesa: Without a word...\xfffeWithout even a whisper...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon connect me to other Trainers,\xfffetransmitting the current of my feelings.
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Without a word...\xfffeWithout even a whisper...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon connect me to other Trainers,\xfffetransmitting the current of my feelings.

texts.original_text: Elesa: Put bluntly, \xfffeswimsuits are nothing but cloth, right?
texts.translated_text: Elesa: Put bluntly, \xfffeswimsuits are nothing but cloth, right?

texts.original_text: Lenora: Aren't Fossils amazing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlthough they are not alive and\xfffecannot speak, they tell us so much\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout the era in which they lived.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee, hee.\xfffeIt was Professor Juniper who said that.
texts.translated_text: Lenora: Aren't Fossils amazing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlthough they are not alive and\xfffecannot speak, they tell us so much\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout the era in which they lived.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHee, hee.\xfffeIt was Professor Juniper who said that.

texts.original_text: Lenora: TMs can be used as many times\xfffeas you wish, to be sure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you teach Retaliate to many different\xfffePokémon, eventually you should find\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe perfect Pokémon for it!
texts.translated_text: Lenora: TMs can be used as many times\xfffeas you wish, to be sure.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you teach Retaliate to many different\xfffePokémon, eventually you should find\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe perfect Pokémon for it!

texts.original_text: Lenora: When I was a little girl,\xfffemy dad, who was a miner, would\xf000븀\x0000\xfffealways bring back bones for me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy young heart was captured by bones!\xfffeBefore I knew it, I was a researcher.
texts.translated_text: Lenora: When I was a little girl,\xfffemy dad, who was a miner, would\xf000븀\x0000\xfffealways bring back bones for me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy young heart was captured by bones!\xfffeBefore I knew it, I was a researcher.

texts.original_text: Lenora: Recently, a girl named Bianca\xfffecame to ask me about Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer's curiosity is insatiable\xfffeat any stage.
texts.translated_text: Lenora: Recently, a girl named Bianca\xfffecame to ask me about Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Trainer's curiosity is insatiable\xfffeat any stage.

texts.original_text: Lenora: Cynthia is a famous archeologist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the course of our research, we have\xfffeshared many academic conversations.
texts.translated_text: Lenora: Cynthia is a famous archeologist.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn the course of our research, we have\xfffeshared many academic conversations.

texts.original_text: A beautiful tune is spreading\xfffethroughout the town...
texts.translated_text: A beautiful tune is spreading\xfffethroughout the town...

texts.original_text: Anville Town\xfffeRolling Out the Steel Rails
texts.translated_text: Anville Town\xfffeRolling Out the Steel Rails

texts.original_text: It's a subway map of the Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: It's a subway map of the Unova region.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, are you also curious about\xfffethat train?
texts.translated_text: Oh, are you also curious about\xfffethat train?

texts.original_text: Unfortunately, no train has\xfffecome here today.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: All righty!\xfffeLet me explain!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, that's a shame.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Oh, that's a shame.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hahaha!\xfffeYou're right.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hahaha!\xfffeYou're right.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Today's train car is a Hyperspeed Train!\xfffeIt runs faster than a rocket!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt runs quieter than an air conditioner!
texts.translated_text: Today's train car is a Hyperspeed Train!\xfffeIt runs faster than a rocket!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt runs quieter than an air conditioner!

texts.original_text: This is a Single Train! It's the oldest\xfffetrain in the Battle Subway.
texts.translated_text: This is a Single Train! It's the oldest\xfffetrain in the Battle Subway.

texts.original_text: This Super Single Train is\xfffea new mass-produced car!
texts.translated_text: This Super Single Train is\xfffea new mass-produced car!

texts.original_text: This car is a Double Train!\xfffeThis is a mass-produced car\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom a decade ago!
texts.translated_text: This car is a Double Train!\xfffeThis is a mass-produced car\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefrom a decade ago!

texts.original_text: This Super Double Train is\xfffea new mass-produced car!
texts.translated_text: This Super Double Train is\xfffea new mass-produced car!

texts.original_text: This car is a Multi Train!\xfffeFew cars of this model were produced.
texts.translated_text: This car is a Multi Train!\xfffeFew cars of this model were produced.

texts.original_text: This train car is a Super Multi Train!\xfffeThis is the latest train car!
texts.translated_text: This train car is a Super Multi Train!\xfffeThis is the latest train car!

texts.original_text: This train car is a Wi-Fi Train!\xfffeIt is the fastest long-distance\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehigh-speed train in the Battle Subway!
texts.translated_text: This train car is a Wi-Fi Train!\xfffeIt is the fastest long-distance\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehigh-speed train in the Battle Subway!

texts.original_text: As you know, this is a local train to\xfffeAnville Town! Isn't it just so cute?
texts.translated_text: As you know, this is a local train to\xfffeAnville Town! Isn't it just so cute?

texts.original_text: This train car is the kind that ran\xfffea long time ago.
texts.translated_text: This train car is the kind that ran\xfffea long time ago.

texts.original_text: This train car is a new train\xfffeto run in the future!
texts.translated_text: This train car is a new train\xfffeto run in the future!

texts.original_text: I can see!\xfffeI can see it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat lovely smooth curve! Ah, I wish\xfffeI could reach out and touch it!
texts.translated_text: I can see!\xfffeI can see it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat lovely smooth curve! Ah, I wish\xfffeI could reach out and touch it!

texts.original_text: It's for a loop line to go around the\xfffeUnova region!
texts.translated_text: It's for a loop line to go around the\xfffeUnova region!

texts.original_text: It's an environmentally friendly train,\xfffebecause they revised all the parts\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto drastically reduce power consumption!
texts.translated_text: It's an environmentally friendly train,\xfffebecause they revised all the parts\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto drastically reduce power consumption!

texts.original_text: Compared to a Single Train,\xfffethe number of parts was reduced\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it could be built for a lower cost.
texts.translated_text: Compared to a Single Train,\xfffethe number of parts was reduced\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it could be built for a lower cost.

texts.original_text: Such a streamlined and refined design!\xfffeBeauty and utility working together!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat kind of beautility is unique to\xfffemass-produced train cars!
texts.translated_text: Such a streamlined and refined design!\xfffeBeauty and utility working together!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat kind of beautility is unique to\xfffemass-produced train cars!

texts.original_text: This is a test car to develop future\xfffemass-produced cars that will replace\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe old Double Trains.
texts.translated_text: This is a test car to develop future\xfffemass-produced cars that will replace\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe old Double Trains.

texts.original_text: Improved acceleration and deceleration!\xfffeAutomated train-car controls!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's full of cutting-edge technologies.
texts.translated_text: Improved acceleration and deceleration!\xfffeAutomated train-car controls!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's full of cutting-edge technologies.

texts.original_text: This is called a pendulum car.\xfffeIts body tilts while going around curves,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it can run without slowing down!
texts.translated_text: This is called a pendulum car.\xfffeIts body tilts while going around curves,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso it can run without slowing down!

texts.original_text: This one is a little slow and heavy.\xfffeWhen it runs, the whole train sways.
texts.translated_text: This one is a little slow and heavy.\xfffeWhen it runs, the whole train sways.

texts.original_text: Compared to contemporary train cars, it\xfffehas more parts, so I heard it was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifficult to build.
texts.translated_text: Compared to contemporary train cars, it\xfffehas more parts, so I heard it was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffedifficult to build.

texts.original_text: Wooo! Cool! Super cool!\xfffeThe latest motor breathes fire!
texts.translated_text: Wooo! Cool! Super cool!\xfffeThe latest motor breathes fire!

texts.original_text: I can see it so clearly! But I cannot\xfffetouch the Hyperspeed Train!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt really is hyper technology!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs you can see, we engineers are\xfffealways seriously dreaming that someday\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe dream will become a reality!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I can see it so clearly! But I cannot\xfffetouch the Hyperspeed Train!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt really is hyper technology!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs you can see, we engineers are\xfffealways seriously dreaming that someday\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe dream will become a reality!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Do you know Tubeline Bridge?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe train that runs on it is\xfffethis Single Train.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Do you know Tubeline Bridge?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe train that runs on it is\xfffethis Single Train.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Newer trains have to be built\xfffein a way that's both functional\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand environmentally friendly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCompared to the past, they've\xfffeimproved significantly.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Newer trains have to be built\xfffein a way that's both functional\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand environmentally friendly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCompared to the past, they've\xfffeimproved significantly.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The number of parts influences the\xfffebudget and construction time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe streamlined and beautiful design\xfffeof the Double Train is still valued today.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's so lively on weekends!\xfffeOh, me? I came here to watch the trains.
texts.translated_text: It's so lively on weekends!\xfffeOh, me? I came here to watch the trains.

texts.original_text: You can trade lots of items.\xfffeIt was surprisingly fun when I tried!
texts.translated_text: You can trade lots of items.\xfffeIt was surprisingly fun when I tried!

texts.original_text: What delicious air!

texts.original_text: I wanted to get a picture from\xfffethis angle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Why do people love trains?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe it's the design, the way they can\xffferun so fast and still be so comfortable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll the essential parts work together...\xfffeIt's simple but so beautiful!
texts.translated_text: Why do people love trains?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe it's the design, the way they can\xffferun so fast and still be so comfortable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll the essential parts work together...\xfffeIt's simple but so beautiful!

texts.original_text: Trains are so cooooool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy mom brought me, but now she's\xfffetaking pictures somewhere.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Trains are so cooooool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy mom brought me, but now she's\xfffetaking pictures somewhere.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: On weekends, a lot of people come here\xfffeto watch the trains.
texts.translated_text: On weekends, a lot of people come here\xfffeto watch the trains.

texts.original_text: They are full of people today, too.\xfffeDo you also trade items?
texts.translated_text: They are full of people today, too.\xfffeDo you also trade items?

texts.original_text: This is a rare weekend when there aren't\xfffeany trains.
texts.translated_text: This is a rare weekend when there aren't\xfffeany trains.

texts.original_text: A lot of train cars have a rest here.
texts.translated_text: A lot of train cars have a rest here.

texts.original_text: If there are a lot of people,\xfffeI feel that the trains are happy!
texts.translated_text: If there are a lot of people,\xfffeI feel that the trains are happy!

texts.original_text: Today all the train cars are resting!
texts.translated_text: Today all the train cars are resting!

texts.original_text: The girl on the bridge...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe's playing a lullaby for all the\xfffesleeping trains of this town.
texts.translated_text: The girl on the bridge...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShe's playing a lullaby for all the\xfffesleeping trains of this town.

texts.original_text: Anville Town is famous for its turntable.\xfffeYou saw it from the bridge, right?
texts.translated_text: Anville Town is famous for its turntable.\xfffeYou saw it from the bridge, right?

texts.original_text: Lots of people ride on trains, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the people who drive the trains\xfffeand the people who maintain them\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave a big responsibility!
texts.translated_text: Lots of people ride on trains, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the people who drive the trains\xfffeand the people who maintain them\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehave a big responsibility!

texts.original_text: If you come out on the weekends to watch\xfffethe trains, there will be a lot of people.
texts.translated_text: If you come out on the weekends to watch\xfffethe trains, there will be a lot of people.

texts.original_text: On the weekends, many \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000\xfffecollectors gather here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt must be easier for them to collect\xfffetheir items because many people who are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetrading different items come here.
texts.translated_text: On the weekends, many \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000\xfffecollectors gather here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt must be easier for them to collect\xfffetheir items because many people who are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetrading different items come here.

texts.original_text: Oh ho! With a face like that,\xfffeI'll bet you're a Pokémon Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI work as a Depot Agent on the\xfffeBattle Subway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you tried challenging the\xfffeBattle Subway yet?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's a hot spot for those who want\xfffesome serious battling action!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut some people get too wrapped up\xfffein their battles, and there's no end\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto the lost-and-found items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's right. Nobody ever came to\xfffepick this up, so I'll give it to you!\xf000븁\x0000

Nobody ever came to\xfffepick this up, so I'll give it to you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I have a lost-and-found item\xfffethat no one has claimed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, could you take it\xfffeoff my hands?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh! I've been waiting for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRecently, we've gotten more passengers,\xfffeso there's more lost-and-found items!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo one has claimed this, so if you don't\xfffemind, could you take it off my hands?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: No worries. No worries.\xfffeJust take it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's better for a Trainer to use it than\xfffefor me to hold on to it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the item is happier, too!
texts.translated_text: No worries. No worries.\xfffeJust take it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's better for a Trainer to use it than\xfffefor me to hold on to it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure the item is happier, too!

texts.original_text: If I have another lost-and-found\xfffeitem, come get it, OK?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, if you're interested, take on the\xfffeBattle Subway in Nimbasa City!

texts.original_text: Oh, my. There's no more room for\xfffethe \xf000ĉ\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll need to remove some from your Bag\xfffebefore you can accept any more!

texts.translated_text: The result is Elite Rank!\xfffeThat's something you can brag about!

texts.original_text: Lady: Hello!\xfffeIt's time for the “What's That?" show,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere we talk about wonderful items!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday we are talking about\xfffethe Eviolite!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy Watchog,\xfffehave you heard of the Eviolite?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(Come on! Like I'd know!)\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLady: Amazing! You know it!\xfffeOK, well, I'll explain it anyway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you give the Eviolite to a\xfffePokémon that hasn't evolved yet...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts Defense and Sp. Def both rise\xfffesharply! Isn't that amazing?!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSo, we'll see you later, then!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(What? That was a really short show!)

texts.original_text: Lady: Hello!\xfffeIt's time for the “What's That?" show,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere we talk about wonderful items!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday we are talking about the\xfffeFloat Stone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy Watchog,\xfffehave you heard of the Float Stone?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(Come on! Of course I haven't!)\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLady: Amazing! You do know it!\xfffeOK, well, I'll explain it anyway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you give the Float Stone to a\xfffePokémon, its weight decreases!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's try giving one to Watchy\xffferight now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(Hey! Are you calling me fat?!)

You do know it!\xfffeOK, well, I'll explain it anyway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you give the Float Stone to a\xfffePokémon, its weight decreases!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's try giving one to Watchy\xffferight now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(Hey! Are you calling me fat?!)

texts.original_text: Lady: Hello!\xfffeIt's time for the “What's That?" show,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewhere we talk about wonderful items!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday we are talking about the\xfffeRocky Helmet!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy Watchog,\xfffehave you heard of the Rocky Helmet?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(Come on! Of course I haven't!)\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLady: Amazing! You do know it!\xfffeOK, well, I'll explain it anyway!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen an attack does physical damage\xfffeto a Pokémon holding the Rocky Helmet,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe attacker takes damage, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll try it! So I put it on, like so, and...\xfffeOK, Watchy, hit me with your best shot!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatchy: Tch tch cha!\xfffe(No fair! You're not a Pokémon!)

texts.original_text: Host: It's time for today's\xfffe“Personality Assessment and Horoscope"!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo what's today's star sign?\xfffeDr. Astropoff, if you please!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAstropoff: If you were born in\xfffeJanuary, your sign\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis Sawsbuck!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou could be described as an\xfffehonest and serious person!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI believe that you would never\xfffebetray your friends.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTry to be a big-hearted person,\xfffeand all will be well!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHost: What's the lucky item\xfffefor a Sawsbuck sign?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAstropoff: Weeell...\xfffeCarry a White Flute!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe humorous tone will put a smile\xfffeon the faces around you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHost: Thank you very much!\xfffeSee you next time!

texts.original_text: Azusa: KONNICHIWA, yo!\xfffeAre you overflowing with GENKI?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's time for this week's highly\xfffeanticipated “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is today's phrase:\xfffe“Your Pokémon is cute!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is a phrase you want to try out!\xfffeSo, what's the right way to say it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Kawaii Pokémon da ne!"\xfffeKa-wah-ii po-kay-mon da nay!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith this you can flatter that\xfffeperson you like! YATTA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrading Pokémon internationally\xfffeis sure great! Tee hee!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, be sure to watch again!\xfffeMATA KONDO!

texts.original_text: Azusa: Yoo-hoo, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday I'm a little wound up, so let's get\xfffethis “KOUKAN TALK" started!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis week's phrase is this:\xfffe“What's your favorite Pokémon?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo what will this sound like\xfffein Japanese?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Ichiban suki na Pokémon wa?"\xfffeIi-chee-ban su-kee nah po-kay-mo-n wah?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen both of you will know about\xfffethe other's favorite!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBy the way, my favorite Pokémon is\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0003!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, see you later!\xfffeJA NE! Have a good day! Mwah!

texts.original_text: Azusa: Meowdy, MINNA!\xfffeIt's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's one phrase for communication\xfffeis this:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Where did you find that?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis phrase can be useful\xfffewhenever you need it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHAI! So this useful phrase goes\xfffelike this in Japanese!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Sore doko de mitsuketano?"\xfffeSo-re do-ko de mee-tsu-kay-tah no?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I meet Trainers with a cute\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0003, I ask them\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat right away!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo with that, MATA ITSUKA AIMASHO!\xfffeAnd adios!

texts.original_text: Azusa: Hello, MINNA!\xfffeIt's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis week's phrase is:\xfffe“Nice meeting you!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUse this when parting with someone\xfffeyou just met!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt times like this, I say:\xfffe“Shiri aete yokatta!"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeShee-ree ah-e-te yo-ka-ta!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's even better when you say this\xfffealong with a firm handshake!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, that's it for today!\xfffeJA NE!

texts.original_text: Azusa: OSSU, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYesterday, I fell in love with\xfffea TOTTEMO KAWAII Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein the Musical!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is what you say at that time!\xfffe“I became your fan!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAfter that, I told it this in Japanese.\xfffe“Anata no fan ni narimashita!"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAh-nah-ta no fan nee na-ri-ma-shee-ta!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was cute!\xfffeSo utterly KAWAII!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy beloved \xf000ā\x0001\x0003!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour double-flip jump is just\xfffetoo adorable to be legal!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn that note, I'm going to\xfffethe Musical again today! JA NE!

texts.original_text: Azusa: HAAAAI! For good kids and\xfffeeven kids that are a little bad...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's phrase is perfect for when two\xfffepeople's thoughts match up, as if\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeby telepathy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“I was thinking the same thing!"\xfffe“Chodo onaji koto kangaeteta!"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeChoh-do o-na-gee ko-to ka-n-ga-eh-te-ta!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I say this, the conversation always\xfffepicks up steam, and then it can't stop!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor that reason, that's it for today!\xfffeJA MATA NE!

texts.original_text: Azusa: Hello, MINNA!\xfffeIt's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnother day, another step closer to\xfffemastering global communication!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Recently, on the way back from the\xfffeMusical, someone said this to me:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Your Pokémon looks different!"\xfffe“Kawatta Pokémon da ne!"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeKa-wa-tah po-kay-mo-n da ne!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought it could be a joke, but when I\xfffelooked at \xf000ā\x0001\x0003...BIKKURI!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was still wearing Props from the\xfffeMusical! I forgot to take them off!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeOops! That would look strange!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHAI! That's it for today!\xfffeMATA AIMASHOU! See you!

texts.original_text: Azusa: Hey, MINA-SAN!\xfffeIt's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday, I'll teach you this question to\xfffeask when you see a Pokémon that you are\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeinterested in!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Where did you catch that Pokémon?"\xfffe“Sono Pokémon doko de tsukamaeta no?"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSo-no po-kay-mo-n do-koh de\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetsu-ka-mah-e-ta no?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen you can go catch one for yourself!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, that's it for today!\xfffeMINNA, bye-bye!

texts.original_text: Azusa: ...Ne, Toru?\xfffeNinniku no nioi suru?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeKinou sa, oishii pasuta\xfffetabetanda kedo sa,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeninniku ga sugoku\xf000븀\x0000\xfffekiiteta no yo ne.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIki wo tometeiru no\xfffeatashi no sei ja nai yo ne?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Toru? No way!\xfffeWe're rolling?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeH-hello, MINNA!\xfffeP-please watch “KOUKAN TALK" again, OK?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSAYONARA!

texts.original_text: Toru: Hey, everyone!\xfffeHow ya doin'?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHa ha! Whether you're feeling good or\xfffebad, it's time for “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis week's phrase is:\xfffe“Check out this Pokémon!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is like telling someone: Hey, have a\xfffelook at my Pokémon! It's so cool! Wooo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you want to say that in\xfffeJapanese, say this!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Kono Pokémon mite!"\xfffeKo-no po-kay-mo-n mee-te!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith this, you can show off your\xfffePokémon to each other, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, thanks for watching this week!\xfffeMATA KONDO!

texts.original_text: Toru: Hey hey, is everyone\xfffeexplosively GENKI today?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“KOUKAN TALK" comin' atcha!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's single phrase for\xfffecommunication is...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Let me see your Pokédex!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTrainers are always interested in\xfffeanother Trainer's Pokédex!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is what you say in that situation!\xfffe“Pokémon Zukan misete!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePo-kay-mo-n zu-ka-n mee-say-te!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow you can have a person who\xfffespeaks Japanese show you their\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokédex! You have that? URAYAMASHII ZE!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, have a great day!\xfffeMATA NE! MINNA!

texts.original_text: Toru: YA! MINNA!\xfffeAre you enjoying life?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's time for this week's\xfffe“KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis week's phrase is for asking\xfffeyour excellent Pokémon rival\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesomething, yeah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“How many Badges have you got?"\xfffe“Ikutsu bajji motteru?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIi-ku-tsu ba ji mo te-ru?\xfffeYEAH!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWith this, you can see how\xfffefar your rival has progressed!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThrough Pokémon, everyone can be\xfffefriends and rivals!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn that note, I'm going to challenge\xfffethe Gyms and collect more Badges!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMATA NE!

texts.original_text: Toru: OSSU, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's “KOUKAN TALK"\xfffeis a liiittle different than usual!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Because today I'm having\xfffea fantastic day!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo what I'm going to teach you in this\xfffefantastic mood is this, KORE!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Are you having a good time?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo you're thinking, I want to talk to\xfffethat person! But what should I say?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, my hypothetical, shy\xfffeyoung man or woman!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI've got the perfect phrase for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Tanoshinderu?"\xfffeTa-no-shi-n-de-ru?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe perfect conversation starter!\xfffeJust run with it from here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's it for today!\xfffeSee you! MATA NE, MINNA!
texts.translated_text: Toru: OSSU, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's “KOUKAN TALK"\xfffeis a liiittle different than usual!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy? Because today I'm having\xfffea fantastic day!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo what I'm going to teach you in this\xfffefantastic mood is this, KORE!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Are you having a good time?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo you're thinking, I want to talk to\xfffethat person! But what should I say?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, my hypothetical, shy\xfffeyoung man or woman!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI've got the perfect phrase for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Tanoshinderu?"\xfffeTa-no-shi-n-de-ru?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe perfect conversation starter!\xfffeJust run with it from here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's it for today!\xfffeSee you! MATA NE, MINNA!

texts.original_text: Toru: OSSU!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRecently, I met an UTSUKUSHII\xfffewoman at a party!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe second I saw her, I thought\xfffeI'd seen her before somewhere.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut I couldn't remember her name!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, in this situation, I went up to her,\xfffeand I said this:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Dokoka de atta koto arukke?"\xfffeDo-ko-ka de a ta ko-to a-ru keh?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt means, “Have we met somewhere?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd what do you think she said to me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“What? I work with you every day.\xfffeYou're not serious, right?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIYA! It was an all-prettied-up Azusa!\xfffeSHIMATAAAA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, that's it for today's\xfffe“KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...I sure hope Azusa will start\xfffetalking to me again soon!

texts.original_text: Toru: KONNICHIWA, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe're getting back to the basics\xfffeon today's “KOUKAN TALK!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday, we will introduce a very\xfffebasic phrase!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Let's trade!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI almost don't need to explain this\xfffephrase! Let's translate it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Koukan shiyou yo!"\xfffeKo-o-ka-n shee-yo-o yo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat is important is to have a glint in\xfffeyour eye, like you're really excited!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you communicate your excitement,\xfffeI'm sure you can make a good trade!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's it for today!\xfffeSee you, everyone! JA NE!

texts.original_text: Toru: YA, MINNA!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn today's “KOUKAN TALK,"\xfffeI'm going to introduce something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethat's often said to me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“You're kidding!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere is often a lot of shocking\xfffenews in my circle of friends.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I said I saw a bright\xfffered \xf000ā\x0001\x0003,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethis is what they said to me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Jodan deshou!"\xfffeJo-da-n de-sho-o!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're kidding?!\xfffeI'm serious!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI saw a very angry\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0003, and its face\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewas bright red!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...Man, I was scared!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's all for today!\xfffeMATA KONDO, everyone!

texts.original_text: Toru: MINNA, KONNICHIWA!\xfffeIn today's “KOUKAN TALK,"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffewe're going to teach you an aggressive\xfffeway to proclaim your future victory!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“I'm going to win!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Katsu zo!"\xfffeKa-tsu zo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat is important is to emphasize the\xfffe“zo!" Be aggressive\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand show where you stand!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor example, saying it through clenched\xfffeteeth would be really cool.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou might not even have to battle! Just\xfffedeclare victory like that, and your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeopponent might get scared and run away!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo that's it for today!\xfffeLet's meet again! JA NE!

texts.original_text: Toru: KONNICHI-HELLO!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's “KOUKAN TALK," which gives\xfffeyou great tips for talking in Japanese!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeToday's phrase is this!\xfffe“What was that about!?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is something you spout out\xfffewithout thinking when something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunexpected happens!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is how you say it in Japanese!\xfffe“Nandattendayo!"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNa-n-da te-n-da-yo!\xfffeThe point is your expression.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you say this while making an expression\xfffethat says, “What?" II YO!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, that's it for today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease look forward to next week's\xfffeinstallment!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMATA RAISHU!

texts.original_text: Toru: Hello, everyone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn today's “KOUKAN TALK,"\xfffewe will teach you the question to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeend all questions!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“What's your hobby?"\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUse it with people you've just met!\xfffeUse it with people you've known forever!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Japanese, you say this:\xfffe“Shumi nani?"\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeShu-mee nah-nee?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat should get the conversation going!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, that's it for today!\xfffePlease watch again!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMATA KONDO!

texts.original_text: Host: Today, on “Eyes on Unova," we will\xfffeintroduce you to:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA couple of genius musicians who live in an\xfffeexceptionally high part of Accumula Town!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHello! Why are you living in such a\xfffehigh-up place?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWoman: I wanted to live in a house where\xfffeI could make music without bothering\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeanyone, but I also wanted to live close\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto the city and all its people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMan: Also, I thought it would be nice if\xfffeour music could ride the wind...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMinccino: Chip kwip!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHost: ...So that's the word!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you hear beautiful music carried on\xfffethe breeze, it feels magical, doesn't it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd this concludes our interview\xfffefrom Accumula Town.

texts.original_text: Host: Today, on “Eyes on Unova," we will\xfffeintroduce you to:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA talented Pokémon massage therapist\xfffewho lives in Castelia City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHello! So what got you interested in\xfffePokémon massage therapy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWoman: At first, I wanted to be a\xfffemassage therapist for people, but one\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeday I didn't have any human clients, so\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI decided to practice on a Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was so happy and so cute afterward!\xfffeSo I decided to switch my practice to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon massage exclusively.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHost: Wow, is that so? That means you\xfffecan do massage for people too, right?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, my neck has been\xfffekilling me...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Oh, well, that's...\xfffeerk... Maybe you're out of practice...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeow ow OW! OK, that's enough, thanks!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was...ow...\xfffeour report from Castelia City.

texts.original_text: Host: Today, on “Eyes on Unova," we will\xfffeintroduce you to:\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe famous fisherman of Village Bridge!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHi there! texts.original_text: Narrator: It's time for “Your Pokémon"!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn today's “Your Pokémon," we will\xfffeintroduce an energetic little one.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Pokémon of this new Trainer who\xfffeis running around Route 2 energetically\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeis the Lillipup called Ran!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIts Trainer heads for Route 2 with Ran\xfffeevery day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRan has never lost a battle there, and it\xffferefuses to lose to any Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's running around the tall grass\xfffewith its owner today as well!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was Ran, who is very energetic,\xfffebut not as much as my li'l Lillipup!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOn the next “Your Pokémon,"\xfffewe will introduce another fantastic\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon...who is great, but not\xf000븀\x0000\xfffequite as great as mine!

texts.original_text: “Unova News": Next, we have an interview\xfffewith Ms. A, who was stranded on a snowy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemountain for three days before\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshe was found in a town in the foothills.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMs. A: It was definitely Cubchoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust when I was out of strength\xfffeand about to fall asleep,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI saw it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was the shadow of something\xfffeliving, and the next day I woke up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this town in the foothills.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe people in this town say I got\xfffehere by myself, but it was definitely\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause of Cubchoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure it saved me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Unova News": This concludes the\xfffeinterview with Ms. A.
texts.translated_text: “Unova News": Next, we have an interview\xfffewith Ms. A, who was stranded on a snowy\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemountain for three days before\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeshe was found in a town in the foothills.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMs. A: It was definitely Cubchoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust when I was out of strength\xfffeand about to fall asleep,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI saw it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was the shadow of something\xfffeliving, and the next day I woke up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein this town in the foothills.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe people in this town say I got\xfffehere by myself, but it was definitely\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebecause of Cubchoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure it saved me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Unova News": This concludes the\xfffeinterview with Ms. A.

texts.original_text: “Unova News": Next up, a column in\xfffeGear Station is said to have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffemoved on its own.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe have an interview with\xfffeMr. B, the only witness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMr. B: Yup, I done seen it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll of tha sudden I done heard\xfffea noise like klink klink klink, and then...\xf000븀\x0000\xffferrrwrrrwrrrwrrrBOOM!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd the column spun right 'round!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, when I heard that klink-klinkin'\xfffeagain and looked up, something that\xf000븀\x0000\xfffelooked kinda like a little gear went\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea-flyin' away.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm shore it was that little\xfffefeller's doin'.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was one of them there Pokey-mon.\xfffeShore was.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Unova News": That concludes our\xfffeinterview with Mr. B.

texts.original_text: “Unova News": This is so exciting! We're\xfffespeaking to a woman who actually saw\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea living ice-cream cone!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMs. C: I wanted a Casteliacone no matter\xfffewhat, and I came all the way in from the\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecountryside to get one.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, I waited in a looong line\xfffeand finally bought the ice cream.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I was just about to take a nibble,\xfffethe ice cream moved!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt startled me, so I dropped it, and it\xffferan away!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeCould that have been a Pokémon?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Unova News": That concludes our\xfffeinterview with Ms. C.
