texts.original_text: “Unova News": Next up, we have news of a\xfffePokémon that can see the future.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMs. D: I was elegantly strolling\xfffealong the beach.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen I saw a Pokémon off in the distance.\xfffeIt was looking intently in my direction\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefor some reason.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt just sat there staring, so at first,\xfffeI thought it was looking at me, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt suddenly pointed to the ocean\xfffeand disappeared!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wanted to know what it was pointing at,\xfffeso I walked toward the ocean...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd then! A big boulder fell down from\xfffethe cliff above!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight where I had just been standing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure that Pokémon can\xfffesee the future!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThere's no doubt about it!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt protected the future of a\xfffebeautiful lady like me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe“Unova News": ...Uh-huh. This concludes\xfffethe report on Ms. D.

texts.original_text: There are five Battle Formats.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSingle Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith one or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer can have one Pokémon\xfffein battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDouble Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith two or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer will send out two\xfffePokémon to battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTriple Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith three or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer will send out three\xfffePokémon to battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There are five Battle Formats.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSingle Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith one or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer can have one Pokémon\xfffein battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDouble Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith two or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer will send out two\xfffePokémon to battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTriple Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith three or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer will send out three\xfffePokémon to battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Rotation Battle is for two Trainers\xfffewith three or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer sends out three Pokémon at\xfffea time, one in front and two in the back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMulti Battle is for four Trainers\xfffewith one or more Pokémon each.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEach Trainer can have one Pokémon\xfffein battle at a time.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You may trade your Pokémon with\xfffeother players.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMeeting new people could be a\xfffeshortcut to meeting rare Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In a Spin Trade, participants each bring\xfffean Egg for trading with others.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhich Egg will you end up with?\xfffeWhat kind of Pokémon is in that Egg?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's quite exciting and fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUp to five players can take part, so\xfffetry it with your friends!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You may get together with others\xfffeand draw a picture.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou all get to work on one sheet\xfffeof paper at the same time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sure a drawing made by friends\xfffewill be a memorable masterpiece!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUp to five players can take part,\xfffeso try it with your friends!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you touch an icon on the bar\xfffeon the Touch Screen below,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeyou can choose words for chatting\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeor tell others what you want to do,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesuch as battles or trades.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, players who have chosen the same\xfffeicon as you will jump up and down\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso you can spot them easily.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTouch any icon to find a person you want\xfffeto play with.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It feels so peaceful here. I love it!
texts.translated_text: It feels so peaceful here. I love it!

texts.original_text: When you're surrounded by trees,\xfffeyou feel like your entire being\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehas become one with nature.
texts.translated_text: When you're surrounded by trees,\xfffeyou feel like your entire being\xf000븀\x0000\xfffehas become one with nature.

texts.original_text: City life seems like it would be\xfffereally nerve racking...
texts.translated_text: City life seems like it would be\xfffereally nerve racking...

texts.original_text: Fresh air!\xfffeA comfortable breeze.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMmmm... This place has everything.
texts.translated_text: Fresh air!\xfffeA comfortable breeze.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMmmm... This place has everything.

texts.original_text: No surprises, no stress--\xfffethat is the secret of a good life!
texts.translated_text: No surprises, no stress--\xfffethat is the secret of a good life!

texts.original_text: Pokémon are the same! They prefer to\xfffelive in a natural setting, too.
texts.translated_text: Pokémon are the same! They prefer to\xfffelive in a natural setting, too.

texts.original_text: Here, everyone is pleasant and kind\xfffeto everyone else.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to work with everyone\xfffefor the sake of this incredible forest!
texts.translated_text: Here, everyone is pleasant and kind\xfffeto everyone else.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to work with everyone\xfffefor the sake of this incredible forest!

texts.original_text: The force of nature commands\xfffeour respect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe force of nature is what supports\xfffeall life. Nature's bounty brings us\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso much goodness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNature's power surpasses imitation!
texts.translated_text: The force of nature commands\xfffeour respect.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe force of nature is what supports\xfffeall life. Nature's bounty brings us\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeso much goodness.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNature's power surpasses imitation!

texts.original_text: Leo: Hello there! Ah... Doesn't it feel\xfffeterrific to enjoy the beauties of nature?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Leo. I come from the Black City\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 visited.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNice to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Recently, I've been feeling a certain...\xfffeHm, I don't know...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...Maybe I'm craving the city lights.
texts.translated_text: Recently, I've been feeling a certain...\xfffeHm, I don't know...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe...Maybe I'm craving the city lights.

texts.original_text: Guess what?\xfffeCheck this out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pidgey was eating food\xfffein the grass right over there!
texts.translated_text: Guess what?\xfffeCheck this out!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA Pidgey was eating food\xfffein the grass right over there!

texts.original_text: Silvia: Why, hello!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIsn't this place sublime?\xfffeThe air is so fresh. It's all so tranquil.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Silvia. I'm from the Black City\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 visited.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's a pleasure to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Silvia: Even if I take off my glasses,\xfffeI'll know exactly where I am.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat tells me is the lush greenery\xfffeall around.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You know, the time I spend here is lovely,\xfffebut something's missing...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I feel.
texts.translated_text: You know, the time I spend here is lovely,\xfffebut something's missing...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's how I feel.

texts.original_text: If my triple-strength glasses don't lie,\xfffeI met a little Wurmple-kins in a spot\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejust ahead of here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis is a special place... So serene!

texts.translated_text: Dave: 'Sup! Call me Dave!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI used to mix it up a lot with\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNice meetin' ya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI feel like this place is bold enough to\xfffetake in a tough guy like me!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Dave: 'Sup!\xfffeI've got it goin' on today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeListen up! I'm gonna spread the word\xfffeabout all the awesome things about\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenature! With a fierceness!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Dave: 'Sup!\xfffeI've got it goin' on today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeListen up! I'm gonna spread the word\xfffeabout all the awesome things about\xf000븀\x0000\xfffenature! With a fierceness!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What can I say?\xfffeWhite Forest is too dull.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt doesn't have enough hustle and bustle\xfffeto keep a guy like me interested.
texts.translated_text: What can I say?\xfffeWhite Forest is too dull.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt doesn't have enough hustle and bustle\xfffeto keep a guy like me interested.

texts.original_text: Aaaaaaaeeeeeeeek!\xfffeIs that a Gastly over there?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, whew. It's just your shadow.\xfffeBut I have seen a Gastly recently.
texts.translated_text: Aaaaaaaeeeeeeeek!\xfffeIs that a Gastly over there?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, whew. It's just your shadow.\xfffeBut I have seen a Gastly recently.

texts.original_text: Britney: I'm \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's friend Britney.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm used to living on the edge\xfffein Black City!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Britney: I'm \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's friend Britney.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm used to living on the edge\xfffein Black City!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Britney: We're up to our ears in nature\xfffehere. It sure winds you down.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCouldn't be more different from\xfffethe freewheelin' life in Black City!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Britney: We're up to our ears in nature\xfffehere. It sure winds you down.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCouldn't be more different from\xfffethe freewheelin' life in Black City!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow that I've started to think about it,\xfffeI miss being wild and free in Black City.
texts.translated_text: Hmm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow that I've started to think about it,\xfffeI miss being wild and free in Black City.

texts.original_text: Are you searching for Hoppip?\xfffeNo problem! I saw one!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeRun through the tall grass and catch it!
texts.translated_text: Are you searching for Hoppip?\xfffeNo problem! I saw one!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeRun through the tall grass and catch it!

texts.original_text: Robbie: I'm Robbie from Black City,\xfffewhere \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 passed through!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNice to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know what? I'd never imagined\xfffea place like this really existed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's nothing but green as far as\xfffethe eye can see! I'm shocked!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Robbie: I'm Robbie from Black City,\xfffewhere \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 passed through!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNice to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou know what? I'd never imagined\xfffea place like this really existed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's nothing but green as far as\xfffethe eye can see! I'm shocked!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Robbie: I was in Black City because I'm\xfffefascinated by architecture, but being\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a forest is pretty nice, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Robbie: I was in Black City because I'm\xfffefascinated by architecture, but being\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein a forest is pretty nice, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ohhhhhhh, am I bored! So bored!\xfffeI want to go back to Black City!
texts.translated_text: Ohhhhhhh, am I bored! So bored!\xfffeI want to go back to Black City!

texts.original_text: Oh! You'll never guess!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeElekid! I saw an Elekid\xffferunning off that way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should chase it!
texts.translated_text: Oh! You'll never guess!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeElekid! I saw an Elekid\xffferunning off that way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should chase it!

texts.original_text: Miki: Hello!\xfffeMy name's Miki! Nice to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI battled \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City!\xfffeSuper tough!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Miki: Hello!\xfffeMy name's Miki! Nice to meet you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI battled \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City!\xfffeSuper tough!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Miki: Ahhh, mmm... This place is soothing.\xfffeI read somewhere that the scent of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetrees and grass makes you feel calm,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein an aromatherapy kind of way.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis place seems to have the same effect!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Miki: Ahhh, mmm... This place is soothing.\xfffeI read somewhere that the scent of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetrees and grass makes you feel calm,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffein an aromatherapy kind of way.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThis place seems to have the same effect!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gosh. Maybe I've become too calm...\xfffe'Cause I'm bored now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut that's worth feeling, too,\xfffefrom time to time.
texts.translated_text: Gosh. Maybe I've become too calm...\xfffe'Cause I'm bored now!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut that's worth feeling, too,\xfffefrom time to time.

texts.original_text: Wait, what?\xfffeA Togepi just ran behind you right now!
texts.translated_text: Wait, what?\xfffeA Togepi just ran behind you right now!

texts.original_text: Ryder: Take a deep breath!\xfffeThe air here is so pure and wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Ryder. I'm from the Black City, where\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 visited. Good to meet you.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ryder: Take a deep breath!\xfffeThe air here is so pure and wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm Ryder. I'm from the Black City, where\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 visited. Good to meet you.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ryder: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen the air is this fresh,\xfffeit gives you extra power for training!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it is a bit of a problem not to have\xfffea sparring partner!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ryder: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen the air is this fresh,\xfffeit gives you extra power for training!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it is a bit of a problem not to have\xfffea sparring partner!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hyah... Hyah? Hyah?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been having trouble lately\xfffegetting into my training...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe Black City suits me better...\xfffe
texts.translated_text: Hyah... Hyah? Hyah?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been having trouble lately\xfffegetting into my training...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe Black City suits me better...\xfffe

texts.original_text: When I was practicing forehand strikes\xfffewith my Pokémon, a Machop was watching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeus in envy. Why don't you go look for it?
texts.translated_text: When I was practicing forehand strikes\xfffewith my Pokémon, a Machop was watching\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeus in envy. Why don't you go look for it?

texts.original_text: Karenna: I got here from Black City\xfffeas fast as I could!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm impressed by how \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 fights,\xfffeand I know I still have a long way to go!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Karenna: I got here from Black City\xfffeas fast as I could!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm impressed by how \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 fights,\xfffeand I know I still have a long way to go!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Karenna: Keep going! Yeah!\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are running!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Karenna: Keep going! Yeah!\xfffeMy Pokémon and I are running!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Phew... I'm tired of running!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime for another battle!\xfffeFor that, back to Black City!
texts.translated_text: Phew... I'm tired of running!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime for another battle!\xfffeFor that, back to Black City!

texts.original_text: Oh. Are you going to run with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just saw a wild Slakoth.\xfffeIf we go running, maybe you'll meet it.
texts.translated_text: Oh. Are you going to run with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just saw a wild Slakoth.\xfffeIf we go running, maybe you'll meet it.

texts.original_text: Doug: Hello, hello! I'm Doug!!\xfffeI came from Black City.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm an acquaintance of \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, there's someone who has furious\xfffePokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Doug: Hello, hello! I'm Doug!!\xfffeI came from Black City.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm an acquaintance of \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNow, there's someone who has furious\xfffePokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Doug: When I'm surrounded\xfffeby nature, I work!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's coming along pretty well!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Doug: When I'm surrounded\xfffeby nature, I work!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's coming along pretty well!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: So, I've had a lot of fresh air,\xfffeand I think I'm well refreshed!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a lot of other work to do,\xfffeso I want to go to Black City.
texts.translated_text: So, I've had a lot of fresh air,\xfffeand I think I'm well refreshed!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a lot of other work to do,\xfffeso I want to go to Black City.

texts.original_text: Recently, I saw a Shinx in this area!\xfffeYes, just being here refreshes me!
texts.translated_text: Recently, I saw a Shinx in this area!\xfffeYes, just being here refreshes me!

texts.original_text: Vincent: Hey, how are you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Black City, I was \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's\xfffesparring partner.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNot too bad of a Trainer, I'd say,\xfffebut not as strong as I am.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Vincent: Hey, how are you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Black City, I was \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's\xfffesparring partner.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNot too bad of a Trainer, I'd say,\xfffebut not as strong as I am.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Vincent: The vastness of nature\xfffespices up my life!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah, I really have taken a liking to\xfffethis place.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Vincent: The vastness of nature\xfffespices up my life!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah, I really have taken a liking to\xfffethis place.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, you know, I was born and raised in\xfffethe city, so maybe I should go home soon.
texts.translated_text: Well, you know, I was born and raised in\xfffethe city, so maybe I should go home soon.

texts.original_text: Recently a Magby was staring at me from\xfffeover there!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt ran as soon as our gazes met.\xfffeIf it likes me, it should let me know!
texts.translated_text: Recently a Magby was staring at me from\xfffeover there!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt ran as soon as our gazes met.\xfffeIf it likes me, it should let me know!

texts.original_text: Marie: The oxygen is so rich!\xfffeJust like \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 said!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn a place like this, I'm sure I can focus\xfffeand write my paper!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Marie: The oxygen is so rich!\xfffeJust like \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 said!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn a place like this, I'm sure I can focus\xfffeand write my paper!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Marie: Fresh air and a good paper...\xfffeOnce I write it, I'll present it in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBlack City!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Marie: Fresh air and a good paper...\xfffeOnce I write it, I'll present it in\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBlack City!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm good and refreshed, so I\xfffewant to go back to Black City.
texts.translated_text: I'm good and refreshed, so I\xfffewant to go back to Black City.

texts.original_text: A few seconds ago, when I was doing some\xfffedeep-breathing exercises, I saw a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMagnemite imitating me! It made me laugh.
texts.translated_text: A few seconds ago, when I was doing some\xfffedeep-breathing exercises, I saw a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeMagnemite imitating me! It made me laugh.

texts.original_text: Lena: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...?\xfffeSorry. You look like someone I know...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA person I met in Black City and had a\xfffePokémon battle with...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Lena: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...?\xfffeSorry. You look like someone I know...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA person I met in Black City and had a\xfffePokémon battle with...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Lena: The plants grow thick and green\xfffewith the blessing of the soil.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to be thankful for this as I walk.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Lena: The plants grow thick and green\xfffewith the blessing of the soil.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI want to be thankful for this as I walk.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: People are drawn to man-made things.\xfffeI miss Black City...
texts.translated_text: People are drawn to man-made things.\xfffeI miss Black City...

texts.original_text: It's so peaceful here. I love listening to\xfffethe Grass-type Pokémon breathing and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe bird Pokémon chirping...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you notice? A Ralts just ran past\xffferight behind you.
texts.translated_text: It's so peaceful here. I love listening to\xfffethe Grass-type Pokémon breathing and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe bird Pokémon chirping...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDid you notice? A Ralts just ran past\xffferight behind you.

texts.original_text: Carlos: Oh! Hello!\xfffeThere is so much to see here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just came from Black City, where I met\xfffea Trainer named \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewho was very strong. It was fun!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Carlos: Oh! Hello!\xfffeThere is so much to see here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI just came from Black City, where I met\xfffea Trainer named \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewho was very strong. It was fun!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Carlos: Oh! Hello!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've traveled in many places, but places\xfffethis close to nature are very rare!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But, hmmm... I think it's about time\xfffeto head somewhere else.
texts.translated_text: But, hmmm... I think it's about time\xfffeto head somewhere else.

texts.original_text: Starly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStarly was just there!\xfffeWhy don't you go look for it?
texts.translated_text: Starly!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStarly was just there!\xfffeWhy don't you go look for it?

texts.original_text: Molly: So this is White Forest!\xfffeIt's very different from Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, do you know a Trainer named\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 who is really strong?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Molly: So this is White Forest!\xfffeIt's very different from Black City!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, do you know a Trainer named\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 who is really strong?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Molly: I've been traveling, and I've seen\xfffea lot of places, but I have never seen\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea place this pretty before!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: This is a pretty place, but maybe\xfffea little boring...

texts.original_text: Oh, that's right! An Azurill was running\xfffehappily toward the grass!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should run with the Pokémon\xfffein the grass!
texts.translated_text: Oh, that's right! An Azurill was running\xfffehappily toward the grass!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMaybe I should run with the Pokémon\xfffein the grass!

texts.original_text: Frederic: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000?!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe...Oh! My mistake!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm very frustrated at losing our\xfffePokémon battle, so I want a rematch\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe next time I see that Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Frederic: Oh... Have a look at this!\xfffeMy Pokémon is so happy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon love nature, but...\xfffeI'm the complete opposite!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Frederic: Oh... Have a look at this!\xfffeMy Pokémon is so happy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon love nature, but...\xfffeI'm the complete opposite!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, my Pokémon is having fun, but\xfffeI'm starving for some excitement.
texts.translated_text: Well, my Pokémon is having fun, but\xfffeI'm starving for some excitement.

texts.original_text: Just a second ago, my Pokémon was\xfffeplaying with a wild Budew.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt ran away when it saw me, but\xfffeit really looked like it was having fun!
texts.translated_text: Just a second ago, my Pokémon was\xfffeplaying with a wild Budew.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt ran away when it saw me, but\xfffeit really looked like it was having fun!

texts.original_text: Lynette: How are you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI was in Black City, and I got to battle\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who was really strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt was wonderful.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Lynette: This environment with\xfffenothing but nature is nice, too.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's soothing.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But I'm a little tired of being out in\xfffethe countryside.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to spend time in a place where\xfffethere is more stuff.
texts.translated_text: But I'm a little tired of being out in\xfffethe countryside.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to spend time in a place where\xfffethere is more stuff.

texts.original_text: I saw an Oddish today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI haven't really seen one before,\xfffeso I was fascinated!
texts.translated_text: I saw an Oddish today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI haven't really seen one before,\xfffeso I was fascinated!

texts.original_text: Pierce: Until recently, I was in\xfffeBlack City. I also battled with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 there.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI suspect \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 likes White\xfffeForest more than you might suspect.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Pierce: Living simply among\xfffenature and enjoying your own life...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think that is not a bad way to live.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Pierce: Living simply among\xfffenature and enjoying your own life...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI think that is not a bad way to live.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I might be getting tired of\xfffethe slow life...
texts.translated_text: Hmmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut I might be getting tired of\xfffethe slow life...

texts.original_text: Today, I saw a Mareep!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's something you could\xfffeonly see in White Forest!
texts.translated_text: Today, I saw a Mareep!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's something you could\xfffeonly see in White Forest!

texts.original_text: Gene: Nature is great! But I remember\xfffeBlack City sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy battle with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 is an\xfffeimportant memory!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gene: Nature is great! But I remember\xfffeBlack City sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy battle with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 is an\xfffeimportant memory!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Gene: My hobby is meeting Pokémon\xfffein their natural habitat!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gene: My hobby is meeting Pokémon\xfffein their natural habitat!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But recently, I've been thinking I want\xfffeto test the strength of the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI've met.
texts.translated_text: But recently, I've been thinking I want\xfffeto test the strength of the Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI've met.

texts.original_text: I met an Aron today! It was really lucky!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhite Forest definitely fits me\xfffelike a glove!
texts.translated_text: I met an Aron today! It was really lucky!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhite Forest definitely fits me\xfffelike a glove!

texts.original_text: Piper: The natural surroundings here are\xfffevery comfortable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUntil recently, I was in Black City, and\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's battling style was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefairly efficient.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Piper: The natural surroundings here are\xfffevery comfortable.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUntil recently, I was in Black City, and\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000's battling style was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefairly efficient.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Piper: Leisurely time passed together\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThings like that are important.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Piper: Leisurely time passed together\xfffewith Pokémon...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThings like that are important.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But recently, for some reason, leisurely\xfffepassing time like this makes me feel\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea little impatient.
texts.translated_text: But recently, for some reason, leisurely\xfffepassing time like this makes me feel\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea little impatient.

texts.original_text: I spent today with a Bellsprout!\xfffeIt was a precious experience!
texts.translated_text: I spent today with a Bellsprout!\xfffeIt was a precious experience!

texts.original_text: Miho: Pokémon in White Forest\xfffeare so adorable!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I met in\xfffeBlack City, was pretty cute too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Miho: Pokémon in White Forest\xfffeare so adorable!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I met in\xfffeBlack City, was pretty cute too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.translated_text: Miho: Pokémon and this expansive nature!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEveryone is in their natural state,\xfffeand I think it's wonderful!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But I might need a little more\xfffethan just nature.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI have to find more things I want to do!
texts.translated_text: But I might need a little more\xfffethan just nature.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI have to find more things I want to do!

texts.original_text: In nature, Seedot and people can\xfffebecome friends...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat sure is a wonderful thing, isn't it?
texts.translated_text: In nature, Seedot and people can\xfffebecome friends...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThat sure is a wonderful thing, isn't it?

texts.original_text: Shane: Everyone is very honest\xfffein White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I just met\xfffein Black City, will like White Forest more\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethan you might expect.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Shane: Everyone is very honest\xfffein White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder if \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I just met\xfffein Black City, will like White Forest more\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethan you might expect.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Shane: Here both Pokémon and\xfffepeople can just be themselves.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Shane: Here both Pokémon and\xfffepeople can just be themselves.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But I'm worried about how this\xfffemore honest me will be seen.
texts.translated_text: But I'm worried about how this\xfffemore honest me will be seen.

texts.original_text: I just saw a Rhyhorn over there!\xfffeA Rhyhorn in its natural state... Wow!
texts.translated_text: I just saw a Rhyhorn over there!\xfffeA Rhyhorn in its natural state... Wow!

texts.original_text: Ralph: In White Forest, it's fun how\xfffepeople and Pokémon can deal with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone another directly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, in Black City, I battled\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, and we were able to show\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeach other how we felt!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was fun, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ralph: In White Forest, it's fun how\xfffepeople and Pokémon can deal with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone another directly.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, in Black City, I battled\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, and we were able to show\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeeach other how we felt!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat was fun, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ralph: I want Pokémon and people to be\xfffeable to face each other directly and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand one another.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ralph: I want Pokémon and people to be\xfffeable to face each other directly and\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand one another.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But I also think I want to promptly\xfffebe able to show people how I feel!
texts.translated_text: But I also think I want to promptly\xfffebe able to show people how I feel!

texts.original_text: I met a Lotad over there today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe communicated our feelings to each\xfffeother, and I'm still awed by the memory.
texts.translated_text: I met a Lotad over there today!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe communicated our feelings to each\xfffeother, and I'm still awed by the memory.

texts.original_text: Eliza: A lifestyle where you encounter\xfffenature is fulfilling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut when I had a Pokémon battle with\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City, something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout that made me feel fulfilled, too.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Eliza: A lifestyle where you encounter\xfffenature is fulfilling.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut when I had a Pokémon battle with\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City, something\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeabout that made me feel fulfilled, too.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Eliza: When you encounter nature,\xfffeyour heart becomes that much richer.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Eliza: When you encounter nature,\xfffeyour heart becomes that much richer.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust looking at nature doesn't fulfill\xfffeyour spirit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I've been thinking recently.
texts.translated_text: But...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeJust looking at nature doesn't fulfill\xfffeyour spirit.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I've been thinking recently.

texts.original_text: I saw a Trapinch, and it made\xfffemy heart happy.
texts.translated_text: I saw a Trapinch, and it made\xfffemy heart happy.

texts.original_text: Collin: My success story begins here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Black City, I had a rival named\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, but I don't have one here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to make a fortune!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Collin: My success story begins here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Black City, I had a rival named\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, but I don't have one here!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm going to make a fortune!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Collin: I like how everyone here looks\xfffeso happy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to make them even happier with\xfffemy business!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Collin: I like how everyone here looks\xfffeso happy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to make them even happier with\xfffemy business!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Business opportunities don't just come\xffferolling at you so easily.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAhh... I feel like Black City may be a\xfffebetter fit for me...
texts.translated_text: Business opportunities don't just come\xffferolling at you so easily.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAhh... I feel like Black City may be a\xfffebetter fit for me...

texts.original_text: Successful people are always looking up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I was looking up while I was walking,\xfffeand I accidentally walked into an Abra.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSorry, Abra!
texts.translated_text: Successful people are always looking up!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo I was looking up while I was walking,\xfffeand I accidentally walked into an Abra.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSorry, Abra!

texts.original_text: Ken: I feel that I've grown as a Trainer\xfffewho can look at Pokémon with a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebroad mindset.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I met in\xfffeBlack City, is doing these days.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ken: I feel that I've grown as a Trainer\xfffewho can look at Pokémon with a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebroad mindset.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI wonder how \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, who I met in\xfffeBlack City, is doing these days.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ken: Studying many different Pokémon and\xfffegaining a lot of far-reaching knowledge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewidens your world.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ken: Studying many different Pokémon and\xfffegaining a lot of far-reaching knowledge\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewidens your world.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But now I'm thinking I'd rather think\xfffeabout just one thing very deeply.
texts.translated_text: But now I'm thinking I'd rather think\xfffeabout just one thing very deeply.

texts.original_text: When you have a broad mindset, you\xfffenotice things about nature and yourself\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand about yourself and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw a Nidoran⑭\xfffeover there recently.
texts.translated_text: When you have a broad mindset, you\xfffenotice things about nature and yourself\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand about yourself and Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw a Nidoran⑭\xfffeover there recently.

texts.original_text: Jacques: When you see how many different\xfffePokémon there are in the world, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand there are lots of different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeanswers to problems, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I met \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City, I\xfffefelt that Trainer’s way of thinking was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone of those answers.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Jacques: When you see how many different\xfffePokémon there are in the world, you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeunderstand there are lots of different\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeanswers to problems, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I met \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City, I\xfffefelt that Trainer’s way of thinking was\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeone of those answers.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Jacques: Several different answers\xfffeexist for each problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatching different Pokémon makes me feel\xfffethat way.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Jacques: Several different answers\xfffeexist for each problem.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWatching different Pokémon makes me feel\xfffethat way.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But I want to study something\xfffewith a more clear, definite answer...
texts.translated_text: But I want to study something\xfffewith a more clear, definite answer...

texts.original_text: A variety of Pokémon,\xfffea variety of answers.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAll of them equally valid.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw a\xfffeNidoran⑮ over there recently.
texts.translated_text: A variety of Pokémon,\xfffea variety of answers.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAll of them equally valid.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw a\xfffeNidoran⑮ over there recently.

texts.original_text: Rosa: Here, you can feel growth from\xfffeday to day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, in Black City, when I battled\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I thought I hadn't grown\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeat all.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Rosa: Here, you can feel growth from\xfffeday to day.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore, in Black City, when I battled\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I thought I hadn't grown\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeat all.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Rosa: Watching the growth of nature lets\xfffeyou feel some kind of growth every day.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Rosa: Watching the growth of nature lets\xfffeyou feel some kind of growth every day.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Well, that may be true, but just watching\xfffenature gets boring sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't have anything to do.
texts.translated_text: Well, that may be true, but just watching\xfffenature gets boring sometimes.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't have anything to do.

texts.original_text: Every day of being alive means many small\xfffechanges that give the day meaning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw\xfffea Whismur recently.
texts.translated_text: Every day of being alive means many small\xfffechanges that give the day meaning.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI thought that when I saw\xfffea Whismur recently.

texts.original_text: Herman: I've settled in here now, but\xfffebefore, when I lived in Black City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battles with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000\xfffesure were fun!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Herman: I've settled in here now, but\xfffebefore, when I lived in Black City...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon battles with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000\xfffesure were fun!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Herman: Living here, surrounded by\xfffenature, is very calming.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Herman: Living here, surrounded by\xfffenature, is very calming.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But it's not like me to stay\xfffein one place forever.
texts.translated_text: But it's not like me to stay\xfffein one place forever.

texts.original_text: Oh yeah... I just saw a Porygon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo strange to see one here... It must\xfffehave taken a liking to the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to live the slow life here, too!
texts.translated_text: Oh yeah... I just saw a Porygon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo strange to see one here... It must\xfffehave taken a liking to the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to live the slow life here, too!

texts.original_text: Emi: Right now, I'm on a leisurely\xfffejourney, but before that, I had a goal:\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto win against \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Emi: Right now, I'm on a leisurely\xfffejourney, but before that, I had a goal:\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto win against \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Emi: It's fun to travel as you like, with\xfffeno particular goal in mind.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Emi: It's fun to travel as you like, with\xfffeno particular goal in mind.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: But maybe it's better to have at least\xfffesome idea of where you're going?
texts.translated_text: But maybe it's better to have at least\xfffesome idea of where you're going?

texts.original_text: In my travels through this forest, I met\xfffea Happiny! I was so happy!
texts.translated_text: In my travels through this forest, I met\xfffea Happiny! I was so happy!

texts.original_text: Grace: The beauty of the Pokémon battle\xfffeI had with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan stand up to the beauty of nature!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Grace: The beauty of the Pokémon battle\xfffeI had with \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000 in Black City\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecan stand up to the beauty of nature!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Grace: The beauty created by nature...\xfffeIts grandness exceeds human imagination.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Grace: The beauty created by nature...\xfffeIts grandness exceeds human imagination.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: The beauty I want to see right now is the\xfffeartistry of human hands.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI can't satisfy that craving here.
texts.translated_text: The beauty I want to see right now is the\xfffeartistry of human hands.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI can't satisfy that craving here.

texts.original_text: The beauty of the Bagon I just saw was\xfffenatural and good...
texts.translated_text: The beauty of the Bagon I just saw was\xfffenatural and good...

texts.original_text: White Forest\xfffePeople and Nature in Harmony
texts.translated_text: White Forest\xfffePeople and Nature in Harmony

texts.original_text: Many people have come here\xfffefrom Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter Black City and invite\xfffepeople, they might move here.
texts.translated_text: Many people have come here\xfffefrom Black City.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you enter Black City and invite\xfffepeople, they might move here.

texts.original_text: Ho! Hoo!\xfffeWelcome to White Forest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn White Forest, people live\xfffein harmony with nature and with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease listen to the voice of the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's saying “Bienvenue!"\xfffeHo! Hoo! Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ho! Hoo!\xfffeWelcome to White Forest!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn White Forest, people live\xfffein harmony with nature and with Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease listen to the voice of the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's saying “Bienvenue!"\xfffeHo! Hoo! Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I do research into the Pokémon\xfffethat live in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn theory, you should find \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffeliving in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I do research into the Pokémon\xfffethat live in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn theory, you should find \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffeliving in this forest.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hoo!\xfffeThat's \xf000ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo it lives in this forest, too!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hoo!\xfffeThat's \xf000ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo it lives in this forest, too!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What's more, you caught it today!\xfffeHo hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis means there are \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffein White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor you, my skilled Pokémon catcher--\xfffethis small trifle. Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: What's more, you caught it today!\xfffeHo hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis means there are \xf000ā\x0001\x0000\xfffein White Forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor you, my skilled Pokémon catcher--\xfffethis small trifle. Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: If you return here tomorrow, I'm sure\xfffethe forest will say “Bienvenue" again!
texts.translated_text: If you return here tomorrow, I'm sure\xfffethe forest will say “Bienvenue" again!

texts.original_text: Thank you very much for today.\xfffeSee you again tomorrow!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe forest is murmuring, “À très vite!"\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Thank you very much for today.\xfffeSee you again tomorrow!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe forest is murmuring, “À très vite!"\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm researching the Pokémon\xfffethat live in this forest. Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there haven't been any Pokémon\xffferecently, and the forest is forlorn.
texts.translated_text: I'm researching the Pokémon\xfffethat live in this forest. Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut there haven't been any Pokémon\xffferecently, and the forest is forlorn.

texts.original_text: If you see \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 in this forest,\xfffeplease let me know.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat will be proof that Pokémon\xfffeare living in this forest.
texts.translated_text: If you see \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 in this forest,\xfffeplease let me know.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat will be proof that Pokémon\xfffeare living in this forest.

texts.original_text: But--that \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 wasn't caught\xfffetoday, was it? Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want to know is whether\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000 is still living in the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe forest itself wants to know, too!
texts.translated_text: But--that \xf000ā\x0001\x0000 wasn't caught\xfffetoday, was it? Hoo!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat I want to know is whether\xfffe\xf000ā\x0001\x0000 is still living in the forest.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe forest itself wants to know, too!

texts.original_text: Did you notice the sky's beauty today?\xfffeTomorrow will be fine, too!
texts.translated_text: Did you notice the sky's beauty today?\xfffeTomorrow will be fine, too!

texts.original_text: Let's go Berry picking together!
texts.translated_text: Let's go Berry picking together!

texts.original_text: I need Berries for tomorrow's dinner,\xfffeso go pick some, OK?
texts.translated_text: I need Berries for tomorrow's dinner,\xfffeso go pick some, OK?

texts.original_text: Let's have a Triple Battle with the\xfffePokémon I have worked so hard to raise!
texts.translated_text: Let's have a Triple Battle with the\xfffePokémon I have worked so hard to raise!

texts.original_text: A Triple Battle is a new style of battle\xfffein which you use three Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease get three Pokémon together\xfffeto use in battle!
texts.translated_text: A Triple Battle is a new style of battle\xfffein which you use three Pokémon!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePlease get three Pokémon together\xfffeto use in battle!

texts.original_text: Oh... I wanted to see\xfffethe Pokémon you've raised.
texts.translated_text: Oh... I wanted to see\xfffethe Pokémon you've raised.

texts.original_text: I'll work even harder raising my Pokémon!
texts.translated_text: I'll work even harder raising my Pokémon!

texts.original_text: I have always lived with these Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmm. How would you like to try a\xfffeTriple Battle with me?
texts.translated_text: I have always lived with these Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHmm. How would you like to try a\xfffeTriple Battle with me?

texts.original_text: In order to have a Triple Battle,\xfffeyou need to have at least three\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon able to battle.
texts.translated_text: In order to have a Triple Battle,\xfffeyou need to have at least three\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon able to battle.

texts.original_text: Oh...\xfffeI hope I'll get to see them another time!
texts.translated_text: Oh...\xfffeI hope I'll get to see them another time!

texts.original_text: There are so many things to consider,\xfffebut that is part of the fun of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTriple Battles!
texts.translated_text: There are so many things to consider,\xfffebut that is part of the fun of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTriple Battles!

texts.original_text: Have you noticed it's been getting\xfffewarmer out lately? It's really nice.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, want to hang out for a while?\xfffeIf you have time, we could have a battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSound good?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Have you noticed it's been getting\xfffewarmer out lately? It's really nice.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, want to hang out for a while?\xfffeIf you have time, we could have a battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSound good?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: All right! Lucky me, meeting\xfffea cool dude like you here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's battle right now!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: All right! Lucky me, meeting\xfffea cool dude like you here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's battle right now!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Eep, my bad.\xfffeI shouldn't have sprung that on you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSorry! Forget I asked!
texts.translated_text: Eep, my bad.\xfffeI shouldn't have sprung that on you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSorry! Forget I asked!

texts.original_text: Wow! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeyou are so good at Pokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to ask you something else...\xfffeWill you ride the Ferris wheel with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI bet I get just as nervous asking a guy\xfffeas a guy would asking a girl...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're OK with that, right? Good! C'mon!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Wow! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeyou are so good at Pokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to ask you something else...\xfffeWill you ride the Ferris wheel with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI bet I get just as nervous asking a guy\xfffeas a guy would asking a girl...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're OK with that, right? Good! C'mon!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Woo, that was fun! I've been wanting to\xffferide this Ferris wheel for a long time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you have to have two people,\xfffeand I worried that if I went with my\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefriend, she'd see how scared I was.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEmbarrassing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen you came along!\xfffeHow lucky is that?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, I'm still scared of heights, but...\xfffeWith you, it was a little bit easier.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm... Want to ride it again?
texts.translated_text: Woo, that was fun! I've been wanting to\xffferide this Ferris wheel for a long time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you have to have two people,\xfffeand I worried that if I went with my\xf000븀\x0000\xfffefriend, she'd see how scared I was.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeEmbarrassing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen you came along!\xfffeHow lucky is that?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, I'm still scared of heights, but...\xfffeWith you, it was a little bit easier.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm... Want to ride it again?

texts.original_text: Hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! How are you?\xfffeWant to hang out for a little while?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe could have a Pokémon battle\xfffeand ride the Ferris wheel together!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis time, I kinda think\xfffeI won't get scared!
texts.translated_text: Hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000! How are you?\xfffeWant to hang out for a little while?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe could have a Pokémon battle\xfffeand ride the Ferris wheel together!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis time, I kinda think\xfffeI won't get scared!

texts.original_text: Hee hee hee. Awesome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, let's have a\xfffePokémon battle right now!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Hee hee hee. Awesome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, let's have a\xfffePokémon battle right now!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh. Oh well, that's how it goes.\xfffeYou do look kinda busy, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.
texts.translated_text: Oh. Oh well, that's how it goes.\xfffeYou do look kinda busy, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.

texts.original_text: Boy oh boy! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeyou are so good at Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo matter what I tried, it was all you!\xfffeI'm done with Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, shall we...ride the Ferris wheel?\xfffeEep, don't give me that look! I'll be fine!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm calm, cool, and collected.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGoing to be absolutely fine this time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh-huh...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Boy oh boy! \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeyou are so good at Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo matter what I tried, it was all you!\xfffeI'm done with Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, shall we...ride the Ferris wheel?\xfffeEep, don't give me that look! I'll be fine!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm calm, cool, and collected.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGoing to be absolutely fine this time!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUh-huh...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww... That was scary again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, you know, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, when I'm with\xfffeyou, I can almost enjoy being scared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's like you make it safe anyway.\xfffeHa ha, maybe I'm weird.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI like hanging out with you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'm looking forward to seeing you again!
texts.translated_text: Aww... That was scary again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, you know, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, when I'm with\xfffeyou, I can almost enjoy being scared.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's like you make it safe anyway.\xfffeHa ha, maybe I'm weird.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI like hanging out with you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI'm looking forward to seeing you again!

texts.original_text: It sure is getting nice out.\xfffeThe warmer it gets, the sleepier I feel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey, do you have a minute?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to ride the Ferris wheel, but it's\xfffetwo at a time, so I can't go by myself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou don't mind riding with me, do you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't have anything to give you in\xfffeexchange, but I've got a great\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon I've been raising, so we\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecould at least have an awesome battle.
texts.translated_text: It sure is getting nice out.\xfffeThe warmer it gets, the sleepier I feel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, hey, do you have a minute?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want to ride the Ferris wheel, but it's\xfffetwo at a time, so I can't go by myself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou don't mind riding with me, do you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't have anything to give you in\xfffeexchange, but I've got a great\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon I've been raising, so we\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecould at least have an awesome battle.

texts.original_text: You serious? Aww, thanks!\xfffeYou're awesome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me introduce my Pokémon. It rocks!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: You serious? Aww, thanks!\xfffeYou're awesome!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me introduce my Pokémon. It rocks!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK... Sorry to have bothered you.\xfffeI'll find somebody who's not in a rush.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave a good one!
texts.translated_text: OK... Sorry to have bothered you.\xfffeI'll find somebody who's not in a rush.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave a good one!

texts.original_text: Er, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000? Did I get that right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou rocked the house!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know I might not look it, but among\xfffemy crowd, I've never lost a battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHere I was thinking you're just cute, and\xfffethen, seriously, you ruled the battle!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's even cooler!\xfffeRight! Let's go and ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000

Let's go and ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Wh-what?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy are you asking if something's wrong?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm OK! I'm OK!\xfffeIt's all...good.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnyway, thanks, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeI figured the Ferris wheel was kid stuff.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe view was great...\xfffeGave me the shivers...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess this ride is not too bad\xfffeonce in a while.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn fact, let's ride it again sometime!\xfffeSee ya, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: Oh, hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeW-wanna hang out...maybe...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel like...having a Pokémon battle...and\xffferiding the Ferris wheel?
texts.translated_text: Oh, hi, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xfffeW-wanna hang out...maybe...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel like...having a Pokémon battle...and\xffferiding the Ferris wheel?

texts.original_text: Did you say y-yes? Seriously!\xfffeCool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew you were awesome\xfffethe minute I saw you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeReady to battle? Let's go!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Did you say y-yes? Seriously!\xfffeCool!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew you were awesome\xfffethe minute I saw you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeReady to battle? Let's go!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh...\xfffeSorry.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, when you're free,\xfffegive me a shout sometime.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSee ya, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: Oh...\xfffeSorry.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, when you're free,\xfffegive me a shout sometime.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSee ya, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: Ugh, ugh, ugh. As usual,\xfffeyou showed no mercy on me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you thought about trying\xfffeto become the Champion?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I think that\xfffecould be more than a dream for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I'll cheer you all the way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. Anyway...\xfffeLet's go and ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Ugh, ugh, ugh. As usual,\xfffeyou showed no mercy on me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHave you thought about trying\xfffeto become the Champion?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, I think that\xfffecould be more than a dream for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I'll cheer you all the way!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYeah. Anyway...\xfffeLet's go and ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hmm-mmmm... Hm, hm, hmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAh, sorry, sorry...\xfffeI was just thinking.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI feel like... \xfffeWhen I am hanging out with you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetime passes sooooo fast.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI mean, I was thinking...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHow cruel time can be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHa ha, forget I said anything!\xfffeThanks for the fun! Let's hang out again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBye, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!
texts.translated_text: Hmm-mmmm... Hm, hm, hmm...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAh, sorry, sorry...\xfffeI was just thinking.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI feel like... \xfffeWhen I am hanging out with you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffetime passes sooooo fast.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI mean, I was thinking...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeHow cruel time can be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHa ha, forget I said anything!\xfffeThanks for the fun! Let's hang out again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBye, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!

texts.original_text: Hi, Trainer. Enjoying the summer?\xfffeIt's sure hot today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's summer for ya.\xfffeWhat? You wanna ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's for two at a time, so take a friend.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? You want me to ride it with you?\xfffeSure, I guess. I'll ride with ya...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut you gotta win a Pokémon battle!
texts.translated_text: Hi, Trainer. Enjoying the summer?\xfffeIt's sure hot today.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's summer for ya.\xfffeWhat? You wanna ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeIt's for two at a time, so take a friend.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? You want me to ride it with you?\xfffeSure, I guess. I'll ride with ya...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBut you gotta win a Pokémon battle!

texts.original_text: Sure enough.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA little battle practice is a good way\xfffeto spend a summer's day.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Sure enough.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA little battle practice is a good way\xfffeto spend a summer's day.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh well. Didn't feel like wasting my time\xffferiding a Ferris wheel anyway.
texts.translated_text: Oh well. Didn't feel like wasting my time\xffferiding a Ferris wheel anyway.

texts.original_text: Nice job. I'm impressed.\xfffeYou and your Pokémon make a great team.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThanks, that was fun. See ya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat?\xfffeThat's not what I promised?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou still want to ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, sure enough, I guess...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Nice job. I'm impressed.\xfffeYou and your Pokémon make a great team.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThanks, that was fun. See ya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat?\xfffeThat's not what I promised?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou still want to ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, sure enough, I guess...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It...uh...it was fun...\xfffeYeah, great view...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? I wasn't looking at the view?\xfffeI was looking at my feet the whole time?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat are you talking about?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou think I'm scared of heights?\xfffeNah. That would be lame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hike on mountains way higher than\xfffea silly little Ferris wh-wheel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeC-catch ya later, Trainer!

I wasn't looking at the view?\xfffeI was looking at my feet the whole time?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWhat are you talking about?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou think I'm scared of heights?\xfffeNah. That would be lame.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI hike on mountains way higher than\xfffea silly little Ferris wh-wheel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeC-catch ya later, Trainer!

texts.original_text: Oh. You again.\xfffeSummer's about over, you know.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime to put the hiking boots away. Wait...\xfffeYou want to ride the Ferris wheel again...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEr...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess...
texts.translated_text: Oh. You again.\xfffeSummer's about over, you know.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeTime to put the hiking boots away. Wait...\xfffeYou want to ride the Ferris wheel again...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEr...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI guess...

texts.original_text: If you want me to ride the Ferris wheel,\xfffeyou have to win a Pokémon battle first.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? Don't be ridiculous!\xfffeIt's not an excuse. Why would I need an\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeexcuse? No Hiker is scared of heights!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: If you want me to ride the Ferris wheel,\xfffeyou have to win a Pokémon battle first.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat? Don't be ridiculous!\xfffeIt's not an excuse. Why would I need an\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeexcuse? No Hiker is scared of heights!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Oh, you changed your mind? Ha ha ha.\xfffeWell, don't feel bad if you're scared.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLots of people are scared of heights.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo need to be embarrassed about that.\xfffeMe? Scared? Ya think? Me, a Hiker?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm all that and a slice of pie. Got it?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGood. S-see ya!
texts.translated_text: Oh, you changed your mind? Ha ha ha.\xfffeWell, don't feel bad if you're scared.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLots of people are scared of heights.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNo need to be embarrassed about that.\xfffeMe? Scared? Ya think? Me, a Hiker?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm all that and a slice of pie. Got it?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGood. S-see ya!

texts.original_text: Y'know, kid, I figured you'd have\xfffePokémon that were strong and tough!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou're gonna be a big success!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYep, that was a fun battle. See ya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWha...?\xfffeYou still wanna ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEr...\xfffeOK, let's go.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSigh...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Y'know, kid, I figured you'd have\xfffePokémon that were strong and tough!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeYou're gonna be a big success!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYep, that was a fun battle. See ya!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWha...?\xfffeYou still wanna ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEr...\xfffeOK, let's go.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeSigh...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I-it was... It was fun, eh?\xfffeWhat? I what? I fainted?!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDon't be ridiculous!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a Hiker!\xfffeI'm not scared of heights.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only reason I was on the floor\xfffewas because there was gum on my shoe.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's it, kid. I'm out! See ya!
texts.translated_text: I-it was... It was fun, eh?\xfffeWhat? I what? I fainted?!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeDon't be ridiculous!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm a Hiker!\xfffeI'm not scared of heights.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe only reason I was on the floor\xfffewas because there was gum on my shoe.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's it, kid. I'm out! See ya!

texts.original_text: I can't believe how hot it is! Can you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, are you interested in the Ferris\xfffewheel? I'm here for the same thing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Ferris wheel seats two people,\xfffeso, unfortunately, you can't ride alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me think. Say, why don't you have\xfffea Pokémon battle with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you win the battle,\xfffeI wouldn't mind riding with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you say? Battle on?
texts.translated_text: I can't believe how hot it is! Can you?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSay, are you interested in the Ferris\xfffewheel? I'm here for the same thing!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe Ferris wheel seats two people,\xfffeso, unfortunately, you can't ride alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me think. Say, why don't you have\xfffea Pokémon battle with me?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you win the battle,\xfffeI wouldn't mind riding with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you say? Battle on?

texts.original_text: Sure, sure...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm interested in you because you seem\xfffeto be so drawn to the Ferris wheel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat being said, I am an Ace Trainer.\xfffeI won't compromise in battle.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Sure, sure...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm interested in you because you seem\xfffeto be so drawn to the Ferris wheel.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat being said, I am an Ace Trainer.\xfffeI won't compromise in battle.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: All right. Just as well for you...
texts.translated_text: All right. Just as well for you...

texts.original_text: Gah. I hate to admit it...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLosing to you is a complete surprise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSigh...\xfffeLooks can be deceiving, so they say...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFair enough. As I said earlier,\xfffeI'll ride the Ferris wheel with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, it's my first Ferris wheel ride.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Gah. I hate to admit it...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLosing to you is a complete surprise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSigh...\xfffeLooks can be deceiving, so they say...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFair enough. As I said earlier,\xfffeI'll ride the Ferris wheel with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, it's my first Ferris wheel ride.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I had no idea.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCall me stupid, but I didn't know\xfffehow scary altitude could be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd...now I know.\xfffeThanks to you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI mean, thank you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThank you for staying calm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me ask you something...\xfffeLet's keep the whole altitude thing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween you and me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd then, if you really want to ride the\xfffeFerris wheel again, I'll ride with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing an Ace Trainer means finding\xfffea way to conquer my fear.
texts.translated_text: I had no idea.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCall me stupid, but I didn't know\xfffehow scary altitude could be.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd...now I know.\xfffeThanks to you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI mean, thank you.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeThank you for staying calm.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet me ask you something...\xfffeLet's keep the whole altitude thing\xf000븀\x0000\xfffebetween you and me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd then, if you really want to ride the\xfffeFerris wheel again, I'll ride with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBeing an Ace Trainer means finding\xfffea way to conquer my fear.

texts.original_text: Ah. H-hi.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're calling me out to ride\xfffethe Ferris wheel again?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou see how I'm acting like it's the\xfffesimplest thing for me to conquer my fear?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can help me out. We'll battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou win, and I'll ride the Ferris wheel\xfffewith you again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you believe in me?
texts.translated_text: Ah. H-hi.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou're calling me out to ride\xfffethe Ferris wheel again?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou see how I'm acting like it's the\xfffesimplest thing for me to conquer my fear?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can help me out. We'll battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou win, and I'll ride the Ferris wheel\xfffewith you again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you believe in me?

texts.original_text: I knew it!\xfffeI knew you would bet on me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf I didn't try to conquer this fear,\xfffethen I really would be stupid.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLet's get going!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: I knew it!\xfffeI knew you would bet on me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf I didn't try to conquer this fear,\xfffethen I really would be stupid.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeLet's get going!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I'm letting myself down here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis was a chance for me\xfffeto conquer my weakness...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto change my attitude about altitude...
texts.translated_text: I'm letting myself down here.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThis was a chance for me\xfffeto conquer my weakness...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto change my attitude about altitude...

texts.original_text: My sincerest thanks for calling me out.\xfffeI'd be a fool to hang on to this fear.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you believe in me,\xfffeI believe in myself and in my ability\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto become a truly fearless Ace Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all up to me... Watch it happen!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: My sincerest thanks for calling me out.\xfffeI'd be a fool to hang on to this fear.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you believe in me,\xfffeI believe in myself and in my ability\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto become a truly fearless Ace Trainer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's all up to me... Watch it happen!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: What are you grinning for?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I imagining it, or are you\xfffelaughing at me?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNice. Nice... Well, thanks for nothing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am absolutely sure I will probably\xfffeconquer my fear when the time comes.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBecause I am an Ace Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut for now, I'm out.\xfffeBut if you keep thinking about riding\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Ferris wheel with me again, and you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejust can't help yourself, come find me.
texts.translated_text: What are you grinning for?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAm I imagining it, or are you\xfffelaughing at me?\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNice. Nice... Well, thanks for nothing.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI am absolutely sure I will probably\xfffeconquer my fear when the time comes.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeBecause I am an Ace Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut for now, I'm out.\xfffeBut if you keep thinking about riding\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Ferris wheel with me again, and you\xf000븀\x0000\xfffejust can't help yourself, come find me.

texts.original_text: It's autumn already.\xfffeSummer goes by so fast...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you know what I mean?\xfffeSee the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've ridden it so many times,\xfffebut now, summer's almost over\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand everyone's gone away...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGone to school, gone on journeys.\xfffeAnd I'm still here, all alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd like to ride one more time,\xfffebut I need a friend to ride with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo me a favor and ride with me?\xfffeIn return,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll do my best in a Pokémon battle.
texts.translated_text: It's autumn already.\xfffeSummer goes by so fast...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo you know what I mean?\xfffeSee the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've ridden it so many times,\xfffebut now, summer's almost over\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand everyone's gone away...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGone to school, gone on journeys.\xfffeAnd I'm still here, all alone.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd like to ride one more time,\xfffebut I need a friend to ride with.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDo me a favor and ride with me?\xfffeIn return,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'll do my best in a Pokémon battle.

texts.original_text: Aww. Ha ha. Thank you, young man.\xfffeYou have a kind heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, let's have a Pokémon battle!\xfffeLook out! I'll show you how it's done!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Aww. Ha ha. Thank you, young man.\xfffeYou have a kind heart.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, let's have a Pokémon battle!\xfffeLook out! I'll show you how it's done!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I see. Pardon me for being so out there.\xfffeI'm sorry for intruding on you,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea stranger...

texts.original_text: Whoops... That seemed like an easy win!\xfffeI did my best, though.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHa ha. Thanks for the lesson!\xfffeIt was fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWell, now...\xfffeReady to ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000

Nice name.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll be around here for a while.\xfffeIf you don't mind, I'd be happy if you\xf000븀\x0000\xffferode the Ferris wheel with me again.

texts.original_text: Oh, it's you. Hi.\xfffeHow have you been?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you here to ride the Ferris wheel?\xfffeI'd love to go again...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe could have another Pokémon battle...
texts.translated_text: Oh, it's you. Hi.\xfffeHow have you been?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you here to ride the Ferris wheel?\xfffeI'd love to go again...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWe could have another Pokémon battle...

texts.original_text: I'm so glad... Thank you...\xfffeYour kindness really lifts my spirits.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI know you're probably on your way\xfffesomewhere. Everyone's always busy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, ready for my best battle?\xfffeLet's see how it goes this time!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Whoops, I thought you looked too busy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSorry to have stopped you.\xfffeSee you...
texts.translated_text: Whoops, I thought you looked too busy.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSorry to have stopped you.\xfffeSee you...

texts.original_text: Oh, my. \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeyou are really good at Pokémon battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeA battle with me is not\xfffechallenging enough, is it?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you've been kind enough to battle\xfffewith me anyway.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI wish I had a...a little brother like you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSorry, I'm just thinking out loud.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on, let's ride the Ferris wheel\xfffeagain! I can't wait!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: It's kinda getting cool...\xfffeI betcha it's gonna get cold soon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAre you here to ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMe, too.\xfffeBut you've gotta have two people.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat do you wanna do?\xfffeHow about we have a Pokémon battle?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWin, and I'll ride the wheel with you.

texts.original_text: Just like that, you say yes?\xfffeYou're kinda confident, hey?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever...\xfffeOne battle will show what's what.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's see what you got on your plate!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Just like that, you say yes?\xfffeYou're kinda confident, hey?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhatever...\xfffeOne battle will show what's what.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's see what you got on your plate!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Ack. Whatever.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll be around a while if you\xfffechange your mind.
texts.translated_text: Ack. Whatever.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'll be around a while if you\xfffechange your mind.

texts.original_text: Whew... I was no match for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGuess I was the one who was kinda\xfffemore confident than I should have been!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI figured I knew my Pokémon battles, but\xfffeyou showed me what is really what!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, like I said, one ride on the\xfffeFerris wheel--over easy.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Whew... I was no match for you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeGuess I was the one who was kinda\xfffemore confident than I should have been!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI figured I knew my Pokémon battles, but\xfffeyou showed me what is really what!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOK, like I said, one ride on the\xfffeFerris wheel--over easy.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Haah! It was so relaxing to talk with you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt felt great to really let my hair down\xfffeand have some girl talk for a change.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think--sometimes you need\xfffeanother girl to talk to, and that's that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, I'm gonna hang out here for a bit!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you feel like it, stop by and we'll talk\xfffesome more!
texts.translated_text: Haah! It was so relaxing to talk with you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt felt great to really let my hair down\xfffeand have some girl talk for a change.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThat's what I think--sometimes you need\xfffeanother girl to talk to, and that's that.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey, I'm gonna hang out here for a bit!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you feel like it, stop by and we'll talk\xfffesome more!

texts.original_text: Hey! We met the other day!\xfffeGlad to see you! How're you doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're not busy, let's hang out again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't we have a Pokémon battle\xfffeand chat while riding the Ferris wheel?
texts.translated_text: Hey! We met the other day!\xfffeGlad to see you! How're you doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you're not busy, let's hang out again.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhy don't we have a Pokémon battle\xfffeand chat while riding the Ferris wheel?

texts.original_text: Yeah? You good? Yeah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor whatever reason, hanging out\xfffewith you energized me like whoa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOoh, let's have a Pokémon battle first!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Yeah? You good? Yeah!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFor whatever reason, hanging out\xfffewith you energized me like whoa!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOoh, let's have a Pokémon battle first!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww. Oh well, if you gotta motor...\xfffeWe'll have another chance to catch up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesometime. Say hi next time, OK?
texts.translated_text: Aww. Oh well, if you gotta motor...\xfffeWe'll have another chance to catch up\xf000븀\x0000\xfffesometime. Say hi next time, OK?

texts.original_text: Sigh... I lost...again!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou've got a knack for\xfffehandling Pokémon, too.\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeI'm just not in your league.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd you're smart and pretty and nice...\xfffeI gotta say, I'm totally jealous of you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeCome on, at least we can ride the\xfffeFerris wheel together.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Aww... It's over already! I knew it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen I hang out with you,\xfffetime just seems to zip by!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI probably shouldn't say this,\xfffebut I don't have a lot of friends...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo finding someone to do stuff with and,\xfffeyou know, just talk and stuff...\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeWell, it's really important to me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm, thanks for being someone\xfffeI can talk to.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnytime you wanna hang out, let me know!
