texts.original_text: It's already cold out.\xfffeIt would be so fun if it snowed.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhat's the matter?\xfffeDo you wanna go for a ride?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeOh, I get it.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou can't ride 'cause\xfffeyou're all by yourself!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey don't let you ride this\xfffeFerris wheel by yourself.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHey! texts.original_text: You do? You want to play with me?\xfffeHee hee! I'm happy!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFun! Fun! Let's battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You don't want to play?\xfffeAww. I'm bored!
texts.translated_text: You don't want to play?\xfffeAww. I'm bored!

texts.original_text: That was fun! Thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew you'd be strong\xfffe'cause you're big!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad is very strong in\xfffePokémon battles, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, he's been busy working,\xfffeso he doesn't play with me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you're gonna play with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext, let's ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: That was fun! Thank you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI knew you'd be strong\xfffe'cause you're big!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad is very strong in\xfffePokémon battles, too!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, he's been busy working,\xfffeso he doesn't play with me.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut you're gonna play with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeNext, let's ride the Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Yay! That was cool!\xfffeDid you have fun?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's been a while since I had fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad doesn't take me anywhere lately.\xfffeHe just comes home and sleeps.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, I try to have fun here by myself\xfffeuntil my dad comes back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's play some more!
texts.translated_text: Yay! That was cool!\xfffeDid you have fun?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's been a while since I had fun.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad doesn't take me anywhere lately.\xfffeHe just comes home and sleeps.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, I try to have fun here by myself\xfffeuntil my dad comes back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's play some more!

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI have a lot of time!\xfffeDo you have time to play, too?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's play!\xfffeAnd let's have a Pokémon battle!\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeAnd let's ride the Ferris wheel!

texts.original_text: Tee hee! Yay! Thank you!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm, OK...\xfffeFirst, let's have a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Tee hee! Yay! Thank you!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm, OK...\xfffeFirst, let's have a Pokémon battle!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Booo!\xfffeAre you busy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll grown-ups are busy.\xfffeI am soooooo bored...
texts.translated_text: Booo!\xfffeAre you busy?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAll grown-ups are busy.\xfffeI am soooooo bored...

texts.original_text: Tee hee! That was so fun!\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you're really strong!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI bet you're stronger than my dad\xfffein Pokémon battles!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeUm, OK, next!\xfffeThe Ferris wheel! The Ferris wheel!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeHurry up! Let's go!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Hee hee! That was fun!\xfffeYou had fun, too. Right? Right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you know what?\xfffeI like you 'cause you play with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd! You know what else?\xfffeUm, it's... I don't like my dad lately.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad and me, we're alone.\xfffeI know he's working hard, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't like my dad 'cause\xfffehe doesn't play with me or anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want him to play with me more.\xfffeWait!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll play with me again, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight?\xfffeOK. See ya! Bye-bye!
texts.translated_text: Hee hee! That was fun!\xfffeYou had fun, too. Right? Right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffe\xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, you know what?\xfffeI like you 'cause you play with me!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd! You know what else?\xfffeUm, it's... I don't like my dad lately.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy dad and me, we're alone.\xfffeI know he's working hard, but...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't like my dad 'cause\xfffehe doesn't play with me or anything.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI want him to play with me more.\xfffeWait!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou'll play with me again, right?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeRight?\xfffeOK. See ya! Bye-bye!

texts.original_text: Hi...\xfffePretty chilly out, don't you think?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeEr... Well...\xfffeI was wondering if you'd think about...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeActually, this is the first time I've been\xfffeout of the house in a long time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSince I'm out anyway, I want to get\xfffesome exercise for my Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd I want to ride the Ferris wheel, too.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo... Want to keep me company?

texts.original_text: Really? Yes? OK!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks!\xfffeYou seem like a nice person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's start by giving our Pokémon\xfffea little warm-up battle for exercise.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Really? Yes? OK!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThanks!\xfffeYou seem like a nice person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's start by giving our Pokémon\xfffea little warm-up battle for exercise.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: OK. Totally understand.\xfffeDidn't mean to intrude on your time.
texts.translated_text: OK. Totally understand.\xfffeDidn't mean to intrude on your time.

texts.original_text: Pant, pant... I'm crushed! It's been way\xfffetoo long since I got enough exercise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut...\xfffeIt was fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon also looks pretty happy,\xfffethanks to the exercise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you for having a battle with us.\xfffeNow, shall we ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been looking forward to this\xfffefor a long time.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Pant, pant... I'm crushed! It's been way\xfffetoo long since I got enough exercise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut...\xfffeIt was fun!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon also looks pretty happy,\xfffethanks to the exercise.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you for having a battle with us.\xfffeNow, shall we ride the Ferris wheel?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI've been looking forward to this\xfffefor a long time.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, thank you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry if I caused you any trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't get out much.\xfffeMy health has never been strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's been tremendous hanging out\xfffewith you today...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, thanks again, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeWhen I feel well enough, I'll be back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd love to hang out with you again.
texts.translated_text: \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, thank you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'm sorry if I caused you any trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI don't get out much.\xfffeMy health has never been strong.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIt's been tremendous hanging out\xfffewith you today...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo, thanks again, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000.\xfffeWhen I feel well enough, I'll be back.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI'd love to hang out with you again.

texts.original_text: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000. Good to see you!\xfffeIt's cold, eh? How are you doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI feel good today, so I'm out for a walk.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeit would be nice to have a Pokémon battle\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand ride the Ferris wheel together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's hang out for a while,\xfffeif that sounds good?
texts.translated_text: Hello, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000. Good to see you!\xfffeIt's cold, eh? How are you doing?\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeI feel good today, so I'm out for a walk.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you don't mind, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeit would be nice to have a Pokémon battle\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand ride the Ferris wheel together...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeLet's hang out for a while,\xfffeif that sounds good?

texts.original_text: All right! I like that answer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShall we begin with a little\xfffePokémon exercise?\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: All right! I like that answer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShall we begin with a little\xfffePokémon exercise?\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: I see, alas. You are a busy person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you have time, it would be nice\xfffeto talk with you again.
texts.translated_text: I see, alas. You are a busy person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen you have time, it would be nice\xfffeto talk with you again.

texts.original_text: Pant, pant...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill...don't have the physical strength\xfffeto keep up with you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's fun\xfffeto have a battle...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon's also\xfffeglad to see you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShall we ride the Ferris wheel now?\xfffeLet's be on our way, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Pant, pant...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeStill...don't have the physical strength\xfffeto keep up with you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut it's fun\xfffeto have a battle...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeMy Pokémon's also\xfffeglad to see you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThank you...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeShall we ride the Ferris wheel now?\xfffeLet's be on our way, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Again, sorry if I've caused you trouble.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBut, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000, since I started\xfffehanging out with you, I feel better...\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAnd, to be honest, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000,\xfffeI am very happy to hang out with you.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAs long as you don't mind, I'd enjoy\xfffehaving you hang out with me another time.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAgain, thank you very much for today.\xfffeSee you, \xf000Ā\x0001\x0000...

texts.original_text: You may trade Pokémon in two ways when\xfffeusing GTS.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may offer a Pokémon for trade\xfffeor search among offered Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You will be asked to put up the\xfffePokémon you are offering to trade.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAt that time, you will be asked what\xfffePokémon you would like in return.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf another player offers your desired\xfffePokémon in return for your offered\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon, the trade will go through.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You may search among the Pokémon\xfffethat are offered by other Trainers.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThey will all identify what Pokémon\xfffetheir Trainers want back in return.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you find one that you want, you\xfffemust provide us with the kind of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon wanted in return.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In GTS Negotiations, you set the trading\xfffeconditions based on what kinds of\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon you'd like to trade.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIf you find a person with matching\xfffeconditions, you may proceed to a\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeNegotiation Trade with that person.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn order to trade, you need to have two\xfffeor more Pokémon in your party.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: In a Negotiation Trade, each person\xfffeoffers three Pokémon to trade.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, each person will choose one of the\xfffeother person's three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: In a Negotiation Trade, each person\xfffeoffers three Pokémon to trade.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThen, each person will choose one of the\xfffeother person's three Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: You can set three conditions in a\xfffeNegotiation Trade: the level of Pokémon\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeto trade, the Pokémon you want to\xf000븀\x0000\xfffereceive, and the Pokémon up for offer.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may trade with a person whose\xfffeconditions match yours, or choose\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeTrade Rendezvous to try another trade\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith a previous trading partner.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: A Random Matchup is a battle with other\xfffePokémon fans from around the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are five kinds of Random Matchups:\xfffeSingle, Double, Triple, Rotation,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Launcher.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, Random Matchups have two modes:\xfffeFree mode and Rating mode.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Free mode, everyone can participate\xfffein battles freely.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Rating mode, you may participate in\xfffebattles after you set Game Sync, access\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Pokémon Global Link website with your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecomputer, and register your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGame Sync ID.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffehttp://www.pokemon-gl.com/\xfffe(Pokémon Global Link)\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: A Random Matchup is a battle with other\xfffePokémon fans from around the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere are five kinds of Random Matchups:\xfffeSingle, Double, Triple, Rotation,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeand Launcher.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, Random Matchups have two modes:\xfffeFree mode and Rating mode.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Free mode, everyone can participate\xfffein battles freely.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeIn Rating mode, you may participate in\xfffebattles after you set Game Sync, access\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethe Pokémon Global Link website with your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffecomputer, and register your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffeGame Sync ID.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffehttp://www.pokemon-gl.com/\xfffe(Pokémon Global Link)\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Free mode is for casual battles against\xfffeother Pokémon fans around the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel free to challenge it!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Free mode is for casual battles against\xfffeother Pokémon fans around the world.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeFeel free to challenge it!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: Rating mode is recommended for those who\xfffewant to master battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen communication is established, you\xfffeare likely to battle against a person with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea similar Rating.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour Rating starts at 1500. When you win,\xfffeit goes up. When you lose, it goes down.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the higher your Rating is, the\xfffestronger you are as a Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's one thing you should be careful\xfffeabout in Rating mode.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour record and Rating will be erased if\xfffeyou connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith a different DS System.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo please be careful if you switch!\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: Rating mode is recommended for those who\xfffewant to master battles.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeWhen communication is established, you\xfffeare likely to battle against a person with\xf000븀\x0000\xfffea similar Rating.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour Rating starts at 1500. When you win,\xfffeit goes up. When you lose, it goes down.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo the higher your Rating is, the\xfffestronger you are as a Trainer!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's one thing you should be careful\xfffeabout in Rating mode.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYour record and Rating will be erased if\xfffeyou connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewith a different DS System.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeSo please be careful if you switch!\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: There are several special rules\xfffefor Random Matchups.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAny Pokémon higher than Lv. 50 will be\xfffeset to that level for the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon nicknames won't be used.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have a limited time to choose Pokémon\xfffefor a battle and to give orders to your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon during the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't exceed the time limit,\xfffeor your Pokémon and its moves\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be chosen for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's also a time limit on the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe winner will be determined when time\xffferuns out, even if both sides still have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon standing.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: There are several special rules\xfffefor Random Matchups.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAny Pokémon higher than Lv. 50 will be\xfffeset to that level for the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffePokémon nicknames won't be used.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou have a limited time to choose Pokémon\xfffefor a battle and to give orders to your\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon during the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeDon't exceed the time limit,\xfffeor your Pokémon and its moves\xf000븀\x0000\xfffewill be chosen for you!\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThere's also a time limit on the battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeThe winner will be determined when time\xffferuns out, even if both sides still have\xf000븀\x0000\xfffePokémon standing.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: For a Single Battle, you need to have\xfffethree to six Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore a battle, you and your opponent\xfffeshow your Pokémon to each other,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethen choose three Pokémon and battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may not have duplicate Pokémon\xfffeor held items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, you can't take special Pokémon\xfffeor Eggs into battle.\xf000븁\x0000
texts.translated_text: For a Single Battle, you need to have\xfffethree to six Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore a battle, you and your opponent\xfffeshow your Pokémon to each other,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethen choose three Pokémon and battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may not have duplicate Pokémon\xfffeor held items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, you can't take special Pokémon\xfffeor Eggs into battle.\xf000븁\x0000

texts.original_text: For a Double Battle, you need to have\xfffefour to six Pokémon.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeBefore a battle, you and your opponent\xfffeshow your Pokémon to each other,\xf000븀\x0000\xfffethen choose four Pokémon and battle.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeYou may not have duplicate Pokémon\xfffeor held items.\xf000븁\x0000\xfffeAlso, you can't take special Pokémon\xfffeor Eggs into battle.\xf000븁\x0000
